sql.sql: Select Sb.* From Sb_Sbxx Sb Where Sb.Zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.sbuuid in(#macroparam#)
select sum(t.ybtse) as ybtse from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? and t.yzpzzl_dm in(?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb11_Bczl t Where t.sbuuid=?

select t.uuid, t.pzxh, t.sbuuid, t.yysgje, t.sl_1, t.ynse, t.ynse_1, t.ybtse, t.swdlrmc, t.swdlrlxdh, t.swdljbr, t.slswjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.yygmje, t.bz, t.slr, t.slrq, t.lxdh, t.slswjgmc, t.bsr from sb_yays t where sbuuid=?

select max(jkqx) as jkqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yyyf = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and hsbz = ?

select t.sspzjxbuuid pzuuid,t.sspzjxbbh pzbh,t.sspzjxbbh,t.jxsr,t.jxzr,t.jxr_dm,t.jbjxrq,t.pzgly_dm,t.jbjxdwr from pz_sspzjxb t where (1 = ? or sspzjxbbh = ?) and (1 = ? or jbjxdwr = ?) and trunc(jbjxrq) between ? and ? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.sfshtgbz='Y' and t.cxbz='N' order by t.sspzjxbbh Asc
select p.* from sb_ls_sbxx t,sb_pkqc p where t.lsmxid=p.pkuuid and t.hhljid=?

SELECT PKUUID, kkzt_dm, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, SBQX, JKQX, PZMXXH, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, HY_DM, ZSFS_DM, SBFS_DM, ZZSNSRLX_DM, JDXZ_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, SL_1, YNSE FROM SB_PKQC A WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND A.SKSSQZ <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND A.ZFBZ_1 = '0'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Xsfdctdqytzb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select t.bdbz,t.lrrq from sb_sbbd_slyryxxfds t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq=? and t.skssqz=? and t.ddbfl=?
SELECT * FROM Cs_Sb_Sdsswsxdzb t WHERE t.fbh IN (#macroparam#) AND t.yxbz='Y'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qycznstzmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT FB.* FROM SB_WTDZSKSHZB ZB, SB_WTDZSKSHFB FB WHERE ZB.ZBUUID = FB.ZBUUID AND ZB.DJXH = ? AND ZB.SKSSQQ = TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND ZB.SKSSQZ = TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND FB.YXBZ = 'Y'
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb3_Nstz t Where t.sbuuid=? Order By t.ewbhxh Asc

Select T1.Jsyj, T2.Qycyrs_Qnpjrs, T2.Zcze_Qnpjs, T2.Hy_Dm From Sb_Sbxx T1, Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb5_Ssyh T2 Where T1.Sbuuid = T2.Sbuuid And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq >= ? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? Order By T1.Lrrq Desc
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_JMQYGQZH t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=?

select a.* , b.*, c.*, a.lrrq as cjrq from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB b, SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB_MX c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zlfsbbz,'N')='N' and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.kfqynsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.kfbdcxmbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.gfznsrsbh = ?) and a.ssqq >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ssqz <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and (1 = #macroparam# or c.dh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lc_1 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.dyh = ?)

select t.dksquuid, t.gldksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.srze, t.yxkcje, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.sskcs, t.ynsfe, t.jmsfe, t.yjsfe, t.ybsfe, t.zszsxm_dm, t.zszspm_dm, t.zszszm_dm, t.jmspjguuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.jyxm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.nsqnyjse, t.sfmxuuid, t.lzsfmxuuid, t.zjsrsfft, t.qxq, t.qxz, t.bz from fp_dk_sfmx t, fp_dk_sq sq where 1 = 1 and t.dksquuid = sq.dksquuid #macroparam# and sq.djxh = ? and t.zjsrsfft is null and t.qxq is null and t.qxz is null and (1 = #macroparam# or sq.sqrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or sq.sqrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zsbz = 'Y'
select ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 skssqz from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx where djxh = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N' and skssqz < to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1 group by ysuuid

SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.SHBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SBBZ = 'Y' AND T.SSPZJXBBH IS NULL AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND TRUNC(T.JBRQ_1) BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select max(sbqx) as sbqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yyyf = ? and (zclxfl = ? or zclxfl is null) and (zsxm_dm = ? or zsxm_dm is null) and (1 = ? or zspm_dm = ? or zspm_dm is null) and (hsbz = ? or hsbz is null) and (sbqx_dm = ? or hsbz = '2' or hsbz is null)
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Waqzfsztzmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB WHERE BGBM IN (#macroparam#) AND YXBZ = ? AND FYXXUUID = ?
select a.* from sb_yqwsbqc a,sb_ls_sbxx b where a.sybh_1=b.sybh_1 and b.hhljid=?

SELECT distinct (zqjm.jmuuid), ZQJM.* FROM SB_SBXX SBXX, SB_ZQJM ZQJM WHERE SBXX.PZXH = ZQJM.PZXH AND SBXX.DJXH = ZQJM.DJXH AND SBXX.ZSXM_DM = '10104' AND SBXX.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SBXX.ZSDLFS_DM = '0' AND SBXX.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR ZQJM.CZLX_DM = '94') AND ZQJM.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND SBXX.DJXH = ? AND NVL(?,NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ,DATE'0001-01-01'))<=NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ,DATE'0001-01-01') AND NVL(?,NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ,DATE'0001-01-01'))>=NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ,DATE'0001-01-01') AND NVL(?,NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ,DATE'0001-01-01'))>=NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ,DATE'0001-01-01') AND NVL(?,NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ,DATE'0001-01-01'))<=NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ,DATE'0001-01-01')

select jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <= ? and yyyf = ? and jjrbz = 'Y' order by swjg_dm, jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq

with swjg as (select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, t3.pzzg, t4.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, cs_pz_pzzgb t3, dm_gy_swjg t4 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t1.ypruuid = ? and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t.pzzg_dm = t3.pzzg_dm and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t.kpjg_dm = t4.swjg_dm and t.sddwdjxh is null and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, t3.pzzg, t4.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, cs_pz_pzzgb t3, dm_gy_swjg t4 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t1.ypruuid = ? and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t.pzzg_dm = t3.pzzg_dm and t1.yprlx_dm in ('20', '31') and t.kpjg_dm = t4.swjg_dm and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, '' as pzzg_dm, '' as pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, '' as pzzg, t3.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk_yhp t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, dm_gy_swjg t3 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and t.kpjg_dm = t3.swjg_dm and t1.ypruuid = ? and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t.sddwdjxh is null and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, '' as pzzg_dm, '' as pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, '' as pzzg, t3.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk_yhp t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, dm_gy_swjg t3 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and t.kpjg_dm = t3.swjg_dm and t1.ypruuid = ? and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t1.yprlx_dm in ('20', '31') and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) select * from swjg order by pzzl_dm, pzhm, tfrq desc

Select Nvl(Sum(a.Ybtse), 0) As Sqyjje From Sb_Sbxx a, Sb_Sds_Jmhd_Yjnd b Where a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And a.Pzxh = b.Pzxh And a.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And a.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And a.Djxh = ? And a.Skssqq >= ? And a.Skssqz <= ? And a.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And b.Yjdndsbbj = ? AND a.zsxm_dm='10104' and a.ybtse>1

SELECT A.DKSQUUID, A.DJXH, A.DKFPLB_DM, A.LCSLID, A.SQRQ, A.KPJE, A.SQRXM, A.SLR_DM, A.SLRQ, A.SLSWJG_DM, A.ZFBZ_1, A.ZFRQ_1, A.ZFR_DM, A.ZRRBZ, A.KJBZ, A.PZXH, A.SJGSDQ, A.LRR_DM, A.LRRQ, A.XGR_DM, A.XGRQ, A.SQDHM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.HY_DM, A.DKSQJE, A.YBSFE, A.JMSBZ, A.JMSLX_DM, A.KPLX_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JMYY, A.FYBH, A.ZJSRSFFT, A.QXQ, A.QXZ, A.SFZCZF, A.FCJYCJXXUUID, A.HTBH,HZDKLX_DM, SBUUID FROM FP_DK_SQ A INNER JOIN FP_DK_FPKJXX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE B.FP_DM = ? AND B.FPHM = ?

select t.swsx_dm, t.zsxm_dm, t.jmxmxl_dm, t.jmxmdl_dm, t.jmlx_dm, t.jmzlx_dm, t.jmsl, t.jmed, t.jmfd, t.fedslklrlx_dm, t.ssjmsblm_dm, t.swjg_dm from cs_swsx_zsxm t where t.swsx_dm =? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg where swjg.yxbz='Y' and swjg.xybz='Y' connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm =?) order by t.swjg_dm desc

select t.djxh gsdjxh, t.skssqq skssqq, t.skssqz skssqz, t.sbuuid zssbuuid, t.pzxh zspzxh, t.yzpzzl_dm zsyzpzzlDm, t.zsxm_dm zszsxmDm, t.zspm_dm zszspmDm, t.zszm_dm zszszmDm, t.ysx bhssre, t.ybtse zzsdqybtse, y.mdtytse zzsdqmdse, t.ynse ynse from sb_sbxx t, sb_zzs_ybnsr y where t.sbuuid = y.sbuuid and t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and y.ewblxh = 1 and t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select b.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and b.gmfdjxh = ? and b.fybh = ? and nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'N'
select b.* from sb_cxs_fcjy b where b.fcjycjxxuuid in (select a.fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjy a where a.pzxh = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.sspkjbdmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzsl pzsl, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm from pz_sspkjbdmxb t where t.sspkjbduuid= ?
SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(T.FFRQ + NUMTODSINTERVAL(1, 'SECOND')), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.LQDWR = ?
select t.ssjmxz_dm, '' jmwj_dm from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swsx_dm = ?
select * from sb_tdzzssb_wpxskcxmmx t where t.sbuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF T WHERE T.YZPZXH = ? AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select b.zspm_dm, b.ybtse from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.yzpzzl_dm ='BDA0610681' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and b.sybh_1 = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ?
select ysx ,t.zspm_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.zsxm_dm='10101' and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.djxh =? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=?

select t.djxh as djxh, t.pzxh as lyuuid1, t.yzpzzl_dm, '' AS wspzzl_dm, '' as wspzzg, '' as wspzhm, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.sl_1 as sl, t.jsyj as jsyj, t.ynse as fpdksk, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.hy_dm, t.lrrq as tfrq, '' as sksx_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh =? and (1 = ? or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and exists(select 1 from zs_yjsf yj where yj.djxh =? and t.pzxh =yj.yzpzxh and t.zsxm_dm=yj.zsxm_dm and t.zspm_dm=yj.zspm_Dm and yj.skcllx_dm ='6' and (1 = ? or yj.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or yj.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or yj.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or yj.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) ) union all select t.djxh as djxh, t.pzxh as lyuuid1, t.yzpzzl_dm, '' AS wspzzl_dm, '' as wspzzg, '' as wspzhm, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.sl_1 as sl, t.jsyj as jsyj, t.ynse as fpdksk, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.hy_dm, t.lrrq as tfrq, '' as sksx_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh =? and (1 = ? or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = ? or t.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.ybtse=0 and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select zg.pzzguuid, zg.pzzl_dm, zg.pzzguuid, zg.pzzg from cs_pz_pzzgb zg where zg.swjg_dm = ? and zg.pzzl_dm = ? and zg.pzzg_dm = ? and sysdate between zg.yxqsrq and zg.yxzzrq
SELECT JDCFPUUID, DKSQUUID, XHFKHYH_DM, XHFYHZH, LZFPDM, LZFPHM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM FP_DK_JDCFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
SELECT ZZSFPMXUUID, ZZSFPUUID, HWLWMC, GGXH, DWSL_DM, HLSL, DJ, JE, SLZSL, SE, JSXJ, SJGSDQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XSE, KCE FROM FP_DK_ZZSFP_HLMX WHERE ZZSFPUUID = ?
SELECT T.PZSSBGDUUID as uuid,T.PZSSBGDBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZSSBGDZB T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SQDW_DM = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZSSBGDBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.PZSSBGDBH
select b.* from sb_zzs_xgm_fb_flzl b where b.sbuuid= ?

select a.zspm_dm code, a.zspmmc caption, a.jldw_dm, b.sl_1 from (select t.zspm_dm, t.zspmmc, t.jldw_dm, t.yxbz, t.xybz from dm_gy_zspm t connect by prior t.zspm_dm = t.sjzspm_dm and t.zspm_dm != ? start with t.zspm_dm =?)a, cs_gy_glb_zspm b where a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.swjg_dm= ? and to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') between b.yxqq and b.yxqz
select * from PZ_FLZ where yspzbh_1=? and pzdw_dm=? and yspzmxhm in (#macroparam#) and zfbz_1='N'
select * from pz_sspzjcqdzb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.zfbz_1='N'

SELECT DISTINCT T.* FROM DM_PZ_PZZL T START WITH T.PZZL_DM IN (SELECT PZZL_DM FROM DM_PZ_PZZL WHERE PZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND XYBZ = 'Y' AND YXBZ = 'Y' AND WHPBZ = 'N' AND PZDL_DM != 'Y') CONNECT BY T.PZZL_DM = PRIOR T.SJPZZL_DM

select distinct b.*, '' as grzffcslx_dm, null as bcjydfzzsslhzsl, ''cezszzsbz, ''bcsbjysfsyzrfzkp, ''cjjgsfhs, a.sbsx_dm_1, '' qsqszylb_dm, a.fwuuid, a.ysbbz, a.ewbhxh, a.nextfcjycjxxuuid, a.dj, a.dqysskssyf, a.dqyskje, 0 as grsds_kchlfy, 0 as tdzzs_kccb, 0 as wbmjyjg, a.fcjycjxxuuid, a.fyjbxxuuid, ''zlfclfbz, 0 as jyjg, ''htbh, 0 as htje, ''qsqszydx_dm, ''qsqszyyt_dm, ''fcjyfs_dm, ''kfbdcxmbh, ''sfptzfbz, a.bdcxmmc, a.fwcqzsh, a.tdsyzbh, null as htqdsj, a.bz, a.zfbz_1, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, 0 as pgqs_jyjg from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'Y' and a.nextfcjycjxxuuid is null and #macroparam# union all select distinct b.*, a.grzffcslx_dm, a.bcjydfzzsslhzsl, a.cezszzsbz, a.bcsbjysfsyzrfzkp, a.cjjgsfhs, a.sbsx_dm_1, a.qsqszylb_dm, a.fwuuid, a.ysbbz, a.ewbhxh, a.nextfcjycjxxuuid, a.dj, a.dqysskssyf, a.dqyskje, a.grsds_kchlfy, a.tdzzs_kccb, a.wbmjyjg, a.fcjycjxxuuid, a.fyjbxxuuid, a.zlfclfbz, a.jyjg, a.htbh, a.htje, a.qsqszydx_dm, a.qsqszyyt_dm, a.fcjyfs_dm, a.kfbdcxmbh, a.sfptzfbz, a.bdcxmmc, a.fwcqzsh, a.tdsyzbh, a.htqdsj, a.bz, a.zfbz_1, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, a.pgqs_jyjg from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid left join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf d on a.fcjycjxxuuid = d.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'N' and a.nextfcjycjxxuuid is null and #macroparam#
SELECT UUID, NSRSBH, SWRY_DM, DJXH, SWJG_DM, XYBZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ FROM FP_DKFP_TDZSBM T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ?

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PZ_SSPZLFDMXB A, PZ_SSPZLFDZB B WHERE A.PZLFDUUID = B.PZLFDUUID AND A.PZZL_DM = ? AND (A.PZZG_DM = ? OR A.PZZG_DM IS NULL) AND (A.PZQSHM = ? OR A.PZQSHM IS NULL) AND (A.PZZZHM = ? OR A.PZZZHM IS NULL) AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.GDBZ = 'N'

select distinct c.djxh, c.nsrsbh, c.nsrmc as czrmc, c.sfzjzl_dm as czrsfzjzl_dm, c.sfzjhm as czrsfzjzlDm, c.scqd_fwfs, c.scqd_fwsj, c.scqd_fwcb, b.fybh, a.fwcqzsh, b.tdsybh, b.tnmj as fwmj, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.tdfwdz as xxdz, b.fwsdswjg_dm, b.fwsdswjg_dm as zgswskfj_dm, b.jdxz_dm, a.htbh, a.htqdsj, a.jyjg, b.mj as zrmj, a.fcjycjxxuuid as uuid, a.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'Y' and c.zrfcsfbz = '0' and #macroparam#

SELECT zzsfpuuid, dksquuid, ghfdjxh, ghfkhyh_dm, ghfyhzh, ghfdz, ghflxdh, sfdkhzfp, kjhzzzszyfptzdhm, lzfpdm, lzfphm, xhfkhyh_dm, xhfyhzh, xhfdz, xhflxdh, ghfyhyywdmc, xhfyhyywdmc, zspm_dm, yjse, jshj, ghfnsrmc, ghfnsrsbh, bz, xhfdjxh, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq FROM fp_dk_zzsfp where xhfdjxh = ? order by lrrq desc
SELECT B.FYBH, A.* FROM SB_CXS_FYXXCJB B, SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB A WHERE A.FYXXUUID = B.FYXXUUID and a.yxbz='Y' and b.yxbz='Y' and djxh=? and #macroparam#

select distinct f.fybh, f.tdfwdz, c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.htbh, k.zsxm_dm, k.zspm_dm, k.skssqq, k.jsyj, k.skssqz, k.ybtse, k.pzxh, k.djxh from sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf m, sb_cxs_fcjy j, sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx k where f.fyjbxxuuid = c.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = j.fcjycjxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = m.fcjycjxxuuid and j.fcjyuuid = k.fcjyuuid and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and m.zrfcsfbz = '0' and m.djxh = ? and k.djxh = ? and c.zlfclfbz = '1' and (1 = #macroparam# or k.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select t.pzzl_dm as code, t.pzzlmc as caption, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzlmc, t.xjpzbz, t.whpbz from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm = ?
select * from pz_yprpzhdxxb where ypruuid=? and sjgsdq like ?

SELECT T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.SJGSDQ, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.YBSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YJSFE, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.SFL, T.JSFYJ, T.YXKCJE, T.SRZE, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSXM_DM, T.SKSSQZ, T.SKSSQQ, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DKSQUUID, T.SFMXUUID, T.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.DJXH FROM FP_DK_SFMX T, FP_DK_SQ A WHERE T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID AND A.DKSQUUID =? AND t.zszsxm_dm IS not NULL AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID)

select a.*,b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.nsrzt_dm,b.hy_dm,b.djzclx_dm from sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cj a,dj_nsrxx b where a.zgswskfj_dm = ? and a.djxh = b.djxh(+) and nvl(b.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y' and nvl(a.pkbz,'N')='Y' and a.fcyz-a.czwyz>0 and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.SYQZZRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.CSQDRQ <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.SYQZZRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.CSQDRQ
select distinct pzzl.pzzl_dm pzzl_dm, pzzl.pzzlmc pzzlmc from pz_sspzlfdmxb lfd, dm_pz_pzzl pzzl where lfd.pzzl_dm = pzzl.pzzl_dm and pzzl.whpbz = 'Y' and lfd.sjgsdq like ?
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb_Hsyq t Where t.sbuuid=?

Select Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Yysr), 0) As Yysr, Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Yycb), 0) As Yycb, Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Bjdlrkse), 0) As Lrze, Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Agdkmbdyqndkse), 0) As Agdkmbdyqndkseljje, Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Ynssde), 0) As Sjlre, Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Ynqysdse), 0) As Ynqysdsebqje, Nvl(Sum(T2.Yfsbje_Sjynqysdse), 0) As Sjynqysdse From Sb_Sbb T1, Sb_Sds_Fjmjs_Jd T2 Where T1.Sbuuid = T2.Sbuuid And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq >= ? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And T1.Zfbz_1 = ? Order By T1.Skssqz Desc

select * from sb_sbb t where t.sbuuid = ?
select * from sb_cgs_clzdjsjghd t where t.nd = ? and trim(t.yf) = ? and t.gccbz = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select ls.xh, ls.jylx_dm, ls.jyfhbz lsjyfhbz, gz.jyfhbz, ls.uuid, lx.jylx_mc from ZS_LS_DR_KJ_JYGZ ls, Dm_Kj_Jygz gz, dm_kj_jylx lx where ls.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm and ls.jylx_dm = gz.jylx_dm and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and gz.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 = gz.jxfx1_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 = gz.jxfx1_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 = gz.jxfx1_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 = gz.jxfx1_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 = gz.jxfx1_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 = gz.jxfx1_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 = gz.jxfx1_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz7 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 = gz.jxfx2_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 = gz.jxfx2_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 = gz.jxfx2_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 = gz.jxfx2_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 = gz.jxfx2_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 = gz.jxfx2_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 = gz.jxfx2_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz7 is null))

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.ssqq skssqq, t.ssqz skssqz, t.zszm_dm, t.sybh_1, t.yzpzzl_dm from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where x.zfbz_1 = 'N' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.djxh = x.djxh and x.zsxm_dm = nvl(t.zsxm_dm,x.zsxm_dm) and nvl(x.zspm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zspm_dm,nvl(x.zspm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.zszm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zszm_dm,nvl(x.zszm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.skssqq,date'1-1-1') < nvl(t.ssqq,nvl(x.skssqq,date'1-1-1'))+1 and nvl(x.skssqz,date'1-1-1') > nvl(t.ssqz,nvl(x.skssqz,date'1-1-1'))-1 and nvl(x.yzpzzl_dm,'X') = nvl(t.yzpzzl_dm,nvl(x.yzpzzl_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.sbsx_dm_1,'X') = nvl(t.sbsx_dm_1,nvl(x.sbsx_dm_1,'X')) and (t.sybh_1 is null or exists (select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg s where s.pzxh = x.pzxh)) and t.hhljid = ?

select t.uuid,t.sbuuid,t.pzxh,t.glfmc,t.gdglflx_dm,t.gjhdqsz_dm,t.sfzjlx_dm,t.nsrsbh,t.qsrq,t.jzrq, nvl(t.glgxlx,t.glgxlx_dm) as glgxlx_dm from SB_QYNDGLBG_GLGXB t where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?

select cldauuid, cldabh, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, clsbdh, nsrsfzjzl_dm, zjhm, hy_dm, djzclx_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clcp, clxh, zypz, cldw, zws, pql, fdjhm, clgzdsx_dm, cdsx, gzrq, ffrq, mzsbz, ewtmc, wszmhm, jdrq, pzhm_1, wspzzl_dm, wspzhm, sjse, znj, znjpzhm, djr_dm, djrq, jdcxszhm, yzpzxh, cljdlx_dm, cldazt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, clscqymc, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, cllx_dm, cldabh, cdsx, fpjgzsbz, xnyqclx_dm, jdczccchgz, zsjg_dm, fpjg from sb_cgs_cldaxx t where t.jdczccchgz = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.cldazt_dm = ? order by t.lrrq desc

SELECT t.* from SB_SDS_FJMJS_ND t, SB_SBXX s where s.DJXH = ? and s.ZSFS_DM = ? and s.YZPZZL_DM = ? and s.SBUUID = t.SBUUID and s.SBSX_DM_1 = '11' and s.zfbz_1 = 'N' and trunc(s.SKSSQQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and trunc(s.SKSSQZ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
select b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_gsxjyqtfpbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = ? and b.skssswjg_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in (#macroparam#) and a.sbsx_dm_1 = ?

select distinct t.djxh, t.nsrlx, t.fybh, t.hy_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.fcmc, t.fwcqzsh, t.fwzldz, t.fcyt_dm, t.fcsnsrlx, e.nsqx_dm, e.sbqx_dm, e.jkqx_dm, f.nsrsbh, t1.czsyuuid, t1.fyxxuuid, t1.zspm_dm, t1.czmj, t1.htzjzsr, t1.htydzlqq, t1.htydzlqz, t1.sbzjsr, t1.sbzjsszlqq, t1.sbzjsszlqz, t1.yxqq, t1.yxqz, t1.bgbm, t.fybh as sybh_1 from sb_cxs_czjzsymxb t1 inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb t on t1.fyxxuuid = t.fyxxuuid and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.bgbm =? and t.zgswskfj_dm =? left join rd_sfzrdxxb e on t.djxh = e.djxh and e.zsxm_dm =? and e.zspm_dm =? and e.rdyxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and e.rdyxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and e.yxbz = 'Y' and e.zsdlfs_dm in (?, ?) inner join DJ_LS_DJXHNSRSBH f on t.djxh = f.djxh and t1.sbzjsszlqq <= sysdate and t1.sbzjsszlqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), ?)

select t.pkuuid, t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm from sb_sbf_pkqc t where t.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and nvl(t.kkzt_dm, 'x') in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_ls_pkqc ls where ls.yusbxh = t.yusbxh and ls.hhljid=?)) and t.zfbz_1 = '0'

select count(1) cfnum,b.sybh_1 from sb_sbb a,sb_sysbmxbg b,sb_ls_sbxx ls where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.sybh_1=ls.sybh_1 and b.skssqq=? and b.skssqz=? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') group by b.sybh_1
select * from sb_zzs_ldsklsz where djxh=? and skssqq >=? and skssqz <=?

SELECT A.PZXH YZPZXH,A.ZSXM_DM,A.ZSPM_DM,A.SKSSQQ,A.SKSSQZ,A.SDKDJDSDJSE SJJE FROM SB_DKDJ_FB_SKMXBG A ,SB_SBXX B WHERE A.SBUUID=B.SBUUID AND B.DJXH=? AND A.BKJDJXH=? AND (B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR B.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND B.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1','4','5') UNION ALL SELECT A.PZXH YZPZXH,A.ZSXM_DM,A.ZSPM_DM,A.SKSSQQ,A.SKSSQZ,A.SDKDJDSDJSE SJJE FROM SB_DKDJ_FB_CCSMXBG A ,SB_SBXX B WHERE A.SBUUID=B.SBUUID AND B.DJXH=? AND A.BKJDJXH=? AND (B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR B.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND B.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1','4','5')

select max(jkqx) as jkqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm= any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm= swjg_dm) and xybz='Y' and yyyf = ? and zclxfl = ? and zsxm_dm=? and (1=? or zspm_dm=?) and hsbz = ? and jkqx_dm = ?

SELECT 1 FROM ZS_YDTXX T WHERE T.YDTLYUUID IN (SELECT B.SBXXUUID FROM SB_SBXX B WHERE B.PZXH = ? AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.YZPZZL_DM = ?) AND (T.CZLX_DM != '66' AND T.CZLX_DM != '68' AND T.CZLX_DM != '10' AND T.CZLX_DM != '17' AND T.CZLX_DM != '18') AND T.TZLX_DM = '3'

select * from pz_pzgly t where t.pzhsjg_dm in (select t1.pzhsjg_dm from pz_ypr t1 where t1.swry_dm = ? and t1.yprlx_dm =? and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq) and sysdate between t.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t.pzhsjgyxzzrq

select pzglyuuid, pzhsjg_dm, pzgly_dm, sjhsjg_dm, jgjc_dm, pzhsjgyxqsrq, pzhsjgyxzzrq, gkjsc_1, sjgsdq from pz_pzgly t where t.sjhsjg_dm in (select w.pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly w where w.pzgly_dm = ? and sysdate between w.pzhsjgyxqsrq and w.pzhsjgyxzzrq) and sysdate between t.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t.pzhsjgyxzzrq
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb_Hhrdk_Zb t Where t.sbuuid=?

select sum(zzs) zzs, sum(xfs) xfs, sum(qysds) qysds, sum(grsds) grsds from (SELECT case when tt.zsxm_dm = '10101' and TT.sksx_dm not in ('0105', '0106', '0107')then -TT.SE else 0 end zzs, case when tt.zsxm_dm = '10102' and TT.sksx_dm not in ('0105', '0106', '0107')then -TT.SE else 0 end xfs, case when tt.zsxm_dm = '10104' and TT.sksx_dm not in ('0105', '0106', '0107')then -TT.SE else 0 end qysds, case when tt.zsxm_dm = '10106' then -TT.SE else 0 end grsds FROM ZS_SRTHS TT WHERE tt.ttsjlx_dm <> ? and tt.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 between ? and ? and djxh = ? union all SELECT case when zsxm_dm = '10101' and jks.sksx_dm not in ('0105', '0106', '0107')then JKS.SJJE else 0 end zzs, case when zsxm_dm = '10102' and jks.sksx_dm not in ('0105', '0106', '0107')then JKS.SJJE else 0 end xfs, case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and jks.sksx_dm not in ('0105', '0106', '0107')then JKS.SJJE else 0 end qysds, case when zsxm_dm = '10106' then JKS.SJJE else 0 end grsds FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE jks.sksx_dm <> ? and jks.sksx_dm <> ? and jks.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ between ? and ? and djxh = ? )

select max(syts) as syts from cs_gy_zqtz where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and (1 = ? or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and yxqsrq<= ? and yxzzrq >=?

select sum(fb1.jxse)+sum(fb1.je) jse from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr,sb_sbb sbb ,sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_yzqy_qdjx fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz > = ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid=fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq <= ? and sbb.skssqz >= ?
select distinct sbxx.pzxh from sb_sbxx sbxx where sbxx.djxh = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.skssqz = ? and sbxx.zsxm_dm = ? and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610125', 'BDA0610130', 'BDA0610131')
select t.*, lx.jylx_mc jylxmc from zs_ls_dr_kj_jygz t, dm_kj_jylx lx where t.sfshtgbz = ? and t.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm
select * from pz_jbscjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null and zfbz_1 = 'N'
select * from pz_sspzlfdzb where lqdwr=? and zfbz_1='N'

select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '备案' as jglx, BALSXLH as clxlh, bazdcjuuid as uuid from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where zfbz_1 = 'N' and cjhdbz = 'N' and clsbdh = ? and zgswjg_dm = ? order by lrrq desc

select yj.ybtse，yj.zspm_dm from sb_sbxx t, zs_yjsf yj where t.djxh in (#macroparam#) and t.pzxh = yj.yzpzxh and t.zspm_dm = yj.zspm_dm and t.skssqq > = ? and t.skssqz < = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in (#macroparam#) and yj.rkrq is not null union all select a.ybtse, a.zspm_dm from zs_yjsf a where a.djxh in (#macroparam#) and a.skssqq > = ? and a.skssqz < = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm != ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.skzl_dm != ? and a.rkrq is not null
select * from sb_zyssb_mx where sbuuid=?

select djb.nsrsbh, djb.nsrmc, djb.slrq, djb.slr_dm slswry_dm, slswjg_dm, djb.lrswjgmc slswjgmc, djb.lrrmc slswrymc, cjb.* from sb_zlbscjb cjb inner join sb_zlbssldjb djb on cjb.zlbsuuid = djb.zlbsuuid where (cjb.zfbz_1 is null or cjb.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and djb.cfdz = ? order by cjb.lrrq desc
SELECT t.xmmc,t.fse,nvl(t.sbxh,6.1) as xh FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_YFXMQT T WHERE T.PZXH =? AND T.SBUUID =?

select pzxh from sb_sbxx a where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1 = ? and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and djxh is null

select distinct sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, case when hzsbbz = 'N' then jsyj else sum(jsyj) over(partition by sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, sbrq, pzxh) end jsyj, case when hzsbbz = 'N' then sl_1 else first_value(sl_1) over(partition by sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, sbrq, pzxh order by sl_1) end sl_1, case when hzsbbz = 'N' then ynse else sum(ynse) over(partition by sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, sbrq, pzxh) end ynse, case when hzsbbz = 'N' then jmse else sum(jmse) over(partition by sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, sbrq, pzxh) end jmse, case when hzsbbz = 'N' then jzse else sum(jzse) over(partition by sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, sbrq, pzxh) end jzse, case when hzsbbz = 'N' then jmxz_dm else listagg(jmxz_dm, ',') within GROUP(order by jmxz_dm) over(partition by sybh, syzl, htqdsj, qszyfsDm, qszymj, sbrq, pzxh) end jmxz_dm, sbrq, pzxh from (select d.fybh sybh, d.tdfwdz syzl, a.htqdsj htqdsj, a.qsqszylb_dm qszyfsDm, d.mj qszymj, c.jsyj, c.sl_1, c.ynse, c.jmse, c.ynse jzse, c.ssjmxz_dm jmxz_dm, b.lrrq sbrq, c.pzxh, c.hzsbbz from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a, sb_cxs_fcjy b, sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx d, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf e where b.jyfuuid = e.jyfuuid(+) and a.fcjycjxxuuid = b.fcjycjxxuuid and b.pzxh = c.pzxh and c.fcjyuuid in (select fcjyuuid from sb_cxs_fcjy k where k.fcjycjxxuuid = a.fcjycjxxuuid and nvl(k.zfbz_1, ?) = ?) and a.fyjbxxuuid = d.fyjbxxuuid and c.zsxm_dm = ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and (b.hzsbbz = ? or (b.hzsbbz = ? and e.zcqrbz = ?)) and b.djxh = ? and d.fybh = ? and c.skssqq >= ? and c.skssqz <= ?)
select * from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611' and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_GLJYMXB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? and dzbzdszl_dm =? order by ewbhxh

select t.lsmxid, t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.ssqq, t.ssqz from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where x.zfbz_1 = 'N' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.djxh = x.djxh and t.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm and t.zspm_dm = x.zspm_dm and t.ssqz >= x.skssqq and x.skssqz >= t.ssqq and ((t.sybh_1 is null and x.sybh_1 is null) or (t.sybh_1 is not null and x.sybh_1 is null and exists( select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg sy where sy.pzxh = x.pzxh and sy.sybh_1 = t.sybh_1)) or t.sybh_1 = x.sybh_1) and t.hhljid = ? and x.zgswskfj_dm like trim(skssswjg_dm) and x.sbsx_dm_1 = '11'
SELECT ZQJMFB.* FROM SB_ZQJM ZQJM, SB_ZQJMFB ZQJMFB, SB_SBXX SBXX WHERE ZQJM.SBXXUUID = SBXX.SBXXUUID AND ZQJM.JMUUID = ZQJMFB.JMUUID AND SBXX.PZXH = ?

select djxh, pzxh, bduuid, skssqq, skssqz, XXPTFPBHSXSESB, XXPTFPBHSXSEFP, XXPTFPSESB, XXPTFPSEFP, XXZYFPCBJESB, XXZYFPCBJEFP, XXZYFPCBSESB, XXZYFPCBSEFP, JXFFDQRZJESB, JXFFDQRZJEFP, JXFFDQHYJESB, JXFFDQHYJEFP, JXFFDQHGSESB, JXFFDQHGSEFP, JXFFDQHZZCSESB, JXFFDQHZZCSEFP, JXFDQJHZPJESB, JXFDQJHZPJEFP, JXFDQJHZPSESB, JXFDQJHZPSEFP, JXFDQJHHGSESB, JXFDQJHHGSEFP, JXFDQJHHYJESB, JXFDQJHHYJEFP, XXZYFPCBJEFP_2, XXZYFPCBJEFP_3, XXZYFPCBSEFP_2, XXZYFPCBSEFP_3, JXFFDQHKGSSKJESEFP, JXFFDQHKGSSKJESESB, JXFFDQYZQYSKJESEFP, JXFFDQYZQYSKJESESB, JXFFDQTLGSSKJESEFP, JXFFDQTLGSSKJESESB, JXFFDQDXQYSKJESEFP, JXFFDQDXQYSKJESESB, jxffdqhyjefp, jxfdqjhhyjefp, JXFFDQRZSESB from SB_SBBD_ZZSYBNSR_YCSBDYGZ y where djxh = ? and skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and yxbz = 'Y' order by y.lrrq desc

select a.djxh mfdjxh, a.zlbsuuid, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1=#macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.mfnsrsbh = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.gmfdjxh = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.gmfnsrsbh = ?) and (nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' or nvl(b.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'N')
select zlbsuuid from sb_zlbssldjb where cfdz=?

select max(sbqx) as sbqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and (zsxm_dm = ? or zsxm_dm is null) and (1 = ? or zspm_dm = ? or zspm_dm is null) and (sbqx_dm = ? or sbqx_dm is null) and (zclxfl = ? or zclxfl is null) and (hsbz = ? or hsbz is null)
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Fjmjs_Nd t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Fzjgfpb_Zjg t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_SYKTFYMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?

Select a.*, nsrxx.scjydz From Sb_Yqwsbqc a, dj_nsrxx nsrxx Where a.zgswskfj_dm = ? And a.djxh = nsrxx.djxh And (a.sfcbjjkwsb = 'Y' or a.sfcbjjkwsb is null) And a.cbrq is null And a.sbrq_1 is null And a.sbqx >= add_months(sysdate, -1) And nsrxx.nsrzt_dm in ('03', '04') and (a.sjlybz <> '5' or a.sjlybz is null) and (a.zsxm_dm <> '10104' or (a.zsxm_dm = '10104' and a.skssqz + 1 < add_months(a.skssqq, 12)))

select t.* from sb_sbb t where t.djxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610130', 'BDA0610131') and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.sbuuid from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz < ? and a.skssqq >= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' order by a.skssqz desc
select yjye_1 from sb_yjskxx where yjskuuid=?

Select Clscqy_Dm, Scqymc, Gcclscqynsrsbh, Scqyjc, Qydmscsj, Clscqyzgswjg, Cljkqymc, Cljkqynsrsbh, Cljkqyzgswjg, Sqrq, Yxbz, Lrr_Dm, Lrrq, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Sjgsdq, Clcdsx_Dm, Gcclscqyssdq, Jkclscqyssdq From Sb_Cgs_Clscqy t Where t.Clcdsx_Dm = ? And Yxbz = 'Y' And t.Cljkqyzgswjg Like ?
select pzhsjg_dm ,a.pzglyuuid from pz_pzgly a where sjhsjg_dm=(select pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly b where b.pzgly_dm=?)
select t.yusbxh, t.kkfh_dm, t.kkzt_dm from sb_ls_pkqc a,sb_sbf_pkqc t where a.yusbxh=t.pkuuid and a.hhljid = ?
select t.* from sb_dkdj_fb_skmxbg t where t.sbuuid = ?
select t2.* from SB_FJMHTBA_XMHTKXZFQKBGB t1,SB_FJMHTBA_ZFKXXXB t2 where t1.YBGBBH =? and t1.FBFNSRSBH =? and t1.SBUUID=t2.SBUUID
select jgjc_dm from pz_pzgly where pzhsjg_dm = ?

select t3.ewbhxh,t3.bqje from SB_CWBB_SYYH_XJLLB t3 where t3.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1 = 'N'))
select count(*) from ZS_JKS where rkxhrq is not null and ZSUUID in (select ZSUUID from ZS_YJSF where YZPZXH=? and YZPZZL_DM in ('BDA0610130', 'BDA0610136','BDA0610333','BDA0610139','BDA0610532'))
select CZLX_DM from SB_ZZS_LDSKLSZ where PZXH=?
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM PZ_PZGLY A WHERE A.PZGLY_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND A.PZHSJGYXZZRQ

Select NVL(T2.YYSR_BQ,0.00) AS YYSR_BQ, NVL(T2.YYSR_LJ,0.00) AS YYSR_LJ, NVL(T2.YYCB_BQ,0.00) AS YYCB_BQ, NVL(T2.YYCB_LJ,0.00) AS YYCB_LJ, NVL(T2.LRZE_BQ,0.00) AS LRZE_BQ, NVL(T2.LRZE_LJ,0.00) AS LRZE_LJ, NVL(T2.TDYWJSDYNSSDE_BQ,0.00) AS TDYWJSDYNSSDE_BQ, NVL(T2.TDYWJSDYNSSDE_LJ,0.00) AS TDYWJSDYNSSDE_LJ, NVL(T2.BZSSR_BQ,0.00) AS BZSSR_BQ, NVL(T2.BZSSR_LJ,0.00) AS BZSSR_LJ, NVL(T2.MSSR_BQ,0.00) AS MSSR_BQ, NVL(T2.MSSR_LJ,0.00) AS MSSR_LJ, NVL(T2.JZMZYNSSDE_BQ,0.00) AS JZMZYNSSDE_BQ, NVL(T2.JZMZYNSSDE_LJ,0.00) AS JZMZYNSSDE_LJ, NVL(T2.MBYQNDKS_BQ,0.00) AS MBYQNDKS_BQ, NVL(T2.MBYQNDKS_LJ,0.00) AS MBYQNDKS_LJ, NVL(T2.SJLRE_BQ,0.00) AS SJLRE_BQ, NVL(T2.SJLRE_LJ,0.00) AS SJLRE_LJ, NVL(T2.SL_1,0.000000) AS SL_1, NVL(T2.SL_LJ,0.000000) AS SL_LJ, NVL(T2.YNSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS YNSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.YNSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS YNSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.XXWLQYJMSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS XXWLQYJMSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.XXWLQYJMSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS XXWLQYJMSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.JMSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS JMSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.JMSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS JMSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.SJYYJSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS SJYYJSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.TDYWYJZSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS TDYWYJZSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.TDYWYJZSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS TDYWYJZSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.YBTSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS YBTSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.YQNDDJZBQDJSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS YQNDDJZBQDJSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.YQNDDJZBQDJSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS YQNDDJZBQDJSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.BYJSJYBTSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS BYJSJYBTSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.SYNSNDYNSSDE_LJ,0.00) AS SYNSNDYNSSDE_LJ, NVL(T2.BYJYNSSDE_BQ,0.00) AS BYJYNSSDE_BQ, NVL(T2.BYJYNSSDE_LJ,0.00) AS BYJYNSSDE_LJ, NVL(T2.ASNPJEYJ_SL_BQ,0.00) AS ASNPJEYJ_SL_BQ, NVL(T2.ASNPJEYJ_SL_LJ,0.00) AS ASNPJEYJ_SL_LJ, NVL(T2.BYJYNSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS BYJYNSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.BYJYNSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS BYJYNSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.ASNPJE_XXWLQYJMSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS ASNPJE_XXWLQYJMSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.ASNPJE_XXWLQYJMSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS ASNPJE_XXWLQYJMSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.BYJSJYNSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS BYJSJYNSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.BYJSJYNSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS BYJSJYNSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.BYJSWJGQDYJSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS BYJSWJGQDYJSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.BYJSWJGQDYJSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS BYJSWJGQDYJSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.ZJGYFTSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS ZJGYFTSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.ZJGLJYFTDSDSE,0.00) AS ZJGLJYFTDSDSE, NVL(T2.CZJZFPSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS CZJZFPSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.CZJZFPSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS CZJZFPSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.FZJGYFTSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS FZJGYFTSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.FZJGYFTSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS FZJGYFTSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.ZJGDLSCJYBMYFTSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS ZJGDLSCJYBMYFTSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.ZJGDLSCJYBMYFTSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS ZJGDLSCJYBMYFTSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.ZJGYCXFJJGYFTSDSEBQJE,0.00) AS ZJGYCXFJJGYFTSDSEBQJE, NVL(T2.ZJGYCXFJJGYFTSDSELJJE,0.00) AS ZJGYCXFJJGYFTSDSELJJE, NVL(T2.FPBL,0.000000) AS FPBL, NVL(T2.FZJGFPBL_LJ,0.000000) AS FZJGFPBL_LJ, NVL(T2.FZJGFPSDSE_BQ,0.00) AS FZJGFPSDSE_BQ, NVL(T2.FZJGFPSDSE_LJ,0.00) AS FZJGFPSDSE_LJ, NVL(T2.BZSSRHSJJMYNSSDE_BQ,0.00) AS BZSSRHSJJMYNSSDE_BQ, NVL(T2.BZSSRHSJJMYNSSDE_LJ,0.00) AS BZSSRHSJJMYNSSDE_LJ, NVL(T2.GDZCJSZJKCTJE_BQ,0.00) AS GDZCJSZJKCTJE_BQ, NVL(T2.GDZCJSZJKCTJE_LJ,0.00) AS GDZCJSZJKCTJE_LJ, T2.SFSYXXWLQY, T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq >=? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And (T1.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? or T1.YZPZZL_DM='BDA0610040') And T1.Zfbz_1 =? AND T1.sbsx_dm_1='11' Order By T1.Skssqz Desc
select a.cbshtglwfmc from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a where a.bh = ? and a.fbfhlwsrfnsrsbh= ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT nsrsbh, djxh, year, quarter, lrlj1, lrlj2, lrlj3, lrlj4, lrlj5, lrlj6, lrlj7, lrlj8, lrlj9, lrlj10, lrlj11, lrlj12, lrlj13, lrlj14, lrlj15, lrlj16, lrlj17, lrlj18, lrlj19, lrlj20, zcnc1, zcnc2, zcnc3, zcnc4, zcnc5, zcnc6, zcnc7, zcnc8, zcnc9, zcnc10, zcnc11, zcnc12, zcnc13, zcnc14, zcnc15, zcnc16, zcnc17, zcnc18, zcnc19, zcnc20, zcnc21, zcnc22, zcnc23, zcnc24, zcnc25, zcnc26, zcnc27, zcnc28, zcnc29, zcnc30, zcnc31, zcnc32, zcnc33, zcnc34, zcqm1, zcqm2, zcqm3, zcqm4, zcqm5, zcqm6, zcqm7, zcqm8, zcqm9, zcqm10, zcqm11, zcqm12, zcqm13, zcqm14, zcqm15, zcqm16, zcqm17, zcqm18, zcqm19, zcqm20, zcqm21, zcqm22, zcqm23, zcqm24, zcqm25, zcqm26, zcqm27, zcqm28, zcqm29, zcqm30, zcqm31, zcqm32, zcqm33, zcqm34 from sb_ls_dm0_zdsy_gy_sb_cwb where year = ? and quarter = ?
select t.djxh,t.skssqq,t.skssqz,t.zsxm_dm,t.zspm_dm,t.hy_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqz >=? and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null)
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? AND T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

select pzxh from sb_sbxx a where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1 = ? and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sybh_1 is null

SELECT SUM(YBTSE) SE from ZS_YJSF T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.SKSSQQ <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.RKRQ >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.RKRQ <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.SBSX_DM_1 = ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND T.SKZL_DM != '20'
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_SSYHMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwbszlqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And a.Sbrq_1 is null And a.Cbrq is null And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))

select t.pzxh, t.yzpzzl_dm, t.ybtse, t.sbrq_1,t.sbfs_dm,t.zfbz_1 from sb_sbb t where t.djxh = ? and ((1=#macroparam#) or (t.skssqq >= ?)) and ((1=#macroparam#) or (t.skssqz <= ?)) and ((1=#macroparam#) or (t.sbrq_1 = ?)) and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
SELECT sqldpzxh,skssqq,skssqz,sqldse,bqqmldse,ldlx,zgswskfj_Dm,swjg_dm,zzslx FROM SB_ZZS_LDSK WHERE DJXH = ? AND SKSSQQ = ? AND SKSSQZ = ? AND ZFRQ_1 IS NULL
select a.* from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz <= ? and a.skssqq >= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in (#macroparam#) and a.sbsx_dm_1 = ?

select qk.pzzl_dm,qk.pzzg_dm,decode(qk.pzzt_dm,null,'04',qk.pzzt_dm) pzzt_dm, qk.pzhm pzqshm,qk.pzhm pzzzhm,'1' pzsl,'0' kjzfsl,'0' skje from zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.sddwdjxh = ? and qk.pzcxsybj is null and (qk.sspkjbdbh is null or exists (select 1 from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.sspkjbdbh = qk.sspkjbdbh and t.shbz = 'N')) and (qk.pzzt_dm != ? or qk.pzzt_dm is null)

select a.wsbuuid from sb_yqwsbqc a, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqz and a.skssqz >= sbxx.ssqq and a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm and a.sbrq_1 is not null and a.zsxm_dm = '10106' and sbxx.hhljid = ?

Select sum(nvl(Xgm.Yzzzsbhsxse, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Xssygdysgdzcbhsxse, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Msxse, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Ckmsxse, 0) + nvl(Xgm.XSCZBDCBHSXSE, 0)) bqbhssre, sum(nvl(Xgm.Hdxse, 0)) bqbhssrehd, sum(nvl(Xgm.Skqjkjdptfpbhsxse_1, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Skqjkjdptfpbhsxse, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Skqjkjdptfpbhsxse2, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Skqjkjdptfpxse_1, 0)) ptfpsre, sum(nvl(Xgm.Swjgdkdzzszyfpbhsxse, 0) + nvl(Xgm.Swjgdkdzzszyfpbhsxse1, 0)) dkfpsre, sum(Xgm.Ynsehj) bqynse, sum(Xgm.Bqyjse_1) bqyjse, sum(Xgm.Bqybtse) bqybtse From Sb_Zzs_Xgm Xgm Where Xgm.Ewblxh In (#macroparam#) And Xgm.Sbuuid in (#macroparam#)
select t.* from sb_whsyjsf t where t.sbuuid = ?
select t.* from sb_zyssb_yklsyfb t where t.sbuuid=?

固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then qmye_zc end zcqm17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then ncye_zc end zcnc18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then qmye_zc end zcqm18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then ncye_zc end zcnc19, /*无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then qmye_zc end zcqm19, /*无形资产*/ /*权益*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then ncye_qy end zcnc20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then qmye_qy end zcqm20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then ncye_qy end zcnc21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then qmye_qy end zcqm21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then ncye_qy 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then qmye_qy end zcqm29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then ncye_qy end zcnc30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then qmye_qy end zcqm30, select zsuuid from zs_yjsf_cbjtkz t ,sb_ls_sbxx l where t.wbuuid=l.lsmxid and l.hhljid=?
UPDATE SB_SDS_MBKSTZ SET JCSYMBKS =? WHERE PZXH =? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ND = (SELECT MAX(ND) FROM SB_SDS_MBKSTZ WHERE PZXH = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N')
SELECT T.GZTZSUUID as uuid ,T.GZTZSBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_GZTZS T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.TYBZ = 'Y' and t.FQPZDW_DM = ? AND T.GZTZSBH BETWEEN ? AND ?
select * from pz_zwcs where pzdw_dm=?

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM, ZSBZ, FPLX_DM, FYBH FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE (1=? or FYBH = ?) select * from zs_ydtxx t where t.ydtlyuuid in (select s.sbxxuuid from sb_sbxx s where s.pzxh=? and s.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5'))

select pzyjrq from pz_yjrqszb a WHERE yjrqnd = ? and yjrqyf = ?

select c.skgk_dm, c.csdmz_1, c.csdmz_2, c.csdmz_3, c.csdmz_4, c.csdmz_5, c.csdmz_6, c.csdmz_7, c.csdmz_8, c.csdmz_9, c.csdmz_10, c.csdmz_11, c.csdmz_12, c.csdmz_13, c.csdmz_14, c.csdmz_15 from cs_zs_skgk c where c.swjg_dm = ? and c.yxqq <= ? and c.yxqz >= ? and nvl(c.csdmz_1,'notdefault') = 'default'

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM, ZSBZ, FPLX_DM, FYBH, ZJSRSFFT, QXQ, QXZ, SFZCZF, FCJYCJXXUUID, HTBH, HZDKLX_DM, SBUUID, XMMC, NSQX_DM, FWZLDZ, SJLY, GSDKSQUUID FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Ybqysrmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

SELECT a.wsbuuid from SB_YQWSBQC a, SB_LS_SBXX sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.skssqz = sbxx.ssqz and (a.sbrq_1 is null or a.sbrq_1 = date '1-1-1') and ((a.zsxm_dm not in ('10101', '10104') and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*普通税*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '10101' and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*增值税*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '10104' and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqq
and ((a.skssqz + 1 < add_months(a.skssqq, 12)
and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm not in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688')) /*企业所得税非年报*/ or (a.skssqz + 1 >= add_months(a.skssqq, 12) and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688','BDA0610039','BDA0610764','BDA0610073','BDA0610766','BDA0610074','BDA0610776 ')) AND (TO_CHAR(sbxx.ssqz, 'MM')-TO_CHAR(sbxx.ssqq, 'MM'))>=11 /*企业所得税A类年报*/ )) /*企业所得税*/ ) and (a.sybh_1 is null or a.sybh_1 = sbxx.sybh_1) and sbxx.hhljid=?

SELECT A.* FROM SB_YQWBSZLQC A, DJ_NSRXX NSRXX WHERE A.DJXH = NSRXX.DJXH AND A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM IN (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG START WITH SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR SWJG_DM = SJSWJG_DM) AND A.BSQX BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR (A.SSGLY_DM = ?)) AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR A.DJXH = ? ) AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR (A.SBRQ_1 IS NULL)) AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR (A.CBRQ IS NULL)) AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RD_NSRZGXX_JGB RD WHERE RD.DJXH = A.DJXH AND RD.NSRZGLX_DM = ? AND RD.YXQQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND RD.SJZZRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND RD.QXBZ = 'N' AND RD.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'))) AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR (NVL(A.QHJTBZ,'N') = ?)) ORDER BY A.DJXH ASC

select t.yspzmxhm yspzmxhm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzsl pzsl, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t.gztzsuuid, t.gztzsmxuuid from pz_gztzs_mx t, pz_gztzs a where t.gztzsuuid = a.gztzsuuid and t.yspzmxhm=? and a.yxbz != 'N' and t.sxlx='2' and a.tybz = 'Y' and t.lrrq=(select max(lrrq) from pz_gztzs_mx where yspzmxhm=?)

Select wtdzsbxx.nssbrq, lssbxx.rowid from sb_ls_ysbtj lssbxx, (Select wtdz.bdzdjxh as djxh, wtdz.skssqq as skssqq, wtdz.skssqz as skssqz, wtdz.zsxm_dm as zsxm_dm, wtdz.zspm_dm as zspm_dm, wtdz.sybh_1 as sybh_1, sbxx.zsdlfs_dm as zsdlfs_dm, sbxx.nssbrq as nssbrq from sb_sbb sbb , sb_sbxx sbxx where sbb.sbuuid = sbxx.sbuuid and sbxx.Zfbz_1 = 'N' and (sbxx.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or sbxx.sbsx_dm_1 is null)) wtdzsbxx where lssbxx.djxh = wtdzsbxx.djxh and lssbxx.zsxm_dm = wtdzsbxx.zsxm_dm and lssbxx.zspm_dm = wtdzsbxx.zspm_dm and lssbxx.skssqq = wtdzsbxx.skssqq and lssbxx.skssqz = wtdzsbxx.skssqz and lssbxx.zsdlfs_dm = wtdzsbxx.zsdlfs_dm and (lssbxx.sybh_1 is null or lssbxx.sybh_1 = wtdzsbxx.sybh_1) and (lssbxx.sjlybz != 5 or lssbxx.sjlybz is null) and lssbxx.zsdlfs_dm = '3' and lssbxx.hhljid = ?
SELECT T.SWJG_DM, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.FYJG_DM CODE, T.FYJGMC CAPTION FROM CS_FZ_FYJGPZ T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM = ?

select sum(fb1.yjse_1) se from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr, sb_sbb sbb, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_hkys_yjn fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz >= ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid = fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq >= ? and sbb.skssqz <= ? and fb1.zsxm like '%小%'
SELECT * FROM CS_SB_SSYHXMJMXZDZB WHERE ssyhxm=?
select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.hdzxqq, t.sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = t.djxh and t.hdzxqq <= t.sjzxqz and t.sjzxqz between ? and ?
select a.pzzl_dm code, a.pzzlmc caption, a.* from DM_PZ_PZZL a where a.pzzl_dm in (select b.pzzl_dm from CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL b where b.swjg_dm = ?)

select max(jjrzzrq) as jjrzzrq from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <=? and jjrzzrq >=? and yyyf = ? and jjrbz = 'N'
select spjg from sb_tdzzsqshdb where djxh=? and xmbh=? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

with yzxx as (select distinct jccb.yzpzxh, yjsf.yyzpzmxxh, yjsf.yzclrq, yjsf.yzpzmxxh, yjsf.tzlx_dm, yjsf.czlx_dm, yjsf.glyzpzmxxh from zs_jccbyjskajxxdzb jccb, zs_yjsf yjsf where jccb.yzpzxh = yjsf.yzpzxh and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and yjsf.yzclrq is not null and yjsf.skzl_dm = '10' and yjsf.djxh in (#macroparam#) and nvl(jccb.jcajxxuuid, ?) = ?) select t.yjskuuid, t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.yjye_1, t.hy_dm, t.sksx_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.pzxh, yzxx.yzclrq as rkrq, yzxx.tzlx_dm, yzxx.czlx_dm, yzxx.glyzpzmxxh, yzxx.yzpzmxxh as yzpzmxxh from yzxx, sb_yjskxx t where t.pzxh = yzxx.yzpzxh and yzxx.yyzpzmxxh = t.yzpzmxxh and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zspm_dm = ?) and t.sksx_dm = ? and t.yjye_1 > 0

SELECT SJGSDQ, HDBZ, SLSBSWJG_DM, BZ, HZDXFSJSJG, XFSSYSL, SYPFMLL, PFHJXSJG, XSE, XSSL, JYLX_DM_1, JYLB_DM_1, JYPHGG, JYTBZSPTM, DJXH, LCSLID, JYXFSJSJGHDUUID FROM SB_XFSJG_JYXFSJSJGHDB WHERE TRIM(LCSLID) = ?

select mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.sshxsl xhsl, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm from pz_sspzssbgdzb zb, pz_sspzssbgdmxb mx where zb.pzssbgduuid = mx.pzssbgduuid and zb.sqdw_dm = ? and zb.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and zb.zstybz = 'Y' and zb.lrrq between ? and ? and mx.pzzl_dm in (select pzzl_dm from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh c where c.xhzsswjg = ?)

select * from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB a, SB_ZLBSCJB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and b.djxh = ? and a.gmfdjxh = ? and (? is null or a.fwcqzsh = ?) and (? is null or a.htbh = ?) and b.bszl_dm=? and nvl(b.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
select * from sb_cgs_cldaxx where clsbdh=? and djxh=?
SELECT * FROM sb_cgs_clgzsdbrwgl t where t.clsbdh = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.dqdefyhzuuid, a.sbuuid, a.pzxh, a.pzmxxh, a.yyts a.sjyynsjye, a.hdyynsjye, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.slzsl, a.ynse, a.jmse, a.ysbse, a.ybtse, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.bz from sb_dqde_gtgsh_fyhz a, sb_sbb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.sbuuid = ? and b.zfbz_1 != 'Y'
select * from np_zcbsdzb t where t.yzpzxh=?
SELECT MX.PZZL_DM,MX.PZZG_DM,MX.PZQSHM,MX.PZZZHM,MX.LQSL FROM PZ_SSPZLFDMXB MX ,PZ_SSPZLFDZB ZB WHERE ZB.PZLFDUUID = MX.PZLFDUUID AND ZB.SSPZLFDBH=?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zgxcnstzmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select sum(fb1.yjse_1) se from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr, sb_sbb sbb, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_dxqy_yjn fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz >= ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid = fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq >= ? and sbb.skssqz <= ? and fb1.ewbhxh = 1
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_JMYNSSDEB T WHERE T.PZXH=? AND T.SBUUID=?

Select t.Uuid, t.Lcslid, t.Nsrmc, t.Zjhm, t.Lxdh, t.Yjdz, t.Clcpxh, t.Clsbdh, t.Fdjhm, t.Slrq, t.Pzfzjg, t.Wszmhm, t.Swjg_Dm, t.Hcr, t.Pfr, t.Pfrq_1, t.Cljg, t.Bz, t.Clgzswszmdbjg_Dm, t.Clgzswszmbdswjgclyj_Dm, t.Zsjg_Dm, t.Gaglbm_Dm, t.Sfzjzl_Dm, t.Sffsbz From Sb_Cgs_Wszmpfhcxx t Where t.Swjg_Dm Like ? And t.Sfybjbz = ? And Clgzswszmbdswjgclyj_Dm In (#macroparam#)
SELECT T.CBSHTGLWFNSRSBH AS fjmsbh,T.CBSHTGLWFMC AS fjmmc,T.DJXH AS djxh from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB T WHERE T.BH=?

select * from sb_ls_sbxx ls, sb_sbxx sb where ls.djxh = sb.djxh and ls.zsxm_dm = sb.zsxm_dm and (ls.zsxm_dm = '10101' or sb.zspm_dm = sb.zspm_dm) and ls.ssqq = sb.skssqq and ls.ssqz = sb.skssqz and sb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610125' and ((sb.zsdlfs_dm is null) or (sb.zsdlfs_dm = ls.zsdlfs_dm)) and ls.hhljid = ?
select t.nsqx_dm, t.yxqq, t.qxrq, t.djxh from rd_jbzqrdjgb t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = t.djxh and t.yxqz >= ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm, skje,kjzfsl from pz_sspzjxbmx where sspzjxbuuid= ?
SELECT T.YZDWXH AS CODE, T.YZDWMC AS CAPTION, T.YZDWLX_DM FROM CS_PZ_YZDWXX T WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ
update SB_XFS_FB_JYSCQYNDXSMX s set s.shbz='Y' where s.sbuuid=?

select a.jylx_dm as code, a.jylx_mc as caption, a.* from dm_kj_jylx a where a.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' order by a.jylx_dm asc

select d.nsrsbh, d.djxh, s.rdpzuuid as sfzrdpzuuid, s.zsxm_dm as zsxmdm, s.zspm_dm as zspmdm, s.zszm_dm as zszmdm, s.zsl as zslhdwse, s.zfsbz, s.rdzsuuid as zsuuid, y.nsqx_dm as naqxdm, y.zsdlfs_dm as zsdlfsdm, y.zsfs_dm as zsfsdm, y.nd, y.zgswskfj_dm as zgswskfjdm, y.skssqq, y.skssqz, y.sbqx from sb_ysbtj y, rd_sfzrdxxb s, dj_nsrxx d where y.djxh = s.djxh and y.djxh = d.djxh and d.djxh in (select djxh from dj_nsrxx where nsrsbh=? or shxydm=?)
select t.fp_dm,t.fphm,t.xhfnsrsbh,t.snysl,t.rlysl,t.xfs_wspzhm from SB_XFS_FB_WGPZMX t where t.qywgyplx = '外购含税油品' and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT DISTINCT zl.pzzl_dm code, NULL pcode, zl.pzzlmc caption FROM cs_pz_swjgdypzzl cs, dm_pz_pzzl zl where cs.PZZL_DM=zl.PZZL_DM and cs.SJGSDQ like '150%'

SELECT AVG(BAZDJSJG) AS ZXZDJSJG FROM SB_CGS_BAZDJSJGHDB WHERE CJHDBZ = 'N' and (#macroparam#) /*zgswjg_dm in ('')*/ AND CLCP IN(#macroparam#) AND CLXH IN(#macroparam#) AND ZYPZ IN(#macroparam#) AND balsxlh=?
SELECT * FROM CS_PZ_PZSLJKB WHERE SWJG_DM = ? AND XYBZ = 'Y' AND YXBZ = 'Y'

select t1.ewbhxh,t1.qms_zc,t1.qms_qy from SB_CWBB_QYKJZZ_ZCFZB t1 where t1.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and ( s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1='N'))

SELECT T.* FROM ZS_YDTXX T WHERE T.pzxh=? AND T.CZLX_DM = '60' AND T.TZLX_DM = '3' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_YDTXX A WHERE t.pzxh=? AND A.CZLX_DM IN ('10', '66') AND A.TZLX_DM = '2' AND T.YDTLYUUID = A.YDTLYUUID AND T.SE = -1 * A.SE)

select t.hwmc,t.fp_dm,t.fphm,t.kprq,t.ghfnsrsbh,t.sl from SB_XFS_FB_ZYFPMX t,sb_sbb b where t.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.skssqq >= ? and b.skssqz <= ? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and b.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.* from sb_tysb_zsfjsgdshtglb t where t.gsdjxh=? and t.zspzxh=?
Select Bduuid, Skssqq, Skssqz, Bdnr, Bdbbz From Sb_Sbbd_Bdyczbd t Where Lcslid = ?
select t.djxh, t.zsfs_dm, t.hdqxq from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.sjzxqz >= ?
SELECT DECODE(SUM(T.JCSL), NULL, 0, SUM(T.JCSL)) AS JCCSHSL FROM PZ_JC_CSH T WHERE T.RKRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND T.CZYUUID = ? AND T.PZZL_DM = ? AND T.PZZG_DM = ?

select t.pzzl_dm,t.pzzg_dm,t.pzhm,t.tfrq,1 dycs,t.kpjg_dm,t.kpr_dm,t.hjje from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t1.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t1.yxbz='Y' and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t.sddwdjxh is null and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.sspkjbdbh is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(t.tfrq) > ? union all select t.pzzl_dm,t.pzzg_dm,t.pzhm,t.tfrq,1 dycs,t.kpjg_dm,t.kpr_dm,t.hjje from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t1.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t1.yxbz='Y' and t1.yprlx_dm = '31' and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.sspkjbdbh is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(t.tfrq) > ? union all select g.pzzl_dm,'' pzzg_dm,'' pzhm,g.tfrq,g.pzsl dycs,g.kpjg_dm,g.kpr_dm,g.hjje from zs_pzsyqk_yhp g, pz_ypr g1 where g.kpr_dm = g1.swry_dm and g1.pzhsjg_dm = ? and g1.yxbz='Y' and g1.yprlx_dm = '12' and g.sddwdjxh is null and g.sspkjbdbh is null and g.zfrq_1 is null and g.zfr_dm is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(g.tfrq) > ? union all select g.pzzl_dm,'' pzzg_dm,'' pzhm,g.tfrq,g.pzsl dycs,g.kpjg_dm,g.kpr_dm,g.hjje from zs_pzsyqk_yhp g, pz_ypr g1 where g.sddwdjxh = g1.djxh and g1.pzhsjg_dm = ? and g1.yxbz='Y' and g1.yprlx_dm = '31' and g.sspkjbdbh is null and g.zfrq_1 is null and g.zfr_dm is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(g.tfrq) > ?

select a.*, c.kfbdcxmbh xmbh, c.bdcxmmc xmmc, c.xzqhsz_dm, c.jdxz_dm, c.fwsdswjg_dm zgswskfj_dm from Sb_Zlbs_Zlfxsxxb_Mx a, SB_ZLBSCJB b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb c where a.gfzdjxh = ? and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and (? is null or a.fybh = ?) and NVL(a.cjbz, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select a.*, c.kfbdcxmbh xmbh, c.bdcxmmc xmmc, c.xzqhsz_dm, c.jdxz_dm, c.fwsdswjg_dm zgswskfj_dm from Sb_Zlbs_Zlfxsxxb_Mx a, SB_ZLBSCJB b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb c, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx d where a.gfzdjxh = ? and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and (? is null or a.fybh = ?) and NVL(a.cjbz, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and a.uuid = d.zlfcj_uuid
select a.* from sb_clgzswszmbfxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.clsbdh = ?

select sbxx.djxh as gsdjxh, sbxx.skssqq as skssqq, sbxx.skssqz as skssqz, sbxx.sbuuid as zssbuuid, sbxx.pzxh as zspzxh, sbxx.yzpzzl_dm as zsyzpzzlDm, sbxx.zsxm_dm as zszsxmDm, sbxx.zspm_dm as zszspmDm, sbxx.zszm_dm as zszszmDm, sbxx.ybtse as bqxfsybtse from sb_sbxx sbxx where sbxx.djxh = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbxx.zsxm_dm='10102' and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
delete sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb t where #macroparam#
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYGQSBFB2 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select sum(fb1.bqyjzzs) se from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr, sb_sbb sbb, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_dlqyxxhjx fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz >= ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid = fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq >= ? and sbb.skssqz <= ?

select t.pzglyuuid as czyuuid, '11' as yprlx_dm, t.pzhsjg_dm, '' as yprmc, null as djxh from pz_pzgly t, dm_qx_swrysf a where t.pzgly_dm = ? and t.pzhsjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm and a.swrysf_dm = ? and sysdate between t.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t.pzhsjgyxzzrq union all select t1.ypruuid as czyuuid, t1.yprlx_dm, t1.pzhsjg_dm, t1.yprmc, t1.djxh from pz_ypr t1, dm_qx_swrysf a where t1.swry_dm = ? and t1.pzhsjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm and t1.yprlx_dm <> '12' and a.swrysf_dm = ? and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq union all select t1.ypruuid as czyuuid, t1.yprlx_dm, t1.pzhsjg_dm, t1.yprmc, t1.djxh from pz_ypr t1 where t1.swry_dm = ? and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq

Select T2.* From Sb_Sbb T1, Sb_Sds_Fjmjs_14jd T2 Where T1.Sbuuid = T2.Sbuuid And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq >= ? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And T1.Zfbz_1 = ? Order By T1.Skssqz Desc
select a.pzzl_dm code ,b.pzzlmc caption from pz_yprpzhdxxb a ,dm_pz_pzzl b where a.pzzl_dm=b.pzzl_dm where a.ypruuid=?

select a.*,b.csfnsrsbh,b.csf_dwhgrmc,b.tdzlwz,b.tdmj,b.jyjg,b.tdsdswjg_dm from sb_zlbscjb a,sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid=b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select distinct pzzl.pzzl_dm pzzl_dm,pzzl.pzzlmc pzzlmc from cs_pz_pzzgb zg,dm_pz_pzzl pzzl where zg.pzzl_dm=pzzl.pzzl_dm and zg.sjgsdq like ?
select t.* from sb_sbfpkqcfkb t where t.zfbz_1 = '0' and t.ycqbz = 'N' and t.zgswskfj_dm = ?
Select t.* From Sb_Cgs_Cldaxx t Where t.Clsbdh = ? And t.Cldazt_Dm = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = ?
select * from sb_xfsjg_yhdzdjsjgbjqd t where t.lcslid = ?
select * from sb_clqkxx where #macroparam#
select t.* from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB t where t.uuid=? and t.bh=? and t.zfbz_1='N'
select a.* from pz_flz a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.pzzy_dm not in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_FYXXCJB WHERE YXBZ = 'Y' and djxh=? and #macroparam#
SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF T WHERE T.YZPZXH=? AND (T.TZLX_DM=? OR T.TZLX_DM=?)

select distinct t.jzxhuuid, t.tfrq, t.pzzl_dm, decode(t.pz_yspz_dm,'06','02',t.pz_yspz_dm) as pz_yspz_dm, t1.pzyspzmc as mc, t.yspzbh_1 as yspzhm, t.pzzy_dm, t3.pzzwzymc as zy, t.pzzg_dm, t2.pzzg, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t.rks, t.fcs, t.kjs, t.zfs, t.sshxs, t.tyzfs, nvl(t.bj_jc,0) + nvl(t.ss_jc,0) as hj, t.bj_jc, t.zl_bj_jc, t.ss_jc, t.zl_ss_jc from pz_flz t left join dm_pz_pzyspz t1 on decode(t.pz_yspz_dm,'06','02',t.pz_yspz_dm) = t1.pzyspz_dm inner join dm_pz_pzzwzy t3 on t.pzzy_dm = t3.pzzwzy_dm left join cs_pz_pzzgb t2 on t.pzzg_dm = t2.pzzg_dm where t.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.pzzl_dm=? and t.pzdw_dm=? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by tfrq,t.pzzy_dm,t.jzxhuuid
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm,yy,bz from pz_sspztyzfmxb where sspztyzfuuid = ?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '1' zt_bz, case when ewbhxh = '1' then bys end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then bys end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ 0 lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bys end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bys end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ 0 lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then bys end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then bys end lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then bys end lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then bys end lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ 0 lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ 0 lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then bys end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then bys end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then bys end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ 0 lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then bys end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then bys end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then bys end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then bys end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, SB_CWBB_QYKJZZ_LRB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.clsbdh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.cgssbzt = ?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select max(jkqx) as jkqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yyyf = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and hsbz = ?

Select t.Cgsuuid, t.Cgssbuuid, t.Wspzhm, t.Clsbdh, t.Zmsbz, t.Ewtmc, t.Swjgjbr_Dm, t.Zsjg_Dm, t.Ffrq, t.Zfbz_1, t.Zfrq_1, t.Zfr_Dm, t.Lrr_Dm, t.Lrrq, t.Xgr_Dm, t.Xgrq, t.Sjgsdq, t.Clpzhm, t.Sjtb_Sj, t.Pzzl_Dm, t.Pzzg_Dm, t.Pzhm From Sb_Cgs_Clgzswszm t Where t.Clsbdh = ? Order By t.Lrrq Desc
Select * From sb_sds_fzjgfpb_fzjg t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?

select pzxh from sb_sbxx a where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1 = ? and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and djxh is null and (djxh is null or a.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610083')
SELECT COUNT(1) scsl from fp_dk_sq WHERE djxh=? AND lrrq>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND lrrq<to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')+1 AND dkfplb_dm=? AND zfbz_1='N'

select a.cjuuid,a.cjr_dm,a.cjrq_1,a.lrrq,a.shswjg_dm,a.cjhdbz,a.cjglhj_dm from sb_cgs_cljgxxcjb a where a.nd = ? and trim(a.yf) = ? and #macroparam# and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gccbz = ? and a.cjglhj_dm in (#macroparam#)

WITH B AS (SELECT T1.SFMXUUID, NVL(SUM(T1.BCKCSE), 0) BCKCSE FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX T1 INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ C ON T1.DKSQUUID = C.DKSQUUID WHERE c.DJXH = ? AND c.dkfplb_dm=? AND T1.ZFBZ_1 <> 'Y' GROUP BY T1.SFMXUUID) SELECT T.SFMXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.SKSSQQ, T.SKSSQZ, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSZM_DM, T.SRZE, T.YXKCJE, T.JSFYJ, T.SFL, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.YJSFE, T.JMSFE, (NVL(T.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)- NVL(T.JMSFE, 0)-NVL(T.NSQNYJSE, 0)) YBSFE, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JYXM_DM, T.HY_DM, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM FROM FP_DK_SFMX T INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ A ON T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID LEFT JOIN B ON T.SFMXUUID = B.SFMXUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.DKFPLB_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.KJBZ = 'N' AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND t.zszsxm_dm IS NOT NULL AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (NVL(T.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)- NVL(T.JMSFE, 0)-NVL(T.NSQNYJSE, 0)) > 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.DJXH = A.DJXH AND X.DKFPLB_DM = A.DKFPLB_DM AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID) ORDER BY dksquuid
Select t.* from sb_sds_fzjgfpb_fzjg t Where t.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_sbbd_slyryxxfds t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq=? and t.skssqz=? and t.bdbz ='N'and t.Ddbfl='2'
select MIN(RKRQ) - 1 RKRQ from pz_jc t where t.czyuuid = ? and t.pzzl_dm = ? and (1 = ? or t.pzzg_dm = ?) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.jcsl > 0 and t.pzzt_dm ='01'

SELECT SUM(YSX) AS JSYJHJ FROM SB_SBXX WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND DJXH IN (SELECT DJXH FROM DJ_NSRXX WHERE NSRSBH IN (SELECT NSRSBH FROM DJ_NSRXX WHERE DJXH = ?)) AND ZSXM_DM = ? AND SKSSQQ = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SKSSQZ = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ZSDLFS_DM = ? AND (1 =? or PZXH not in(?))

select a.* from sb_tdsyqkdjxx a where a.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or a.tdsyzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.csqdsj <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.csqdsj

select a.* from sb_clqkxx a where a.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.CLSBDH = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.zxrq, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.CLFPRQHZCDJRQ <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.zxrq, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.CLFPRQHZCDJRQ
select t.pzhm_1 from SB_CGS_CLDAXX t where t.pzhm_1=?
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_CBFTXXB_JBXX where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?

SELECT T.HWYSFPUUID, T.HWYSFPYSXXUUID, T.QYD, T.DDD, T.JYD, T.CBDW, T.JEHJ, T.JSHJ, T.BZ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.YSHWXX, T.CCDWHJ, T.FHRNSRSBH, T.FHRMC, T.SHRNSRSBH, T.SHRMC FROM FP_DK_HWYSZZSFP_YSXX T WHERE T.HWYSFPUUID = ?
select t.pzlfdmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.lqsl pzsl, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm from pz_sspzlfdmxb t where t.pzlfduuid = ?
select distinct pzzl.pzzl_dm pzzl_dm,pzzl.pzzlmc pzzlmc from cs_pz_pzzgb zg,dm_pz_pzzl pzzl where zg.pzzl_dm=pzzl.pzzl_dm and zg.sjgsdq like ?
select x.* from zs_yjsf x, zs_yqjnsk_sqb y, zs_yqjnsk_sqmxb z where x.zsuuid = z.zsuuid and y.squuid = z.squuid and (y.zfbz_1 is null or y.zfbz_1 = 'N') and x.yzpzxh = ?

select b.syuuid uuid, b.djxh, b.tdsybh, b.tdsyzbh, b.dh_1, b.tdxz_dm, b.tdqdfs_dm, b.tdyt_dm, b.tdzldz xxdz, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.tddj dj_1, b.qztdkfcb tdkfcb, b.qzqdtdsyqzfje qdtdsyqzfje, b.csqdsj, b.nsywzzsj tdsyqzzsj, a.tddj_dm, '' zfbz_1, a.dwse, '' zfrq_1, b.zytdmj1 tdmj, b.zgswskfj_dm, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgrq, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, '' tdzj, b.jdxz_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.jmxzdmxx ssjmxz_dm, '' mstdmj, '' qh, '' tdsyzfzjgmc from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a,sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b where a.syuuid(+)=b.syuuid and b.djxh =? and (1 =? or b.tdsyzbh = ?) and nvl(b.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y' and nvl(a.yxbz,'Y')='Y' and (nvl(a.bgbm,'1')='1' or nvl(a.bgbm,'1')='2') and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(b.czrsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or b.csqdsj <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(b.czrsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.csqdsj
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_FHBXZCTZ t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=?
select a.* from sb_ysbtj a where a.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.djxh=? and ((0=#macroparam#) or (a.nssbrq is null))
select a.ypr_dm, (select c.pzgly_dm from pz_pzgly c where c.pzhsjg_dm = a.pzhsjg_dm and c.yxbz='Y') as swry_dm, a.mx, a.bzrq from pz_wjygfqrddjsh a where a.pzhsjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select sum(t.bcldbhs) as bcldbhs from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq =? and t.skssqz = ? and t.czlx_dm in ('53', '56', '61', '64') group by t.zzslx ,t.ldlx

Select t.Clcpxh As Clcp, t.Clcpxh As Clxh, t.Cd, t.Cd As Cdsx, t.Clscqy_Dm, t.Cllb_Dm_1, t.Scqymc As Clscqymc, t.Cllx_Dm, t.Clcpxh, t.Cldw, t.Zws, t.Pql, t.Zypz, t.Zypzbm, t.Zdjsjg, t.Clgzsrlnyzl_Dm, t.Clxlh, t.Clcpxh, t.bbh, '现行' As Jglx From Sb_Cgs_Zdjsjg t Where t.Clxlh = ? And ('1' = #macroparam# Or t.Clcpxh = ?) And t.Sxrq <= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') Order By t.Bbh Desc

with swjg as (select ypruuid,yprmc,decode(wt.djxh, null, wt.swry_dm, null) as swry_dm, wt.djxh from pz_ypr wt where wt.pzhsjg_dm =? and wt.yxbz='Y') select count(1) kjs,zfbz bl,ypruuid pzdwdm,yprmc pzdwmc from ( select t1.ypruuid,t1.yprmc, case when t.zfr_dm is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as zfbz from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and t1.yxbz='Y' and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t.sddwdjxh is null and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') union all select t1.ypruuid,t1.yprmc,case when t.zfr_dm is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as zfbz from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and t1.yxbz='Y' and t1.yprlx_dm = '31' and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') union all select g1.ypruuid,g1.yprmc ,case when g.zfr_dm is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as zfbz from zs_pzsyqk_yhp g, pz_ypr g1 where g.kpr_dm = g1.swry_dm and g1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and g1.yxbz='Y' and g1.yprlx_dm = '12' and g.sddwdjxh is null and g.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') union all select g1.ypruuid,g1.yprmc ,case when g.zfr_dm is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as zfbz from zs_pzsyqk_yhp g, pz_ypr g1 where g.sddwdjxh = g1.djxh and g1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and g1.yxbz='Y' and g1.yprlx_dm = '31' and g.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') )group by ypruuid,yprmc,zfbz

SELECT A.YSYSKMXUUID, A.DKSQUUID, A.DKFPLB_DM, A.ZSXM_DM, A.ZSPM_DM, A.WSPZZL_DM, A.WSPZZG, A.WSPZHM, A.PMSE, A.BCKCSE, A.SKSX, A.GLDKSQUUID, A.HY_DM, A.ZFBZ_1, A.ZFR_DM, A.ZFRQ_1, A.SFMXUUID, A.SPUUID, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, A.LRR_DM, A.LRRQ, A.XGR_DM, A.XGRQ, A.SJGSDQ, A.KKCSE, A.JSFYJ, A.SFL, A.JSYJ, A.DJXH, A.KSYSKUUID, A.LZSFMXUUID FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX A INNER JOIN FP_DK_FPKJXX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.LZFPDM = ? AND B.LZFPHM = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.LZSFMXUUID IS NOT NULL

with kk as (select cjb.djxh mfdjxh,clf.gmfdjxh, clf.mfpzxh, clf.gmfpzxh from sb_zlbscjb cjb, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb clf where cjb.zlbscjuuid = clf.zlbscjuuid and clf.fybh = ? and cjb.djxh = ?) select t.*,kk.* from sb_fcjy t, sb_sbb sbb, kk where t.sbuuid = sbb.sbuuid and t.sybh_1 = ? and kk.mfpzxh = t.pzxh and sbb.djxh = ? and nvl(sbb.zfbz_1, 'N') <> 'Y' and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

select a.zspm_dm,a.zszm_dm,a.zszmmc,t.fdsl,t.sl_1,t.swjg_dm from CS_GY_GLB_ZSZM t,dm_gy_zszm a where t.zszm_dm=a.zszm_dm and a.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.xybz='Y' and a.yxbz='Y' and sysdate between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg a connect by prior a.sjswjg_dm = a.swjg_dm start with a.swjg_dm = ?)

select xzqhsz_dm,tddj_dm,dwse, t.yxqq, t.yxqz,jdxz_dm from cs_dj_tddwseszb t where t.xzqhsz_dm=? and (t.jdxz_dm =? or t.jdxz_dm is null) and (1 =? OR (t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? )) and t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and (1 = ? or t.yxqz >= ?) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz ='Y'

select c.sybh_1 from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b,sb_tdzzs_ffdckf c where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and c.sbuuid=a.sbuuid and a.djxh = b.djxh and a.yzpzzl_dm = b.yzpzzl_dm and b.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and a.zfbz_1!='Y' and a.djxh = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and c.sybz_dm_1=?
select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_xfs b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Tshyzbjnstz t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm,skje,kjzfsl from pz_sspkjbdmxb where sspkjbduuid = ?
select * from CS_SB_CGSCBLRL where yxbz = 'Y' and (#macroparam#)/*swjg_dm in ('')*/
select * from sb_zzs_ncpjxkcbzbab t where t.djxh=? and t.bassqq<=? and t.bassqz>=? and t.zfbz_1='N'
select t.pzzl_dm, sum(t.jcsl) as jcsl from pz_jc t where t.czyuuid = ? and t.pzzt_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' group by t.pzzl_dm
select * from sb_hgz_cyqq where qjjybs=?
select count(*) from ZS_WSZ where HZSPUUID is not null and ZSUUID in (select ZSUUID from ZS_YJSF where YZPZXH=? and YZPZZL_DM in ('BDA0610130', 'BDA0610136','BDA0610333','BDA0610139','BDA0610532'))

Select t.* From Sb_Sbxx t,sb_sds_fjmhd_yjnd a Where t.sbuuid = a.sbuuid And t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq >= ? And t.Skssqz <= ? And t.Sbsx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And t.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And a.yjdndsbbj = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')

select t.yjskuuid, t.yjsklsuuid, t.djxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.yzpzzl_dm , yzpzzl.dzbzdszlmc, t.pzxh, t.lse, t.sksx_dm, sksx.sksxmc, t.lrrq, t.lyuuid_1 from sb_yjskxxlsz t, dm_gy_dzbzdszl yzpzzl, dm_zs_sksx sksx where t.djxh=? and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = yzpzzl.dzbzdszl_dm(+) and t.sksx_dm =sksx.sksx_dm(+) order by t.lrrq desc
SELECT djxh FROM fp_dk_fpkjxx WHERE zfbz_1='N' AND fpzl_dm=? AND fp_dm=? AND fphm=?

select ls.xh, ls.jylx_dm, ls.jyfhbz lsjyfhbz, gz.jyfhbz, ls.uuid, lx.jylx_mc from zs_ls_dr_kj_jygz ls, Dm_Kj_Jygz gz, dm_kj_jylx lx where ls.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm and ls.jylx_dm = gz.jylx_dm and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and gz.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 = gz.jxfx1_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 = gz.jxfx1_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 = gz.jxfx1_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 = gz.jxfx1_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 = gz.jxfx1_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 = gz.jxfx1_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 = gz.jxfx1_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz7 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 = gz.jxfx2_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 = gz.jxfx2_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 = gz.jxfx2_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 = gz.jxfx2_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 = gz.jxfx2_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 = gz.jxfx2_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 = gz.jxfx2_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz7 is null))
SELECT * FROM Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_czzwczbgb t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

SELECT T.SSPZJXBUUID as uuid,T.SSPZJXBBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZJXB T WHERE T.PZGLY_DM = ? AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SFSHTGBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.SSPZJXBBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPZJXBBH

SELECT C.SFMXUUID, NVL(C.SRZE, 0) KPJE, NVL(C.YJSFE, 0) + NVL(C.YBSFE, 0) YBSFE FROM FP_DK_SQ A, FP_DK_FPKJXX B, FP_DK_SFMX C WHERE A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID AND B.DKSQUUID = C.DKSQUUID AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND C.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND C.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND C.GLDKSQUUID IS NULL AND (C.ZSPM_DM LIKE '101016%' OR C.ZSPM_DM LIKE '101017%') AND C.DKFPLB_DM IN ('01', '07') AND A.DJXH = ? AND b.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.KJRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1

update sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cj a set ( a.fwcqzsh , a.fybh , a.fwmj , a.czfcmj , a.fcyz , a.czwyz , a.jsbl , a.zspm_dm , a.fcmc , a.fcyt_dm , a.dh_1 , a.pkbz , a.csqdrq , a.syqzzrq , a.xzqhsz_dm , a.xxdz , a.zgswskfj_dm , a.zfrq_1 , a.sl_1 , a.nsqx_dm , a.sbqx_dm , a.jkqx_dm , a.cqgs_dm , a.jdxz_dm , a.ssjmxz_dm , a.bqjmse , a.jmsfcyz , a.xgr_dm , a.xgrq ) = (select b.fwcqzsh , b.fybh , b.fwmj , b.czfcmj , b.fcyz , b.czwyz , b.jsbl , b.zspm_dm , b.fcmc , b.fcyt_dm , b.dh_1 , b.pkbz , b.csqdrq , b.syqzzrq , b.xzqhsz_dm , b.xxdz , b.zgswskfj_dm , b.zfrq_1 , b.sl_1 , b.nsqx_dm , b.sbqx_dm , b.jkqx_dm , b.cqgs_dm , b.jdxz_dm , b.ssjmxz_dm , b.bqjmse , b.jmsfcyz , a.lrr_dm , sysdate from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.fybh = b.fybh) where (a.djxh, a.fybh) in (select djxh, fybh from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj) and a.djxh = ?
