select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.sybh_1, t.lsmxid, x.ybtse, x.yzpzzl_dm, x.pzxh, x.lrr_dm from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where x.zfbz_1 = 'N' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.djxh = x.djxh and x.zsxm_dm = nvl(t.zsxm_dm, x.zsxm_dm) and x.zspm_dm = nvl(t.zspm_dm, x.zspm_dm) and (t.zszm_dm is null or t.zszm_dm = x.zszm_dm) and nvl(x.skssqq, date '0001-01-01') = nvl(t.ssqq, nvl(x.skssqq, date '0001-01-01')) and nvl(x.skssqz, date '0001-01-01') = nvl(t.ssqz, nvl(x.skssqz, date '0001-01-01')) and x.zsdlfs_dm = nvl(t.zsdlfs_dm, x.zsdlfs_dm) and decode(x.yzpzzl_dm, #macroparam#, x.yzpzzl_dm) = nvl(decode(t.yzpzzl_dm, #macroparam#, t.yzpzzl_dm), decode(x.yzpzzl_dm, #macroparam#, x.yzpzzl_dm)) and x.sbsx_dm_1 = nvl(t.sbsx_dm_1, x.sbsx_dm_1) and x.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and ((t.sybh_1 is null and x.sybh_1 is null) or (t.sybh_1 is not null and t.sybh_1 = x.sybh_1 and exists (select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg a where a.pzxh = x.pzxh and a.sybh_1 = x.sybh_1)) or (t.sybh_1 is not null and x.sybh_1 is null and exists (select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg a where a.pzxh = x.pzxh and a.sybh_1 = t.sybh_1))) and t.hhljid = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or x.yzpzzl_dm not in #macroparam#) and x.yzpzzl_dm not in (#macroparam#)
select * from sb_tdzzs_ffdckf where sbuuid=?
Select sum(nvl(Xgm.Yzzzsbhsxse, 0)) ysfwbqbhsxse, sum(nvl(Xgm.Hdxse, 0)) ysfwbqbhssrehd From Sb_Zzs_Xgm Xgm Where Xgm.Ewblxh = ? And Xgm.Sbuuid in (#macroparam#)

select 2 as tzlx_dm from zs_ydtxx t where t.ydtlyuuid in (select a.ydtuuid from zs_ydtxx a where a.ydtlyuuid in (select b.sbxxuuid from sb_sbxx b where b.pzxh=? )) and t.tzlx_dm ='4' and NVL(T.TDSFSQSPBZ,'Y')='Y'
select t.pzzg_dm code,t.pzzg caption,t.pzzl_dm pcode,t.* from cs_pz_pzzgb t where sysdate between yxqsrq and yxzzrq
UPDATE SB_TDSYQKDJXX SET QH = ? WHERE DJXH = ? AND TDSYBH = ?
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.nd = ? and t.yf = ? and (t.sjlybz is null or t.sjlybz in (#macroparam#) or (t.sjlybz = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ?))
select a.* from sb_ysbtj a,sb_ls_sbxx b where a.sybh_1=b.sybh_1 and b.hhljid=?

SELECT DISTINCT t2.yfsbjelrl asrzelrl, t1.* from SB_SDS_FJMHD_ND t1, SB_SDS_FJMHD_ASRZEHDMX t2, SB_SBXX s where s.DJXH = ? and s.ZSFS_DM = ? and s.YZPZZL_DM = ? and s.SBUUID = t1.SBUUID and t1.SBUUID = t2.SBUUID and s.SBSX_DM_1 ='11' and s.zfbz_1 ='N' and trunc(s.SKSSQQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and trunc(s.SKSSQZ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select * from pz_sspzssbgdzb where pzssbgduuid=?
SELECT * FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.PZZL_DM = ? AND T.GDSBZ = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ

with uu as (select c.fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf t, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f where t.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and t.djxh = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and c.ysbbz = 'Y' and f.fybh = ?), kk as (select distinct s.pzxh from sb_cxs_fcjy s, uu where s.fcjycjxxuuid = uu.fcjycjxxuuid and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') select distinct a.sbuuid, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.sbsx_dm_1 as sblx_dm, a.pzxh, a.yzpzzl_dm, b.ZSXM_DM, b.sbfs_dm, b.sbqx, b.sybh_1, a.sbrq_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.YBTSE, a.lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b, kk where a.SBUUID = b.SBUUID and a.pzxh = kk.pzxh and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sbrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sbrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and a.GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5') ORDER BY a.lrrq DESC
select * from sb_tdjy_zb_csf where sbuuid=? and pzxh=?

SELECT T.SSPZTYZFUUID as uuid ,T.SSPZTYZFBH AS PZBH FROM pz_sspztyzfzb T WHERE T.BBDW_DM = ? AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SSPZTYZFBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPZTYZFBH
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.YPRUUID = ? AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(T.YXQSRQ) AND TRUNC(T.YXZZRQ)

select zdjsjg,bbh,clscqymc from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb where clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_Dm = ?) order by bbh desc

select t.zlxgid, t.djxh from sb_ls_sbxx l, sb_yqwsbqc t where l.hhljid = ? and l.lsmxid = t.zlxgid and l.djxh = t.djxh and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and t.sbrq_1 is null and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm, 0, 5) || '%' and (a.zsxm_dm = '10101' or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or a.sbsx_dm_1 is null) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')) and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx b, dj_nsrxx dj where b.gshgshdjxh = t.djxh and b.gshgshdjxh = dj.djxh and b.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and b.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm and b.skssqq <= t.skssqz and b.skssqz >= t.skssqq and ((b.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and b.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and not (dj.djzclx_dm in ('175', '171', '172') or dj.djzclx_dm like '41%') and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = b.djxh and tzf.yxqq <= b.skssqq and tzf.yxqz >= b.skssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and gsxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and gsxx.skssqq >= tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz <= tzf.yxqz))) or (b.zspm_dm not in ('101060300', '101060200') or (b.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and (dj.djzclx_dm in ('175', '171', '172') or dj.djzclx_dm like '41%')))))

select count(1) as rowsum from (select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '现行' as jglx, clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb where ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clscqymc like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcpxh) like ?) union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '暂行' as jglx, ZXLSXLH as clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg zxzdjsjg where zxzdjsjg.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(zxzdjsjg.clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(zxzdjsjg.clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or zxzdjsjg.clscqymc like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(zxzdjsjg.clcpxh) like ?) and (#macroparam#) /*zxzdjsjg.hdswjg_dm in ()*/ union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '备案' as jglx, BALSXLH as clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clscqymc like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcpxh) like ?) and cjhdbz = 'N' and zgswjg_dm = ?)
select a.sybh_1 from sb_sbb t,sb_sbxx a where t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.djxh = ? and t.sbuuid=a.sbuuid and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.sybh_1 = ?
SELECT jgjc_dm FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzgly_dm = ?
select pzxh from sb_sbxx where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and yzpzzl_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1= ? and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')

select * from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.djxh = ? and to_char(a.skssqq,'yyyy-mm-dd') = ? and to_char(a.skssqz,'yyyy-mm-dd') = ? and b.sl_1 = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

select SWJG_DM , SWJGMC , SWJGJC , SWJGBZ , SJSWJG_DM , JGJC_DM , SWJGYZBM , SWJGDZ , SWJGLXDH , CZDH , DZXX , XZQHSZ_DM , SWJGFZR_DM , GDSLX_DM , SWJGJG from dm_gy_swjg jg where jg.Gdslx_Dm =? and jg.xzqhsz_dm=? and xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A, SB_XFS_FB_DCTLSKDKTZ B WHERE A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ = ? AND A.SKSSQZ = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5')

select bazdjsjg as zxzdjsjg from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where cjhdbz = 'N' and (#macroparam#)/*zgswjg_dm in ('')*/ and clcp IN (#macroparam#) and clxh IN (#macroparam#) and zypz IN (#macroparam#) and balsxlh = ? order by lrrq desc
select t.zzslx,t.ldlx,t.skssqq,t.skssqz,t.bcldbhs from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? and t.njzbz='1' and t.skssqz=?

select a.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx a, sb_zlbscjb b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx c, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb d where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and c.uuid = a.zlfcj_uuid and b.djxh = ? and (? is null or d.kfbdcxmbh = ?)
select * from pz_sspzjcqdmxb t where t.sspzjcqduuid = ?
select * from ( select a.*, rank() over(PARTITION by a.bh order by lrrq desc) xh from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a where a.BH=?and a.ZFBZ_1='N') where xh = 1
select t.*, t1.pzzlmc from cs_pz_jbjxpzbmx t left join dm_pz_pzzl t1 on t.pzzl_dm = t1.pzzl_dm where t.jbjxpzuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1= 'Y'
select * from CS_YH_FZJGKBAYHSXB t where t.swjg_dm =? and t.yxbz='Y'

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwsbqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))
select * from SB_FJM_KJQYSDSHTBADJB t where t.BH= ?

SELECT a.wsbuuid from SB_YQWSBQC a, SB_LS_SBXX sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.skssqz = sbxx.ssqz and (a.Sbrq_1 is null or a.Sbrq_1 = date '1-1-1') and (a.zsdlfs_dm is null or a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm) and ((a.zsxm_dm not in ('10101', '10104', '30217') and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*普通税*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '10101' and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*增值税*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '30217' and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*文化事业建设费*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '10104' and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqq and ((a.skssqz + 1 < add_months(a.skssqq, 12) and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm not in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688')) /*企业所得税非年报*/ or (a.skssqz + 1 >= add_months(a.skssqq, 12) and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688','BDA0610039','BDA0610764','BDA0610073','BDA0610766','BDA0610074','BDA0610776','BDA0610570')) AND (TO_CHAR(sbxx.ssqz, 'MM')-TO_CHAR(sbxx.ssqq, 'MM'))>=11 /*企业所得税A类年报*/ )) /*企业所得税*/ ) and (a.sybh_1 is null or a.sybh_1 = sbxx.sybh_1) and sbxx.hhljid=?
select t.* from sb_wtdz_zqjyyhsbgb t where t.sbuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.nd = ? and t.yf = ? and t.sjlybz = '1'
SELECT ZB.SSPZLFDBH, ZB.FFDWR, ZB.FFRXM, ZB.LQDWR, ZB.LQRXM, ZB.FFRQ FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB ZB WHERE zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND trunc(ZB.FFRQ) >=? AND trunc(ZB.FFRQ) <=? #macroparam#
SELECT T.PZZL_DM AS CODE, T.PZZLMC AS CAPTION, T.SWJG_DM FROM DM_PZ_PZZL T, CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL A WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZZL_DM = A.PZZL_DM AND A.SWJG_DM = ?

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM, ZSBZ, FPLX_DM, FYBH FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE DJXH = ? AND SBUUID = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select sbxx.sbuuid, sbxx.sbxxuuid, sbxx.ybtse from sb_sbxx sbxx, sb_kqsyfnd ndsb where sbxx.sbuuid = ndsb.sbuuid and nvl(sbxx.zfbz_1,'N') ='N' and sbxx.djxh = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.skssqz = ? and ndsb.yqt_dm = ? and ndsb.yqtmc = ? and ndsb.zyzmc = ? and sbxx.zsxm_dm = ? and sbxx.zspm_dm = ? and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')

select t.zlxgid, t.djxh, t.sbrq_1, (select min(a.nssbrq) from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm, 0, 5) || '%' and (a.zsxm_dm = ? or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = ? or a.sbsx_dm_1 is null) and a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in (?)) as nssbrq, (select min(nssbrq) from sb_gssbxx b, dj_nsrxx dj where b.gshgshdjxh = t.djxh and b.gshgshdjxh = dj.djxh and b.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and b.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm and b.skssqq <= t.skssqz and b.skssqz >= t.skssqq and ((b.zspm_dm in (?) and b.yzpzzl_dm in (?) and not (dj.djzclx_dm in (?) or dj.djzclx_dm like ?) and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = b.djxh and tzf.yxqq <= b.skssqq and tzf.yxqz >= b.skssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like ? and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 in (?) and gsxx.zfbz_1 = ? and gsxx.skssqq >= tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz <= tzf.yxqz))) or (b.zspm_dm not in (?) or (b.zspm_dm in (?) and (dj.djzclx_dm in (?) or dj.djzclx_dm like ?))))) gsnssbrq from sb_ls_sbxx l, sb_yqwsbqc t where l.hhljid = ? and l.lsmxid = t.zlxgid and l.djxh = t.djxh and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? union all select t.zlxgid, t.djxh, t.sbrq_1, (select min(lrrq) from sb_zlbscjb a where a.ssqz = t.zlssqjz and a.djxh = t.djxh and nvl(a.zfbz_1, ?) = ?) nssbrq, null gsnssbrq from sb_yqwbszlqc t, sb_ls_sbxx l where l.hhljid = ? and l.lsmxid = t.zlxgid and l.djxh = t.djxh and t.zgswskfj_dm like ?
SELECT * FROM SB_XFSJG_BJXFSZDJSJG_HDMX T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ?

select clqkuuid, djxh, clpzh, clsbdh, zspm_dm, zszm_dm, ppxh, clcp, fdjhm, clfprqhzcdjrq, syxz, jdcrlnyzl_dm, jdxz_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, sl_1, bz, zxrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, zbzl, hdzkrs, pql, sbqx_dm, nsqx_dm, jkqx_dm, jldw_dm from sb_clqkxx a where (a.djxh=? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.clsbdh=? or 1=#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') =? and (a.clfprqhzcdjrq < =? or 1=#macroparam#)

SELECT a.pzfl_dm pzfldm ,a.pzzl_dm, b.pzzlmc pzzlmc FROM CS_PZ_PZZLFLGLB a, dm_pz_pzzl b WHERE a.pzzl_dm = b.pzzl_dm AND a.pzfl_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND a.pzhsjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND a.yxbz = 'Y' AND a.xybz = 'Y' AND b.yxbz = 'Y' AND b.xybz = 'Y'

select ls.djxh, ba.kjzdzz_dm from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls, dj_cwkjzdjhsrjbabgs ba where ls.djxh = ba.djxh(+) and ba.yxqq(+) <= ? and ba.yxqz(+) >= ? and ba.yxbz(+) = ? and exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.lb_dm = ? and t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and exists (select 1 from dj_nsrxx_kz kz where kz.djxh = t.djxh and kz.hsfs_dm in (#macroparam#)))
update sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a set a.csfsbbz = 'N' where a.zlbscjuuid in (select zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb where nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(a.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.csfpzxh = ?
SELECT * FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzgly_dm = ? AND a.pzhsjgyxqsrq <= trunc(SYSDATE) AND a.pzhsjgyxzzrq > trunc(SYSDATE)

Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Fjmhd_Yjnd_Srzehdmx t Where t.Sbuuid = (Select a.Sbuuid From Sb_Sbxx a, Sb_Sds_Fjmhd_Yjnd b Where a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And a.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And a.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And b.Yjdndsbbj = '1' And a.Sbsx_Dm_1 = '11' And a.Djxh = ? And a.Zsfs_Dm = ? And a.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And a.Skssqq >= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And a.Skssqz <= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.zsxm_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from ( select * from cs_sb_yzl t where t.zspm_dm=? and t.zszm_dm is null and xybz='Y' AND YXBZ='Y') a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y')
select * from cs_pz_swjgdypzzl a where a.swjg_dm like ? and not exists (select 1 from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh b where b.swjg_dm= ? and b.pzzl_dm = a.pzzl_dm )

select t2.btzwgqy_nsrsbh btzwgqynssbh, t2.btzwgqy_qymc btzwgqymc, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_nsrsbh gdnsrsbh, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_gdmc gdmc, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_gjhdq gdgjdq, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_cgzl cgzl, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_sjq cgqssj, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_sjz cgzzsj, t3.btzwgqyqbgdxx_zqbgfbl cgbl, t1.sbuuid, t1.pzxh from sb_sbb t1, sb_glywwlndbg_fb8_dwtzqk t2, sb_glywwlndbg_fb8_dwtzqk_mx t3 where t1.sbuuid = t2.sbuuid and t2.sbuuid = t3.sbuuid and t1.djxh = ?
select t.swjg_dm from pz_sspzjjb t where t.swjg_dm =? and t.zfbz_1 ='N' and t.FHYJ is null

select c.zlbsuuid, d.zlbsdl_dm, d.zlbsxl_dm, c.bszl_dm, c.ssqq, c.ssqz, c.lrrq, d.cfdz from sb_zlbscjb c inner join sb_zlbssldjb d on c.zlbsuuid = d.zlbsuuid where c.djxh = ? and c.ssqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and c.ssqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.zlbsdl_dm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is Null) order by c.lrrq desc

SELECT GZ.CSZ, TRIM(GZ.CSBM) CSBM FROM SB_CS_TSNSRGZB GZ, SB_CS_TSNSRWHB WH WHERE WH.TSYWGLUUID = GZ.TSYWGLUUID AND WH.DJXH = ? AND ('1'=? OR wh.tsnsrlx_dm = ?) AND WH.YXQQ <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND WH.YXQZ >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND WH.YXBZ = 'Y' AND GZ.YXBZ = 'Y'
select zlbsxl_dm, zlbsxlmc from cs_sb_zlbsbdgl where kjzdzz_dm = ? and yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y'
select t.* from sb_kssssrfpblwh t where t.djxh=? and t.yxqq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zsdlfs_dm=? and (1 = ? or t.bkjdjxh = ?) and t.yxbz='Y'
select a.* from sb_tdzzsqssh_swsxtzs a ,sb_tdzzsqs_fb_tdzzsqssbshb b where a.ywzjuuid=b.uuid and b.djxh=? and b.xmbh=? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYZCSGFB3 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select t.pzlfduuid ypzuuid, t.sspzlfdbh ypzbh, t.ffrq ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm, lfdlx_dm from PZ_SSPZLFDZB t where t.lrr_dm = ? and zfbz_1 != 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from pz_flz b where b.yspzhm = t.pzlfduuid and b.xhuuid is null) and ffrq between ? and ? and lfdlx_dm!='5' and not exists(select 1 from pz_gztzs a where t.pzlfduuid=a.yspzhm and a.tybz is null)
select * from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh w where w.swjg_dm = ? and exists (select 1 from cs_pz_swjgdypzzl t where t.swjg_dm like ? and t.pzzl_dm = w.pzzl_dm)
select 1 from sb_sbf_cbjg t where t.wsbuuid = ? and t.cbuuid is not null and t.cbrq is not null
select * from pz_sspzssbgdzb where sqdw_dm=? and zstybz='N' and zfbz_1='N'

Select Clscqy_Dm, Scqymc, Gcclscqynsrsbh, Scqyjc, Qydmscsj, Clscqyzgswjg, Cljkqymc, Cljkqynsrsbh, Cljkqyzgswjg, Sqrq, Yxbz, Lrr_Dm, Lrrq, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Sjgsdq, Clcdsx_Dm, Gcclscqyssdq, Jkclscqyssdq From Sb_Cgs_Clscqy t Where t.Clcdsx_Dm = ? And Yxbz = 'Y' And t.Clscqyzgswjg Like ?

select jsjghduuid, nd, yf, bbh, clxlh, gjhdqsz_dm, clscqy_dm, zgswjg_dm, cllb_dm_1, cllx_dm, clcp, clxh, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, sqccjg, bqccjg, bqccjg as ccjg, sqcklsjg, bqcklsjg, bqcklsjg as cklsjg, yhdzdjsjg, zdjsjg, hdr_dm, hdrq, hdswjg_dm, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, gccbz from sb_cgs_clzdjsjghd t where t.bbh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select distinct t.djxh, t.nsrlx, t.fybh, t.hy_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.fcmc, t.fwcqzsh, t.fwzldz, e.nsqx_dm, e.sbqx_dm, e.jkqx_dm, f.nsrsbh, t1.cjsyuuid, t1.fyxxuuid, t1.zspm_dm, t1.fcyz, t1.czwyz, t1.czfcmj, t1.jsbl, t1.yxqq, t1.yxqz, t1.bgbm, t.fybh as sybh_1 from sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb t1 inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb t on t1.fyxxuuid = t.fyxxuuid and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.bgbm = ? and t.zgswskfj_dm =? left join rd_sfzrdxxb e on t.djxh = e.djxh and e.zsxm_dm = ? and e.zspm_dm =? and e.rdyxqq <=to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and e. rdyxqz>=to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and e.yxbz = 'Y' inner join DJ_LS_DJXHNSRSBH f on t.djxh = f.djxh and t1.yxqq <= sysdate and t1.yxqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), ?)

select t.dksquuid, t.gldksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.srze, t.yxkcje, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.sskcs, t.ynsfe, t.jmsfe, t.yjsfe, t.ybsfe, t.zszsxm_dm, t.zszspm_dm, t.zszszm_dm, t.jmspjguuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.jyxm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.nsqnyjse, t.sfmxuuid, t.lzsfmxuuid, t.zjsrsfft, t.qxq, t.qxz, t.bz, t.sfzczf from fp_dk_sfmx t, fp_dk_sq sq where 1 = 1 and t.dksquuid = sq.dksquuid #macroparam# and sq.djxh = ? and t.zjsrsfft = 'Y' and t.qxq is not null and t.qxz is not null and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zsbz = 'Y'

select a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sbxxuuid = b.sbxxuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.djxh is null
select pzyjrq from pz_yjrqszb a where swjg_dm like ? and yjrqnd = ? and yjrqyf = ?

select mx.Sspztyzfmxuuid, mx.sspztyzfuuid, mx.sspzxhsquuid, mx.pzjcuuid, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.pzsl from pz_sspztyzfmxb mx, pz_sspztyzfzb zb where mx.sspztyzfuuid = zb.sspztyzfuuid and zb.zstybz = 'Y' and mx.sspzxhsquuid is null and zb.tbrq >=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and zb.tbrq <=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and zb.sjgsdq like ?
select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxg a where a.jdccchgzbh = ? order by a.fzrq desc ,a.lrrq desc
select * from sb_tdjy where sybh_1=? and zrfdjxh = ? and csfdjxh=? and (1 = #macroparam# or htbh = ? ) order by lrrq desc
select PBSBDYCLXFL_DM, PBSBDYCLXFLMC, SJPBSBDYCLXFL_DM from DM_SB_PBSBDYCLXFL where yxbz = 'Y' start with SJPBSBDYCLXFL_DM is null connect by prior PBSBDYCLXFL_DM = SJPBSBDYCLXFL_DM
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_DYNSBAB T WHERE T.PZXH=? AND T.SBUUID=?
select a.* from sb_yqtfpxx a, sb_sbb b where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.gzlx_dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') and b.pzxh = ? and (1= #macroparam# or b.sbuuid = ?)

select a.sbuuid,a.pzxh,a.yzpzzl_dm,a.nsrsbh,a.lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh =? and b.sybh_1 =? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm =? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') order by a.lrrq desc
select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz a where a.jdccchgzbh = ? order by a.fzrq desc,a.lrrq desc
SELECT max(yf) yf FROM PZ_ZWCS WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ND = ?

select c.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c inner join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb a on c.ysuuid = a.cjsyuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ? and #macroparam#

Select t.* From Sb_Sbxx t, Sb_Sds_Jmhd_Yjnd a Where t.Sbuuid = a.Sbuuid And a.Yjdndsbbj = ? And t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq >= ? And t.Skssqz <= ? And t.Sbsx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And t.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb9_Zjtx t Where t.sbuuid=? Order By t.ewbhxh Asc
select a.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr a where a.sbuuid=?
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qyhbbhbqy t Where t.Sbuuid = ? And t.Pzxh = ?

select t.pzxh, t.pzmxxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.jsyj as sbje, t.ynse, t.ybtse, t.sl_1, t.zszm_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.pzxh = ? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
select fybh, uuid, zdjsjg,lrrq from SB_QSJYZDJSJGHB where fybh=? And YXBZ='Y'

SELECT T.FPKJXXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.KJSWJG_DM, T.KPR_DM, T.KJRQ, T.DJXH, T.FP_DM, T.FPZL_DM, T.FPHM, T.KPJE, T.LZFPDM, T.LZFPHM, T.TSNSRDJXH, T.FPKF_DM, T.BZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFSQR, T.ZFSQRQ, T.ZFYY, T.SJGSDQ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.ZFRQ_1 FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX T WHERE T.LZFPDM = ? AND T.LZFPHM = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'
update sb_sbxx set zfbz_1 = 'Y', zfr_dm = ?, zfrq_1 = ?,XGR_DM = ?,XGRQ = ? where (zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or zfbz_1 is null) and pzxh = ?
select * from Sb_Sbxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and a.zsdlfs_dm = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select * from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx where (djxh, tdsybh) not in (select djxh, tdsybh from sb_tdsyqkdjxx)
SELECT pzglyuuid,pzhsjg_dm, pzgly_dm, sjhsjg_dm, jgjc_dm, pzhsjgyxqsrq, pzhsjgyxzzrq, gkjsc_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzhsjg_dm = ?

SELECT hwysfpuuid, spfdjxh, sfdkhzfp, kjhzhwysytyfptzdhm, lzfpdm, lzfphm, cyrdjxh, cyrnsrsbh, cyrmc, cyrzgswjg_dm, cyrzgswjg_mc, shrdjxh, shrnsrsbh, shrmc, fhrdjxh, fhrnsrsbh, fhrmc, spfnsrmc, dksquuid, spfnsrsbh, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq FROM fp_dk_hwysyzzsfp WHERE dksquuid =?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, yysr_bq bq92, yycb_bq bq93, lrze_bq bq94, tdywjsdynssde_bq bq95, BZSSR_BQ bq96, gdzcjszjkctje_bq bq97, mbyqndks_bq bq98, nvl(sjlre_bq, 0) + nvl(byjynssde_bq, 0) bq99, nvl(ynsdse_bq, 0) + nvl(byjynsdse_bq, 0) + nvl(byjswjgqdyjsdse_bq, 0) bq100, nvl(jmsdse_bq, 0) + nvl(asnpje_xxwlqyjmsdse_bq, 0) bq101, ynsdse_bq bq102 from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_sds_jmcz_yjd b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh
select pzxh from sb_sbxx where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and yzpzzl_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1= ? and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select mx.sspztyzfmxuuid, mx.sspztyzfuuid, mx.pzjcuuid, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.pzsl from pz_sspztyzfmxb mx where mx.sspzxhsquuid = ?
select t.* from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select * from sb_cxs_fdcjyjghdb where #macroparam#

/*增值税一般纳税人附表一*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when ewbhxh = 1 then hj_xxynse end bq19, /*其中:17%税率的货物及加工修理修配劳务*/ case when ewbhxh = 2 then kch_xxynse end bq20, /*17%税率的服务、不动产和无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = 3 then hj_xxynse end bq21, /*13%税率*/ case when ewbhxh = 4 then kch_xxynse end bq22, /*11%税率*/ case when ewbhxh = 5 then kch_xxynse end bq23, /*6%税率*/ case when ewbhxh = 8 then hj_xxynse end bq65, /*其中：6%征收率*/ case when ewbhxh = 9 then hj_xxynse end bq66, /*5%征收率的货物及加工修理修配劳务*/ case when ewbhxh = 22 then kch_xxynse end bq67, /*5%征收率的服务、不动产和无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = 10 then hj_xxynse end bq68, /*4%征收率*/ case when ewbhxh = 11 then hj_xxynse end bq69, /*3%征收率的货物及加工修理修配劳务*/ case when ewbhxh = 12 then kch_xxynse end bq70, /*3%征收率的服务、不动产和无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh in ('13', '20', '21') then kch_xxynse end bq71 /*其他征收率*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb1_bqxsqkmx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh

select * from cs_rd_zfsdzb dzb where dzb.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and dzb.fszspm_dm = ? and dzb.yxbz='Y' and dzb.xybz='Y' order by dzb.swjg_dm desc
update sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a set a.mfsbbz = 'N' where a.zlbscjuuid in (select zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb where nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.mfpzxh = ?

select t.ypruuid as code, t.yprmc as caption, t.* from pz_ypr t where t.pzhsjg_dm in (select w.pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly w where w.pzgly_dm = ? and sysdate between w.pzhsjgyxqsrq and w.pzhsjgyxzzrq) and t.yprlx_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq
select pzxh from sb_sbxx where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and zspm_dm = ? and (1 = ? or zsdlfs_dm = ?) and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
Select * From sb_sbxx t Where (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh=?) And t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?

select t.djxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.kjzdzz_dm from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.sjlybz = '2' and t.nssbrq is null and not exists (select 1 from sb_zlbscjb cjb where cjb.djxh = t.djxh and cjb.ssqq >= t.skssqq and cjb.ssqz <= t.skssqz and (cjb.zfbz_1 = 'N' or cjb.zfbz_1 is null))
select * from CS_SB_QYSDS_XXWLQYCSPZB t where t.swjg_dm =? AND t.sydzsfs LIKE ? and t.yxqq <=? and t.yxqz>=? and t.yxbz='Y' order by xxwlqyedxx asc
select yq.* from sb_yqwsbqc yq, sb_ls_sbxx ls where yq.djxh = ls.djxh and yq.zlxgid = ls.yjskuuid and ls.hhljid = ?
select a.bh, a.fjmqyzwmc, a.hthxymc, a.hth, a.htje from SB_FJM_KJQYSDSHTBADJB a where a.djxh = ? and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select a.hy_dm, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, max(a.sl_1) sl1, sum(a.jsyj) jsyj, sum(a.ynse) ynse, sum(a.ybtse) ydzse, sum(a.yjse) ydzse1, count(*) dzhcs from zs_gsdz_yjsf a, zs_gsdz_wsz b where a.wtdzrdjxh = ? and a.wtdzrdjxh = b.wtdzrdjxh and a.zsuuid = b.zsuuid and a.djxh = b.djxh and trunc(b.kjrq) between ? and ? and (a.dzzgswskfj_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and a.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') group by a.hy_dm, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.skssqq, a.skssqz
select * from pz_jbscjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx a, sb_zlbscjb b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and c.uuid = a.zlfcj_uuid and c.gfzdjxh = ?
select t.* from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx t, (select distinct ysuuid from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx a where a.djxh = ? and sbuuid = ? and pzxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N') b where t.ysuuid = b.ysuuid and t.bgbm != 1
SELECT * FROM sb_hgzxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.jdczccchgz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.clsbdh = ?) order by t.lrrq desc

select * from( select a.ewbhxh, a.mflx, a.gyrnsrsbh, a.gyrxm, a.sfzjlx_dm, a.zjhm, a.gj_dm, a.dz, a.lxdh, a.szfe_1, a.zrfe, a.gyrdjxh from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx a where (a.zlbscjuuid, a.mflx) in (select b.zlbscjuuid, '1' from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b,sb_zlbscjb cjb where b.zlbscjuuid = cjb.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and b.fybh = ? and b.gmfdjxh = ?) union all select c.ewbhxh, '1' as mflx, c.gyrnsrsbh, c.gyrxm, c.sfzjlx_dm, c.zjhm, c.gj_dm, c.dz, c.lxdh, c.szfe_1, to_number('1') as zrfe, c.gyrdjxh from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx c, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx d,sb_zlbscjb cjb where c.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and c.zlfcj_uuid = d.uuid and d.zlbscjuuid = cjb.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and d.fybh = ? and d.gfzdjxh = ?) where 1 = ? union all select e.ewbhxh, e.mflx, e.gyrnsrsbh, e.gyrxm, e.sfzjlx_dm, e.zjhm, e.gj_dm, e.dz, e.lxdh, e.szfe_1, to_number('1') as zrfe, e.gyrdjxh from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb_gyrxx e, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb f,sb_zlbscjb cjb where e.zlbscjuuid = f.zlbscjuuid and e.tdcj_uuid = f.uuid and f.zlbscjuuid = cjb.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and e.mflx='1' and f.tdsybh = ? and f.csfdjxh = ? and 2 = ?

select '2' as kjywlx, t.cbshtglwfnsrsbh as nsrZqjmgnssbh, t.cbshtglwfmc as nsrZzgjnzwmc, t.cbshtglwfmc as nsrZqjmgzwmc, '' as nsrZzgjnywmc, t.htmc as nsrHtmc, t.htzh as nsrHtbh, t.htzxqsrq as nsrHtzxqssj, t.htzxzzrq as nsrHtzxzzsj, t.htje as nsrHtzje, t.bh as nsrHtbh, t.gjhdqsz_dm as nsrJmghdqmcjdm, t.cbshtglwfdz as nsrZqjmgzwdz, HTBZ_DM as bz, a.djzclx_dm as djzclxDm, a.hy_dm as hyDm,zfbz_2,qysdssdlx_dm as qysdssdlxDm1 from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb t,dj_nsrxx a where t.fjmdjxh =? and t.fjmdjxh= a.djxh(+) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT T.ZSXM_DM AS zsxmDm,t.zspm_dm as zspmDm,t.skssqq as skssqq,t.skssqz as skssqz,t.kssl as kssl,t.jsyj as jsyj,t.ynse as se FROM ZS_YJSF T where t.djxh = ? and t.yzpzxh=? and t.kjdjxh=? and t.yzpzzl_dm=?
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_ybjqgfdqtgd t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.SSPKJBDBH = ?

SELECT MAX(JJRQSRQ) + 1 AS JJRQSRQ FROM CS_GY_JJR WHERE SWJG_DM in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) AND XYBZ = 'Y' START WITH JJRQSRQ = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR JJRZZRQ = JJRZZRQ - 1

select b.xmbh,b.xmmc,b.ybtskblqx,a.lrrq from sb_tdzzsqssh_swsxtzs a ,sb_tdzzsqs_fb_tdzzsqssbshb b where a.ywzjuuid=b.uuid and b.djxh=? and b.xmbh=? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.dzbzdszl_dm='BDA0610858' order by a.lrrq DESC
select pzyspz_dm code,pzyspzmc caption from dm_pz_pzyspz where xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T.JBRQ_1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.SSPZJXBBH = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select distinct s.skssqq, s.skssqz,s.ybtse,s.yzpzzl_dm,t.sbuuid,s.lrrq from SB_XFS_FB_JYPFQYYFXSMX t, sb_sbb s where t.sbuuid = s.sbuuid and s.djxh = ? and s.skssqq >= to_date(?, ('yyyy-mm-dd')) and (t.shbz is null or t.shbz = 'N') and s.zfbz_1 = 'N' and s.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') order by s.lrrq desc

Select Nvl(Sum(a.Ybtse), 0) As Sqyjje From Sb_Sbxx a, Sb_Sds_Fjmhd_Yjnd b Where a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And a.Pzxh = b.Pzxh And a.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And a.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And a.Djxh = ? And a.Skssqq >= ? And a.Skssqz <= ? And a.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And a.sbsx_dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And b.Yjdndsbbj = ?

select distinct a.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb b,sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid =c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.ssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ssqz = to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.bszl_dm = ? and b.kfbdcxmbh = ? and b.zrfcsfbz = ? and (? is null or c.gfznsrsbh = ?) and (? is null or c.grzmc like '%'|| ? ||'%') and (? is null or c.dh = ?) and (? is null or c.fjh = ?)

select t1.* from SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_JMSDSEMXB t1 where t1.jzmzlx in ('1', '2') and exists (select 1 from SB_SBXX t2 where t1.sbuuid = t2.sbuuid and t1.pzxh = t2.pzxh and t2.djxh = ? and t2.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t2.skssqq >= ? and t2.skssqz <= ? AND T2.SBSX_DM_1 IN (#macroparam#) AND T2.YZPZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND T2.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND T2.ZSXM_DM = '10104')

select cs.csz, cs.swjg_dm from cs_dj_xmdjssjxsz cs, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) jg where cs.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and rownum = 1 order by cs.swjg_dm desc

select t2.ewbhxh, t2.bnljs from SB_CWBB_QYKJZZ_LRB t2 where t2.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1 = 'N'))

Select t.* From Sb_Sbxx t, sb_sds_fjmhd_yjnd a Where t.Sbuuid = a.Sbuuid And a.Yjdndsbbj = ? And t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq >= ? And t.Skssqz <= ? And t.Sbsx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And t.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')

select t.jylx_dm, t.dmlb, t.yxbz from dm_kj_jylx t where t.dmlb = ? and t.fzbz_2 = ? and t.swjg_dm in ( select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm )

select a.ysfwxsqbhssr from sb_zzs_xgm_fb_flzl a, sb_sbb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.zfbz_1!='Y' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and b.sbsx_dm_1='11'
select t.swry_dm,t.swryxm from dm_gy_swry t where t.XYBZ='Y' and t.YXBZ = 'Y' and t.swjg_Dm = ?
select distinct sbuuid, gfzdjxh, fybh, pzxh, pcuuid from sb_zlf_fhtz where pzxh = ?
select b.* from HX_SB.SB_SBB a, HX_SB.SB_KJ_QYSDS b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610780','BDA0610134') and b.htbh = ?
select /*+RESULT_CACHE*/jkqxgz from dm_gy_jkqx where jkqx_dm =? and xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
select a.* from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and b.zlbscjuuid = ? and (nvl(a.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' or nvl(a.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y')
select distinct * from cs_sb_tyzrrszpz where swjg_dm in(Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior sjSwjg_Dm = swjg_Dm) and yxbz='Y' order by zsxm_dm,zspm_dm,zszm_dm
select t.zzsfpmxuuid, t.zzsfpuuid, t.hwlwmc, t.ggxh, t.dwsl_dm, t.hlsl, t.hldj, t.je, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj,XSE,KCE from fp_dk_zzsptfp_hlmx t where t.zzsfpuuid = ?

SELECT T.PZSSBGDUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.PZSSBGDBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_SSPZSSBGDZB T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SQDW_DM = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSRQ_3 >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSRQ_3 <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.PZSSBGDBH
Select t.* From SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_ZCSSTZFB4 t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh=? and a.yzpzzl_dm=? and b.zsxm_dm=? and a.skssqq=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

select * from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb_gyrxx t where (t.zlbscjuuid, t.mflx) in (select a.zlbscjuuid, '0' from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(a.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zrfpzxh = ? union all select a.zlbscjuuid, '1' from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(a.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.csfpzxh = ?)
select t.swry_dm code,t.yprmc caption,t.* from pz_ypr t where yprlx_dm=? and (swry_dm = ? or pzhsjg_dm in (select pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly a where a.pzgly_dm = ?))
SELECT * FROM cs_pz_jbjxpzb
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYGQSBFB3 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select * from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx t where (t.zlbscjuuid, t.zlfcj_uuid, DY_EWBHXH) in (select a.zlbscjuuid, a.uuid, a.ewbhxh from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(a.ZLFSBBZ, 'N') = 'Y' and b.zlbscjuuid = a.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.PZXH = ?)

select c.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c inner join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb a on c.ysuuid = a.cjsyuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ? and #macroparam# union all select c.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c inner join sb_cxs_czjzsymxb a on c.ysuuid = a.czsyuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ? and #macroparam#
select * from sb_yjskxxlsz t where t.pzxh=?

select jc.pzzl_dm, jc.pzzg_dm, jc.pzqshm, jc.pzzzhm, jc.jcsl from pz_jc jc, pz_ypr ypr where ypr.ypruuid = jc.czyuuid and ypr.swry_dm = ? and jc.pzzl_dm = ? and jc.pzzg_dm = ? and jc.pzqshm >= ? and jc.pzzzhm <= ? and jc.yxbz ='Y' and sysdate between ypr.yxqsrq and ypr.yxzzrq
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zhzycpsryhmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_FCSSYSYXX T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND #macroparam#
select a.* from wbjh_cxs_fcjycjxx a, wbjh_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf b where a.fwuuid = b.fwuuid and a.htbh = ? and b.djxh = ? and b.zrfcsfbz = ? and a.zlfclfbz = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select round(sum(decode( sb.zsxm_dm,'10101',sb.ysx*(1+nvl(sb.sl_1,0)),sb.jsyj )),2) jsyj from sb_sbxx sb where sb.djxh = ? and sb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.skssqq >= ? and sb.skssqz <= ?
select pz.dyrwh, pz.syjg_dm, pz.mzmc_1, pz.bbkzbl, pz.dyscdm, pz.myhs, pz.hjj, pz.whjg_dm, pz.xgrq, pz.xgr_dm, pz.bz, pz.ywfl_dm, pz.tdmbbh from cs_gy_dycspz pz where pz.dyrwh = ?

select t.pzxh as yzpzxh, t.pzmxxh as yzpzmxxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.jsyj as sbje, t.sl_1 as sl, t.ynse, t.ybtse from sb_sbxx t, sb_sbb b where t.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and t.djxh = b.djxh and t.djxh = ? and t.pzxh = ? and (1=? or to_char(t.skssqq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? ) and (1=? or to_char(t.skssqz, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? ) and b.zfrq_1 is not null and b.zfr_dm is not null and t.zfrq_1 is not null and t.zfr_dm is not null
select uuid from SB_GLYWWLNDBG t where t.sbuuid=?
select t.* from sb_yjsf_cjb t where t.lcslid=? and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null)

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwbszlqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And a.Sbrq_1 is null And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))

select t.pkuuid from sb_pkqc t where t.zfbz_1='0' and nvl(t.kkzt,'x') in ('x','2') and (1=#macroparam# or t.ssgly_dm like ?||'%') and (1=#macroparam# or t.nsrsbh=?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.zgswskfj_dm =?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssswjg_dm=?) and t.lrrq >=trunc(sysdate,'mm') and t.lrrq<add_months(trunc(sysdate,'mm'),1)

select mx.* from pz_sspzssbgdzb zb, pz_sspzssbgdmxb mx where zb.pzssbgduuid = mx.pzssbgduuid and zb.zstybz = 'Y' and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.sqdw_dm = ? and mx.pzzl_dm = ? AND (1=? or mx.pzzg_dm = ?) and mx.pzqshm >= ? and mx.pzzzhm <= ?
select t.* from zs_ydtxx t where t.pzxh=? and t.tzlx_dm in('1','4')

Select t.Uuid, t.Lcslid, t.Nsrmc, t.Zjhm, t.Lxdh, t.Yjdz, t.Clcpxh, t.Clsbdh, t.Fdjhm, t.Slrq, t.Pzfzjg, t.Wszmhm, t.Swjg_Dm, t.Hcr, t.Pfr, t.Pfrq_1, t.Cljg, t.Bz, t.Clgzswszmdbjg_Dm, t.Clgzswszmbdswjgclyj_Dm, t.Zsjg_Dm, t.Gaglbm_Dm, t.Sfzjzl_Dm, t.Sffsbz, t.Sfybjbz From Sb_Cgs_Wszmpfhcxx t Where t.Hcr = ? And t.Sfybjbz = ? And t.Clgzswszmbdswjgclyj_Dm In (#macroparam#)
select * from sb_zlbssldjb s where s.djxh=? and s.zlbsxl_dm=? and s.ssqq=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select distinct t.djxh from sb_sbb t where t.pzxh = ?

select count(*) as rowsum from (select c.clxlh, c.clcp, c.clxh, c.cd as cdsx, c.cllx_dm, c.cldw, c.zws, c.pql, c.zdjsjg, c.zypz from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb c where c.cllx_dm = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(c.clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(c.clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (c.cldw = ? or c.cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (c.zws = ? or c.zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (c.pql = ? or c.pql='0')) union select d.zxlsxlh as clxlh, d.clcp, d.clxh, d.cdsx, d.cllx_dm, d.cldw, d.zws, d.pql, d.zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, d.zypz from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg d where d.cllx_dm = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(d.clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(d.clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (d.cldw = ? or d.cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (d.zws = ? or d.zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (d.pql = ? or d.pql='0')))
select * from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx_sh where fcjycjxxuuid=? and lcslid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_YQTDM T WHERE T.XYBZ='Y'
select * from sb_zlbscjb a where nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.ssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ssqz = to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.bszl_dm = ?
select swsx_dm,swsxmc from dm_gy_swsx where ywlc_dm like 'LCA03%' and xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Sedmyhmxbfb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

SELECT * FROM (select t.qc from kj_hsrq t, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G where t.sj_swjg_dm = G.Swjg_Dm and t.qrqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between qc and qrqz order by G.SWJG_DM DESC, t.qc) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
select t.* from sb_dkdj_fb_jks_yhjs t where t.sbuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT sk.zgswskfj_dm,sk.swjg_dm,sk.skssqq,sk.skssqz FROM sb_zzs_ldsklsz sk WHERE sk.Skssqz = (SELECT MAX(a.skssqz) FROM sb_sbb a WHERE a.DJXH = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610606' and a.zfbz_1='N' ) AND sk.DJXH = ?

SELECT T.ZSXM_DM AS zsxmDm,t.zspm_dm as zspmDm,t.skssqq as skssqq,t.skssqz as skssqz,t.kssl as kssl,t.jsyj as jsyj,t.se as se FROM SB_SYSBMXBG T WHERE t.pzxh=? and t.djxh=? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.QGLBZ='Y' and T.WSZMKJBZ='Y'
select * from pz_ypr where djxh=? and trunc(sysdate) between yxqsrq and yxzzrq

select t.pzglyuuid as czyuuid, '11' as yprlx_dm, t.pzhsjg_dm, t.pzgly_dm, '' as yprmc, null as djxh from pz_pzgly t where t.pzgly_dm =? and sysdate between t.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t.pzhsjgyxzzrq union all select t1.ypruuid as czyuuid, t1.yprlx_dm, t1.pzhsjg_dm,t2.pzgly_dm, t1.yprmc, t1.djxh from pz_ypr t1, pz_pzgly t2 where t1.swry_dm = ? and t1.pzhsjg_dm = t2.pzhsjg_dm and sysdate between t2.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t2.pzhsjgyxzzrq and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq
select * from pz_flzjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select jc.pzjcuuid, jc.pzhsjg_dm, jc.pzzl_dm, jc.pzzg_dm, jc.pzqshm, jc.pzzzhm, jc.jcsl, jc.ffyxj, jc.rkrq from pz_jc jc where jc.czyuuid = ? and jc.pzzt_dm = ? and jc.yxbz = 'Y' order by pzzl_dm ,pzzg_dm, ffyxj desc, rkrq asc,pzqshm
select * from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh=? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')

select x.skssqq, x.skssqz, x.zspm_dm, t.lsmxid, x.hy_dm, x.yzpzzl_dm, sum(x.ynse - x.jmse) as ybtse, sum(x.jsyj) as jsyj, sum(x.jmse) jmse, sum(x.ynse) ynse, sum(x.ybtse) ybtse1, sum(x.yjse) yjse, sum(x.ysx) ysx from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where t.djxh = x.djxh and t.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm and t.zspm_dm = x.zspm_dm and t.sbsx_dm_1 = x.sbsx_dm_1 and nvl(x.hy_dm, 'X') = nvl(t.hy_dm, nvl(x.hy_dm, 'X')) and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and nvl(x.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and t.ssqq < = x.skssqq and t.ssqz > = x.skssqz and t.hhljid = ? group by x.skssqq, x.skssqz, x.zspm_dm, x.hy_dm, x.yzpzzl_dm, t.lsmxid
select distinct csh.pzzl_dm, pzzl.pzzlmc from pz_jc_csh csh, dm_pz_pzzl pzzl where csh.pzzl_dm = pzzl.pzzl_dm and csh.yxbz = 'Y' and pzzl.yxbz = 'Y' and csh.pzhsjg_dm like ?

SELECT T.YPRUUID, T.YPRLX_DM, T.YPRMC, T.DJXH, SWRY_DM FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.YPRLX_DM IN ('12', '31', '20', '30', '32') AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PZ_ZWCS A WHERE A.PZDW_DM = T.YPRUUID AND A.CSHRQ IS NOT NULL AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N')

select zjb.* from sb_cxs_pksysyxxzjb zjb where exists (select 1 from sb_pkqc p inner join sb_ls_sbxx t on t.lsmxid = p.pkuuid where t.hhljid = ? and zjb.pzxh = p.pzxh and (p.zsxm_dm = '10110' or p.zsxm_dm = '10112')) and (not exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a where zjb.uuid = a.uuid) and not exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx a where zjb.uuid = a.uuid))

/*小企业利润表*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '4' zt_bz, case when ewbhxh = '1' then bnljje end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then bnljje end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ 0 lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bnljje end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bnljje end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ 0 lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then bnljje end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then bnljje end lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then bnljje end lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then bnljje end lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ 0 lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ 0 lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then bnljje end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then bnljje end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then bnljje end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then bnljje end lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '24' then bnljje end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then bnljje end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then bnljje end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then bnljje end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_xqykjzz_lrb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid
select t.* from sb_tysb_zsfjsgdshtglb t where t.dsdjxh=? and t.fjspzxh=? and t.fjsyzpzzl_dm=? and skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select a.* from pz_jc a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.czyuuid = ? and a.pzzl_dm = ? AND (1=? or a.pzzg_dm = ?) and a.pzzt_dm = ? and a.yprlx_dm = ? and a.jcsl > 0 ORDER BY a.ffyxj DESC, a.rkrq, a.pzqshm
SELECT t.pzzl_dm code,t.pzzlmc caption,t.* FROM cs_pz_swjgdypzzl t,dm_pz_pzzl a WHERE t.pzzl_dm=a.pzzl_dm and a.yxbz='Y' and a.yxbz='Y' and a.pzxlbz='Y' and t.swjg_dm = ?

select b.pzzl_dm, sum(b.pzjhsl) hzsl from PZ_SSPZJHBBHZBZB a, PZ_SSPZJHBBHZMXB b where a.pzhzjhuuid = b.pzhzjhuuid and a.tbswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and pzjhzl_dm = ? and jhnyq = ? and jhnyz = ? and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.xybz!='N' and a.sbbz='Y' and b.yxbz!='N' group by b.pzzl_dm
select a.* from pz_jbsc a where a.ypruuid = ? and a.pzzy_dm not in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select distinct t1.yzpzzl_dm,t1.nssbrq,t1.skssqq,t1.skssqz,t1.zsxm_dm,t1.ybtse,t2.yjskzt_dm,t1.pzxh from sb_sbxx t1, zs_yjsf t2 where t1.pzxh=t2.yzpzxh and t1.sbsx_dm_1='21' and t1.djxh =? and t1.skssqq > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t1.skssqz < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and (1 = ? or t1.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and t1.zfbz_1='N' and t1.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
SELECT T.GZTZSUUID as uuid ,T.GZTZSBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_GZTZS T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.TYBZ = 'Y' and t.FQPZDW_DM = ? AND T.GZTZSBH BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM sb_sds_jmcz_14nd_jmqygqhRf t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=?
select servicename from CS_SB_CWGZPZB where yzpzzl_dm = ? and gzbz ='Y'

select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_zzs_xgm b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610611' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' order by b.ewblxh

Select t.Clcpxh As Clcp, t.Clcpxh As Clxh, t.Cd, t.Cd As Cdsx, t.Clscqy_Dm, t.Cllb_Dm_1, t.Scqymc As Clscqymc, t.Cllx_Dm, t.Clcpxh, t.Cldw, t.Zws, t.Pql, t.Zypz, t.Zypzbm, t.Zdjsjg, t.Clgzsrlnyzl_Dm, t.Clxlh, t.Clcpxh, t.bbh, '现行' As Jglx From Sb_Cgs_Zdjsjg t Where t.Clcpxh = ? And t.Sxrq <= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And ('1' = #macroparam# Or t.Zypz = ?) And ('1' = #macroparam# Or (t.Cldw = ? Or Cldw = '0')) And ('1' = #macroparam# Or (t.Pql = ? Or Pql = '0')) And ('1' = #macroparam# Or (t.Zws = ? Or Zws = '0')) And ('1' = #macroparam# Or t.Cllx_Dm = ?) And ('1' = #macroparam# Or t.Scqymc = ?) Order By Bbh Desc

select a.* from sb_tdsyqkdjxx a where a.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or a.tdsyzbh = ?) and (1 = ? or a.dh_1 = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') > = to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.csqdsj < = to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.csqdsj
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb6_Jwsds t Where t.sbuuid=?

select a.sbuuid from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz < ? and a.skssqq >= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' order by a.skssqz desc
select t.* from sb_zyssb_jklfb t where t.sbuuid=?

select * from sb_sbb sb where sb.djxh = ? and sb.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sb.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sb.yzpzzl_dm IN('BDA0610611','BDA0610606') and sb.zfbz_1='N' AND SB.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5')
SELECT MAX(T.YZPZMXXH) yzpzmxxh FROM ZS_YJSF T WHERE T.YZPZXH=?
select * from Cs_Pz_Pzsljkb where swjg_dm=? and pzzl_dm=?

select t.ysyskmxuuid, t.dksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zsxm_dm, t.wspzzl_dm, t.wspzzg, t.wspzhm, t.bckcse, t.pmse, t.sksx, t.gldksquuid, t.hy_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.sfmxuuid, t.skssqq, t.spuuid, t.skssqz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.xgrq, t.kkcse, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.jsyj, t.djxh, t.ksyskuuid, t.lzsfmxuuid from fp_dk_ysyskmx t where t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.spuuid = ?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select sum(t.sdkdjdsdjznj) sdkdjdsdjznj from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg t where sbpch=? and nvl(hzbz_1,'N')='N'
SELECT * FROM SB_ZZS_NCPJXKCBZBAB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND BASSQQ = ? AND BASSQZ = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM CS_SB_KQSYFFL
select sum(ybtse) from zs_yjsf where djxh=? and skssqz<? and zsxm_dm='10101' and yzclrq is null and skcllx_dm in ('0','1') and tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and zspm_dm not like '1010199%' and sksx_dm='0101'
select t.* from sb_ls_pkqc a,sb_sbf_pkqc t where a.yusbxh=t.yusbxh and a.xh=t.xh and a.hhljid = ? and (1=#macroparam# or t.zgswskfj_dm =?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssswjg_dm=?)

select * from sb_sbb a,sb_sbxx b where a.pzxh =b.pzxh and a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.sbuuid=? and (1=? or a.pzxh=?) and (1=? or a.skssqq = ?) and (1=? or a.skssqz= ?) and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and a.zfbz_1 ='N'

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwzh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.dyh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.lc_2 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fjh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.zlfclfbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.htbh = ?) and c.kfbdcxmbh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g where g.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and g.zrfcsfbz = '1' and g.nsrsbh = ?)) and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'

select t1.ewbhxh,t1.qmye_zc,t1.qmye_qy from SB_CWBB_SYYH_ZCFZB t1 where t1.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and ( s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1='N'))
select * from dm0_zdsy_sqsj_ssb where year = ? and month = ? and djxh = ?
select t.* from sb_dkdj_fb_jks_dkds t where sbuuid=?
select * from sb_hgz_ccqq t where t.qjjybs=?
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBBHBGD t where t.nsrsbh=?
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_DWZFKXQKB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? order by ewbhxh
select BDBZ from SB_SBBD_YYSPBBD where djxh=? And Skssqq=? And Skssqz =? and yxbz='Y' order by lrrq desc

SELECT t1.* from SB_SDS_FJMHD_ND t1, SB_SBXX s where s.DJXH = ? and s.ZSFS_DM = ? and s.YZPZZL_DM = ? and s.SBUUID = t1.SBUUID and s.SBSX_DM_1 ='11' and s.zfbz_1 ='N' and trunc(s.SKSSQQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and trunc(s.SKSSQZ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select jm.* from sb_sbxx sbxx ,sb_zqjm jm where sbxx.sbuuid=? and sbxx.pzxh=? and sbxx.sbxxuuid =jm.sbxxuuid and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and nvl(sbxx.zfbz_1,'N')='N' AND jm.tzlx_dm in('1','4')

SELECT T.PZSYQKUUID, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM, T.PZZT_DM, T.PZSL, T.KJZFSL, T.SKJE, T.TFRQ, T.SJXHRQ FROM V_ZS_PZ_PZSYQK T WHERE T.SJXHRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') #macroparam# ORDER BY T.SJXHRQ ASC, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM
Select Pzxh, Bdbz From Sb_Sbbd_Zzsxgm_Pbbd t Where Djxh = ? And Skssqq = ? And Skssqz = ? and ZFBZ_1=? and rowNum=1
select t.*, rowid from cs_gy_xtcs t where t.csbm = ? and t.swjg_dm= ?

/*增值税一般纳税人附表三*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when ewbhxh in ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7', '8') then bqsjkcje end bq9, /*服务、不动产和无形资产扣除项目本期扣除额*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then bqsjkcje end bq10, /* 其中：17%税率的项目*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bqsjkcje end bq11, /*11%税率的项目*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then bqsjkcje end bq12, /*6%税率的项目（不含金融商品转让）*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then bqsjkcje end bq13, /*6%税率的金融商品转让项目*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then bqsjkcje end bq14, /*5%征收率的项目*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then bqsjkcje end bq15, /*3%征收率的项目*/ case when ewbhxh in ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7', '8') then qmye end bq16 /*服务、不动产和无形资产扣除项目期末余额*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb3_ysfwkcxm b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh
select * from sb_sbbd_zzsxgm_pbbd t where t.djxh=? and t.pzxh=?
select min(skssqz) skssqz from (select a.fyxxuuid, max(a.skssqz) skssqz from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a where a.zfbz_1='N' and a.djxh=? group by fyxxuuid)
SELECT SBQS.*, SBB.DJXH FROM SB_SBB SBB, SB_QS SBQS WHERE SBB.SBUUID = SBQS.SBUUID AND nvl(SBB.ZFBZ_1,?) = ? AND SBB.GZLX_DM_1 IN (?, ?, ?) AND SBB.DJXH = ? AND (#macroparam#)

update sb_tdsyqkdjxx a set (dh_1, tdsyzbh, tdxz_dm, tdqdfs_dm, tdyt_dm, xzqhsz_dm, xxdz, dj_1, qdtdsyqzfje, tdkfcb, csqdsj, tdsyqzzsj, tddj_dm, zfbz_1, dwse, zfrq_1, tdmj, zgswskfj_dm, pkbz, tdzj, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, zspm_dm, ssjmxz_dm, mstdmj, xgr_dm, xgrq ) = (select dh_1, tdsyzbh, tdxz_dm, tdqdfs_dm, tdyt_dm, xzqhsz_dm, xxdz, dj_1, qdtdsyqzfje, tdkfcb, csqdsj, tdsyqzzsj, tddj_dm, zfbz_1, dwse, zfrq_1, tdmj, zgswskfj_dm, pkbz, tdzj, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, zspm_dm, ssjmxz_dm, mstdmj, lrr_dm, sysdate from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh) where (a.djxh, a.tdsybh) in (select djxh, tdsybh from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx)
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_BFLGDB t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
Select j.* From Sb_Cgs_Clzdjsjgb j Where #macroparam#
select * from sb_zlbs_zdsyqyjbxx where sdbz='N' and zlbscjuuid in(#macroparam#)

with kk as (select distinct s.pzxh from sb_cxs_fcjy s where s.fcjycjxxuuid in (select f.fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjy f where f.pzxh = ?) and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select ? as pzxh from dual) select distinct a.sbuuid, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.sbsx_dm_1 as sblx_dm, a.pzxh, a.yzpzzl_dm, b.ZSXM_DM, b.sbfs_dm, b.sbqx, b.sybh_1, a.sbrq_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.YBTSE, a.lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b, kk where a.SBUUID = b.SBUUID and b.pzxh = kk.pzxh and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and a.GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

update sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cz a set (a.fwcqzsh, a.tdsybh, a.czfcmj, a.zspm_dm, a.fcmc, a.fcyt_dm, a.dh_1, a.pkbz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.xxdz, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.zfrq_1, a.sl_1, a.htzjzsr, a.czfnsrsbh, a.czfnsrmc, a.zlrqq, a.zlrqz, a.bqyszjsr, a.jdxz_dm, a.nsqx_dm, a.sbqx_dm, a.jkqx_dm, a.czxz_dm, a.bqynse, a.ssjmxz_dm, a.bqjmse, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq) = (select b.fwcqzsh, b.tdsybh, b.czfcmj, b.zspm_dm, b.fcmc, b.fcyt_dm, b.dh_1, b.pkbz, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.xxdz, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.zfrq_1, b.sl_1, b.htzjzsr, b.czfnsrsbh, b.czfnsrmc, b.zlrqq, b.zlrqz, b.bqyszjsr, b.jdxz_dm, b.nsqx_dm, b.sbqx_dm, b.jkqx_dm, b.czxz_dm, b.bqynse, b.ssjmxz_dm, b.bqjmse, a.lrr_dm, sysdate from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcz b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.fybh = b.fybh) where (a.djxh, a.fybh) in (select djxh, fybh from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcz) and djxh=?
UPDATE SB_TDSYQKDJXX SET TDSYZFZJGMC = ? WHERE DJXH = ? AND TDSYBH = ?
SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A, SB_XFS_FB_BQZYKCSE_QT B WHERE A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ = ? AND A.SKSSQZ = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5')
select * from pz_jbsc a where a.yspzhm = ? and a.yspzmxhm = ? and a.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.djxh czrfdjxh, a.zlbsuuid, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, Sb_Zlbs_Tdczrxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.czrf_nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.csfdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.csfnsrsbh = ?) and (decode(nvl(b.czrfnsrbz, 'Y'), 'N', 'Y', nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N')) = 'N' or nvl(b.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'N')
select pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly a where (sjhsjg_dm = ? or pzhsjg_dm = ?) and sysdate between ? and ? and sjgsdq like ?
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_FLQYXX t where t.nsrsbh=?

select pzhsjg_dm as pzdw, count(1) as wjxsl, 0 as ytkwjb From pz_sspkjbdzb where pzhsjg_dm = ? and sspzjxbbh is null and shbz = 'Y' and zfbz_1 = 'N' and cxbz = 'N' and gdbz = 'N' and sbbz = 'Y' and jbrq_1 < sysdate - ? group by pzhsjg_dm union all select /*+use_concat*/ b.ypruuid as pzdw, 0 as wjxsl, count(1) as ytkwjg from zs_pzsyqk a, pz_ypr b where a.tfrq < sysdate - ? and a.ypruuid = b.ypruuid and b.pzhsjg_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' group by b.ypruuid
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.clsbdh = ? And t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.cgssbzt = ?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.zsxm_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from cs_sb_yzl t where t.zspm_dm=? and t.zszm_dm=? and xybz='Y' AND YXBZ='Y') a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y')
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, sshxsl pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm,skje from pz_sspzssbgdmxb where pzssbgduuid = ?

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.csfl order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from cs_sb_xtcsdy a where trim(a.csfl) = ? and a.csbm=? and ((to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= a.yxqz and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= a.yxqq)) and (1 = ? or to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')<= a.yxqz) and a.yxqq < a.yxqz) a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y') where xh = 1

Select T2.* From Sb_Sbb T1, Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Yjd T2 Where T1.Sbuuid = T2.Sbuuid And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq >= ? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And T1.Zfbz_1 = ? AND T1.SBSX_DM_1='11' Order By T1.Skssqz Desc

with aa as (select a.fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf a where a.djxh = ?) select distinct c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2, j.djxh, j.nsrsbh, j.nsrmc, j.zrfcsfbz, j.sfzjzl_dm, j.sfzjhm, j.gj_dm, j.zcqrbz, j.szfe_2, j.bdfe_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf j, aa where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = j.fcjycjxxuuid and c.ysbbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and c.nextfcjycjxxuuid is null and c.fcjycjxxuuid = aa.fcjycjxxuuid

update sb_tdsyqkdjxx a set (a.qh) = (select b.qh from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh) where (a.djxh, a.tdsybh) in (select b.djxh, b.tdsybh from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where b.qh is not null and b.tdsyzfzjgmc is null)
select * from DM_GY_XZQH a start with a.xzqhsz_dm in (select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and xybz = 'Y' connect by prior a.xzqhsz_dm = a.sjxzqhsz_dm

select c.djxh, c.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, nvl(sum(lrlj1), 0) lrlj1, nvl(sum(lrlj2), 0) lrlj2, nvl(sum(lrlj3), 0) lrlj3, nvl(sum(lrlj4), 0) lrlj4, nvl(sum(lrlj5), 0) lrlj5, nvl(sum(lrlj6), 0) lrlj6, nvl(sum(lrlj7), 0) lrlj7, nvl(sum(lrlj8), 0) lrlj8, nvl(sum(lrlj9), 0) lrlj9, nvl(sum(lrlj10), 0) lrlj10, nvl(sum(lrlj11), 0) lrlj11, nvl(sum(lrlj12), 0) lrlj12, nvl(sum(lrlj13), 0) lrlj13, nvl(sum(lrlj14), 0) lrlj14, nvl(sum(zcnc2), 0) zcnc2, nvl(sum(zcnc3), 0) zcnc3, nvl(sum(zcnc4), 0) zcnc4, nvl(sum(zcnc5), 0) zcnc5, nvl(sum(zcnc6), 0) zcnc6, nvl(sum(zcnc7), 0) zcnc7, nvl(sum(zcnc8), 0) zcnc8, nvl(sum(zcnc9), 0) zcnc9, nvl(sum(zcnc10), 0) zcnc10, nvl(sum(zcnc11), 0) zcnc11, nvl(sum(zcnc12), 0) zcnc12, nvl(sum(zcnc13), 0) zcnc13, nvl(sum(zcnc14), 0) zcnc14, nvl(sum(zcnc15), 0) zcnc15, nvl(sum(zcnc16), 0) zcnc16, nvl(sum(zcnc17), 0) zcnc17, nvl(sum(zcnc18), 0) zcnc18, nvl(sum(zcnc19), 0) zcnc19, nvl(sum(zcnc20), 0) zcnc20, nvl(sum(zcnc21), 0) zcnc21, nvl(sum(zcnc22), 0) zcnc22, nvl(sum(zcnc23), 0) zcnc23, nvl(sum(zcnc24), 0) zcnc24, nvl(sum(zcnc25), 0) zcnc25, nvl(sum(zcnc26), 0) zcnc26, nvl(sum(zcnc27), 0) zcnc27, nvl(sum(zcnc28), 0) zcnc28, nvl(sum(zcnc29), 0) zcnc29, nvl(sum(zcnc30), 0) zcnc30, nvl(sum(zcnc31), 0) zcnc31, nvl(sum(zcnc32), 0) zcnc32, nvl(sum(zcnc33), 0) zcnc33, nvl(sum(zcnc34), 0) zcnc34, nvl(sum(zcqm1), 0) zcqm1, nvl(sum(zcqm2), 0) zcqm2, nvl(sum(zcqm3), 0) zcqm3, nvl(sum(zcqm4), 0) zcqm4, nvl(sum(zcqm5), 0) zcqm5, nvl(sum(zcqm6), 0) zcqm6, nvl(sum(zcqm7), 0) zcqm7, nvl(sum(zcqm8), 0) zcqm8, nvl(sum(zcqm9), 0) zcqm9, nvl(sum(zcqm10), 0) zcqm10, nvl(sum(zcqm11), 0) zcqm11, nvl(sum(zcqm12), 0) zcqm12, nvl(sum(zcqm13), 0) zcqm13, nvl(sum(zcqm14), 0) zcqm14, nvl(sum(zcqm15), 0) zcqm15, nvl(sum(zcqm16), 0) zcqm16, nvl(sum(zcqm17), 0) zcqm17, nvl(sum(zcqm18), 0) zcqm18, nvl(sum(zcqm19), 0) zcqm19, nvl(sum(zcqm20), 0) zcqm20, nvl(sum(zcqm21), 0) zcqm21, nvl(sum(zcqm22), 0) zcqm22, nvl(sum(zcqm23), 0) zcqm23, nvl(sum(zcqm24), 0) zcqm24, nvl(sum(zcqm25), 0) zcqm32, nvl(sum(zcqm33), 0) zcqm33, nvl(sum(zcqm34), 0) zcqm34 from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_cwb a, dj_nsrxx c where a.djxh = c.djxh AND c.yxbz = 'Y' AND year = ? and quarter = ? group by c.djxh, c.nsrsbh
update sb_sbb set zfr_dm=?, xgr_dm=? ,zfbz_1 = 'Y', zfrq_1 = ?,xgrq=sysdate where (zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or zfbz_1 is null) and pzxh = ?

Select Nvl(Sum(t.Ybtse), 0) As Sqyjje From Sb_Sbb t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq >= ? And t.Skssqz <= ? And t.Sbsx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And t.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And t.Zfbz_1 = ? And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')

SELECT T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.SJGSDQ, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.YBSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YJSFE, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.SFL, T.JSFYJ, T.YXKCJE, T.SRZE, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSXM_DM, T.SKSSQZ, T.SKSSQQ, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DKSQUUID, T.SFMXUUID, A.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.DJXH, A.SQDHM FROM FP_DK_SFMX T, FP_DK_SQ A WHERE T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID AND A.DKSQUUID = ? AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID)
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb a where #macroparam# and a.djxh=? and zfbz_1 ='N' and a.clgzsjsfs_dm='4' and a.gzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.gzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx where zlbscjuuid=?
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_drwgqygghdsqk t Where t.pzxh=? And (1=? or t.sbuuid=?) and (1=? or t.mxxh=?) AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'
select max(skssqz) skssqz from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx where ysuuid=? and zfbz_1='N'

select t.pzlfduuid pzuuid,t.sspzlfdbh pzbh,trunc(t.ffrq) ffrq,t.lfdlx_dm pzlx,t.ffflx_dm,t.ffdwr,t.ffrxm,t.lqflx_dm,t.lqdwr,t.lqrxm from pz_sspzlfdzb t where (1 = ? or sspzlfdbh = ?) and (1 = ? or ffdwr = ?) and (1 = ? or lqdwr = ?) and zfbz_1 = 'N' and trunc(ffrq) between ? and ? and lfdlx_dm != '5' order by t.sspzlfdbh Asc

select distinct gk.skgk_dm, gk.skgkmc, gk.gk_dm from CS_ZS_SWJGGKDZB dzb, dm_gy_gk gk where dzb.skgk_dm = gk.skgk_dm and gk.xybz = 'Y' and gk.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.xybz = 'Y' and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT LXDH, FKFNSRSBH, LZFPHM, LZFPDM, BZ, SQLY, FKFDJXH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, ZBGCXMBH, GCXMMC, GCXMBH, FKFSFWZBR, FKFMC, FKFSFZJHM, FKFSFZJZL_DM, SKFSFWFBR, DKSQUUID, JZUUID, SKFNSRSBH, SKFSFZJLX_DM, SKFSFZJHM, SKFMC, DZ FROM FP_DK_JZYFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
SELECT T.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.YPRLX_DM = ? UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT T1.PZGLY_DM AS SWRY_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY T1 WHERE T1.YXBZ = 'Y'
select a.yprpzhdxxuuid, a.pzzl_dm, b.pzzlmc, a.ypruuid, a.yxqsrq, a.yxzzrq from pz_yprpzhdxxb a, dm_pz_pzzl b where a.pzzl_dm = b.pzzl_dm and a.ypruuid = ? and sysdate between a.yxqsrq and a.yxzzrq

SELECT T.Clsbdm as clsbDm,t.cbsbh as cbsbh,t.zsxm_dm as zsxmDm,t.zspm_dm as zspmDm,t.skssqq as skssqq,t.skssqz as skssqz, 1 as kcssl, t.jsyj as jsyj,t.ydkdjdsdjse as se FROM SB_DKDJ_FB_CCSMXBG T where t.pzxh=?

select t.pzxh yzpzxh,sum(nvl(t.ysx,t.jsyj)) jsyj from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh=? and (1=? or t.sbsx_dm_1=?) and t.skssqq >=? and t.skssqz <=? and (1=? or t.zsxm_dm=?) and t.zsxm_dm in('10101','10103') and t.zfbz_1='N' group by t.pzxh
Select Bduuid, Hsxsestskskjptfpkjebd_1, Hsxsetqtfpkpjebd_1 From Sb_Sbbd_Zzsxgm_Pbbd Where Pzxh = ? And zfbz_1='N'
select * from SB_SDS_FJMHD_YJND jd where jd.pzxh =? and jd.sbuuid=?

select nvl(sum(y.bqsjyjkqsyfsl),0 ) as bqsjyjkqsyfsl from sb_kqsyfyj y, sb_sbxx s where y.sbuuid = s.sbuuid and nvl(s.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and s.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and s.djxh=? and skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.zsxm_dm=? and s.zspm_dm=? and y.yqt_dm=?

SELECT A.YSUUID, B.SBUUID, decode(D.SKCLLX_DM, '', e.skcllx_dm, null, e.skcllx_dm, D.SKCLLX_DM) skcllx_dm, D.YZCLRQ FROM SB_CXS_TDSYYSXX A inner join SB_CXS_SBSYSYXX B on A.YSUUID = B.YSUUID inner join SB_SBB C on B.SBUUID = C.SBUUID left join ZS_YJSF D on C.PZXH = D.YZPZXH and d.tzlx_dm in('1','4') left join zs_ydtxx e on c.pzxh = e.pzxh and e.tzlx_dm in('1','4') WHERE nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and A.YSUUID = ?
select * from SB_FCJY_ZB_ZRF t where t.pzxh = ?
Select t.* from SB_SDS_JMQYQS_FB_FZQCSY t Where t.sbuuid=?
select * from SB_CXS_FYXXCJB t where t.yxbz='Y' and djxh=?
select * from sb_tdzzssb_nsrxx where sbuuid=?

select substr(t.swjg_dm,1,5) sjgsdq from dm_gy_swjg t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y' and t.swjg_dm like '%0000' and t.swjg_dm not like '199%' and t.swjg_dm not like '299%' and t.swjg_dm not like '000%'

select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with sjswjg_dm = ? connect by sjswjg_dm = prior swjg_dm union all select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' and swjg_dm= ?

select qy.*,jg.swjg_dm,jg.swjgmc,jg.swjgbz,jg.sjswjg_dm from dm_zs_clscqy qy right join ( select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with sjswjg_dm = ? connect by sjswjg_dm = prior swjg_dm and swjg_dm in (select zgswjg_dm from dm_zs_clscqy) union all select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' and swjg_dm= ? ) jg on qy.zgswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm where qy.yxbz='Y' and qy.xybz='Y'

select a.* from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB a, SB_ZLBSCJB b where a.gmfdjxh = ? and (? is null or a.fybh = ?) and NVL(a.cjbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select a.* from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB a, SB_ZLBSCJB b, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx c where c.gyrdjxh = ? and (? is null or a.fybh = ?) and NVL(a.cjbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and c.mflx = '1'

SELECT B.YSUUID, B.SBUUID, decode(D.SKCLLX_DM, '', e.skcllx_dm, null, e.skcllx_dm, D.SKCLLX_DM) skcllx_dm, D.YZCLRQ FROM SB_CXS_FCSSYSYXX B inner join SB_SBB c on B.SBUUID = C.SBUUID left join ZS_YJSF D on C.PZXH = D.YZPZXH and d.tzlx_dm in('1','4') left join zs_ydtxx e on c.pzxh = e.pzxh and e.tzlx_dm in('1','4') where nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and B.YSUUID = ?

select a.sybh_1,b.skssqq,b.skssqz,b.lrrq from SB_SYSBMXBG a, SB_SBB b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.PZLFDUUID as uuid, T.SSPZLFDBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB T WHERE (T.Lqdwr= ? OR T.Lqdwr in (SELECT W.YPRUUID FROM PZ_YPR W WHERE W.PZHSJG_DM =?)) AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SSPZLFDBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPZLFDBH

select a.djxh zrfdjxh,b.zrfsbbz zrfsbbz_1, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_TDCZRXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.csfdjxh =? and b.tdsybh =? and b.csfsbbz = 'Y' and a.djxh is null
select * from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh = ? and t.djxh = ?
update fp_dk_ksyskmx t set t.zfbz_1 = 'Y', t.zfrq = sysdate, t.xgrq = sysdate, t.zfr_dm = ?, t.xgr_dm = ? WHERE t.lyuuid_1 IN (#macroparam#)
UPDATE SB_CXS_FYXXCJB SET YXBZ = 'N', XGRQ = SYSDATE, XGR_DM = ? WHERE FYXXUUID IN (#macroparam#)
select * from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx where ysuuid=? and yxbz='Y'
UPDATA NP_ZCBSDZB T SET T.LRR_DMRR =?,T.YZPZXH=? AND T.LRRQ =SYSDATE WHERE T.ZXBZTZSUUID IN(?) AND AND T.SJGSDQ LIKE ?
select * from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh w where w.swjg_dm = ? and exists (select 1 from cs_pz_swjgdypzzl t where t.swjg_dm like ? and t.pzzl_dm = w.pzzl_dm)

select b.* from SB_SBB a,SB_KJ_QYSDS b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and (a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610780' or a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610134') and a.sbuuid = ? and a.pzxh = ?

select '2' as kjlx, t.cbshtglwfnsrsbh as fjmnsrsbh, t.gjhdqmc as fjmnsrzqjmgdqmcjdm, t.cbshtglwfmc as fjmqyzwmc, t.cbshtglwfmc as zqjmgnsrzwmc, '' as fjmqyywmc, t.htmc as hthxymc, t.htzh as hth, t.htzxqsrq as htqyrq, t.htzxzzrq as htyxqx, t.htje, t.cbshtglwfdh as kjywrlxdh, t.cbshtglwjflxr as kjywrlxrxm, t.bh as xthtbh, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.cbshtglwfdz as fjmqyzqjmgzwdz, t.HTBZ_DM as htbz, a.djzclx_dm as fjmdjzclxDm, a.hy_dm as fjmhyDm, t.zfbz_2, t.qysdssdlx_dm from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb t, dj_nsrxx a where t.fjmdjxh = a.djxh(+) and t.djxh =? and t.zfbz_1='N' and htzh is not null

select '税收票证领发单' as djzl, t.pzlfduuid uuid, t.sspzlfdbh bh, t.lfdlx_dm, t.ffrq lrrq, a.swryxm kjrmc, t.lrr_dm kjr, t.lrr_dm jsr, t.fff_dm fqdw, t.lqf_dm jsdw, '01' ysdjzl from PZ_SSPZLFDZB t, dm_gy_swry a where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.swry_dm = t.lrr_dm and t.lrr_dm = ? and t.ffrq between to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and t.sjgsdq like ? and not exists (select 0 from PZ_GZTZS g where g.yspzbh_1 = t.sspzlfdbh and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.yxbz = 'Y' and (g.gdbz = 'Y' or g.tybz <> 'Y'))

select * from sb_zys_hsyqt_zb a, sb_sbb b where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.djxh = ? and a.yqt_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and b.skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zszm_dm = ? and a.xssxrq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.zfbz_1!='Y'

SELECT A.KSYSKUUID, A.JSYJ, A.FPDKSK PMSE, A.FPDKSK KKCSE, '0' BCKCSE, A.SL_1 SFL, A.ZSXM_DM, A.ZSPM_DM, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, A.SKSX_DM SKSX, A.SPUUID, A.WSPZZL_DM, A.WSPZZG, A.WSPZHM, A.KSYSKWHSXUUID, A.HY_DM FROM FP_DK_KSYSKMX A WHERE A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.DJXH = ? AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX B WHERE B.KSYSKUUID = A.KSYSKUUID AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.DJXH = ?)
select t.jytbzsptm, t.gg, t.cl, t.sl, t.xsjg, t.dbjg, t.jsjg, t.xse, t.bz from SB_XFS_FB_JYSCQYNDXSMX t where t.sbuuid = ?
select * from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_JZZCTZFB1 t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.pzxlbz ='Y'
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.nssbrq is null and t.sjlybz = '2'
SELECT A.PZHSJG_DM, A.SJHSJG_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY A START WITH A.PZHSJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.PZHSJG_DM = A.SJHSJG_DM AND A.SJHSJG_DM IS NOT NULL
select * from dm0_zdsy_lssj_ssb where year = ? and month = ? and djxh = ?

select ysyskmxuuid, dksquuid, dkfplb_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzg, wspzzl_dm, wspzhm, pmse, bckcse, sksx, gldksquuid, hy_dm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, sfmxuuid, spuuid, skssqq, skssqz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, kkcse, jsfyj, sfl, jsyj, djxh, ksyskuuid from fp_dk_ysyskmx where spuuid in (#macroparam#) and zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzgly_dm = ? AND a.pzhsjgyxqsrq <= trunc(SYSDATE) AND a.pzhsjgyxzzrq > trunc(SYSDATE)

select nvl(sum(cwbb.qmye_qy), 0) wfplrqmye from sb_cwbb_qykjzzybqy_zcfzb cwbb where cwbb.ewbhxh = 29 and cwbb.zlbscjuuid in (select t.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.ssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zfbz_1 is null)
select mx.pzssbgdmxuuid, mx.pzssbgduuid, mx.pzjcuuid, mx.sspzxhsquuid, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.kbpbz from pz_sspzssbgdmxb mx where mx.pzssbgdmxuuid =?

select qk.pzzl_dm, decode(qk.pzzt_dm, null, '04', qk.pzzt_dm) pzzt_dm, qk.pzsl jcsl from zs_pzsyqk_yhp qk where qk.kpr_dm = ? and qk.zfr_dm is null and (qk.sspkjbdbh is null or exists (select 1 from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.sspkjbdbh = qk.sspkjbdbh and t.shbz = 'N')) and qk.sddwdjxh is null and (qk.pzzt_dm != ? or qk.pzzt_dm is null)
select t.ypruuid as code, t.yprmc as caption, t.* from pz_ypr t, dm_qx_swrysf a where t.pzhsjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm and a.swrysf_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yprlx_dm = ?

SELECT nvl(SUM(DKSQJE),0) FROM FP_DK_SQ A INNER JOIN FP_DK_FPKJXX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_SFMX X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID AND X.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND X.GLDKSQUUID IS NULL AND (X.ZSPM_DM LIKE '101016%' OR X.ZSPM_DM LIKE '101017%') AND x.dkfplb_dm IN('01','07') ) AND a.dkfplb_dm IN('01','07') AND b.KJRQ >=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND b.kjrq <to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
insert into sb_rzxx r (r.uuid,r.swjg_dm,r.ms,r.lrrq,r.bz_2,r.sjgsdq,r.lrr_dm) values (SYS_GUID(),?,?,sysdate,?,'00000000000','00000000000')

SELECT * FROM sb_hgz_wszt t where (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.jdczccchgz = ?) and (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.clsbdh = ?) and (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.wszmhm = ?) and t.zfbz_1='N' order by t.lrrq desc,t.cgswszt desc
select t.* from sb_dkdj_fb_jks_dkds t where t.sbuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select ys.* from sb_cxs_pkyjskxxzjb ys inner join sb_cxs_pksysyxxzjb zjb on ys.sysyuuid = zjb.uuid where exists (select 1 from sb_pkqc p inner join sb_ls_sbxx t on t.lsmxid = p.pkuuid where t.hhljid = ? and zjb.pzxh = p.pzxh and (p.zsxm_dm = '10110' or p.zsxm_dm = '10112')) and (not exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_yjskxx a where ys.skuuid = a.skuuid) and not exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcsyjskxx a where ys.skuuid = a.skuuid))

select t.pzssbgduuid pzuuid,t.pzssbgdbh pzbh,t.sqdw_dm,t.sqr_dm,t.tbrq,t.ssskje,t.ssrq,t.ssdd,t.ssyyjjg,t.zsr_dm,t.zsrq_3 zsrq,zrrxm from pz_sspzssbgdzb t where (1 = ? or pzssbgdbh = ?) and (1 = ? or sqdw_dm = ?) and trunc(tbrq) between ? and ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and zstybz = 'Y' order by t.pzssbgdbh Asc
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb1_Sydw t Where t.sbuuid=?

Select a.* From Sb_Sbxx a, Sb_Sds_Jmhd_Yjnd b Where a.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And a.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And a.Pzxh = b.Pzxh And a.Djxh = ? And a.Skssqq >= ? And a.Skssqz <= ? And a.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And a.Sbsx_Dm_1 = ? And b.Yjdndsbbj = ?

select t.pkuuid,t.djxh,t.zspm_dm,t.skssqq,t.skssqz from sb_sbf_pkqc t where t.zfbz_1='0' and nvl(t.kkzt_dm,'x') in (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or t.zgswskfj_dm =?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssswjg_dm=?) and t.lrrq >=trunc(sysdate,'mm') and t.lrrq<add_months(trunc(sysdate,'mm'),1)
select p.pzxh from sb_sbxx p,sb_sbb t where p.pzxh=t.pzxh and (p.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and (t.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and p.djxh = ? and p.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.bz=? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
SELECT T.SBUUID, T.PZXH, T.NSRSBH, T.DJXH FROM SB_SBB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.SKSSQQ = ? AND T.SKSSQZ = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND T.YZPZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_RTZJB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? and gljylx =?
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND LQDWR = ? #macroparam#
select t.skssqq,t.skssqz,t.sksx_dm,t.zsxm_dm,t.zspm_dm,sum(t.yjye_1) as yjyehj from sb_yjskxx t where t.yjye_1>0 and t.djxh=? group by t.skssqq,t.skssqz,t.sksx_dm,t.zsxm_dm,t.zspm_dm

SELECT B.UUID KCBZHDUUID, A.DJXH, C.NSRSBH, C.NSRMC, A.CPMC_1, A.CPLX_DM, TRIM(A.HDFF_DM) HDFF_DM, A.HDQXQ, A.HDQXZ, B.KCBZ, A.NCPHYL, A.NCPDHSL, A.HYNCPMC, B.GGSWJG_DM FROM SB_ZSS_NCPJXKCSHDB A, SB_ZZSJXSEKCBZHD_TZ B, DJ_NSRXX C WHERE A.KCBZHDUUID = B.UUID(+) AND B.DJXH = C.DJXH AND B.LCSLID = ?
select b.xmbh,b.xmmc from sb_tdzzsqssh_swsxtzs a ,sb_tdzzsqs_fb_tdzzsqssbshb b where a.ywzjuuid=b.uuid and b.djxh=? and b.xmbh=? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select abs(nvl(sum(cwbb.bnwfply),0)) bnzjbdje from sb_cwbb_qykjzzybqy_syzqy cwbb where ewbhxh = 17 and cwbb.zlbscjuuid in (select t.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.ssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zfbz_1 is null)
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Ybqycbzcmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select ba.xmmc as xmmc, ba.bh as bh, ba.htmc as htmc, ba.htzh as htzh, ba.qysdssdlx_dm as sdxm from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB ba where ba.djxh = ? and ba.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.fwcqzsh as fwcqzsh, cjb.djxh as zrfdjxh, t.fybh as sybh1, t.tdfwdz syzlwz, t.tdsybh as sybh, t.mj as fwmj, t.htbh, t.htqdrq, t.jyjg as cjjg, t.zlbscjuuid as uuid, t.mfnsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, t.mfmc as zrfnsrmc, t.mfdz as zrfnsrdz, t.mfsfzjlx_dm as zrfnsrzjlxDm, t.mfzjhm as zrfnsrzjhm, t.mflxdh as zrfnsrlxdh, t.gmfdz as csfnsrdz, t.gmfsfzjlx_dm as csfnsrzjlxDm, t.gmfzjhm as csfnsrzjhm, t.gmflxdh as csfnsrlxdh, t.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhDm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm as fwsdswjgDm, t.scqd_fwcb as scfwqdcb, t.fcjyfs_dm as fwjyfsDm, t.tnmj, t.scqd_fwsj as scfwqdsj, t.fclx_dm, t.htje as htje, 'CLF' AS zlfclfbz, cjb.zlbscjuuid as uuid, t.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB t, sb_zlbscjb cjb where cjb.zlbscjuuid = t.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.gmfdjxh = ?
