union select null as fwcqzsh, c.djxh as zrfdjxh, b.fybh as sybh1, b.tdfwdz syzlwz, null as sybh, b.mj as fwmj, b.htbh, b.htqdsj, b.jyjg as cjjg, b.zlbscjuuid as uuid, a.kfqynsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, a.kfqymc as zrfnsrmc, null as zrfnsrdz, null as zrfnsrzjlxDm, null as zrfnsrzjhm, null as zrfnsrlxdh, b.grzmc as csfnsrdz, b.sfzjzl_dm as csfnsrzjlxDm, b.sfzjhm as csfnsrzjhm, null as csfnsrlxdh, a.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhDm, a.jdxz_dm, a.fwsdswjg_dm as fwsdswjgDm, null as scfwqdcb, b.fcjyfs_dm as fwjyfsDm, b.tnmj, null as scfwqdsj, b.fclx_dm, b.htje as htje, 'ZLF' AS zlfclfbz, c.zlbscjuuid as uuid, b.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb c where b.zlbscjuuid = a.zlbscjuuid and b.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and b.gfzdjxh = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union select t.fwcqzsh fwcqzsh, b.djxh as zrfdjxh, t1.fybh as sybh1, t1.tdfwdz syzlwz, t1.tdsybh as sybh, t1.mj as fwmj, t.htbh, t.htqdsj as htqdrq, t.jyjg as cjjg, t.fcjycjxxuuid as uuid, b.nsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, b.nsrmc as zrfnsrmc, b.dz as zrfnsrdz, b.sfzjzl_dm as zrfnsrzjlxDm, b.sfzjhm as zrfnsrzjhm, b.lxdh as zrfnsrlxdh, a.dz as csfnsrdz, a.sfzjzl_dm as csfnsrzjlxDm, a.sfzjhm as csfnsrzjhm, a.lxdh as csfnsrlxdh, t1.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhDm, t1.jdxz_dm, t1.fwsdswjg_dm as fwsdswjgDm, b.scqd_fwcb as scfwqdcb, t.qsqszylb_dm as fwjyfsDm, t1.tnmj, b.scqd_fwsj as scfwqdsj, t.qsqszyyt_dm as fclx_dm, t.htje as htje, decode(t.zlfclfbz, '1', 'ZLF', '2', 'CLF') AS zlfclfbz, t.fcjycjxxuuid as uuid, t.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx t, sb_cxs_fyjbxx t1, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf a, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf b where t.fcjycjxxuuid = a.fcjycjxxuuid and t.fcjycjxxuuid = b.fcjycjxxuuid(+) and a.zrfcsfbz = '1' and b.zrfcsfbz = '0' and t.fyjbxxuuid = t1.fyjbxxuuid and b.zcqrbz = 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx xx, sb_cxs_fcjy jy where xx.fcjyuuid = jy.fcjyuuid and jy.fcjycjxxuuid = t.fcjycjxxuuid and zsxm_dm = '10119' and nvl(jy.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = xx.djxh) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ?
select * from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=? and NVL(t.zfbz_1,'N') ='N' AND t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
select tfy.djxh, tfy.hztyqxq, tfy.hztyqxz, tfy.fylcslid, tfy.fyrq from dj_tfyxx tfy, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where tfy.djxh = ls.djxh and tfy.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.* from sb_wtdz_skbg t where t.sbuuid = ?
select * from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb t where t.clxlh = ?
select max(t.pzmxxh) as yzpzmxxh from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh=?
SELECT ZB.SSPZTYZFUUID, ZB.SSPZTYZFBH, ZB.LCSLID, ZB.BBDW_DM, ZB.TBRQ, ZB.LRR_DM FROM PZ_SSPZTYZFZB ZB WHERE ZB.LCSLID = ? AND ZB.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZB.ZSTYBZ = 'N'

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwbszlqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))

select t.djxh gsdjxh, t.skssqq skssqq, t.skssqz skssqz, t.sbuuid zssbuuid, t.pzxh zspzxh, t.yzpzzl_dm zsyzpzzlDm, t.zsxm_dm zszsxmDm, t.zspm_dm zszspmDm, t.zszm_dm zszszmDm, t.ysx bhssre, t.ybtse zzsdqybtse, t.ynse ynse from sb_sbxx t where t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select t.pzxh, t.pzxh as fbxh, t.fs, t.se, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.ewbhxh as fblc from SB_ZZS_YBNSR_FB2_BQJXSEMX t where t.sbuuid = ?

select distinct fybh, fwsdswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, tdfwdz, mj, fwzh, dyh, fjh, tnmj, cx_dm, a.bz, tdsybh, a.tdsyzbh, fh, lc_2 from sb_cxs_fyjbxx a inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c on a.fyjbxxuuid = c.fyjbxxuuid and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf b on c.fcjycjxxuuid = b.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.djxh = ? and (#macroparam#) union all select fybh, zgswskfj_dm as fwsdswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, fwzldz as tdfwdz, jzmj as mj, '' fwzh, '' dyh, '' fjh, jzmj as tnmj, '' cx_dm, '' bz, tdsybh, '' tdsyzbh, '' fh, '' lc_2 from sb_cxs_fyxxcjb where yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ?
select t.* from sb_ysbtjsx_rz t where t.clbz = ? order by lrrq desc

select * from CS_SB_XPLJMPZXXB where swjg_dm and t.swjg_dm in (select s.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' and s.ghbz = 'Y' START WITH s.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' order by swjg_dm desc

select ba.djxh, ba.yxqq, ba.yxqz from dj_hznsqyxxbab ba, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = ba.djxh and nvl(ba.jdjnbs, 'N') = ? and ba.zfbz_1 = ? and ba.zfjglx_dm = ? and not exists (select 1 from sb_cs_tsnsrwhb t where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.yxbz = ? and t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and t.tsnsrlx_dm in (#macroparam#))
select * from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=?

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.zsxm_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from cs_sb_yzl t where t.zspm_dm=? and t.zszm_dm=? and xybz='Y' AND YXBZ='Y') a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y')
select t.* from cs_sb_yzl1 t where to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')<=t.yxqz and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y' and t.syybjsff=?

select a.gzq, a.yspzzl_dm, a.yspzzg_dm, a.ysqshm, a.yszzhm, a.yspzsl, '更正后' gzh, b.pzzl_dm, b.pzzg_dm, b.pzqshm, b.pzzzhm, b.pzsl, a.pzzt_dm, a.yspzmxhm from (select '更正前' gzq, t1.gztzsuuid, t1.yspzmxhm, t1.pzzl_dm yspzzl_dm, t1.pzzg_dm yspzzg_dm, t1.pzqshm ysqshm, t1.pzzzhm yszzhm, t1.pzsl yspzsl, t1.pzzt_dm, t1.sxlx from pz_gztzs_mx t1 where t1.gztzsuuid = ? and t1.sxlx = '1') a left join pz_gztzs_mx b on a.yspzmxhm = b.yspzmxhm where b.gztzsuuid = a.gztzsuuid and b.sxlx = '2'

Select Zl.Dzbzdszl_Dm, Zl.Dzbzdszlmc From Dm_Gy_Dzbzdszl Zl Where Zl.Dzbzdszl_Dm In (Select a.Dzbzdszl_Dm From Cs_Zs_Splryzpzzl a Where a.Swjg_Dm In (Select d.Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg d Start With d.Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior d.Sjswjg_Dm = d.Swjg_Dm)) and Zl.Yxbz = 'Y' and Zl.Xybz = 'Y'
select tj.pzzl_dm, tj.xhzsswjg, tj.sshxzsswjg, tj.pzplzsswjg, dm.whpbz, dm.phcd from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh tj, dm_pz_pzzl dm where dm.pzzl_dm = tj.pzzl_dm and tj.pzzl_dm = ? and tj.swjg_dm =?
select * from (select t.uuid,t.pgjg,t.lrrq from SB_PGQSJYJG_ZJB t where t.zrfdjxh = ? and t.sybz_dm_1= ? and t.sybh_1 = ? and yxbz='Y' order by lrrq desc) where rownum=1

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.zsxm_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from ( select * from cs_sb_zyszsl t where t.zspm_dm=? and t.zszm_dm is null and xybz='Y' AND YXBZ='Y') a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y')
select * from sb_gdzys_zb where pzxh=?
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Sedmyhmxb t Where t.djxh = ? And t.nd In (#macroparam#) And nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')= 'N' Order By t.Nd Desc

select pzxh from sb_sbxx a where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1 = ? and yzpzzl_dm = ? and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sybh_1 is null

select jyphgg, sum(xse) as sum1, sum(xssl) as sum2 from SB_XFS_JYBFQYYFXSMXHZB t where t.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (t.hdbz = 'N' or t.hdbz is null) group by jyphgg

select a.*, b.nsrsbh, b.nsrmc, b.sbrq_1, b.sblx, b.djzclxmc, b.lxdh, b.skssqq, b.skssqz, b.xmbh, b.xmmc, b.xmdz, b.nsrdz, b.yzbm, b.khyh, b.yhzh, b.sfwhdzs, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.jdxz_dm, b.hymc, b.swjgmc, c.swdlrjbr, c.swdlrmc, c.swdlrdz, c.slr, c.slswjg, c.slswjgmc, c.slrq, c.shr, c.shrq, c.xzqhsf, c.xzqhds, c.xzqhqx, c.jdxz_dm as xzqhjdxz from sb_tdzzssb_sbxx a, sb_tdzzssb_nsrxx b, sb_tdzzssb_slrxx c where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.sbuuid = ? and a.pzxh = ?
select * from sb_cxs_sbnsrxx where djxh=? order by lrrq desc
select * from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx where zfbz_1='N' and syuuid=? and #macroparam#
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb2_Jrqy t Where t.sbuuid=?

select a.sybh_1,b.skssqq,b.skssqz,b.lrrq from SB_SYSBMXBG a, SB_SBB b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 =? and b.yzpzzl_dm =? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' ORDER BY lrrq DESC

select cldauuid, cldabh, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, clsbdh, nsrsfzjzl_dm, zjhm, hy_dm, djzclx_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clcp, clxh, zypz, cldw, zws, pql, fdjhm, clgzdsx_dm, cdsx, gzrq, ffrq, mzsbz, ewtmc, wszmhm, jdrq, pzhm_1, wspzzl_dm, wspzhm, sjse, znj, znjpzhm, djr_dm, djrq, jdcxszhm, yzpzxh, cljdlx_dm, cldazt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, clscqymc, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, sjtb_sj, cllx_dm, cldabh, cdsx, fpjgzsbz, xnyqclx_dm, jdczccchgz, zsjg_dm, fpjg, czmc from sb_cgs_cldaxx t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or t.clsbdh = ?) and t.cldazt_dm = ? order by t.lrrq desc
SELECT A.* FROM SB_YQWSBQC A, SB_LS_SBXX SBXX WHERE SBXX.HHLJID = ? AND A.WSBUUID = SBXX.YJSKUUID AND (A.SFCBJJKWSB = 'Y' OR A.SFCBJJKWSB IS NULL) AND (A.CBUUID IS NOT NULL OR A.SBRQ_1 IS NOT NULL)
select * from pz_jbsc a where a.ypruuid = ? and (1 = ? or a.xhuuid = ?) and a.pzzy_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select to_char(nvl(min(jbsr), sysdate), 'yyyy-mm-dd') jxqr from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.shbz = 'Y' and t.cxbz = 'N' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sspzjxbbh is null and t.pzhsjg_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM SB_WTDZSKSHZB WHERE #macroparam#
Select t.* from sb_sds_fzjgfpb_zjg t Where t.sbuuid=?
select z.gljg_dm, z.hsjg_dm skssswjg_dm from dm_qx_znjgdzb z, dm_gy_swjg t where z.gljg_dm = t.swjg_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or z.gljg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or z.hsjg_dm = ?)

select t.pzssbgduuid ypzuuid, t.pzssbgdbh ypzbh, t.tbrq ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm from pz_sspzssbgdzb t where t.lrr_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and zstybz='Y' and not exists (select 1 from pz_flz b where b.yspzhm = t.pzssbgduuid and b.xhuuid is null) and t.tbrq between ? and ? and not exists(select 1 from pz_gztzs a where t.PZSSBGDUUID=a.yspzhm and a.tybz is null)

select a.fyxxuuid, a.djxh, a.fybh, a.fwcqzsh, a.tdsybh, a.jzmj fwmj, b.czfcmj, b.fcyz, b.czwyz, b.jsbl, b.zspm_dm, a.fcmc, a.fcyt_dm, a.tdsybh dh_1, '' pkbz, a.csqdsj csqdrq, a.nsywzzsj syqzzrq, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.fwzldz xxdz, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsywzzsj zfrq_1, b.jsbl sl_1, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, ''nsqx_dm, ''jkqx_dm, ''sbqx_dm, ''cqgs_dm, a.jdxz_dm, b.jmxzdmxx ssjmxz_dm, b.jmshj bqjmse, b.fcyz jmsfcyz from sb_cxs_fyxxcjb a left join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb b on a.fyxxuuid=b.fyxxuuid and b.yxbz='Y' and (b.bgbm='1' or b.bgbm='2') where a.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or a.fybh = ?) and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.nsywzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')>= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.csqdsj <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.nsywzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')>= a.csqdsj

with kk as (select distinct d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, a.bdcxmmc, D.SKSSQQ, D.SKSSQZ, d.pzxh from sb_zlf a, sb_zlf_fhtz c, sb_sbb d, sb_zlbscjb m, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb n, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx j where a.sbuuid = c.pcuuid and c.sbuuid = d.sbuuid and m.zlbscjuuid = n.zlbscjuuid and n.zlbscjuuid = j.zlbscjuuid and d.pzxh = j.pzxh #macroparam# and m.djxh = ? and d.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')), aa as (select distinct yzpzxh pzxh, skcllx_dm from zs_yjsf where yzpzxh in (select pzxh from kk) and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and skcllx_dm = '0'), bb as (select distinct d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, a.bdcxmmc, D.SKSSQQ, D.SKSSQZ, d.pzxh from sb_zlf a, sb_sbb d where a.sbuuid = d.sbuuid #macroparam# and d.djxh = ? and d.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')), cc as (select distinct yzpzxh pzxh, skcllx_dm from zs_yjsf where yzpzxh in (select pzxh from bb) and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and skcllx_dm = '0') select * from (select kk.djxh, kk.nsrsbh, kk.nsrmc, kk.bdcxmmc, kk.pzxh, KK.SKSSQQ, KK.SKSSQZ, aa.skcllx_dm from kk, aa where kk.pzxh = aa.pzxh union all select bb.djxh, bb.nsrsbh, bb.nsrmc, bb.bdcxmmc, bb.pzxh, BB.SKSSQQ, BB.SKSSQZ, cc.skcllx_dm from bb, cc where bb.pzxh = cc.pzxh) order by pzxh desc
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb6_gdzc t where t.sbuuid = ?
select * from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_FZJGYHBAB t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select t.* from sb_zyssb_zb t where t.sbuuid=?
SELECT T.YPRUUID AS CODE, T.YPRMC AS CAPTION, T.* FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM IN (SELECT PZHSJG_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY W WHERE W.SJHSJG_DM = ? AND W.YXBZ = 'Y') AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from pz_flz a where a.jzpzbh = ? and a.pzzy_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
Select nvl(t.zgjyjfzcndkce,0) zgjyjfzcndkce,nvl(t.qtndkce,0) qtndkce From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zgxcnstzmxb t where t.djxh =? and t.nd =? AND T.ZFBZ_1 ='N' AND ROWNUM =1

update sb_tdsyqkdjxx a set (a.qh, a.tdsyzfzjgmc) = (select distinct b.qh, b.tdsyzfzjgmc from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh) where (a.djxh,a.tdsybh) in (select b.djxh,b.tdsybh from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where b.qh is not null and b.tdsyzfzjgmc is not null)
select nvl(y.sqldse,0)as sqldsesbs ,nvl(y.qmldse,0) as bqldsesbs,y.xxse as xxsesbs,nvl(y.sjdkse,0) as jxsesbs,nvl(y.ynse,0) as ynse from sb_zzs_ybnsr y where y.ewblxh='1' and y.sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_FJSF WHERE SBUUID = ?
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb1_Jrqy t Where t.sbuuid=?
select t.* from sb_dkdj_fb_jks_yhjs t where sbuuid=?
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_QJFYMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select pzglyuuid, pzhsjg_dm, pzgly_dm, sjhsjg_dm, jgjc_dm, pzhsjgyxqsrq, pzhsjgyxzzrq, gkjsc_1, sjgsdq from pz_pzgly t where t.pzgly_dm = ? and sysdate between t.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t.pzhsjgyxzzrq

select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_dkdj_fb_skmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.skssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and b.bkjdjxh = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ?
select a.*, b.xzqhsz_dm from sb_sbxx a, dm_gy_jdxz b where a.jdxz_dm = b.jdxz_dm(+) and a.sbuuid = ?

SELECT YSYSKMXUUID, DKSQUUID, DKFPLB_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, PMSE, BCKCSE, SKSX, GLDKSQUUID, HY_DM, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, SFMXUUID, ZFRQ_1, SPUUID, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, KKCSE, JSFYJ, SFL, JSYJ, DJXH, KSYSKUUID, LZSFMXUUID, ZGSWSKFJ_DM FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
select 1 from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.wsbuuid = ? and t.cbuuid is not null and t.cbrq is not null
delete from SB_CXS_FCJYCJXX_JYF where fcjycjxxuuid in (#macroparam#)

select c.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c inner join sb_cxs_czjzsymxb a on c.ysuuid = a.czsyuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ? and #macroparam#

select pzgly.PZGLYUUID code, yprlx.YPRFLMC caption,null pcode from PZ_PZGLY pzgly,DM_PZ_YPRFL yprlx where pzgly.PZHSJG_DM=15001091000 and yprlx.YPRFL_DM = 11 union select ypr.YPRUUID code, yprlx.YPRFLMC caption,null pcode from PZ_YPR ypr,DM_PZ_YPRFL yprlx where ypr.PZHSJG_DM=15001091000 and yprlx.YPRFL_DM =31

Select Sb.* From Sb_Sbxx Sb Where Sb.Zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.sbuuid=? And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Pzxh = ?)) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#))) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Zsxm_Dm In (#macroparam#))) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Zspm_Dm In (#macroparam#))) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Sbsx_Dm_1 = ?)) Order By Sb.Lrrq Desc
Select t.* from SB_SDS_JMQYQS_FB_SYCCJSHFP t Where t.sbuuid=?

select b.djxh, b.sybh_1, max(b.skssqz) skssqz, b.syuuid from sb_ls_sbxx c, sb_sysbmxbg b ,sb_sbb e where c.sybh_1 = b.sybh_1 and c.djxh = b.djxh and e.djxh = c.djxh and c.hhljid = ? and b.lrrq >= sysdate - 365 and b.sbuuid=e.sbuuid and (e.zfbz_1 = 'N' or e.zfbz_1 is null) and e.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') group by b.djxh, b.sybh_1, b.syuuid
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Mjsrjjkcyhmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
Select t.* From Cs_Sb_Cwgzpzb t Where t.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And t.Gzbz = 'Y'

select YHYYWD_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, QSYHHH, KHYHHH from (select c.YHYYWD_DM, c.XZQHSZ_DM, c.QSYHHH, c.KHYHHH from CS_ZS_SKY_YHDZ c where c.YHYYWD_DM = ? and c.YXBZ = 'Y' and c.XYBZ = 'Y' and c.SWJG_DM in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by c.SWJG_DM desc) where rownum = 1
select * from sb_tdjy where sbuuid=? and pzxh=?

select * from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx t where (t.zlbscjuuid, t.mflx) in (select a.zlbscjuuid, '0' from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.mfpzxh = ? union all select a.zlbscjuuid, '1' from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(a.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.gmfpzxh = ?)
select * from dm0_zdsy_dqsj_cwb where year = ? and quarter = ? and djxh = ?
select * from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcz where (djxh, fybh) not in (select djxh, fybh from sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cz)

select 1 from sb_sbb a,sb_sbxx b,sb_qs c where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and c.sybh_1 = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ? and b.zspm_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N')<>'Y' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')

select a.gyrdjxh, a.gyrnsrsbh, a.gyrxm from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx a where (a.zlbscjuuid, a.dy_ewbhxh) in (select distinct zlbscjuuid, ewbhxh from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx t where t.pzxh = ?) union all select t.gyrdjxh, t.gyrnsrsbh, t.gyrxm from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx t where t.mflx = '1' and t.zlbscjuuid in (select distinct zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a where a.gmfpzxh = ?) union all select t.gyrdjxh, t.gyrnsrsbh, t.gyrxm from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx t where t.mflx = '0' and t.zlbscjuuid in (select distinct zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a where a.mfpzxh = ?) union all select t.djxh gyrdjxh, t.nsrsbh gyrnsrsbh, t.nsrmc gyrxm from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf t where (t.fcjycjxxuuid, t.zrfcsfbz) in (select distinct t.fcjycjxxuuid, t.zrfcsfbz from sb_cxs_fcjy t where pzxh = ?)

select t1.djxh,t1.pgfxrq,t1.pgssqq,t1.pgssqz,t2.bzqx,t2.wtms pgxmmc,t2.wszzrq,t2.zxbztzsuuid,t2.swjgjg,t2.zg,t2.nh,t2.wh from np_nspgajxxb t1, np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz t2 where t1.nspgajxxuuid = t2.nspgajxxuuid and t1.djxh = ? and t2.qrbz='N' and nvl(t1.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and nvl(t2.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
select * from ZS_YJSF t where t.YZPZXH = ? and (t.TZLX_DM = ? or t.TZLX_DM = ?) and (t.SKCLLX_DM = ? or t.SKCLLX_DM = '6') and t.sksx_dm <>'0205'

select c.zlbsuuid,c.ssqq,c.ssqz,c.lrrq,d.cfdz from sb_zlbscjb c,sb_zlbssldjb d where c.djxh =? And c.zlbsuuid=d.zlbsuuid and c.ssqz =to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and bszl_dm =? and (c.ssqq <>to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') or c.ssqz<>to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (zfbz_1 <>'Y' or zfbz_1 is Null) order by lrrq desc

SELECT A.* FROM sb_cxs_fyxxcjb A INNER JOIN sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb B ON A.Fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid WHERE DJXH = ? AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' and b.yxbz='Y' AND （A.czrsj IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.czrsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ）

select max(syts) as syts from cs_gy_zqtz where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and zsxm_dm = ? and (1 = ? or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and nsqx_dm = ? and yxqsrq <= ? and yxzzrq >= ?

select a.wsbuuid from sb_yqwsbqc a, sb_ls_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.skssqq < b.ssqz and a.skssqz > b.ssqq and (a.sbrq_1 is null or a.sbrq_1 = date '1-1-1') and a.sjlybz = '5' and b.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610119' and b.hhljid = ?
select mx.sspzxhsqmxuuid, mx.sspzxhsquuid, mx.pzzl_dm_2, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.xhsl, mx.gdbgnx, mx.ybgnx, mx.ljhm, mx.bz from pz_sspzxhsqmxb mx where mx.sspzxhsquuid = ?
select * from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid where nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' #macroparam#

SELECT FPZL_DM,FP_DM,FPQSHM,FPZZHM,FS,SE,GCXMBH FROM (SELECT A.DKSQUUID, A.FPZL_DM, A.FP_DM, A.FPHM AS FPQSHM, A.FPHM AS FPZZHM, 1 FS, SUM(NVL(B.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.JMSFE, 0) - NVL(B.NSQNYJSE, 0)) AS SE FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX A INNER JOIN FP_DK_SFMX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' GROUP BY A.DKSQUUID,FPZL_DM, FP_DM, FPHM) KJ ,FP_DK_JZYFP JZY WHERE KJ.DKSQUUID = JZY.DKSQUUID(+)
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ
select t.* from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB t where t.fjmdjxh =? and t.zfbz_1='N'
select t.djxh, sum(t.dksqje) dksqje, sum(t.kpje) kpje from fp_fc_dkje t where t.fcjycjxxuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by t.djxh
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMHD_YJND t WHERE T.SBUUID=? AND T.PZXH=?

select max(sbqx) as sbqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yyyf = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and hsbz = ?

SELECT a.wsbuuid from SB_YQWSBQC a, SB_LS_SBXX sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.skssqz = sbxx.ssqz and a.sbrq_1 is not null and ((a.zsxm_dm not in ('10101', '10104') and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*普通税*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '10101' and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq) /*增值税*/ or (a.zsxm_dm = '10104' and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqq and ((a.skssqz + 1 < add_months(a.skssqq, 12) and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm not in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688')) /*企业所得税非年报*/ or (a.skssqz + 1 >= add_months(a.skssqq, 12) and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688', 'BDA0610039', 'BDA0610764', 'BDA0610073', 'BDA0610766', 'BDA0610074', 'BDA0610776 ')) AND (TO_CHAR(sbxx.ssqz, 'MM') - TO_CHAR(sbxx.ssqq, 'MM')) >= 11 /*企业所得税A类年报*/ )) /*企业所得税*/ ) and (a.sybh_1 is null or a.sybh_1 = sbxx.sybh_1) and ((a.zsdlfs_dm is null) or (a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm)) and sbxx.hhljid = ?

with c as (select a.ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 maxskssq from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyysxx b on a.ysuuid = b.ysuuid and b.bgbm = '1' and b.yxbz = 'Y' where a.djxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by a.ysuuid) select t.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx t inner join sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a on a.ysuuid=t.ysuuid inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b on a.syuuid = b.syuuid left join c on a.ysuuid = c.ysuuid where b.djxh = ? and a.bgbm = '1' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.maxskssq, a.yxqq) < a.yxqz and #macroparam#
SELECT * FROM CS_SB_hyhdlrlDzb WHERE yxbz='Y'
select * from sb_zqjm t where t.sbxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.tzlx_dm ='1'
Select t.servicename From Cs_Sb_Cwgzpzb t Where t.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And t.Gzbz = 'Y'
select t.* from SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB t, (select distinct ysuuid from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a where a.djxh = ? and sbuuid = ? and pzxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N') b where t.cjsyuuid = b.ysuuid and t.bgbm != 1
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_JMSDSEMXB T WHERE T.PZXH=? AND T.SBUUID=?
select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_zzs_ybnsr b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11'

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.nssbrq, t.sbfs_dm from sb_sbxx t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = t.djxh and t.zfbz_1 = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 = ? and t.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and t.lrrq >= add_months(?, -3)
SELECT * FROM sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb t where #macroparam# /*t.clscqymc in ()*/

select a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sbxxuuid = b.sbxxuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

select csz from cs_sb_spbzxxpzb a where a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y' and (1=#macroparam# or a.tj=?) and swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm b from dm_gy_swjg b start with b.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior b.sjswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm) order by swjg_dm desc

select b.* from SB_SBB a, SB_DQDE_GTGSH_FYHZ b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610119' and a.sbuuid = ? and a.pzxh = ? order by b.pzmxxh
select t.jdxz_dm from cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb t where t.xzqhsz_dm = ? and t.gdslx_dm = ?
SELECT jgjc_dm FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzhsjg_dm = ? AND a.pzhsjgyxqsrq <= SYSDATE AND a.pzhsjgyxzzrq > SYSDATE
select t.* from sb_cxs_czjzsymxb t, (select distinct ysuuid from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a where a.djxh = ? and sbuuid = ? and pzxh =? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N') b where t.czsyuuid = b.ysuuid and t.bgbm != 1

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, x.zspm_dm, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.sybh_1, t.lsmxid, x.yzpzzl_dm from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where x.zfbz_1 = ? and x.gzlx_dm_1 in (?, ?, ?) and t.djxh = x.djxh and x.zsxm_dm = nvl(t.zsxm_dm, x.zsxm_dm) and x.zspm_dm = nvl(t.zspm_dm, x.zspm_dm) and (t.zszm_dm is null or t.zszm_dm = x.zszm_dm) and nvl(x.skssqq, ?) = nvl(t.ssqq, nvl(x.skssqq, ?)) and nvl(x.skssqz, ?) = nvl(t.ssqz, nvl(x.skssqz,?)) and x.zsdlfs_dm = nvl(t.zsdlfs_dm, x.zsdlfs_dm) and decode(x.yzpzzl_dm, #macroparam#, x.yzpzzl_dm) = nvl(decode(t.yzpzzl_dm, #macroparam#, t.yzpzzl_dm), decode(x.yzpzzl_dm, #macroparam#, x.yzpzzl_dm)) and x.sbsx_dm_1 = nvl(t.sbsx_dm_1, x.sbsx_dm_1) and x.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and ((t.sybh_1 is null and x.sybh_1 is null) or (t.sybh_1 is not null and t.sybh_1 = x.sybh_1 and exists (select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg a where a.pzxh = x.pzxh and a.sybh_1 = x.sybh_1)) or (t.sybh_1 is not null and x.sybh_1 is null and exists (select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg a where a.pzxh = x.pzxh and a.sybh_1 = t.sybh_1))) and t.hhljid = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or x.yzpzzl_dm not in #macroparam#) and x.yzpzzl_dm not in (#macroparam#)
select zlbsuuid,ssqq,ssqz,lrrq from sb_zlbscjb where djxh = ? and ssqq >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and ssqz < to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')+1 and bszl_dm =? and (zfbz_1 <>'Y' or zfbz_1 is null)
select * from SB_YJSKXXLSZ t where t.pzxh = ?

select t.djxh nsrmc, t.tfrq kjrq, t.hjje ccse,nvl(y.ypruuid,y1.ypruuid) ypruuid,nvl(y.swry_dm,y1.swry_dm) yprDm from zs_pzsyqk t left join pz_ypr y on t.sddwdjxh = y.djxh left join pz_ypr y1 on t.kpr_dm = y1.swry_dm where t.kpjg_dm in ( select swjg_dm from( select * from qx_swjg_zns where zn_dm = '09' and yxbz = 'Y' and sjswjg_dm is not null ) pzzns start with pzzns.swjg_dm =? connect by prior pzzns.swjg_dm = pzzns.sjswjg_dm) and pzzl_dm = ? #macroparam# and pzhm = ?

select * from sb_dkdj_fb_skmxbg t where t.bkjdjxh = ? and (1 = ? or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.pzxh = t.pzxh and a.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') )
SELECT nvl(MAX(t.mxxh),0) AS mxxh FROM sb_sds_jmcz_yjd_btzwgqyxx t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? and t.zfbz_1='N'

select * from (select a.cslx_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.cs_dm_1, a.cs_dm_2, a.cs_dm_3, a.cs_dm_4, a.cs_dm_5, a.cs_dm_6, a.cs_dm_7, a.cs_dm_8, a.cs_dm_9, a.cs_dm_10, a.cs_dm_11, a.cs_dm_12, a.cs_dm_13, a.cs_dm_14, a.cs_dm_15 from cs_zs_yskm_ysfpbl_dm a where a.kmblbz = ? and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.swjg_dm in (select d.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg d start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm) order by a.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1
select t.skssswjg_dm from cs_sb_plywpz t where t.clywlx=? and t.xybz='Y' and t.yxbz='Y'

select a.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj a, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqz and a.skssqz >= sbxx.ssqq and a.nssbrq is null and a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm and ((sbxx.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and not (sbxx.hy_dm in ('175','171','172') or sbxx.hy_dm like '41%') and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = sbxx.djxh and tzf.yxqq <= sbxx.ssqq and tzf.yxqz >= sbxx.ssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and gsxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and gsxx.skssqq >= tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz <= tzf.yxqz))) or (sbxx.zspm_dm not in ('101060300', '101060200') or (sbxx.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and (sbxx.hy_dm in ('175','171','172') or sbxx.hy_dm like '41%')))) and sbxx.hhljid = ?
select * from sb_sbbtbckts t where t.djxh=? and t.pzxh=?
select distinct zspm_dm from sb_sbxx p,sb_sbb t where p.pzxh=t.pzxh and p.zfbz_1!='Y' and t.zfbz_1!='Y' and p.djxh = ? and p.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.bz=?

select b.yzzzsbhsxse from sb_sbb a,sb_zzs_xgm b where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.ewblxh = 1 and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11'

select jjrqsrq as jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq as jjrzzrq from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yyyf = ? order by jjrqsrq
select t.* from sb_nsrjbxx t where sbuuid=?
select * from sb_zzs_xgm xgm where xgm.sbuuid in (select sb.sbuuid from sb_sbb sb where sb.djxh=?) and ewblxh='2'

SELECT sk.ldskuuid,sk.djxh,sk.pzxh,sk.zzslx,sk.sqldpzxh, sk.skssqq,sk.skssqz,sk.ldlx,sk.sqldse,sk.bqqmldse,sk.zfbz_1, sk.zfrq_1,sk.zfr_dm,sk.zgswskfj_dm,sk.ldfsrq,sk.swjg_dm,sk.lrr_dm,sk.lrrq,sk.xgr_dm,sk.xgrq,sk.sjgsdq FROM SB_ZZS_LDSK SK WHERE SK.Skssqz = (SELECT MAX(a.skssqz) FROM SB_ZZS_LDSK A WHERE (a.zfbz_1='N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) AND A.DJXH = ? ) AND SK.DJXH = ?
select * from pz_sspzgdmxb t where t.pzgduuid=?

select distinct a.pzzl_dm,d.pzzlmc from pz_jbsc a, pz_jbscjzxx b,cs_pz_swjgdypzzl c,dm_pz_pzzl d where a.pzzy_dm = '12' and a.xhuuid = b.xhuuid and b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf = ? and a.pzzl_dm = c.pzzl_dm and a.pzzl_dm = d.pzzl_dm and d.pzdl_dm not in ('6','7') and substr(a.sjgsdq, 1, 3) = substr(c.sjgsdq, 1, 3) order by a.pzzl_dm
select a.* from sb_sbb a where a.sbuuid = ?

SELECT SWRY.SWRY_DM CODE, SWRY.SWRYXM CAPTION FROM DM_QX_SWRYSF SF, DM_GY_SWRY SWRY WHERE SF.SWRY_DM = SWRY.SWRY_DM AND SF.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (SYSDATE BETWEEN SF.SFYXQQ AND SF.SFYXQZ) AND SF.SFSWJG_DM = ? AND SWRY.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SWRY.SWRY_DM NOT IN (SELECT T.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.YPRLX_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y')
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_GKQYJTCYSTMD where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? and dzbzdszl_dm =?
select hdrq, pzxh from sb_yqsbhzb where yqsbuuid = ?

select x.skssqq, x.skssqz, x.zspm_dm, t.lsmxid, x.hy_dm, x.yzpzzl_dm, sum(x.ynse - x.jmse) as ybtse, sum(x.jsyj) as jsyj, sum(x.jmse) jmse, sum(x.ynse) ynse, sum(x.ybtse) ybtse1 from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where t.djxh = x.djxh and nvl(x.zsxm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zsxm_dm,nvl(x.zsxm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.zspm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zspm_dm,nvl(x.zspm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.hy_dm,'X') = nvl(t.hy_dm,nvl(x.hy_dm,'X')) and x.zsfs_dm = '401' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and nvl(x.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and t.ssqq < = x.skssqq and t.ssqz > = x.skssqz and t.hhljid = ? group by x.skssqq, x.skssqz, x.zspm_dm, x.hy_dm, x.yzpzzl_dm, t.lsmxid
select count(1) from fp_dk_ysyskmx t where t.ksyskuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.gfzdjxh, c.djxh, a.gfznsrsbh, b.pzxh, a.grzmc, a.gj_dm, a.sfzjzl_dm, a.sfzjhm, a.tdfwdz, a.fybh, a.mj, a.dj, a.jyjg, a.htbh, a.htje, a.htqdsj, a.fclx_dm, a.dh, a.lc_1, a.dyh, a.fjh, a.jzjglx_dm, a.tnmj, a.cx_dm, a.fcjyfs_dm, b.qspm_dm, b.qssl, b.qs_cqbcse, b.qs_ynse, b.qs_jmse, b.qs_sjse, b.yhspm_dm, b.yhssl, b.yhs_ynse, b.yhs_jmse, b.yhs_sjse, b.qsssjmxz_dm, b.yhsssjmxz_dm, c.skssqq, c.skssqz from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlf_zb b, sb_sbb c, sb_zlbscjb d where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.pzxh = c.pzxh and b.sbuuid=c.sbuuid and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.fybh = b.fybh and a.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gfzdjxh = b.gfzdjxh and c.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and c.djxh = ? and a.gfzdjxh = ? and (1 = ? or c.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or c.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select t.uuid,t.ywzjuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.sy,t.yj_1,t.sqsx,t.sqrq,t.wszzrq,t.wszg,t.shswjg,t.wszzswjgmc from sb_tdzzsqssh_swsxtzs t where t.uuid=?

select a.*, b.*, case when c.shxydm is not null then c.shxydm else c.nsrsbh END AS NSRSBH, c.nsrmc, d.swjgmc from SB_CS_TSNSRWHB a, (select distinct a.tsywgluuid, MAX(decode(trim(csbm), 'yskmDm', csz, NULL)) yskmDm, MAX(decode(trim(csbm), 'ysfpblDm', csz, NULL)) ysfpblDm, MAX(decode(trim(csbm), 'zhjzl', csz, 0.0)) zhjzl, MAX(decode(trim(csbm), 'sjzsl', csz, 0.0)) sjzsl, MAX(decode(trim(csbm), 'jdyjbl', csz, null)) jdyjbl, MAX(decode(trim(csbm), 'tlysyyzl', csz, 0.0)) tlysyyzl from SB_CS_TSNSRGZB a group by a.tsywgluuid) b, dj_nsrxx c, dm_gy_swjg d, qx_swjg_zns e where a.tsywgluuid = b.tsywgluuid AND e.ccm LIKE ? and a.swjg_dm = e.swjg_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (? is null or a.TSNSRLX_DM = ?) and a.djxh = c.djxh AND e.swjg_dm = d.swjg_dm and (? is null or c.nsrsbh = ? or c.shxydm = ?)
select t.* from pz_ypr t where t.swry_dm = ? and t.pzhsjg_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq

select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, bbh, '现行' as jglx, clxlh from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb where clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_Dm = ?) order by bbh desc
select * from sb_sbb t where t.djxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.bz = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

Update sb_sbfpkqcfkb fkb set fkb.ycqbz =ls.sbsx_dm_1, fkb.clbz =ls.zsdlfs_dm, fkb.clsm=ls.jkqx_dm,f fkb.xgr_dm ='00000000000', fkb.xgrq = sysdate where exists (select t.*, rowid from sb_ls_sbxx ls where ls.lsmxid = fkb.wbuuid and ls.hhljid = ?)

select t4.ewbhxh,t4.bnsszbhgb,t4.bnzbgj,t4.bnjkcg,t4.bnyygj,t4.bnybfxzb,t4.bnwfplr,t4.bnsyzqyhj from SB_CWBB_SYYH_SYZQYBDB t4 where t4.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1 = 'N'))
select sum(b.se) se from sb_sbb a,sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.yzpzzl_dm=? and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and b.sybh_1=? and a.djxh=? and b.zsxm_dm like ?

select t.pzxh, t.pzxh as sbxh, t.ASYSLJSXSE, t.YSHWXSE, t.YSLWXSE, t.SYSL_NSJCTZXSE, t.AJYBFJSXSE, t.JYBF_NSJCTZXSE, t.MDTBFCKXSE, t.Msxse, t.Mshwxse, t.Mslwxse, t.XXSE, t.Jxse, t.Sqldse, t.Jxsezc, t.Mdtytse, t.SYSL_NSJCYBJSE, t.Ydksehj, t.Sjdkse, t.Ynse, t.Qmldse, t.Jybf_Ynse, t.Jybf_Nsjcybjse, t.Ynsejze, t.Ynsehj, t.Qcwjse, t.Ssckkjzyjkstse, t.Bqyjse, t.Fcyjse, t.Ckkjzyjksyjse, t.Bqjnsqynse, t.Bqjnqjse, t.Qmwjse, t.Qmwjse_Qjse, t.Bqybtse, t.Jzjtsjtse, t.Qcwjcbse, t.Bqrkcbse, t.Qmwjcbse, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.EWBLXH as sbbl from SB_ZZS_YBNSR t where t.sbuuid =?

select t3.ewbhxh,t3.bns from SB_CWBB_QYKJZZ_SYZQY t3 where t3.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1 = 'N'))

with lsje as (select a.djxh, sum(a.kpje) kpje, sum(dksqje) dksqje from fp_dk_sq a, fp_ls_dkje b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.lrrq >= b.kpqsrq and a.lrrq <= b.kpjzrq and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.zsbz = 'Y' and a.kjbz = 'Y' and b.dksquuid = ? group by a.djxh) select c.djxh, c.kpqsrq, c.kpjzrq, ls.kpje, ls.dksqje from fp_ls_dkje c, lsje ls where c.djxh = ls.djxh and c.dksquuid = ?

select * from (select a.tsnsrlx_dm, a.tsnsrlxmc, nvl(whqx, '62') whqx from DM_GY_TSNSRLX a where a.xybz = 'Y') a, (select nvl(jgjc_dm, '62') jgjc from dm_gy_swjg a where a.Swjg_Dm = ?) b where to_number(a.whqx) >= to_number(b.jgjc)
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb2_gljyhz t where t.sbuuid = ?

select xzqhsz_dm code,xzqhmc caption from dm_gy_xzqh where xzqhsz_dm = any (select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with xzqhsz_dm = (select xzqhsz_dm from (select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh where xzqhsz_dm = any (select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior sjxzqhsz_dm = xzqhsz_dm order by xzqhsz_dm) where rownum = 1) connect by prior xzqhsz_dm = sjxzqhsz_dm
select f.fp_dm as code from dm_fp_fp f where f.fpzl_dm=?
select * from sb_xfs_jyscqyndxsmxhzb t where t.lcslid=?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '3' zt_bz, case when ewbhxh = '2' or ewbhxh = '5' or ewbhxh = '11' or ewbhxh = '12' then bqje end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' or ewbhxh = '5' or ewbhxh = '11' then bqje end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then bqje end lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' or ewbhxh = '17' then bqje end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then bqje end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then bqje end lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then bqje end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ 0 lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ 0 lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ 0 lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then bqje end lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then bqje end lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then bqje end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then bqje end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '19' then bqje end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ 0 lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then bqje end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then bqje end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then bqje end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then bqje end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_syyh_lrb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYFLBGB t where t.BFLQYNSSBH=?
select b.* from sb_zzs_xgm b where b.sbuuid = ? and b.ewblxh >= 3 order by b.ewblxh

select y.xsdj,s.skssqq,s.skssqz from sb_kqsyfyj y, sb_sbxx s where y.sbuuid = s.sbuuid and nvl(s.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and s.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and s.djxh=? and skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.zsxm_dm=? and s.zspm_dm=? and y.yqt_dm = ? order by s.skssqq desc
select * from fp_dk_sq where gsdksquuid=? and zfbz_1='N'
select lsz.* from sb_yjskxxlsz lsz, sb_sbb sbxx where lsz.lyuuid_1 = sbxx.sbuuid and sbxx.sbuuid = ? and sbxx.pzxh = ? and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and nvl(sbxx.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB WHERE #macroparam#

SELECT SUM(A.YYSR_LJ) AS YYSRSNTQ ,SUM(A.LRZE_LJ) AS LRZESNTQ FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD A INNER JOIN SB_SBB B ON A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND B.SKSSQZ = ? AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND B.GZLX_DM_1 IN (#macroparam#)

select count(1) from kj_hsrq t ,(SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G where t.sj_swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm and t.qc <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.qm>= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.qrqz < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC
SELECT t.* FROM CS_SB_QYSDS_HZQYZFJGFTBL T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.YXQQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.YXQZ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.yxbz='Y'
select qc.* from sb_yqwbszlqc qc, sb_ls_sbxx ls where qc.djxh = ls.djxh and qc.zlxgid = ls.yjskuuid and ls.hhljid = ?
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.wszmhm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.cgssbzt = ?
select sum(t.ybtse) as ybtse from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >=? and t.skssqz <=? and t.yzpzzl_dm in(#macroparam#) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT KSYSKUUID, DJXH, LYUUID_1, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, SL_1, JSYJ, FPDKSK, SKSX_DM, HY_DM, ZFBZ_1, TFRQ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, KSYSKWHSXUUID FROM FP_DK_KSYSKMX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND (1 = ? OR T.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = ? OR T.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = ? OR T.TFRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = ? OR T.TFRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) AND (1 = ? OR LYUUID_1 = ?) AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'
Select t.* From Sb_Cgs_Cldaxx t Where t.Clsbdh = ? And t.Cldazt_Dm = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = ? And t.djxh = ? And t.yzpzxh = ?
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb4_lw t where t.sbuuid = ?
update sb_sbbd_bdycclxx t set t.zfr_dm= ?, t.zfrq=?, t.zfbz_1=?, t.xgr_dm=?, t.xgrq=? where t.lcslid=?
select t.Fddbr,t.Dz,t.Gjhdq,t.Glfmc from SB_GLYWWLNDBG_FB1_GLGX t ,sb_sbb b where t.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.djxh=?
select a.ysfpbl_dm code, a.ysfpblmc caption from dm_jk_ysfpbl a, zs_ls_kjshjygs_ysfpbl b where a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.ysfpbl_dm = b.ysfpbl_dm order by a.ysfpbl_dm asc
select y.* from zs_yjsf y,sb_ls_sbxx l where y.zsuuid=l.sybh_1 and l.hhljid=?

select mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzsl, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm,mx.bz from pz_sspztyzfzb zb, pz_sspztyzfmxb mx where zb.sspztyzfuuid = mx.sspztyzfuuid and zb.bbdw_dm = ? and zstybz = 'Y' and zfbz_1 != 'Y' and zb.lrrq between ? and ? and mx.pzzl_dm in (select pzzl_dm from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh c where c.xhzsswjg = ?)

select * from (select * from cs_sb_yysjqxzmpzb t where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yxbz='Y' order by swjg_dm desc) where rownum = '1'

SELECT T.PZGLYUUID AS CODE, T.PZHSJG_DM AS CAPTION, '11' AS YPRLX_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.PZGLY_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ UNION SELECT T1.YPRUUID AS CODE, T1.YPRMC AS CAPTION, T1.YPRLX_DM FROM PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T1.SWRY_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T1.YXQSRQ AND T1.YXZZRQ
select pzjjbmxuuid,pzjjbuuid,pzzl_dm,pzzg_dm,pzzt_dm,jjpzsl jcsl, pzqshm,pzzzhm from pz_sspzjjqkmx where pzjjbuuid=?

SELECT T.PZLFDUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.SSPZLFDBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND (T.LQDWR = ? OR T.LQDWR IN (SELECT W.YPRUUID FROM PZ_YPR W WHERE W.PZHSJG_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FFRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FFRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.SSPZLFDBH

select max(syts) as syts from CS_GY_ZQTZ where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and zsxm_dm = ? and (1 = ? or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and nsqx_dm = ? and yxqsrq <=? and yxzzrq >= ?
select y.* from sb_yjskxx y ,sb_ls_sbxx l where y.yjskuuid=l.lsmxid and l.hhljid=?

select b.tyfphluuid, b.tyfpuuid, b.hwlwmc, b.dwsl_dm, b.ggxh, b.hlsl, b.dj, b.je, b.bz, b.lrrq from (select a.tyfphluuid, a.tyfpuuid, a.hwlwmc, a.dwsl_dm, a.ggxh, a.hlsl, a.dj, a.je, a.bz, a.lrrq from fp_dk_tyjdfp_hlmx a, fp_dk_tyjdfp m, fp_dk_sq n where a.tyfpuuid = m.tyfpuuid and m.dksquuid = n.dksquuid and n.zfbz_1 = 'N' and n.djxh = ? order by a.lrrq desc) b where rownum <= 10

/*增值税一般纳税人申报表*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then asysljsxse end bq1, /*按适用税率征税销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then yshwxse end bq2, /*其中：应税货物销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then yslwxse end bq3, /*应税劳务销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then sysl_nsjctzxse end bq4, /*纳税检查调整的销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then ajybfjsxse end bq5, /*按简易征收办法征税销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then jybf_nsjctzxse end bq6, /* 其中：纳税检查调整的销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then mdtbfckxse end bq7, /*免、抵、退税办法出口销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then msxse end bq8, /*免税销售额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then xxse end bq18, /*销项税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then jxse end bq25, /*进项税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then sqldse end bq56, /*上期留抵税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then jxsezc end bq57, /*进项税转出额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then mdtytse end bq58, /*免抵退应退税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then sysl_nsjcybjse end bq59, /*按适用税率计算检查应补缴税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then ydksehj end bq60, /*应抵扣税额合计*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then sjdkse end bq61, /*实际抵扣税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then ynse end bq62, /*应纳税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then qmldse end bq63, /*期末留抵税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then jybf_ynse end bq64, /*按简易征收办法计算的应纳税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then jybf_nsjcybjse end bq72, /*按简易征收办法计算的纳税检查应补税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then ynsejze end bq73, /*应纳税减征额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then ynsehj end bq74, /*应纳税额合计*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then qcwjse end bq75, /*期初未缴税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then bqyjse end bq76, /*本期已缴税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1', '3') then qmwjse end bq77, /*期末未缴税额*/ case when ewblxh =3 then jzjtsjtse end bq79, /*本期实际退税额*/ case when ewblxh in ('1') then bqrkcbse end bq80 /*已缴查补税额*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh

select count(1) c from CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL a where a.pzzl_dm in ('000005021') and a.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from ( select * from qx_swjg_zns where zn_dm = '09' and yxbz = 'Y' and sjswjg_dm is not null ) pzzns connect by prior pzzns.sjswjg_dm = pzzns.swjg_dm start with pzzns.swjg_dm = ?)

select t.zsxm_dm,t.ssjmxz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.swsx_dm, jmxz.ssjmxzmc from CS_YH_SWSXJMXZDZB t, dm_gy_ssjmxz jmxz, dm_gy_swsx swsx where t.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.xybz = 'Y' and swsx.xybz = 'Y' and swsx.yxbz = 'Y' and swsx.swsx_dm = t.swsx_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and jmxz.ssjmxz_dm = t.ssjmxz_dm and jmxz.xybz = 'Y' and jmxz.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?)
select t1.* from SB_FJMHTBA_XMHTKXZFQKBGB t1,SB_FJMHTBA_ZFKXXXB t2 where t1.YBGBBH =? and t1.FBFNSRSBH = ? and t1.SBUUID=t2.SBUUID

select ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JSYJ, SL_1, YBTSE, JKQX, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZCLRQ, nssbrq from ZS_YJSF where YZPZXH = ? and SKZL_DM = '20' AND tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and SBSX_DM_1 = '21' and sksx_dm='0301'

select nvl(sum(b.bqqsl), 0) sqljqsl from sb_szyssb a, sb_zyssb_mx b, sb_sbb c where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' and c.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and c.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssqq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.zspm_dm = ?
select swry_dm,yprmc ,a.ypruuid from pz_ypr a where yprlx_dm='31' and pzhsjg_dm=(select pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly b where b.pzgly_dm=?)
select t.pzzl_dm as code, t.pzzlmc as caption, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzlmc from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm =?
select b.* from wbjh_clfxsxxb a,wbjh_clfxsxxb_gyrxx b where (? is null or fwuuid=?) and a.mfsfzjlx_dm = ? and a.mfzjhm = ? and a.mfgj_dm = ? and a.fwuuid=b.fwuuid;
select * from sb_qysdsndsb_qyjbxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(t.yxbz,'Y')='Y' order by t.lrrq desc
select t.Dygmc,t.sydjmxz from CS_SB_QYSDSXLCSPZB t where t.fbh = ? and t.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.xh,t.zb_xh,t.zyjkshm, t.skjehe, t.nsrsbh, t.jkdwrnsrmc from wbjh_hg_wspzhzsj t where t.zyjkshm = ?
select * from pz_jc a where a.czyuuid=? and a.jcsl > 0
select t.ldfsrq from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq=? and t.skssqz=? and t.czlx_dm in (#macroparam#) order by t.ldfsrq desc
select t.cfdz from SB_ZLBSSLDJB t where t.zlbsuuid=?

SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A,SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_JMSDSEMXB B WHERE A.SBUUID=B.SBUUID AND A.PZXH=B.PZXH AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ >= ? AND A.SKSSQZ <= ? AND A.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5') ORDER BY A.SKSSQQ DESC
select t.pzzg_dm as code, t.pzzg as caption, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzzg, t.gdsbz, t.pzzl_dm from cs_pz_pzzgb t where t.sjgsdq like ?

select t.bduuid, t.djxh, t.pzxh, t.WFLZLBHSXSE_1, t.PTFPSJKPJE_1,t.WFLZLBHSXSE_2,t.PTFPSJKPJE_2,t.YFLZLBHSXSE_1, t.YFLZLBHSXSE_2,t.bdbz from SB_SBBD_ZZSXGM_PBBD t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? order by t.lrrq desc
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBBHBQY t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_JC_CSH T1 WHERE T1.PZZL_DM = ? AND T1.PZZG_DM = ? AND T1.YXBZ = 'Y'

select a.cslx_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.cs_dm_1, a.cs_dm_2, a.cs_dm_3, a.cs_dm_4, a.cs_dm_5, a.cs_dm_6, a.cs_dm_7, a.cs_dm_8, a.cs_dm_9, a.cs_dm_10, a.cs_dm_11, a.cs_dm_12, a.cs_dm_13, a.cs_dm_14, a.cs_dm_15 from cs_zs_yskm_ysfpbl_dm a where a.kmblbz = ? and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.swjg_dm = ?

select sb.sbuuid,sb.sbrq_1,sb.sbsx_dm_1,sb.djxh,sb.pzxh,sb.skssqq,sb.skssqz,sb.yzpzzl_dm,sb.nsrsbh,sb.ybtse,t1.yspz_xmlbh,t1.yspz_xmlsj,sb.lrrq,sb.lrr_dm,sb.sjgsdq from yspz_xmlywglb t, yspz_xmlsjb_new t1, sb_sbb sb where t1.yspz_xmllsh = t.uuid and t.ywuuid = sb.sbuuid and sb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sb.yzpzzl_dm = ? and sb.lrrq > to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.SJGSDQ, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.YBSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YJSFE, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.SFL, T.JSFYJ, T.YXKCJE, T.SRZE, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSXM_DM, T.SKSSQZ, T.SKSSQQ, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DKSQUUID, T.SFMXUUID, T.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.ZJSRSFFT, T.QXQ, T.QXZ, T.BZ, T.SFZCZF, T.LZSFMXUUID FROM FP_DK_SFMX T, FP_DK_FPKJXX B WHERE T.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.LZFPDM = ? AND B.LZFPHM = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.LZSFMXUUID IS NOT NULL
select t.* from sb_dkdj_skbg t where t.sbuuid = ?
select t.pzxh, t.pzxh as fbxh, t.qcye, t.bqfse, t.bqykcje, t.bqsjkcje, t.qmye, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.ewbhxh as fblc from SB_ZZS_YBNSR_FB3_YSFWKCXM t where t.sbuuid =?

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM, ZSBZ, FPLX_DM, FYBH, FCJYCJXXUUID FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR FYBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR FCJYCJXXUUID = ?)
select * from CS_SB_ZLBSXLZFBSDZB where zlbsxl_dm=? and yxbz='Y' order by code

/*已缴税款*/ select a.djxh, c.nsrsbh nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when zsxm_dm = '10102' and sksx_dm = '0401' then ybtse end bq91, /*已缴查补税额*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and yzpzzl_dm != 'BDA0610056' and sksx_dm != '0107' then ybtse end bq103, /*企业所得税实际预缴*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and skssqz <= to_date(? || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd') then ybtse end bq104, /*企业所得税上年预缴*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and (yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610039' and skssqq = to_date(? || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssqz = to_date(? || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd') or yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610056') then ybtse end bq105, /*汇算清缴*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and sksx_dm = '0401' then ybtse end bq107, /*已缴查补税额*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10111' and zspm_dm != '101119901' and zspm_dm != '101119902' and zspm_dm != '101119903' then ybtse end bq124, /*已缴印花税*/ case when (zspm_dm = '101110301' or zspm_dm = '101110302' or zspm_dm = '101110303' or zspm_dm = '101110304' or zspm_dm = '101110305' or zspm_dm = '101110306' or zspm_dm = '101110307') /*and yskm_dm like '1011101'*/ then ybtse end bq125, /*已缴证券交易印花税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10103' then ybtse end bq126, /*本期已缴营业税税款*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10103' AND sksx_dm = '0104' then ybtse end bq127, /*清欠税款*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10103' and sksx_dm = '0401' then ybtse end bq128, /*查补税款*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10109' then ybtse end bq130, /*已缴城市维护建设税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10107' then ybtse end bq132, /*已缴资源税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10113' then ybtse end bq135, /*已缴土地增值税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10110' then ybtse end bq137, /*已缴房产税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10114' then ybtse end bq139, /*已缴车船税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10112' then ybtse end bq141, /*已缴城镇土地使用税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10106' and sksx_dm != '0107' then ybtse end bq143, /*已缴个人所得税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10106' and zspm_dm = '101060900' then ybtse end bq144, /*其中：财产转让所得*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10116' then ybtse end bq145, /*已缴车辆购置税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10119' then ybtse end bq146, /*已缴契税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10118' then ybtse end bq147, /*已缴耕地占用税*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10120' then ybtse end bq148, /*已缴烟叶税*/ case when b.skzl_dm in ('20', '31', '32') then ybtse end bq149, /*已缴其他税收（含滞纳金及罚款收入）*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10101' and sksx_dm = '0107' then ybtse end bq150, /*代扣代缴收入*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10102' and sksx_dm = '0107' then ybtse end bq151, /*代扣代缴收入*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and sksx_dm = '0107' then ybtse end bq152, /*代扣代缴收入*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10106' and sksx_dm = '0107' then ybtse end bq153, /*代扣代缴收入*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10106' and sksx_dm = '0107' and zspm_dm = '101060100' then ybtse end bq154, /*代扣代缴收入工资薪金*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10106' and sksx_dm = '0107' and zspm_dm = '101060700' then ybtse end bq155, /*代扣代缴收入股息、红利*/ case when zsxm_dm = '30203' then ybtse end bq156, /*教育费附加已缴各项收费 待定*/ case when zsxm_dm = '30216' then ybtse end bq157, /*地方教育费附加已缴各项收费 待定*/ case when zsxm_dm = '30217' then ybtse end bq158, /*文化事业建设费已缴各项收费 待定*/ case when zsxm_dm like '102%' and sksx_dm = '0107' then ybtse end bq159, /*社保基金已缴各项收费 待定*/ case when zsxm_dm like '304%' /* and sksx_dm = '0107' */ then ybtse end bq160, /*其它行政事业建设费已缴各项收费 待定*/ case when zsxm_dm not like '101%' and zsxm_dm not like '102%' and zsxm_dm not like '104%' and zsxm_dm not like '304%' and zsxm_dm not in ('30203', '30216', '30217') /* and sksx_dm = '0107'*/ then ybtse end bq161 /*已缴各项收费 待定*/ from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, zs_yjsf b, dj_nsrxx c where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.djxh = c.djxh and a.djxh = ? AND a.yxbz = 'Y' AND a.jknd = ? and b.rkrq between ? and ?

select * from sb_sbb t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.ybtse = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? AND T.SBSX_DM_1 = '11' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and not exists (select * from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb mxb where mxb.bhzrdjxh=? and mxb.sbjnfs_dm in('0','3','4') and mxb.yxbz='Y')
SELECT T.YPRUUID, T.YPRLX_DM, T.YPRMC, T.DJXH, T.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? #macroparam#
select t.* from sb_yhspdsbg_fb_xspz t where t.sbuuid = ?

select t.fp_dm,t.fphm,t.xhfnsrsbh,case when t.qywgyplx in('外购免税油品') then 1 else 2 end as qywgyplx from SB_XFS_FB_WGPZMX t where t.qywgyplx in ('外购免税油品', '外购含税油品') and t.fpzlmc = '普通版增值税专用发票' and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT T.ZCBSDZBUUID FROM NP_ZCBSDZB T WHERE T.ZXBZTZSUUID IN(?) AND T.SJGSDQ LIKE ?
select a.yskm_dm code, a.yskmmc caption from dm_gy_yskm a, zs_ls_kjshjygs_yskm b where a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yskm_dm = b.yskm_dm order by a.yskm_dm asc
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_FCSSYSYXX WHERE NVL(ZFBZ_1,'N')='N' AND YSUUID = ?

select t.ypruuid, t.yprlx_dm, t.yprmc, t.djxh, swry_dm from pz_ypr t where t.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t.yprlx_dm in ('12', '31','20','30','32') and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxzzrq and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqsrq and exists (select 1 from pz_zwcs a where a.pzdw_dm = t.ypruuid and a.cshrq is not null)

select t.fpkjxxuuid, t.dksquuid, t.djxh, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fphm, t.kpje, t.fpkf_dm, a.ybsfe, a.sqdhm from fp_dk_fpkjxx t, fp_dk_sq a, fp_dk_jzyfp b where t.dksquuid = a.dksquuid and a.dksquuid = b.dksquuid and t.djxh in (#macroparam#) and b.gcxmbh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = ? or t.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.fphm >= ?) and (1 = ? or t.fphm <= ?) and (1 = ? or a.sqdhm = ?) and a.dkfplb_dm = '06' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
update sb_yjskxx t set t.yjye_1=t.yjye_1 + to_number(?) ,t.xgrq =sysdate where t.yjskuuid=?
select pzxh from sb_sbb t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq >=? and t.skssqz <=? and t.YZPZZL_DM=? and t.ZFBZ_1='N' order by t.lrrq desc
Select t.* from SB_SDS_FJMJS_JD t Where t.sbuuid=?
select t.uuid,t.wszg,t.ywzjuuid ,b.sfbz from sb_tdzzsqshdb_swsxtzs t ,sb_tdzzsqshdb b where t.ywzjuuid= b.uuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.djxh=? and b.xmbh=? order by t.lrrq desc
select a.hth spwsbh,a.bh,a.qysdssdlx_dm sdlx from SB_FJM_KJQYSDSHTBADJB a where a.djxh=? and a.Zfbz_1='N'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zxytczxzjtzb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

SELECT DISTINCT DZB.SKGK_DM, GK.SKGKMC, DZB.SKGK_DM CODE, GK.SKGKMC CAPTION, DZB.SWJG_DM, DZB.MRBZ FROM CS_ZS_SWJGGKDZB DZB, DM_GY_GK GK WHERE DZB.SKGK_DM = GK.SKGK_DM AND DZB.YXBZ = 'Y' AND DZB.XYBZ = 'Y' AND GK.YXBZ = 'Y' AND GK.XYBZ = 'Y' AND DZB.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT T.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG T START WITH T.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SJSWJG_DM = T.SWJG_DM) ORDER BY DZB.SWJG_DM DESC

SELECT T.SSPKJBDUUID as uuid ,T.SSPKJBDBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.SHBZ = 'Y' AND T.Sbbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1='N' AND T.SSPKJBDBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPKJBDBH
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

select sbxx.sbuuid, sbxx.sbxxuuid, sbxx.ybtse from sb_sbxx sbxx, sb_kqsyfyj yjxx where sbxx.sbuuid = yjxx.sbuuid and nvl(sbxx.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and sbxx.djxh = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.skssqz = ? and yjxx.yqt_dm = ? and yjxx.yqtmc = ? and yjxx.zyzmc = ? and sbxx.zsxm_dm = ? and sbxx.zspm_dm = ? and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select sum(WGQCKCYPSL) as ljs from SB_XFS_FB_SNYRLYYDTJB_KCHYQK t where t.ewblxh in (2,4,6,8) and t.sbuuid=?

with c as (select a.ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 maxskssq from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a inner join SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB b on b.cjsyuuid = a.ysuuid and b.bgbm = '1' and b.yxbz = 'Y' where a.djxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by a.ysuuid) select t.cjsyuuid, t.fyxxuuid, t.fcyz, t.czwyz, t.czfcmj, t.jsbl, nvl(c.maxskssq, a.yxqq) yxqq, t.yxqz, t.ycjsyuuid, t.zspm_dm, t.yxbz, t.bgbm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj, t.jmxzdmxx, t.jmshj from SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB t inner join SB_CXS_FYXXCJB a on a.fyxxuuid =t.fyxxuuid left join c on c.ysuuid=t.cjsyuuid where a.djxh =? and t.bgbm = '1' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.maxskssq, t.yxqq) < t.yxqz and #macroparam#

select a.djxh mfdjxh, a.zlbsuuid, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (? is null or a.djxh = ?) and (? is null or b.mfnsrsbh = ?) and (? is null or b.gmfdjxh = ?) and (? is null or b.gmfnsrsbh = ?)

select a.*,b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.nsrzt_dm,b.hy_dm,b.djzclx_dm from sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cz a,dj_nsrxx b where a.zgswskfj_dm = ? and a.djxh = b.djxh(+) and nvl(b.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y' and nvl(a.pkbz,'N')='Y' and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.ZLRQZ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.ZLRQQ <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.ZLRQZ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.ZLRQQ
select t.ssjmxzdl_dm, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.ssjmxzhz_dm from sb_zqjm t where t.djxh = ? and t.pzxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.sybh_1 = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') order by t.lrrq desc
select t.pzssbgdmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.sshxsl pzsl, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm from pz_sspzssbgdmxb t where t.pzssbgduuid = ?
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYZCSGFB2 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select t.pzssbgduuid ypzuuid, g.gztzsuuid gztzsuuid, t.pzssbgdbh ypzbh, g.gztzsbh gztzsbh, t.tbrq ypzrq, t.sqr_dm kjr_dm, g.jsr_dm jsr_dm, t.gdbz yspzgdbz from pz_sspzssbgdzb t, pz_gztzs g where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.pzssbgduuid = g.yspzhm and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz is null and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?
select * from dm0_zdsy_lssj_cwb where year = ? and quarter = ? and djxh = ?

select * from pz_ypr t where t.pzhsjg_dm in (select w.pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly w where w.pzgly_dm = ? and sysdate between w.pzhsjgyxqsrq and w.pzhsjgyxzzrq) and t.djxh = ? and t.yprlx_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq

select t.djxh, t.zlssqjq, t.zlssqjz, t.zlbsxl_dm from sb_yqwbszlqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.sbrq_1 is null and not exists (select 1 from sb_zlbscjb cjb where cjb.djxh = t.djxh and cjb.ssqq >= t.zlssqjq and cjb.ssqz <= t.zlssqjz and (cjb.zfbz_1 = 'N' or cjb.zfbz_1 is null))
select * from PZ_SSPZJHBBHZBZB where pzhzjhuuid=? and xybz!='N' and zfbz_1!='Y'
select a.* from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx a inner join sb_cxs_fcjy b on a.fcjyuuid=b.fcjyuuid where fcjycjxxuuid=? and #macroparam#

select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.skssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
SELECT /*+ordered use_nl(SB ZQ)*/ZQ.* FROM SB_SBXX SB,SB_ZQJM ZQ WHERE SB.SBXXUUID =ZQ.SBXXUUID AND SB.PZXH=? AND (ZQ.TZLX_DM =? or ZQ.TZLX_DM =?)
select t.sbuuid from sb_sbb t where t.djxh=? and rownum=1
select * from Sb_Sds_Fzjgfpb_Fzjg t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT 1 FROM SB_KDQSSFXSKFJB t WHERE t.pzxh=?

select a.sbuuid,a.pzxh,a.yzpzzl_dm,a.nsrsbh,a.lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh =? and b.sybh_1 =? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm =? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') order by a.lrrq desc

select c.gcxmbh from fp_dk_fpkjxx a, fp_dk_sq b, fp_dk_jzyfp c where a.dksquuid = b.dksquuid and b.dksquuid = c.dksquuid and c.gcxmbh in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.kjbz = 'Y'

select ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JSYJ, SL_1, YBTSE, JKQX, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZCLRQ, nssbrq from ZS_YJSF where YZPZXH = ? and SKZL_DM = '10' AND tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and SBSX_DM_1 = '21' and sksx_dm='0301'

select jdxz_dm code, jdxzmc caption from dm_gy_jdxz jd where jd.xybz = 'Y' and jd.yxbz = 'Y' and jd.jdxz_dm in (select zb.jdxz_dm from cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb zb where zb.xzqhsz_dm = ? and zb.gdslx_dm = ? and zb.yxbz = 'Y' and zb.xybz = 'Y')
SELECT HWYSFPUUID, DKSQXMUUID, HWMC, SL, LC, YJ, YFJE, XMMC, JE, SJGSDQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ FROM FP_DK_HWYSZZSFP_XMMX WHERE HWYSFPUUID = ?
select t.* from sb_slxx t where t.sbuuid=?

Select Cldauuid, Cldabh, Djxh, Nsrsbh, Nsrmc, Clsbdh, Nsrsfzjzl_Dm, Zjhm, Hy_Dm, Djzclx_Dm, Lxdh, Yzbm, Dz, Clcp, Clxh, Zypz, Cldw, Zws, Pql, Fdjhm, Clgzdsx_Dm, Cdsx, Gzrq, Ffrq, Mzsbz, Ewtmc, Wszmhm, Jdrq, Pzhm_1, Wspzzl_Dm, Wspzhm, Sjse, Znj, Znjpzhm, Djr_Dm, Djrq, Jdcxszhm, Yzpzxh, Cljdlx_Dm, Cldazt_Dm, Lrr_Dm, Lrrq, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Sjgsdq, Clscqymc, Zfbz_1, Zfr_Dm, Zfrq_1, Cllx_Dm, Cldabh, Cdsx, Fpjgzsbz, Xnyqclx_Dm, Jdczccchgz, Zsjg_Dm, Fpjg From Sb_Cgs_Cldaxx t Where t.Clsbdh = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' Order By t.Lrrq Desc

select 1 from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sbxxuuid = b.sbxxuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and a.syuuid = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
SELECT * FROM SB_CGS_CLDASLFLJL where syjg_dm = ? and jdrq = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or cllb_dm_1 = ?)

select cldauuid, cldabh, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, clsbdh, nsrsfzjzl_dm, zjhm, hy_dm, djzclx_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clcp, clxh, zypz, cldw, zws, pql, fdjhm, clgzdsx_dm, cdsx, gzrq, ffrq, mzsbz, ewtmc, wszmhm, jdrq, pzhm_1, wspzzl_dm, wspzhm, sjse, znj, znjpzhm, djr_dm, djrq, jdcxszhm, yzpzxh, cljdlx_dm, cldazt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, clscqymc, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, sjtb_sj, cllx_dm, cldabh, cdsx, fpjgzsbz, xnyqclx_dm, jdczccchgz, zsjg_dm, fpjg, czmc from sb_cgs_cldaxx t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or t.clsbdh = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or t.wszmhm = ?) and t.cldazt_dm = ? order by t.lrrq desc

select distinct a.swjg_dm, b.swjgmc, b.swjg_dm as code, b.swjgmc as caption from cs_sb_cxs_jdxzswjgdzb a inner join dm_gy_swjg b on a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm where a.jdxz_dm = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y'

select t.fwcqzsh as fwcqzsh, cjb.djxh as zrfdjxh, t.fybh as sybh1, t.tdfwdz syzlwz, t.tdsybh as sybh, t.mj as fwmj, t.htbh, t.htqdrq, t.jyjg as cjjg, t.zlbscjuuid as uuid, t.mfnsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, t.mfmc as zrfnsrmc, t.mfdz as zrfnsrdz, t.mfsfzjlx_dm as zrfnsrzjlxDm, t.mfzjhm as zrfnsrzjhm, t.mflxdh as zrfnsrlxdh, t.gmfdz as csfnsrdz, t.gmfsfzjlx_dm as csfnsrzjlxDm, t.gmfzjhm as csfnsrzjhm, t.gmflxdh as csfnsrlxdh, t.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhDm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm as fwsdswjgDm, t.scqd_fwcb as scfwqdcb, t.fcjyfs_dm as fwjyfsDm, t.tnmj, t.scqd_fwsj as scfwqdsj, t.fclx_dm, t.htje as htje, 'CLF' AS zlfclfbz, cjb.zlbscjuuid as uuid, t.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB t, sb_zlbscjb cjb where cjb.zlbscjuuid = t.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.gmfdjxh = ? union select null as fwcqzsh, c.djxh as zrfdjxh, b.fybh as sybh1, b.tdfwdz syzlwz, null as sybh, b.mj as fwmj, b.htbh, b.htqdsj, b.jyjg as cjjg, b.zlbscjuuid as uuid, a.kfqynsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, a.kfqymc as zrfnsrmc, null as zrfnsrdz, null as zrfnsrzjlxDm, null as zrfnsrzjhm, null as zrfnsrlxdh, b.grzmc as csfnsrdz, b.sfzjzl_dm as csfnsrzjlxDm, b.sfzjhm as csfnsrzjhm, null as csfnsrlxdh, a.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhDm, a.jdxz_dm, a.fwsdswjg_dm as fwsdswjgDm, null as scfwqdcb, b.fcjyfs_dm as fwjyfsDm, b.tnmj, null as scfwqdsj, b.fclx_dm, b.htje as htje, 'ZLF' AS zlfclfbz, c.zlbscjuuid as uuid, b.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb c where b.zlbscjuuid = a.zlbscjuuid and b.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and b.gfzdjxh = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union select t.fwcqzsh fwcqzsh, b.djxh as zrfdjxh, t1.fybh as sybh1, t1.tdfwdz syzlwz, t1.tdsybh as sybh, t1.mj as fwmj, t.htbh, t.htqdsj as htqdrq, t.jyjg as cjjg, t.fcjycjxxuuid as uuid, b.nsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, b.nsrmc as zrfnsrmc, b.dz as zrfnsrdz, b.sfzjzl_dm as zrfnsrzjlxDm, b.sfzjhm as zrfnsrzjhm, b.lxdh as zrfnsrlxdh, a.dz as csfnsrdz, a.sfzjzl_dm as csfnsrzjlxDm, a.sfzjhm as csfnsrzjhm, a.lxdh as csfnsrlxdh, t1.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhDm, t1.jdxz_dm, t1.fwsdswjg_dm as fwsdswjgDm, b.scqd_fwcb as scfwqdcb, t.qsqszylb_dm as fwjyfsDm, t1.tnmj, b.scqd_fwsj as scfwqdsj, t.qsqszyyt_dm as fclx_dm, t.htje as htje, decode(t.zlfclfbz, '1', 'ZLF', '2', 'CLF') AS zlfclfbz, t.fcjycjxxuuid as uuid, t.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx t, sb_cxs_fyjbxx t1, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf a, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf b where t.fcjycjxxuuid = a.fcjycjxxuuid and t.fcjycjxxuuid = b.fcjycjxxuuid(+) and a.zrfcsfbz = '1' and b.zrfcsfbz = '0' and t.fyjbxxuuid = t1.fyjbxxuuid and b.zcqrbz = 'Y' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ?
select nsrsbh from dj_nsrxx where djxh=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPR WHERE SWRY_DM = ? AND YPRLX_DM = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'

select t1.PZZL_DM, t1.PZZLMC, t1.PZZL_DM, t1.PZZLMC, t1.whpbz, t1.phcd, t1.xjpzbz, t2.ypruuid, t2.pzhsjg_dm from pz_yprpzhdxxb t, dm_pz_pzzl t1, pz_ypr t2 where t.ypruuid = t2.ypruuid and t2.yxbz='Y' and t.pzzl_dm = t1.pzzl_dm and t1.xybz = 'Y' and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t2.swry_dm = ? #macroparam#
Select t.* From SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_ZCSSTZFB2 t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

Select T2.* From Sb_Sbb T1, Sb_Sds_Fzjgfpb_Zjg T2 Where T1.Sbuuid = T2.Sbuuid And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq <= ? And T1.Skssqz >= ? And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm in(#macroparam#) And T1.Sbsx_Dm_1 = ? And T1.Zfbz_1 = ? Order By T1.Lrrq Desc
SELECT A.PZHSJG_DM CODE, A.SJHSJG_DM PCODE, B.SWJGMC CAPTION FROM PZ_PZGLY A, DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE A.PZHSJG_DM = B.SWJG_DM START WITH A.PZHSJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.PZHSJG_DM = A.SJHSJG_DM
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Mbkstz t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = ? And t.Nd In (#macroparam#) Order By t.Nd Asc
UPDATE SB_SYSBMXBG SET ZFBZ_1 = 'Y', ZFRQ_1 = ?,ZFR_DM = ?,XGRQ=SYSDATE WHERE (ZFBZ_1 <> 'Y' OR ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND PZXH = ?

SELECT T.JYPFXSUUID, T.LCSLID, T.TBSWJG_DM, T.DJXH, T.SSQQ, T.SSQZ, T.TBRQ, T.JYTBZSPTM, T.JYPHGG, T.JYLB_DM_1, T.JYLX_DM_1, T.XSJG, T.XSSL, T.XSE, T.BZ, T.HDBZ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ FROM SB_XFS_JYBFQYYFXSMXHZB T WHERE TRIM(T.LCSLID) = ?
SELECT ZB.SSPZTYZFBH,ZB.BBDW_DM,ZB.TBRQ,ZB.ZSR_DM,ZB.ZSRQ_3 FROM PZ_SSPZTYZFZB ZB WHERE zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND trunc(ZB.TBRQ) >=? AND trunc(ZB.TBRQ)<=? #macroparam#

SELECT SUM(SL) SL FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) SL FROM SB_HBS_NSSBB_A A WHERE A.SYBH_1 = ? AND (1 = #MACROPARAM# OR A.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND A.ZFBZ_1 = ? UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) SL FROM SB_HBS_NSSBB_B B WHERE B.SYBH_1 = ? AND (1 = #MACROPARAM# OR B.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND A.ZFBZ_1 = ?)

SELECT T.PZZL_DM pcode, T.PZZG_DM code, T.PZZG caption FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB T WHERE T.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND T.PZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND T.YXQSRQ <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND T.YXZZRQ > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')

select b.pzxh from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610783','BDA0610784') and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.djxh = ? and b.sybh_1=?
SELECT t.skssqq,t.skssqz FROM SB_SBB t WHERE t.DJXH = ? AND t.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.skssqz>=? and t.skssqq<=?

select a.sbuuid, c.fybh, round(sum(a.jsyj),2) as sbzjsr, a.sl_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, round(sum(a.ynse), 2) ynse, round(sum(a.jmse), 2) jmse, round(sum(a.yjse), 2) yjse, round(sum(a.ybtse), 2) ybtse from sb_cxs_fcsyjskxx a inner join sb_cxs_czjzsymxb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb c on a.fyxxuuid = c.fyxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcssysyxx d on a.sbuuid = d.sbuuid and c.fyxxuuid = d.fyxxuuid and b.czsyuuid = d.ysuuid and a.ysuuid=d.ysuuid and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' where a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.jzlx = '2' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and a.djxh = ? and to_char(a.skssqq, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(a.skssqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.skssqq=d.skssqq and a.skssqz=d.skssqz and #macroparam# group by a.sbuuid, c.fybh, a.sl_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz

Select t.* From Sb_Sbxx t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq >= ? And t.Skssqz <= ? And t.Sbsx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And t.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')
SELECT DISTINCT kc.pzzg_dm code, kc.PZZL_DM pcode, zg.PZZG caption FROM pz_jc kc, cs_pz_pzzgb zg WHERE kc.PZZL_DM = zg.PZZL_DM AND KC.PZZG_DM=ZG.PZZG_DM

SELECT MAX(JJRQSRQ) + 1 AS JJRQSRQ FROM CS_GY_JJR WHERE SWJG_DM in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) AND XYBZ = 'Y' START WITH JJRQSRQ = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR JJRZZRQ = JJRZZRQ - 1

SELECT T.PZSYQKUUID AS UUID, T.PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK T, PZ_YPR W WHERE T.SDDWDJXH = W.DJXH AND W.YPRUUID = ? AND W.YPRLX_DM IN ('31', '20') AND T.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T.PZCXSYBJ IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT T1.PZSYQKUUID AS UUID, T1.PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK T1, PZ_YPR W1 WHERE T1.KPR_DM = W1.SWRY_DM AND W1.YPRUUID = ? AND W1.YPRLX_DM = '12' AND T1.SDDWDJXH IS NULL AND T1.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T1.PZCXSYBJ IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT T2.YHPSYQKUUID AS UUID, NULL AS PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP T2, PZ_YPR W2 WHERE T2.SDDWDJXH = W2.DJXH AND W2.YPRUUID = ? AND W2.YPRLX_DM IN ('31', '20') AND T2.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T2.ZFR_DM IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT T3.YHPSYQKUUID AS UUID, NULL AS PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP T3, PZ_YPR W3 WHERE T3.KPR_DM = W3.SWRY_DM AND W3.YPRUUID = ? AND W3.YPRLX_DM = '12' AND T3.SDDWDJXH IS NULL AND T3.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T3.ZFR_DM IS NULL

select sum(fb1.ynse) se from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr, sb_sbb sbb, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_hztycdd_xx fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz >= ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid = fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq >= ? and sbb.skssqz <= ?

Select Distinct b.Sbuuid, b.Djxh, b.Sbsx_Dm_1 As Sblx_Dm, b.Pzxh, b.Yzpzzl_Dm, b.Zsxm_Dm, b.Sbfs_Dm, b.Nssbrq As Sbrq1, b.Skssqq, b.Skssqz, b.Ybtse, b.Sjgsdq From Sb_Sbxx b Where b.Djxh = ? And b.Skssqq >= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And b.skssqz <= trunc(add_months( To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),11),'YYYY')-1 And b.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And b.Zsxm_Dm = ? And b.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And b.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')
select a.pzzl_dm , a.pzzlmc,a.pzzl_dm code, a.pzzlmc caption, b.xjpzbz, b.phcd, b.whpbz from cs_pz_swjgdypzzl a, dm_pz_pzzl b where a.pzzl_dm = b.pzzl_dm and a.swjg_dm like ? and b.xjpzbz = ?

select a.* from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a where a.syuuid =? and yxbz='Y' and bgbm in ('1','2') and a.yxqz = (select max(b.yxqz) from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx b where b.yxbz = 'Y' and bgbm in ('1','2') and b.syuuid = ?)

select t.uuid ,t.shyj,t.shrq,t.shyj,t.shyjsm,t.zrfdcsrsds,t.kcxmjesds,t.zzesds,t.zzeykcxmjezbsds, t.syslsds,t.sskcxssds,t.yjtdzzssesds ,t.ybttdzzssesds,t.ybtskblqx,t.shswjg,t.shr,t.shswjgmc from sb_tdzzsqs_fb_tdzzsqssbshb t where uuid=?
