SELECT T.YZDWXH, T.YZDWLX_DM, T.YZDWMC, T.YXQSRQ YXQQ, T.YXZZRQ YXQZ, T.SWJG_DM FROM CS_PZ_YZDWXX T WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ

select t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.sbqx, t.zsdlfs_dm, case when t.nssbrq is not null then t.nssbrq else (select min(a.nssbrq) from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm = t.zgswskfj_dm and (a.zsxm_dm in ('10101', '30217') or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or a.sbsx_dm_1 is null) and a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')) end nssbrq from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.nd = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') and t.yf = ?
update sb_sbfpkqcfkb t set t.kkzt_dm=?, t.kkfh_dm=?, t.xgrq=sysdate where t.wbuuid=?
Select pzxh,bdbz from SB_SBBD_YYSPBBD where djxh=? and skssqq=? and skssqz=? And YXBZ=? and rowNum=1

SELECT T.PZLFDUUID as uuid, T.SSPZLFDBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB T WHERE (T.Lqdwr= ? OR T.Lqdwr in (SELECT W.YPRUUID FROM PZ_YPR W WHERE W.PZHSJG_DM =?)) AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.SSPZLFDBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPZLFDBH

select a.pzxh from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz < ? and a.skssqq >= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610334' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' order by a.skssqz desc
select t.* from sb_fxmtysb_grczfc_dskqxx t where t.djxh=? #macroparam#
select uuid from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb t where t.csfdjxh=? and t.tdsybh=? and t.cjbz='N'

select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.djxh=? and a.yzpzzl_dm=? and b.skssqq=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and b.skssqz=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select s.sl_1 xfssysl, f.lcslid from SB_XFS_JYBFQYYFXSMXHZB f, sb_sbxx s where f.lcslid = s.sbuuid and f.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and f.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT T.SSPKJBDUUID as uuid ,T.SSPKJBDBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.SHBZ = 'Y' AND T.Sbbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1='N' AND T.SSPKJBDBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPKJBDBH
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.YPRUUID = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select b.* from sb_zzs_xgm_fb_dlqyjxhxx b where b.sbuuid = ?
select * from FP_DCXCYCLXXB where lyuuid = ?
select a.scqy, a.jyphgg, a.jylb_dm_1, a.jytbzsptm, a.dbjg, a.pfjg, a.jsjg from SB_ZLBS_XPHXGGJYHZ a,SB_ZLBSCJB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and b.djxh = ?

WITH B AS (SELECT T1.SFMXUUID, NVL(SUM(T1.BCKCSE), 0) BCKCSE FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX T1 INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ C ON T1.DKSQUUID = C.DKSQUUID WHERE c.DJXH = ? AND c.dkfplb_dm=? AND T1.ZFBZ_1 <> 'Y' GROUP BY T1.SFMXUUID) SELECT T.SFMXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.SKSSQQ, T.SKSSQZ, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSZM_DM, T.SRZE, T.YXKCJE, T.JSFYJ, T.SFL, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.YJSFE, T.JMSFE, (NVL(T.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)- NVL(T.JMSFE, 0)-NVL(T.NSQNYJSE, 0)) YBSFE, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JYXM_DM, A.HY_DM, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.SQDHM FROM FP_DK_SFMX T INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ A ON T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID LEFT JOIN B ON T.SFMXUUID = B.SFMXUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.DKFPLB_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.KJBZ = 'N' AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (NVL(T.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)- NVL(T.JMSFE, 0)-NVL(T.NSQNYJSE, 0)) > 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.DJXH = A.DJXH AND X.DKFPLB_DM = A.DKFPLB_DM AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID) ORDER BY DKSQUUID
select sum(b.se) se from sb_sbb a,sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.yzpzzl_dm=? and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and b.sybh_1=? and a.djxh=? and b.zsxm_dm like ?
SELECT UUID, NSRSBH, SWRY_DM, DJXH, SWJG_DM, XYBZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ FROM FP_DKFP_TDZSBM T WHERE T.SWRY_DM = ? AND T.XYBZ = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF T WHERE T.YZPZXH=? AND (T.TZLX_DM=? OR T.TZLX_DM=?) and t.skzl_dm in('10','90')
select a.skssqq,a.skssqz,a.sbrq_1,a.zgswskfj_dm,a.slr_dm,b.sybh_1 from sb_sbb a,sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and a.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_qyndglbg_bgqyxxb_qybmxx where zbuuid = ?

select b.jshj from sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb1_bqxsqkmx b where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.ewbhxh = 5 and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11'
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_QYXTZB_GDFPQK where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?
Select * From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb5_Ssyh t Where t.Sbuuid = ? And t.Pzxh = ?

SELECT FPZL_DM, FP_DM, FPHM AS FPQSHM, FPHM AS FPZZHM, 1 FS, SUM(NVL(B.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.JMSFE, 0) - NVL(B.NSQNYJSE, 0)) AS SE FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX A INNER JOIN FP_DK_SFMX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' GROUP BY FPZL_DM, FP_DM, FPHM
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_yjd_btzwgqyxx t Where t.pzxh=? And (1=? or t.sbuuid=?) and (1=? or t.mxxh=?) AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jrqyzcmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

SELECT YPR.YPRUUID CODE, YPR.YPRMC CAPTION FROM PZ_YPR YPR,dm_qx_swrysf a WHERE YPR.SWRY_DM = ? AND YPR.YPRLX_DM = ? AND YPR.PZHSJG_DM = A.SFSWJG_DM AND A.SWRYSF_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN YPR.YXQSRQ AND YPR.YXZZRQ
select * from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.shbz='N' and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.cxbz='N' and t.jbjxdwr=?
select a.uuid,b.xmbh from sb_tdzzsqshdb_swsxtzs a ,sb_tdzzsqshdb b where a.ywzjuuid=b.uuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.uuid=?

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zgswskfj_dm from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.zsdlfs_dm = ? and (t.sjlybz != '2' or t.sjlybz is null) and t.skssqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'mm'), -1) and t.nssbrq is null and (1 = ? or (t.zsxm_dm != '10104' or (to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') != '01' or to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') != '12'))) and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and (a.zsxm_dm in ('10101','30217') or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (t.zspm_dm = '101060200' or t.zsxm_dm != '10106') and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610688') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5'))
SELECT A.PZHSJG_DM, A.SJHSJG_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY A START WITH A.PZHSJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.PZHSJG_DM = A.SJHSJG_DM AND A.SJHSJG_DM IS NOT NULL

select t.pzlfduuid ypzuuid, g.gztzsuuid gztzsuuid, t.sspzlfdbh ypzbh, g.gztzsbh gztzsbh, t.ffrq ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjrDm, g.jsr_dm jsrDm, t.gdbz yspzgdbz from PZ_SSPZLFDZB t, pz_gztzs g where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.pzlfduuid = g.yspzhm and t.sspzlfdbh = g.yspzbh_1 and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz is null and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_YBQYSRMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?

select min(bazdjsjg) as zxzdjsjg from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where cjhdbz = 'N' and (#macroparam#)/*zgswjg_dm in ('')*/ and clcp IN (#macroparam#) and clxh IN (#macroparam#) and zypz IN (#macroparam#) and balsxlh = ?

select t.gztzsuuid pzuuid,t.gztzsbh pzbh,t.yspzbh_1,t.fqpzdw_dm,t.jspzdw_dm,t.jsr_dm,t.pzyspz_dm,t.rq from pz_gztzs t where (1 = ? or fqpzdw_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or jspzdw_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or gztzsbh = ?) and tybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' and trunc(rq) between ? and ? order by t.gztzsbh Asc

select c.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c inner join sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a on c.ysuuid = a.ysuuid inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b on a.syuuid = b.syuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ? and #macroparam#
select max(skssqz) skssqz from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx where zfbz_1='N' and syuuid=?

with kk as (select DISTINCT b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.sbuuid, b.pzxh from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, sb_sbb b where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.gzlx_dm_1 in (?, ?) and b.sbrq_1 between ? and ? AND nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.yxbz = ? AND a.jknd = ? and a.djxh = ?) select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, ynse bq140 from kk a, sb_cxs_yjskxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid
SELECT XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, KKCSRE, SQKPJE, JSXM, JZUUID, JZXMUUID FROM FP_DK_JZYFP_GCXM WHERE JZUUID = ?

update sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a set a.qh = (select qh from (select * from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and qh is not null) b where a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid) where zlbscjuuid in (select zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and qh is not null)

select b.*, a.nd, a.yf,a.cjr_dm,a.cjswjg_dm,a.cjrq_1,a.gccbz from sb_cgs_cljgxxcjb a, sb_cgs_cljgxxcjmxb b where a.cjuuid = b.cjuuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.cjglhj_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.cjhdbz = 'N'
select sbbdsx_dm code ,sbbdsxmc caption from DM_SB_SBBDSX where xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
Select t.* from SB_SDS_JMQYQS t Where t.sbuuid=?

select a.sbuuid,a.skssqq,a.skssqz from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz <= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' order by a.skssqz desc

select t2.ewbhxh,t2.bqje from SB_CWBB_SYYH_LRB t2 where t2.zlbscjuuid in (select s.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb s where s.djxh=? and s.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1 = 'N'))
delete from dm0_zdsy_dqsj_cwb where QUARTER =? and year=? and djxh=?

select b.uuid, b.pzxh, b.sbuuid, b.ewbhxh, b.zsxm_dm, b.zspm_dm, b.bqxssl, b.yzxssl, b.ckmz_xssl, b.sqwksl, b.bqkkcsl, b.jksl, b.gngjsl, b.wtjg_shsl, b.yzjjcp_kdthsl, b.bqyzsl, b.jzxqkcsl, b.zsbz_1, b.bqyzjjje, b.bqjzje, b.yyjjje, b.sqjzjje, b.bqybjje, b.bqjzxqjje, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.xgr_dm, b.xgrq, b.sjgsdq from sb_sbb t, SB_FQDQDZCPCLJJ b where t.djxh = ? and t.pzxh = b.pzxh AND T.YZPZZL_DM = 'BDA0610549' and t.skssqq>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.skssqz<=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.zfbz_1='N'
select t.pzglyuuid, t.pzhsjg_dm, t.pzgly_dm, t.jgjc_dm from pz_pzgly t where t.pzhsjg_dm = ? and sysdate between t.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t.pzhsjgyxzzrq

SELECT CASE WHEN A.ZFBZ_1 = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END QSJL FROM (SELECT T.ZFBZ_1, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY T.LRRQ DESC) XH FROM SB_SBB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.Sbrq_1 >= ? AND T.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND T.YZPZZL_DM = 'BDA0610058') A WHERE A.XH = 1

SELECT SUM(AA.YBTSE) as se FROM (SELECT A.YBTSE, A.DJXH, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, C.RKRQ, A.ZSXM_DM, A.SBSX_DM_1, A.TZLX_DM, A.SKZL_DM, A.SKSX_DM FROM ZS_YJSF A, ZS_WSZ B, ZS_JKS C WHERE A.ZSUUID = B.ZSUUID AND B.HZSPUUID = C.SPUUID AND A.DJXH = B.DJXH AND A.ZSDLFS_DM = '0' UNION ALL SELECT A.YBTSE, A.DJXH, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, C.RKRQ, A.ZSXM_DM, A.SBSX_DM_1, A.TZLX_DM, A.SKZL_DM, A.SKSX_DM FROM ZS_YJSF A, ZS_JKS C WHERE A.ZSUUID = C.ZSUUID AND A.DJXH = C.DJXH AND A.ZSDLFS_DM = '0') AA WHERE AA.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND AA.DJXH = ? AND AA.RKRQ >= ? AND AA.RKRQ <= ? AND AA.SKSSQQ <= ? AND AA.SBSX_DM_1 = '11' AND AA.SKSX_DM = '0101' AND AA.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND AA.SKZL_DM != 20

Select Nvl(Sum(t.Ybtse), 0) As Sqyjje From Sb_Sbxx t Where t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq >= ? And t.Skssqz <= ? And t.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) and t.zsxm_dm='10104' AND T.ybtse>1
select sum(t.ynse) ynse, sum(t.jsyj) jsyj from sb_sbxx t where t.sbuuid=? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.zspm_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select swry_dm,swryxm from dm_Gy_swry where swjg_Dm = ? and YXBZ = 'Y'

select t.dksquuid, t.djxh, t.dkfplb_dm, t.kpje, t.lcslid, t.sqrxm, t.sqrq, t.slr_dm, t.slrq, t.zfbz_1, t.slswjg_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zrrbz, t.kjbz, t.pzxh, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sqdhm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.hy_dm, t.dksqje, t.ybsfe, t.jmsbz, t.jmslx_dm, t.kplx_dm, t.jmyy, t.zsbz from fp_dk_sq t where t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sqrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sqrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select * from SB_XFS_FB_JYPFQYYFXSMX t1, SB_SBB t2 where t1.sbuuid = t2.sbuuid and t1.phgg = ? and t2.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT T.LSMXID,(SUM(S.YNSE)-SUM(S.JMSE)) YBTSE,SUM(S.JSYJ) JSYJ,SUM(S.YSX) YSX FROM SB_LS_SBXX T,SB_SBXX S WHERE T.DJXH=S.DJXH AND T.SSQQ=S.SKSSQQ AND T.SSQZ=S.SKSSQZ AND T.ZSXM_DM=S.ZSXM_DM AND (1=? or T.RDZSUUID = S.RDPZUUID) AND (S.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR S.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND S.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1','4','5') AND S.ZSDLFS_DM='0' AND S.YZPZZL_DM NOT IN('BDA0610119','BDA0610865') AND T.HHLJID=? AND (1=? OR S.SJGSDQ LIKE ?) GROUP BY T.LSMXID

select b.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb a, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx b, sb_zlbscjb c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zlfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and (c.djxh, a.kfqynsrsbh, a.kfbdcxmbh, b.gfzdjxh, b.fybh) in (select c.djxh, b.kfqynsrsbh, b.kfbdcxmbh, a.gfzdjxh, a.fybh from sb_zlf_zb a, sb_zlf b, sb_sbb c where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and a.pzxh = c.pzxh and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.pzxh = ?)

select a.*,b.csfnsrsbh,b.csf_dwhgrmc,b.tdzlwz,b.tdmj,b.jyjg,b.tdsdswjg_dm from sb_zlbscjb a,sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b where nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid=b.zlbscjuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.ssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ssqz = to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.bszl_dm = ?
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb3_gx t where t.sbuuid = ?
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.nssbrq is not null and t.sjlybz = '2'
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb2_Sydw t Where t.sbuuid=?
UPDATE zdsy_jk_qythqc SET sfjs='Y' WHERE zlbscjuuid IN (#macroparam#)

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '6' zt_bz, case when ewbhxh = '1' then bns end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then bns when ewbhxh = '6' then -1*bns end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then bns end lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then bns end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then bns when ewbhxh = '12' then -1*bns end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then bns end lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then bns end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then bns end lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '19' then bns when ewbhxh = '16' then -1*bns end lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then bns when （ewbhxh = '25' or ewbhxh = '24' or ewbhxh = '23'） then -1*bns end lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '34' then bns end lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ 0 lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '27' then bns end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '28' then bns end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then bns end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then bns end lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then bns end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '35' then bns end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then bns end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '39' then bns end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, SB_CWBB_DBQYKJHSBF_LRB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid

select t.uuid ,t.shyj,t.shrq,t.shyj,t.shyjsm,t.zrfdcsrsds,t.kcxmjesds,t.zzesds,t.zzeykcxmjezbsds, t.syslsds,t.sskcxssds,t.yjtdzzssesds ,t.ybttdzzssesds,t.ybtskblqx,t.shswjg,t.shr,t.shswjgmc from sb_tdzzsqs_fb_tdzzsqssbshb t where t.lcslid=?
delete from dm0_zdsy_dqsj_ssb where year=? and month=? and djxh=?
select t.* from PZ_SSPZJXBMX t where t.sspzjxbuuid = ?
select t.yxqq, t.djxh from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = t.djxh and t.nsrzglx_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.zfbz_1 = ?

select a.djxh, a.rdpzuuid, a.hy_dm, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.zszm_dm, a.yzpzzl_dm, to_date(to_char(a.skssqq, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as skssqq, to_date(to_char(a.skssqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as skssqz, a.sl_1, sum(a.ybtse) as ybtse, sum(a.jsyj) as jsyj, sum(a.jmse) as jmse, sum(a.ynse) as ynse, sum(a.ysx) as ysx, sum(a.yjse) as yjse from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') =? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in(#macroparam#) and a.yzpzzl_dm <> ? group by a.djxh, a.rdpzuuid, a.hy_dm, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.zszm_dm, a.yzpzzl_dm, to_date(to_char(a.skssqq, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(to_char(a.skssqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), a.sl_1

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '8' zt_bz, /*资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then ncye_zc end zcnc1, /* 一、资产总计*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then qmye_zc end zcqm1, /* 一、资产总计*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then ncye_zc end zcnc2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then qmye_zc end zcqm2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then ncye_zc end zcnc3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then qmye_zc end zcqm3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then ncye_zc end zcnc4, /*交易性金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then qmye_zc end zcqm4, /*交易性金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then ncye_zc end zcnc5, /* 应收票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then qmye_zc end zcqm5, /* 应收票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then ncye_zc end zcnc6, /* 应收帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then qmye_zc end zcqm6, /* 应收帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then ncye_zc end zcnc7, /* 预付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then qmye_zc end zcqm7, /* 预付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then ncye_zc end zcnc8, /* 应收利息*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then qmye_zc end zcqm8, /* 应收利息*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then ncye_zc end zcnc9, /* 其他应收款*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then qmye_zc end zcqm9, /* 其他应收款*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then ncye_zc end zcnc10, /* 存 货*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then qmye_zc end zcqm10, /* 存 货*/ 0 zcnc11, /* 其中：原材料*/ 0 zcqm11, /* 其中：原材料*/ 0 zcnc12, /* 库存商品*/ 0 zcqm12, /* 库存商品*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then ncye_zc end zcnc13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then qmye_zc end zcqm13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then ncye_zc end zcnc14, /* 其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then qmye_zc end zcqm14, /* 其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then ncye_zc end zcnc15, /* 投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then qmye_zc end zcqm15, /* 投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then ncye_zc end zcnc16, /* 长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then qmye_zc end zcqm16, /* 长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '19' then ncye_zc end zcnc17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '19' then qmye_zc end zcqm17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then ncye_zc end zcnc18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then qmye_zc end zcqm18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then ncye_zc end zcnc19, /*无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then qmye_zc end zcqm19, /*无形资产*/ /*权益*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then ncye_qy end zcnc20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then qmye_qy end zcqm20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then ncye_qy end zcnc21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then qmye_qy end zcqm21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then ncye_qy end zcnc22, /* 其中:短期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then qmye_qy end zcqm22, /* 其中:短期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then ncye_qy end zcnc23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then qmye_qy end zcqm23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then ncye_qy end zcnc24, /* 应付票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then qmye_qy end zcqm24, /* 应付票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then ncye_qy end zcnc25, /* 应付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then qmye_qy end zcqm25, /* 应付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then ncye_qy end zcnc26, /* 预收账款*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then qmye_qy end zcqm26, /* 预收账款*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then ncye_qy end zcnc27, /* 其他应付款*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then qmye_qy end zcqm27, /* 其他应付款*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then ncye_qy end zcnc28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then qmye_qy end zcqm28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then ncye_qy end zcnc29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then qmye_qy end zcqm29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then ncye_qy end zcnc30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then qmye_qy end zcqm30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then ncye_qy end zcnc31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then qmye_qy end zcqm31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then ncye_qy end zcnc32, /* 资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then qmye_qy end zcqm32, /* 资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then ncye_qy end zcnc33, /* 未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then qmye_qy end zcqm33, /* 未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '28' then ncye_qy end zcnc34, /* 盈余公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '28' then qmye_qy end zcqm34 /* 盈余公积*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_qykjzzybqy_zcfzb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid

select distinct skssqq, skssqz from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid=b.fyxxuuid where a.jzlx=? and a.djxh=? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and #macroparam# order by skssqq desc
select * from SB_ZSS_NCPJXKCSHDB t where t.djxh=? and t.hdqxq<=? and t.hdqxz>=? and t.zfbz_1='N'
select * from pz_zwcs where pzdw_dm = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'
select xybz from cs_sb_skskjsyqk where djxh=? and ywbz=? and xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'

select * from pz_sspzgdzb t where t.bbdw_dm = ? and t.zfr_dm is null and t.zfrq_1 is null and t.bbrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') order by t.bbrq desc
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb11_Cqgq t Where t.sbuuid=?

select t.kjywrmc as zwxm, t.kjywrywmc as ywxm, t.zqjmgnsrzwmc, t.zqjmgnsrywmc， t.fjmqygjdq_dm as gjdq, t.fjmqyzqjmgzwdz as qjmgdzzw, t.fjmqyzqjmgywdz as qjmgdzyw, t.hthxymc , t.htbh, t.htqyrq as htzxqssj, t.htyxqx as htzxzzrq, t.htje from sb_fjmhtba_sdsdj t, sb_sbb b where t.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and t.kjywrsbh = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM PZ_YPR A WHERE A.SWRY_DM = ? AND A.YPRLX_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.YXQSRQ AND A.YXZZRQ

select sum(fb1.jxse)+sum(fb1.je) jse from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr,sb_sbb sbb ,sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_dxqy_qdjx fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz > = ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid=fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq <= ? and sbb.skssqz >= ?

WITH B AS (SELECT T1.SFMXUUID, NVL(SUM(T1.BCKCSE), 0) BCKCSE FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX T1 INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ C ON T1.DKSQUUID = C.DKSQUUID WHERE c.DJXH = ? AND c.dkfplb_dm=? AND T1.ZFBZ_1 <> 'Y' GROUP BY T1.SFMXUUID) SELECT T.SFMXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.SKSSQQ, T.SKSSQZ, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSZM_DM, T.SRZE, T.YXKCJE, T.JSFYJ, T.SFL, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.YJSFE, T.JMSFE, (NVL(T.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)- NVL(T.JMSFE, 0)-NVL(T.NSQNYJSE, 0)) YBSFE, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JYXM_DM, A.HY_DM, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.SQDHM FROM FP_DK_SFMX T INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ A ON T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID LEFT JOIN B ON T.SFMXUUID = B.SFMXUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.DKFPLB_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.KJBZ = 'N' AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (NVL(T.YNSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)- NVL(T.JMSFE, 0)-NVL(T.NSQNYJSE, 0)) > 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.DJXH = A.DJXH AND X.DKFPLB_DM = A.DKFPLB_DM AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID) ORDER BY dksquuid

select pzxh from sb_sbxx a where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1 = ? and a.yzpzzl_Dm not in (#macroparam#) and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sybh_1 is null

select * from PZ_SSPZJHBBHZBZB a where #macroparam# and a.pzjhzl_dm = ? and a.jhnyq = ? and a.jhnyz = ? and (1=? or sbbz = ?) and (1=? or hzbz_1 = ?) and (1=? or jhlx_dm = ?) and (1=? or sjhzjhuuid = ?) and #macroparam# and a.xybz != 'N' and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y'
select y.* from sb_yqwsbqc y, sb_ls_sbxx l where y.djxh = l.djxh and y.sbrq_1 is null and l.hhljid = ?

select c.* from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c inner join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb a on c.ysuuid = a.cjsyuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ? and #macroparam#
select sum(t.ybtse) as ybtse from zs_yjsf t where yzpzxh=? and t.djxh =? and t.skcllx_dm=0 and t.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and t.czlx_dm in ('10','66','92')
SELECT BZ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, JE, DJ, HLSL, DWSL_DM, GGXH, HWLWMC, TYFPUUID, TYFPHLUUID FROM FP_DK_TYJDFP_HLMX WHERE TYFPUUID = ?
select a.jytbzsptm, a.jyphgg, a.jylb_dm_1, a.jylx_dm_1, a.xssl, a.xse, a.pfhjxsjg, a.sypfmll, a.xfssysl, a.hzdxfsjsjg from SB_XFSJG_JYXFSJSJGHDB a where a.djxh = ?
select b.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb5_bdcfqdkb b where b.sbuuid=?
select t.pzzg_dm as code, t.pzzg as caption, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzzg, t.gdsbz, t.pzzl_dm from cs_pz_pzzgb t where t.sjgsdq like ? and pzzl_dm=?
select djxh,ssny,syuuid,sum(jsyj) jsyj,sum(jmse) jmse,sum(ybtse) ybtsehj from sb_cxs_yjskxx a where djxh=? and a.yxbz='Y' and #macroparam# group by djxh ,syuuid,ssny
select a.* from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' #macroparam#

select bazdjsjg as zdjsjg from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where zfbz_1 = 'N' and cjhdbz = 'N' and clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_Dm = ?) and zgswjg_dm = ?
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_bgrczwgqygfqk t Where t.pzxh=? And (1=? or t.sbuuid=?) and (1=? or t.mxxh=?) AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'
select count(1) kjnum from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg where sbpch=? and nvl(hzbz_1,'N')='N'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zgxcnstzmxb t where t.djxh=? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

update sb_cxs_fcjycjxx t set (t.zlfclfbz, t.jyjg, t.htbh, t.htje, t.htqdsj, t.qsqszydx_dm, t.qsqszyyt_dm, t.fcjyfs_dm, t.kfbdcxmbh, t.sfptzfbz, t.bdcxmmc, t.fwcqzsh, t.tdsyzbh, t.bz, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.pgqs_jyjg, t.wbmjyjg, t.tdzzs_kccb, t.grsds_kchlfy, t.dqyskje, t.dqysskssyf, t.dj, t.nextfcjycjxxuuid, t.ewbhxh, t.fwuuid, t.qsqszylb_dm, t.grzffcslx_dm) = (select l.zlfclfbz, l.jyjg, l.htbh, l.htje, l.htqdsj, l.qsqszydx_dm, l.qsqszyyt_dm, l.fcjyfs_dm, l.kfbdcxmbh, l.sfptzfbz, l.bdcxmmc, l.fwcqzsh, l.tdsyzbh, l.bz, l.xgr_dm, sysdate as xgrq, l.pgqs_jyjg, l.wbmjyjg, l.tdzzs_kccb, l.grsds_kchlfy, l.dqyskje, l.dqysskssyf, l.dj, l.nextfcjycjxxuuid, l.ewbhxh, l.fwuuid, l.qsqszylb_dm, l.grzffcslx_dm from sb_ls_fcjyxx l where l.fcjycjxxuuid = t.fcjycjxxuuid and l.fyjbxxuuid = ?) where t.fcjycjxxuuid in (select fcjycjxxuuid from sb_ls_fcjyxx where fyjbxxuuid = ?) and t.ysbbz = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select b.ypxh,b.qmkc_zgsl as qckczgsl,b.qmkc_dcsl as qckcdcsl,b.qmkc_zgje as qckczgje,b.qmkc_dcje as qckcdcje from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_cpygxcqk b where b.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_kqsyfyj where sbuuid=?
select * from dm_kj_jylx t where t.jylx_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)

select a.djxh zrfdjxh,b.zrfsbbz zrfsbbz_1, b.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.csfdjxh = ? and b.tdsybh = ? and a.djxh = ? and (b.zrfsbbz = 'Y' or b.csfsbbz = 'Y')
select t.* from WBJH_GD_WJJ_JGTJJXXB t where t.nssbrq>=sysdate-1 and t.zgswskfj_dm like ?
select * from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx where ysuuid=? and zfbz_1='N'
select bz_1 from sb_tdzzssb_nsrxx where sbuuid=?

select jjrqsrq as jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq as jjrzzrq, rowid from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <= ? and jjrzzrq >= ? and yyyf = ? and jjrbz = ?
select * from sb_qyndglbg_bgqyxxb_jbxx where uuid = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select t.uuid as shxxuuid, t.zbuuid, t.zrfdcsrsdsptzz, t.zrfdcsrsdsfptzz, t.zrfdcsrsdsqtlxfc, t.kcxmjesdsptzz, t.kcxmjesdsfptzz, t.kcxmjesdsqtlxfc, t.zzesdsptzz, t.zzesdsfptzz, t.zzesdsqtlxfc, t.zzeykcxmjezbsdsptzz, t.zzeykcxmjezbsdsfptzz, t.zzeykcxmjezbsdsqtlxfc, t.syslsdsptzz, t.syslsdsfptzz, t.syslsdsqtlxfc, t.sskcxssdsptzz, t.sskcxssdsfptzz, t.sskcxssdsqtlxfc, t.yjtdzzssesdsptzz, t.yjtdzzssesdsfptzz, t.yjtdzzssesdsqtlxfc, t.ybttdzzssesdsptzz, t.ybttdzzssesdsfptzz, t.ybttdzzssesdsqtlxfc from sb_tdzzsqssh_mx t where t.zbuuid=?

Select T1.Djxh, T1.Yxqq, T1.Yxqz, T1.Tsnsrlx_Dm, T1.Swjg_Dm, T2.Csbm, T2.Csz From Sb_Cs_Tsnsrwhb T1, Sb_Cs_Tsnsrgzb T2 Where T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Tsnsrlx_Dm = ? And T1.Yxqq <= ? And T1.Yxqz >= ? And T1.Yxbz = 'Y' And T2.Yxbz = 'Y' And T1.Tsywgluuid = T2.Tsywgluuid

select max(syts) as syts from cs_gy_zqtz where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and (1 = ? or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and yxqsrq <= ? and yxzzrq >= ?

SELECT ZZSFPUUID, GHFDJXH, DKSQUUID, GHFKHYH_DM, GHFYHZH, GHFDZ, GHFLXDH, SFDKHZFP, LZFPDM, KJHZZZSZYFPTZDHM, LZFPHM, XHFKHYH_DM, XHFYHZH, XHFDZ, XHFLXDH, GHFYHYYWDMC, ZSPM_DM, XHFYHYYWDMC, YJSE, JSHJ, GHFNSRMC, GHFNSRSBH, BZ, XHFDJXH, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SFLRHYXX, XHFNSRMC FROM FP_DK_ZZSFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

Select Mbkstzuuid, Djxh, Pzxh, Nd, Kshylje, Hbflqyzrkmbkse, Kmbdsde, Byhdyndmbe, Byhdendmbe, Byhdsndmbe, Byhdsndmbe_1, Byhdwndmbe, Kjzwmbwdksje, Jcsymbks, Zfbz_1 From Sb_Sds_Mbkstz t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Nd In (#macroparam#) Order By t.Nd Asc

select t.zzsfpuuid, t.dksquuid, t.xhfsfzjzl_dm, t.xhfsfzjhm, t.xhfdjxh, t.xhfnsrsbh, t.xhfnsrmc, t.xhfkhyh_dm, t.xhfyhyywdmc, t.xhfyhzh, t.xhflxdh, t.xhfdz, t.lzfpdm, t.lzfphm, t.ghfdjxh, t.ghfnsrsbh, t.ghfnsrmc, t.ghfsfzjzl_dm, t.ghfsfzjhm, t.ghfkhyh_dm, t.ghfyhyywdmc, t.ghfyhzh, t.ghfdz, t.ghflxdh, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.bz, t.sflrhyxx from fp_dk_zzsptfp t where t.dksquuid = ?
select * from sb_cgs_clhgzdzxxcfsyspb t where t.shyj_dm = ? and trim(t.jdccchgzbh) = ? and t.djxh = ?
select sbuuid,lrrq from sb_sbb t where t.zfbz_1='N'and t.djxh=? and t.skssqq=? and t.skssqz=? and t.lrrq <=?

SELECT DECODE(SUM(LQS), NULL, 0, SUM(LQS)) AS LQS, DECODE(SUM(KJS), NULL, 0, SUM(KJS)) AS KJS, DECODE(SUM(ZFS), NULL, 0, SUM(ZFS)) AS ZFS, DECODE(SUM(SSHXS), NULL, 0, SUM(SSHXS)) AS SSHXS FROM PZ_JBSC WHERE YPRUUID = ? AND PZZL_DM = ? AND PZZG_DM = ? AND TFRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND PZZY_DM NOT IN ('12', '13', '14', '15') AND TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select PZZL_DM,PZZG_DM,PZHM,SPHM,YJZE,YJYE_1 from sb_yjskxx where yjye_1>0 and djxh = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or zspm_dm = ?) and skssqz <= ? and sksx_dm in(#macroparam#)
SELECT * FROM SB_ZLBS_TDCZRXXB_GYRXX T WHERE T.ZLBSCJUUID = ?

SELECT * FROM CS_DJ_TDDWSESZB T WHERE T.XZQHSZ_DM = ? AND (T.JDXZ_DM = ? OR T.JDXZ_DM IS NULL) AND (1 = ? OR (T.YXQQ <= ? AND T.YXQZ >= ?)) AND T.YXQQ <= T.YXQZ AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.TDDJ_DM, T.YXQQ

select YHYYWD_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, QSYHHH, KHYHHH from (select c.YHYYWD_DM, c.XZQHSZ_DM, c.QSYHHH, c.KHYHHH from CS_ZS_SKY_YHDZ c where c.YHYYWD_DM = ? and c.YXBZ = 'Y' and c.XYBZ = 'Y' and c.SWJG_DM in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by c.SWJG_DM desc) where rownum = 1

/*本期实际退税额*/ select a.djxh, c.nsrsbh nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when zsxm_dm = '10104' /*and yzpzzl_dm != 'BDA0610056'*/ then -abs(se) end bq103, /*企业所得税实际预缴*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and skssqz like ? || '%' then -abs(se) end bq104, /*企业所得税上年预缴*/ case when zsxm_dm = '10104' and ( /*yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610039' and */ skssqq = to_date(? || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssqz = to_date(? || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd') /*or yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610056'*/ ) then -abs(se) end bq105, /*汇算清缴*/ case when yskm_dm like '1010103%' or yskm_dm like '1010105%' or yskm_dm like '1010203%' then -abs(se) end bq111 /*实际收到的出口退税额（负数）*/ from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, zs_srths b, dj_nsrxx c where a.djxh = b.djxh and c.djxh = b.djxh and a.djxh = ? AND a.yxbz = 'Y' AND a.jknd = ? and b.thrq_1 between ? and ? and b.xhrq_1 is not null

SELECT DISTINCT T.PZJCUUID, T.PZHSJG_DM, T.CZYUUID, T.YPRLX_DM, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM, T.JCSL, T.PZZG_DM, T.RKRQ, T.FFYXJ, T.PZZT_DM FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.PZZT_DM in (#macroparam#) and T.Pzhsjg_Dm=? and T.Yprlx_Dm=? AND T.JCSL > 0 and yxbz='Y' ORDER BY t.PZZL_DM ASC, t.ffyxj DESC, t.rkrq,t.pzqshm ASC
select * from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a where a.zlbscjuuid=?
select t.* from sb_szyssb t where t.sybh_1 = ? and t.djxh = ? and exists (select 1 from sb_sbb a where a.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1', '4', '5'))

select distinct a.pzzl_dm,d.pzzlmc from pz_flz a, pz_flzjzxx b,cs_pz_swjgdypzzl c,dm_pz_pzzl d where a.pzzy_dm = '12' and a.xhuuid = b.xhuuid and b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf = ? and a.pzzl_dm = c.pzzl_dm and a.pzzl_dm = d.pzzl_dm and d.pzdl_dm not in ('6','7') and substr(a.sjgsdq, 1, 3) = substr(c.sjgsdq, 1, 3) order by a.pzzl_dm
Select t.Skssqq, t.* From Sb_Sbb t Where t.skssqq<=To_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')
select t.* from pz_sspzjxb t where zfbz_1='N'
select t.wbszluuid from sb_yqwbszlqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.zlssqjz = ? and t.sbrq_1 is null
SELECT T.Cbshtglwfkhyhmc as cbsfhtglwfmc FROM SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB T WHERE T.CBSHTGLWFNSRSBH=?

select jjrqsrq as jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq as jjrzzrq from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <= ? and yyyf = ? and jjrbz = 'Y'
select * from ZS_YJSF t where t.YZPZXH = ? and (t.TZLX_DM = ? or t.TZLX_DM = ?) and (t.SKCLLX_DM = ? or t.SKCLLX_DM = '6')
select lrze,nstzjse,nstzzje,sjynsdse from SB_SDS_JMCZ_ND t where t.pzxh =? order by t.lrrq desc
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_CZZWCZFB2 t where t.zqrnsrsbh=?
select * from CS_PZ_YZDWXX where yzdwxh=?

select a.djxh, b.mfnsrsbh nsrsbh, b.mfmc as czrmc, b.mfsfzjlx_dm as czrsfzjzl_dm, b.mfzjhm as czrsfzjzlDm, b.scqd_fwfs, b.scqd_fwsj, b.scqd_fwcb, b.fybh, b.fwcqzsh, b.tdsybh, b.tnmj as fwmj, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.tdfwdz as xxdz, b.zgswskfj_dm as fwsdswjg_dm, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.jdxz_dm, b.htbh, b.htqdrq htqdsj, b.jyjg, b.mj as zrmj, a.zlbscjuuid as uuid, b.qsqszydx_dm as tdfwqszydx from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and #macroparam#
select cpycpbl from SB_XFS_FB_SNYRLYYDTJB where ewbhxh = 5 and sbuuid=?
select y.* from sb_ysbtj y, sb_ls_sbxx l where y.djxh = l.djxh and l.hhljid = ?
SELECT * FROM SB_ZZSJXSEKCBZHD_TZ T WHERE T.LCSLID = ?

select zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg where zfbz_1 = 'N' and clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_Dm = ?) and (#macroparam#) /*hdswjg_dm in('')*/

select a.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlbscjb b,sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid=c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.djxh = ? and (? is null or c.kfbdcxmbh=?)

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwzh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.dyh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.lc_2 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fjh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.zlfclfbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.htbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.kfbdcxmbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.kfbdcxmbh is null) and exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf k where k.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and k.djxh = ? and k.zrfcsfbz = '0') and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g where g.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and g.zrfcsfbz = '1' and g.nsrsbh = ?)) and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.PZZL_DM, SUM(T.PZJHSL) AS HZSL, SUM(T.PZJHSL) AS PZJHSL FROM PZ_SSPZJHBBHZMXB T WHERE T.PZHZJHUUID IN (#macroparam#) GROUP BY T.PZZL_DM
SELECT * FROM ZS_YDTXX T WHERE T.SE > 0 AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND T.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND T.PZXH = ?

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.lc_2, g.djxh, g.jyfuuid, g.nsrsbh, g.nsrmc, g.szfe_2, g.bdfe_2, g.fwtc_dm, g.gj_dm, g.sfzjzl_dm, g.sfzjhm, g.zcqrbz from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g, sb_ls_fcjyxx l where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = g.fcjycjxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = l.fcjycjxxuuid and l.fyjbxxuuid = ? and g.zrfcsfbz = '1' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = ?
select sb.* from sb_sbxx sb where sb.djxh = ? and sb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.skssqq = ? and sb.skssqz = ? and sb.yzpzzl_dm =? and sb.sbsx_dm_1 = ? Order By sb.lrrq Desc
select t.swry_dm,t.yprmc from pz_ypr t
select t.* from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? and t.zsxm_dm = '10101' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
select sbuuid,lrrq from sb_sbb t where t.zfbz_1='N' and t.djxh=? and t.skssqq=? and t.skssqz=? and t.yzpzzl_dm in(#macroparam#) and t.lrrq <=?

select null pcode, 'fb01' code, '分包合同字号' caption from dual union select null pcode, 'zb02' code, '转包合同字号' caption from dual union select DISTINCT 'fb01' pcode, a2.FBHTZH code, a2.FBHTZH caption from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a1, SB_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB_FB1 a2 where a1.BH =? and a1.SBUUID = a2.SBUUID union select DISTINCT 'zb02' pcode, a3.ZBHTZH code,a3.ZBHTZH caption from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a1, SB_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB_FB2 a3 where a1.BH =? and a1.SBUUID = a3.SBUUID
select zg.pzzg_dm, zg.pzzg, zg.pzzg_dm code, zg.pzzg caption from cs_pz_pzzgb zg where zg.swjg_dm = ? #macroparam#

select a.djxh, a.dksquuid, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.fphm, c.tdsybh sybh, f.wspzzl_dm, f.wspzzg, f.wspzhm, f.sksx, f.spuuid, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm from fp_dk_sq a, fp_dk_fpkjxx b, fp_dk_tyjdfp c, fp_dk_ysyskmx f where a.dksquuid = b.dksquuid and a.dksquuid = c.dksquuid and a.dksquuid = f.dksquuid and a.djxh = ? and a.kjbz = 'Y' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and c.fybh = ? union select a.djxh, a.dksquuid, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.fphm, c.tdsybh sybh, f.wspzzl_dm, f.wspzzg, f.wspzhm, f.sksx, f.spuuid, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm from fp_dk_sq a, fp_dk_fpkjxx b, fp_dk_tyjdfp c, fp_dk_ysyskmx f where a.dksquuid = b.dksquuid and a.dksquuid = c.dksquuid and a.dksquuid = f.dksquuid and a.djxh = ? and a.kjbz = 'Y' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and c.tdsybh = ? union select a.djxh, a.dksquuid, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.fphm, e.fybh sybh, f.wspzzl_dm, f.wspzzg, f.wspzhm, f.sksx, f.spuuid, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm from fp_dk_sq a, fp_dk_fpkjxx b, fp_dk_bdcfp d, fp_dk_bdcfp_xmmx e, fp_dk_ysyskmx f where a.dksquuid = b.dksquuid and a.dksquuid = d.dksquuid and d.bdcfpuuid = e.bdcfpuuid and a.dksquuid = f.dksquuid and a.djxh = ? and a.kjbz = 'Y' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and e.fybh = ?
select swry_dm,yprmc ,ypruuid from pz_ypr a where yprlx_dm='12' and pzhsjg_dm=(select pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly b where b.pzgly_dm= ?)
select * from pz_jbsc a where a.jzpzbh = ? and a.pzzy_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select TRIM(c.yskm_dm) yskm_dm, TRIM(c.ysfpbl_dm) ysfpbl_dm, c.csdmz_1, c.csdmz_2, c.csdmz_3, c.csdmz_4, c.csdmz_5, c.csdmz_6, c.csdmz_7, c.csdmz_8, c.csdmz_9, c.csdmz_10, c.csdmz_11, c.csdmz_12, c.csdmz_13, c.csdmz_14, c.csdmz_15 from cs_zs_yskm_ysfpbl c where c.cslx_dm = ? and c.swjg_dm = ? and c.yxqq <= ? and c.yxqz >= ? and nvl(c.csdmz_1, 'notdefault') != 'default'

SELECT NVL(SUM(T.KPJE), 0) KPJE, NVL(SUM(T.DKSQJE), 0) SQJE FROM FP_DK_SQ T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND TRUNC(T.SQRQ) >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(T.SQRQ) <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DKFPLB_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.KJBZ = 'Y'
select pzzl_dm,swjg_dm,slpzxesl,wjbpzsl,swjgzdkcsl,yprzdkcsl from cs_pz_pzsljkb where swjg_dm = ? and xybz='Y'

select t.sspztyzfuuid ypzuuid, g.gztzsuuid gztzsuuid, t.sspztyzfbh ypzbh, g.gztzsbh gztzsbh, t.tbrq ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm, g.jsr_dm jsr_dm, t.gdbz yspzgdbz from pz_sspztyzfzb t, pz_gztzs g where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sspztyzfuuid = g.yspzhm and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz is null and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?

with c as (select a.ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 maxskssq from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a inner join SB_CXS_CzJZSYMXB b on b.czsyuuid = a.ysuuid and b.bgbm = '1' and b.yxbz = 'Y' where a.djxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by a.ysuuid) select * from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx t1 inner join SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB t on t1.ysuuid = t.czsyuuid inner join SB_CXS_FYXXCJB a on a.fyxxuuid = t.fyxxuuid left join c on c.ysuuid = t.cZsyuuid where a.djxh = ? and t.bgbm = '1' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.maxskssq, t.sbzjsszlqq) < t.sbzjsszlqz and #macroparam#
select t.sysbuuid from sb_sysbmxbg t where t.pzxh = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
update sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx s set s.jmszjsr = ?, s.yjmsje_1 = ?, s.xgr_dm = ?, s.xgrq = sysdate where s.ysuuid = ? and s.ssjmxz_dm = ?
select * from sb_cxs_fdcjyjghdb_jyf a where #macroparam#

Select t.* From Cs_Sb_Sdsswsxdzb t Where t.Fbh = ? And (1 = ? Or (t.Swjg_Dm = ?))

select count(1) from pz_jc t where t.pzzl_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' AND (1=? or t.pzzg_dm = ?) and t.pzqshm < = ? and t.PZZZHM > = ? and t.PZZT_DM = '01' and t.jcsl > 0 and t.czyuuid in ( select ypruuid from pz_ypr w where w.swry_dm = ? and w.yxbz='Y' and w.yprlx_dm = '12')

select t.dksquuid, t.kjrq, t.kpje, a.dkfplb_dm, a.ybsfe, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fphm from fp_dk_fpkjxx t, fp_dk_sq a where t.dksquuid = a.dksquuid and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.kjbz = 'Y' and dkfplb_dm in ('01', '02', '05', '06', '09') and lzfpdm is null and lzfphm is null and t.djxh = ? and t.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or t.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.fphm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from fp_dk_fpkjxx c, fp_dk_sq d where c.dksquuid = d.dksquuid and c.lzfpdm = t.fp_dm and c.lzfphm = t.fphm and d.dkfplb_dm in ('02', '05', '06') and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.kjbz = 'Y')

select a.zspm_dm code, a.zspmmc caption, a.jldw_dm, b.sl_1 from ( select t.zspm_dm, t.zspmmc, t.jldw_dm, t.yxbz, t.xybz from dm_gy_zspm t connect by prior t.zspm_dm = t.sjzspm_dm start with t.zspm_dm = ?)a, cs_gy_glb_zspm b where a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.swjg_dm= ? and to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') between b.yxqq and b.yxqz
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Dkynssdemxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select a.* from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.djxh = ? and nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.mfpzxh = ?
select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxg a where a.clsbdh = ? order by a.lrrq desc
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYGQSBFB4 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

SELECT C.SFMXUUID, NVL(C.SRZE, 0) KPJE, NVL(C.YJSFE, 0) + NVL(C.YBSFE, 0) YBSFE FROM FP_DK_SQ A, FP_DK_FPKJXX B, FP_DK_SFMX C WHERE A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID AND B.DKSQUUID = C.DKSQUUID AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND C.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND C.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND C.GLDKSQUUID IS NULL AND (C.ZSPM_DM NOT LIKE '101016%' AND C.ZSPM_DM NOT LIKE '101017%') AND C.DKFPLB_DM IN ('01', '07') AND A.DJXH = ? AND b.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.KJRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
select t.sspztyzfmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzsl pzsl, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm from PZ_SSPZTYZFMXB t where t.sspztyzfuuid = ?
select t.uuid,t.swjg_dm,t.yxqq,t.yxqz,t.kkqrbz,t.xybz from sb_pkqc_kkqr t where t.swjg_dm=? and t.yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz='Y'

SELECT SUM(AA.YBTSE) as se FROM (SELECT A.YBTSE, A.DJXH, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, C.RKRQ, C.CZLX_DM, A.ZSXM_DM, A.SBSX_DM_1, A.TZLX_DM, A.SKZL_DM, A.SKSX_DM FROM ZS_YJSF A, ZS_WSZ B, ZS_JKS C WHERE A.ZSUUID = B.ZSUUID AND B.HZSPUUID = C.SPUUID AND A.DJXH = B.DJXH AND A.ZSDLFS_DM = '0' UNION ALL SELECT A.YBTSE, A.DJXH, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, C.RKRQ, C.CZLX_DM, A.ZSXM_DM, A.SBSX_DM_1, A.TZLX_DM, A.SKZL_DM, A.SKSX_DM FROM ZS_YJSF A, ZS_JKS C WHERE A.ZSUUID = C.ZSUUID AND A.ZSDLFS_DM = '0') AA WHERE AA.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND DJXH = ? AND AA.RKRQ >= ? AND AA.RKRQ <= ? AND AA.SKSSQQ >= ? AND AA.SKSSQZ <= ? AND AA.SBSX_DM_1 = '11' AND AA.SKSX_DM = '0101' AND AA.SKZL_DM != 20 AND AA.CZLX_DM not in ('44','67','49','51','52','34')

select * from sb_sbxx a where a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610125' and a.zsxm_dm = '10101' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.jmse>0 and rownum<5000 and a.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and not exists( select 1 from sb_jmyhzsb b where b.djxh = a.djxh and b.zsxm_dm=a.zsxm_dm and b.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610125' )

select t.* from sb_wtdz_skbg_fb_mx t where t.bdzdjxh = ? and (1 = ? or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.pzxh = t.pzxh and a.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') )

select a.*,b.FWMJ,b.czfcmj,b.fcyz,b.czwyz from sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cz a,sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cj b where a.djxh=b.djxh and a.fybh=b.fybh and a.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or a.fybh = ?) and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.zlrqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.zlrqq <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.zlrqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.zlrqq

select distinct yzpzzl_dm from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.skssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610017','BDA0610019','BDA0610090','BDA0610091','BDA0610109','BDA0610110','BDA0610732','BDA0610735','BDA0610738','BDA0610744')
select * from Dm_Gy_Xzqh t where t.xzqhsz_dm like ?||'%' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz='Y'
SELECT DISTINCT T.PZZL_DM FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL T WHERE T.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select * from sb_tdzzssb_slrxx where sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_KJ_CXCKLX_GRSDS_MX WHERE PZXH = ? AND SBUUID = ?
select * from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB t where t.fjmdjxh = ? and t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select mx.pzssbgdmxuuid, mx.pzssbgduuid, mx.pzjcuuid, mx.sspzxhsquuid, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.kbpbz from pz_sspzssbgdmxb mx ,pz_sspzssbgdzb zb where mx.pzssbgduuid = zb.pzssbgduuid and zb.zstybz = 'Y' and mx.sspzxhsquuid is null and zb.tbrq >=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and zb.tbrq <=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and zb.sjgsdq like ?
SELECT DISTINCT kc.pzzl_dm code, NULL pcode, zl.PZZLMC caption, zl.whpbz , zl.phcd FROM pz_jc kc, dm_pz_pzzl zl WHERE kc.PZZL_DM = zl.PZZL_DM

select sbqs.sybz_dm_1 as sybz, sbqs.sybh_1 as sybh, sbb.djxh from sb_sbb sbb,sb_qs sbqs where sbb.sbuuid = sbqs.sbuuid and nvl(sbb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and sbb.pzxh = ?
update sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg t set t.sbuuid = ?, t.pzxh = ?, t.hzbz_1 = 'Y', t.xgr_dm = ?, t.xgrq = sysdate where t.sbpch = ? and t.ewbhxh >= ? and t.ewbhxh <= ?
select t.pzzl_dm as code, t.pzzlmc as caption, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzlmc, t.xjpzbz, t.whpbz from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm = ?
select decode(a.slswsx_dm, 'SLSXA041011002', 'SP', 'SLSXA041023001', 'BA', '') as splxbz from cs_rd_ssxdsdlxsldzb a where a.ssxdsdlx_dm = ?

/*增值税预缴税款表*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, xse bq24 /*按3%征收率计征的建筑和房地产租售项目税额当期数及累计数（计算）*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzsyjnssb_sjb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.YZXM_DM IN (?,?,?)
select t.hy_dm,t.zspm_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.sbuuid=?

select sb.nsrsbh, sb.nsrmc, sb.djxh, sb.pzxh, sb.clsbdh, sb.clcp, sb.clcpxh, sb.clxh, sb.pql, sb.zws, sb.cldw, sb.zypz, sb.fdjhm, sb.cgssbuuid, t.cgsuuid, t.wspzhm, t.zmsbz, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.ewtmc, t.ewtmt, t.ffrq,sb.lrrq from sb_cgs_clgzswszm t, sb_cgs_sbbxblsb sb where t.cgssbuuid = sb.cgssbuuid and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.cgssbzt = ? and sb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1=#macroparam# or t.clsbdh = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.wspzhm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or sb.nsrsbh = ?)
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYGQSBFB3 t where t.nsrsbh=?
select * from sb_sbb t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz <=? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and t.zfbz_1='N'
select * from sb_sbb t where t.djxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.bz = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.sbqx from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.sbrq_1 is null
select t.* from sb_fxmtysb t where t.sbuuid=?
select * from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB a where a.zlbscjuuid = ?
select * from pz_jc t where t.czyuuid = ? and t.pzzl_dm = ? and (1 = ? or t.pzzg_dm = ?) and t.pzzt_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' #macroparam#

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2, k.djxh, k.nsrsbh, k.nsrmc from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf k, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = k.fcjycjxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = g.fcjycjxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.kfbdcxmbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.nsrmc = ?) and c.zlfclfbz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or g.djxh = ?) and g.nsrsbh = ? and k.zrfcsfbz = '0' and g.zrfcsfbz = '1' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'

select a.* from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.czrf_dwhgrmc = ? and b.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.bszl_dm = ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT MX.PZZL_DM,MX.PZZG_DM,MX.PZQSHM,MX.PZZZHM,MX.SL FROM PZ_SSPZTYZFZB ZB, PZ_SSPZTYZFMXB MX WHERE ZB.SSPZTYZFUUID = MX.SSPZTYZFUUID AND ZB.SSPZTYZFBH = ?
SELECT swjgjg FROM dm_gy_swjg WHERE swjgjg IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY swjg_dm = PRIOR sjswjg_dm START WITH swjg_dm = ?
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.nd = ? and t.yf = ? and (t.sjlybz is null or t.sjlybz in (#macroparam#) or (t.sjlybz = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ?))
select t.sbuuid from sb_sbb t where t.pzxh=? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select b.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_ygzsffxcsm b where b.sbuuid = ?
select * from cs_pz_jbjxpzbmx t where t.jbjxpzuuid = ?

select t.uuid, t.zbuuid, t.hbsr, t.qdtdsyqszfdje, t.fdckfcb, t.tdzyjcqbcf, t.qqgcf, t.jzazgcf, t.jcssf, t.ggptssf, t.kfjjfy, t.lxzc, t.qtfdckffy, t.bz_1, t.sl_1, t.zrfdcsrze, t.swsrjqtsr, t.stxssr, t.kcxmjehj, t.fdckffy, t.yzrfdcygdsjd, t.yys, t.cswhjsf, t.jyffj, t.czbgddqtkcxm, t.zze, t.zeykcxmjezb, t.sysl, t.sskcxs, t.yjtdzzsse, t.jmse, t.yjse, t.ybtdzzsse, t.dssr, t.sfbz, t.zspm_dm from sb_tdzzsqshdb_mx t where t.zbuuid=?
select * from sb_tdzzssb_jmxx where tdzzsqssbuuid=?
select a.* from sb_cjxxgl_zdjsjgxf a where (#macroparam#) /*a.clscqy_dm in ('')*/ and (a.sjxybz != 'Y' or a.sjxybz is null) and a.sxrq between ? and ?

select b.bqjzxqje from sb_sbb t, SB_FQDQDZCPCLJJYJSL b where t.djxh = ? and t.pzxh = b.pzxh and t.sbuuid=b.sbuuid AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ? and t.skssqq>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.skssqz<=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_SDSSHYWHDGBFBB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? and dzbzdszl_dm =?
SELECT 1 FROM CS_SB_QYSDSDFJMSWJGCSPZB t WHERE t.swjg_dm=? AND t.yxbz='Y'
SELECT A.PZHSJG_DM CODE, A.SJHSJG_DM PCODE, B.SWJGMC CAPTION FROM PZ_PZGLY A, DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE A.PZHSJG_DM = B.SWJG_DM START WITH A.PZHSJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.PZHSJG_DM = A.SJHSJG_DM
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb8_dwtzqk t where t.sbuuid = ?
select b.* from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx b where b.fcjycjxxuuid in (select a.fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjy a where a.pzxh = ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.ysbbz = 'Y'

select zsxm_Dm, zspm_Dm, zszm_Dm, skssqq, skssqz, kssl, jsyj, sl_1 as sl, yjse as kcse, ybtse as se, hy_Dm, jkqx, yzpzzl_Dm, nssbrq, yjskzt_Dm, zsuuid, yzfsrq, skzl_dm, sksx_dm, cbsx_dm from zs_yjsf t where t.djxh = ? and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skssqq =? and t.skssqz=? and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.czlx_dm ='79'
select b.* ,a.slrq ,a.slr_dm,a.slswjg_dm from sb_sbb a,sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_zzs_ldsk where zfbz_1 = 'N' and BQQMLDSE > 0 and djxh = ? and ldlx = ? order by skssqq, skssqz
SELECT * FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? AND T.CZYUUID = ? AND T.PZZT_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from wbjh_pgqsjyjg where fwuuid=?
select b.SBUUID,b.FBSMC,b.FBGCXMBH,b.FBJE,b.FBHTZH from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a ,SB_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB_FB1 b where a.BH=? and a.SBUUID=b.SBUUID

select b.zspm_dm, sum(b.ybtse) ysbse from sb_sbb a ,sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610678' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.skssqq=b.skssqz and b.djxh=? and b.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by b.zspm_dm

select t.uuid, t.pzxh, t.sbuuid, t.yqt_dm, t.yqtmc, t.yzbm, t.khyh, t.lxdh, t.zyzmc, t.yfcpmc, t.yhzh, t.dz, t.bndyyljcl, t.zyyyl, t.shsl_1, t.bndyyzcl, t.syfl, t.bndyjn_kqsyfyyl_sskkl, t.bndyjn_kqsyfyyql, t.snydk_kqsyfyyl, t.snybj_kqsyfyyl, t.ybt_kqsyfyyl, t.bnd_zhygyxsyyqjg, t.ybtkqsyfje, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.cwfzrxm, t.ssdljbr, t.slr, t.sjgsdq, t.sbrq, t.bsr, t.slrq, t.slswjgmc, t.shjl, t.sbsx_dm_1, t.cpxssxrq from sb_kqsyfnd t where sbuuid=?

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zgswskfj_dm from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.zsdlfs_dm = ? and t.sbrq_1 is null and (1 = ? or (t.zsxm_dm != '10104' or (to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') != '01' or to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') != '12'))) and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and (a.zsxm_dm in ('10101','30217') or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (t.zspm_dm = '101060200' or t.zsxm_dm != '10106') and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610688') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5'))

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.csfl order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from cs_sb_xtcsdy a where trim(a.csfl) = ? and a.csbm=? and ((to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= a.yxqz and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= a.yxqq)) and (1 = ? or to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')<= a.yxqz) and a.yxqq < a.yxqz) a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y') where xh = 1
Select * From sb_sbb t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
SELECT T.PZHSJG_DM, T.YPRUUID, T.YPRLX_DM FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE ((0 = ? AND T.YPRLX_DM = '12' AND T.SWRY_DM = ?) OR (0 = ? AND T.YPRLX_DM IN ('31', '20') AND T.DJXH = ?)) AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select yjye_1, yjskuuid, sksx_dm, skssqq, skssqz, yjze, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm from sb_yjskxx t where djxh = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and zspm_dm = ? and skssqz <= ? and sksx_dm = ? and (1= ? or skssqq >=? )
SELECT * FROM sb_hgz_cyqq t where (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.jdczccchgz = ?) and (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.clsbdh = ?) order by t.lrrq desc

select distinct t.jzxhuuid, t.yspzbh_1, t.tfrq, t.pzzy_dm, t3.pzzwzymc as zy, t2.pzzg, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t.lqs, (nvl(t.kjs,0) + nvl(t.zfs,0)) as hj, t.kjs, t.zfs, t.sshxs, t.jc, t.zl_jc from pz_jbsc t inner join dm_pz_pzzwzy t3 on t.pzzy_dm = t3.pzzwzy_dm left join cs_pz_pzzgb t2 on t.pzzg_dm = t2.pzzg_dm where t.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.pzzl_dm=? and t.ypruuid =? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by tfrq,t.pzzy_dm,t.jzxhuuid
select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz a where a.clsbdh = ? order by a.lrrq desc
select t.ssjmxz_dm, '' jmwj_dm from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swsx_dm = ?

SELECT FKFDJXH, FKFSFZJHM, FKFSFZJZL_DM, FKFNSRSBH, LZFPHM, LZFPDM, LXDH, DZ, SKFMC, SKFNSRSBH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, FKFMC, FYBH, TDSYBH, DKSQUUID, TYFPUUID, SKFSFZJLX_DM, SKFSFZJHM FROM FP_DK_TYJDFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

SELECT b.djxh as djxh,a.hdyjse as yjhdyjse,a.lrr_dm as lrrDm,a.lrrq as lrrq,b.sjgsdq as sjgsdq,a.xjrq as xjrq, a.skssqq as skssqq,a.skssqz as skssqz,a.sqsjjnse as sqsjjnse, a.sxh as sxh,a.uuid as uuid,b.xgr_dm as xgrDm,b.xgrq as xgrq,a.yjskhdfs_dm as yjskhdfsDm, b.yqsbuuid yqsbuuid,a.zsxm_dm as zsxmDm ,a.zspm_dm as zspmDm,b.hdr_dm as hdrDm, b.hdrq as hdrq, b.hdswjg_dm as hdswjgDm FROM SB_YQSBYJSEHDB a, SB_YQSBHZB b WHERE a.yqsbuuid = b.yqsbuuid and b.hdrq is not null and (b.zfbz_1 is null or b.zfbz_1='N') and b.yqsbuuid = ?
select t.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr t ,sb_sbb b where t.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.skssqq >= ? and b.skssqz <= ? and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')

select t.djxh, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, trunc(t.lrrq) lrrq from sb_zlbscjb t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = t.djxh and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and t.bszl_dm not in (#macroparam#) and exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.lb_dm = ? and t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and EXISTS (select 1 from dj_nsrxx_kz kz where kz.djxh = t.djxh and kz.hsfs_dm in (#macroparam#)))

select b.jzmj FWMJ, a.czmj czfcmj, '' fcyz, '' czwyz, b.fyxxuuid as uuid, b.djxh, b.fybh, b.fwcqzsh, b.tdsybh, a.czmj czfcmj, a.zspm_dm, b.fcmc fcmc, b.tdsybh dh_1, b.fcyt_dm, '' pkbz, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.fwzldz xxdz, b.zgswskfj_dm, a.yxqz zfrq_1, a.sl_1, a.htzjzsr, a.czfnsrmc, a.czfnsrsbh, a.htydzlqq zlrqq, a.htydzlqz zlrqz, '' czxz_dm, b.jdxz_dm, a.sbzjsr bqyszjsr, a.sbzjsr*a.sl_1 as bqynse, a.jmxzdmxx ssjmxz_dm, a.jmshj bqjmse from sb_cxs_czjzsymxb a, sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b where a.fyxxuuid=b.fyxxuuid and a.yxbz='Y' and b.yxbz='Y' and (a.bgbm='1' or a.bgbm='2') and b.djxh =? and (1 = ? or b.fybh = ?) and (1 =? or to_date(nvl(to_char(b.nsywzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')>= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 =? or b.csqdsj <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(b.nsywzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')>= b.csqdsj

select a.djxh, b.fybh, b.fwcqzsh, b.fwzh, b.dy as dyh, b.lc_1 as lc_2, b.fh as fjh, b.mj, b.tdfwdz, b.zgswskfj_dm as fwsdswjg_dm from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and #macroparam#

select pz.pzzl_dm, decode(t.pzdl_dm, '1', 'XJ', '3', 'SJ', '4', 'SJ', '5', 'XJ') as sptj from dm_pz_pzzl t, cs_pz_swjgdypzzl pz where t.pzzl_dm = pz.pzzl_dm and t.pzdl_dm in ('1', '3', '4', '5') and pz.pzzl_dm not like '00000104%' and pz.pzzl_dm not like '00000101%' and pz.pzzl_dm not like '00000402%' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and pz.swjg_dm like ?
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb8_dwtzqk_mx t where t.sbuuid = ?
Select * From CS_SB_SDSSWSXDZB t Where t.YXBZ = 'Y' And t.XYBZ = 'Y' And t.FBH =? and t.yxqq<=? and t.yxqz>=?
select t.pzzg_dm as code, t.pzzg as caption, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzzg, t.gdsbz, t.pzzl_dm from cs_pz_pzzgb t where sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and t.sjgsdq like ? and t.pzzl_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM sb_hgz_cyqq t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.clsbdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jdczccchgz = ?) order by t.lrrq desc
select * from pz_gztzs where gztzsuuid=? and yxbz='Y'
select t.yzclrq from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh = ?
Select * From Sb_Fqdqdzcpcljj t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select * from pz_ypr t where t.swry_dm=? and t.pzhsjg_dm =? and t.yprlx_dm=?
select zlbsxl_dm, zlbsxlmc, kjzdzz_dm from cs_sb_zlbsbdgl where zlbsxl_dm = ? and yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ZS_PZSYQK WHERE PZSYQKUUID = ?
select * from pz_sspzlfdzb where lfdlx_dm = ? and lqdwr = ? and lqflx_dm = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'
select pzxh from sb_sbxx where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq = ? and skssqz = ? and zsxm_dm = ? and sbsx_dm_1 = ? and zsdlfs_dm='0' and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')

Select a.Xh, a.Zxjzrq, a.Swjg_Dm, a.Yxbz, b.Jgjc_Dm From Cs_Sb_Sjcjrq a, (Select t.Swjg_Dm, t.Jgjc_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg t Start With t.Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior t.Sjswjg_Dm = t.Swjg_Dm) b Where a.Swjg_Dm = b.Swjg_Dm And a.Yxbz = 'Y' Order By b.Jgjc_Dm Desc
SELECT * FROM CS_SB_SSYHXMJMXZDZB WHERE yhlb=?

SELECT DISTINCT ZS.YZPZXH, ZS.ZSXM_DM, ZS.ZSPM_DM, ZS.SKSSQQ, ZS.SKSSQZ, ZS.JSYJ, ZS.SL_1, ZS.YBTSE, ZS.JKQX, ZS.YZPZMXXH, ZS.GLYZPZMXXH, ZS.YZCLRQ, ZS.NSSBRQ, ZS.SBSX_DM_1, ZS.SKZL_DM, zs.kssl FROM ZS_YJSF ZS, SB_LS_SBXX SB, SB_SBB SBB WHERE SBB.PZXH = ZS.YZPZXH AND SBB.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SB.HHLJID = ? AND ZS.YZPZXH = SB.PZXH AND ZS.SKZL_DM IN ('10', '20') AND ZS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ZS.SBSX_DM_1 = '21' AND ZS.SKSX_DM = '0301'

select mx.djxh, mx.SQYQSBSZ_DM as zsxm_dm, mx.sqyqsbpm_dm as zspm_dm, mx.HZYQSBQX as xjrq from SB_YQSBHZB_MX MX WHERE MX.DJXH = ? AND MX.SKSSQQ = ? AND MX.SKSSQZ = ? AND MX.SQYQSBSZ_DM = ? AND (1=? or MX.SQYQSBPM_DM = ?)
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_CZZWCZFB1 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select t.* from CS_SB_SZYSLPZB t where t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.zspm_dm = ? and (t.zszm_dm is null or t.zszm_dm = ?) and (t.qyshylb_dm is null or t.qyshylb_dm=?) and (t.dxsccgsq_dm is null or t.dxsccgsq_dm =?) and (t.gsgwsfyfg is null or t.gsgwsfyfg=?) and (t.syskdc is null or t.syskdc = ?) and t.yxbz='Y'

select hd.djxh, hd.zspm_dm, hd.hdqxq, hd.nsqx_dm from zs_hd_yhshd_jg hd, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where hd.djxh = ls.djxh and hd.nsqx_dm is not null and hd.sjzxqz > hd.hdqxq and hd.lrrq > date '2017-5-1' and hd.hdqxz > ?

select b.zspm_dm, sum(se) ysbse from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and b.sybh_1 = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') group by b.zspm_dm

SELECT t.nssbrq as sbrq, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, 0 as fs, b.sjdkse as je, b.sjdkse as se FROM SB_SBXX T, sb_zzs_ybnsr b WHERE t.pzxh = b.pzxh and t.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and T.DJXH = ? and b.ewblxh ='1' and t.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.gzlx_dm_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select * from sb_qysdsndsb_qyjbxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (1=? OR t.sbsx_dm_1='11' or nvl(t.sbsx_dm_1,'11')='11') AND (1=? OR t.sbsx_dm_1='21') and nvl(t.yxbz,'Y')='Y' order by t.lrrq desc
select t.pzxh,t.bdbz from SB_SBBD_SLYRYXXFDS t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq=? and t.skssqz=? and t.ddbfl=? and t.yxbz='Y'
select t.fp_dm,t.fphm,t.wspzhm,t.snysl,t.rlysl from SB_XFS_FB_XSWSQKMX t where t.sbuuid=?
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_CBFTXXB_CYFXX where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?

Select Cldauuid, Cldabh, Djxh, Nsrsbh, Nsrmc, Clsbdh, Nsrsfzjzl_Dm, Zjhm, Hy_Dm, Djzclx_Dm, Lxdh, Yzbm, Dz, Clcp, Clxh, Zypz, Cldw, Zws, Pql, Fdjhm, Clgzdsx_Dm, Cdsx, Gzrq, Ffrq, Mzsbz, Ewtmc, Wszmhm, Jdrq, Pzhm_1, Wspzzl_Dm, Wspzhm, Sjse, Znj, Znjpzhm, Djr_Dm, Djrq, Jdcxszhm, Yzpzxh, Cljdlx_Dm, Cldazt_Dm, Lrr_Dm, Lrrq, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Sjgsdq, Clscqymc, Zfbz_1, Zfr_Dm, Zfrq_1, Cllx_Dm, Cldabh, Cdsx, Fpjgzsbz, Xnyqclx_Dm, Jdczccchgz, Zsjg_Dm, Fpjg From Sb_Cgs_Cldaxx t Where t.Clsbdh = ? And t.Cldazt_Dm = ? And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' Order By t.Lrrq Desc
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZLFDMXB T WHERE T.PZLFDUUID = ?
select * from np_zcbsdzb t where t.zxbztzsuuid=? and t.yzpzxh=?

select t.uuid, t.ywzjuuid, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.ssqq, t.xmbh, t.xmmc, t.xmdz, t.lcslid, t.wszg, t.wszzrq, t.xqsbrq, t.slswjg, t.slswjgmc, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1 ,t.wszzswjgmc from sb_tdzzsqshdb_swsxtzs t where uuid=?
SELECT A.FYBH, B.* FROM SB_CXS_FYXXCJB A, SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB B WHERE A.FYXXUUID = B.FYXXUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND B.YXQZ > TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.YXQQ < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.YXBZ = 'Y'
select t.xzqhsz_dm,t.xzqhmc from dm_gy_xzqh t where t.ssxzqmc like substr((select s.swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg s where s.swjg_dm=?),1,3)||'%'

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2, k.djxh, k.nsrsbh, k.fwtc_dm from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf k where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = k.fcjycjxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = ? and k.djxh = ? and k.zrfcsfbz = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and nvl(f.zfbz_1, ?) = ?

update sb_sbfpkqcfkb t set t.zfbz_1 = '1', t.zfrq_1 = sysdate, t.xgrq = sysdate where t.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and nvl(t.kkzt_dm, 'x') in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.zspm_dm = ? and (instr(to_char(t.djxh), '2') = 1 or instr(to_char(t.djxh), '3') = 1))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (t.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and instr(to_char(t.djxh), '1') = 1)) and (1 = #macroparam# or djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_ls_pkqc ls where ls.yusbxh = t.wbuuid and ls.hhljid=?)) and t.zfbz_1 = '0'

select t.lsmxid,x.sbqx from sb_ls_sbxx t,sb_ysbtj x where (x.zfbz_1='N' or x.zfbz_1 is null) and t.djxh=x.djxh and t.ssqq=x.skssqq and t.ssqz=x.skssqz and t.zsxm_dm=x.zsxm_dm and (t.zsxm_dm='10101' or t.zspm_dm is null or t.zspm_dm=x.zspm_dm) and t.hhljid= ?

SELECT KSYSKUUID, DJXH, LYUUID_1, KSYSKWHSXUUID, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, SL_1, JSYJ, FPDKSK, SKSX_DM, HY_DM, ZFBZ_1, TFRQ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ FROM FP_DK_KSYSKMX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND (1 = ? OR T.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = ? OR T.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, 0 bq92, 0 bq93, 0 bq94, 0 bq95, 0 bq96, 0 bq97, 0 bq98, nvl(asrze_ynssde, 0) + nvl(acbfy_ynssde, 0) bq99, ynsdse bq100, fhtjdxxwlqyjmsdse bq101, 0 bq102 from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_sds_jmhd_yjnd b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh

select a.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj a, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.skssqz = sbxx.ssqz and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq and a.nssbrq is not null and (a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm or a.zsdlfs_dm is null) and ((a.zsxm_dm not in ('10101', '30217') and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm) or a.zsxm_dm in ('10101','30217')) and nvl(a.sybh_1, 'X') = nvl(sbxx.sybh_1, nvl(a.sybh_1, 'X')) and (a.sjlybz is null or a.sjlybz <> '2') and sbxx.hhljid = ?
select t.rowid,t.* from cs_gy_ywgzpzb t where t.ywgzmxxh like ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' order by t.ywgzmxxh

SELECT ZFRQ_1, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, ZFYY, ZFSQRQ, ZFSQR, ZFR_DM, ZFBZ_1, BZ, FPKF_DM, TSNSRDJXH, LZFPHM, LZFPDM, KPJE, FPHM, FP_DM, FPZL_DM, DJXH, KJRQ, KPR_DM, KJSWJG_DM, DKSQUUID, FPKJXXUUID FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR FPZL_DM = ?) AND FP_DM = ? AND FPHM = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select distinct t.yjskuuid, t.zsxm_dm, t.pzxh, zsxm.zsxmmc, t.zspm_dm, zspm.zspmmc, t.djxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.yjze, t.yjye_1, t.sksx_dm, sksx.sksxmc, t.zgswskfj_dm from sb_yjskxx t, dm_gy_zsxm zsxm, dm_gy_zspm zspm, dm_zs_sksx sksx where t.djxh = ? and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=? and t.zsxm_dm = zsxm.zsxm_dm(+) and t.zspm_dm = zspm.zspm_dm(+) and t.sksx_dm = sksx.sksx_dm(+)

select a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sbxxuuid = b.sbxxuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
select * from sb_cjrjybzj t where sbuuid=? and pzxh=?
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_nd_fb5_ssyh t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
select p.* from sb_ls_pkqc t, sb_sbf_pkqc p where t.yusbxh = p.yusbxh and t.xh = p.xh and t.hhljid = ? and p.skssswjg_dm = ?
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_drwgqygghdsqk t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?

select sum(col) as qsjl from (select count(*) col from SB_FJMSDSNB_JS_SH t1,sb_sbb a where t1.pzxh =a.pzxh and a.zfbz_1='N' AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5') AND t1.djxh = ? and to_char(t1.shrq, 'YYYY') = ? union all select count(*) col from SB_FJMSDSNB_HD_SH t2,SB_SBB B where T2.PZXH =B.PZXH AND B.ZFBZ_1='N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and t2.djxh = ? and to_char(t2.shrq, 'YYYY') = ?)
select t.clsbdh,t.wszmhm,t.ybtse from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.cgssbzt = '9' and t.djxh = ? and t.clgzsjsfs_dm = ? and t.clgzsmjstj_dm = ?
select t.* from sb_yjskxxlsz t, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where t.yjskuuid = sbxx.yjskuuid and t.lyuuid_1 = sbxx.rdpzuuid and sbxx.hhljid=?
select count(*) from pz_ypr t where t.swry_dm=? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and t.yprlx_dm =?

select t.djxh,t.hy_dm,t.zgswj_dm,t.ssgly_dm,t.djzclx_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.yxbz = ? and (t.kzztdjlx_dm like '11%' or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '12%' or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '13%')
select b.* from SB_ZZS_YBNSR_FB_GDZCJXDK b where b.sbuuid=?
select pzxh from sb_tdzzssb_sbxx where sbuuid=?
select distinct b.xhfdz from fp_dk_sq a, fp_dk_zzsptfp b where a.dksquuid = b.dksquuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.xhfdz is not null and a.djxh = ?

select cgsuuid, cgssbuuid, wspzhm, clsbdh, zmsbz, ewtmc, swjgjbr_dm, zsjg_dm, ffrq, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, clpzhm, sjtb_sj, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm from sb_cgs_clgzswszm t where t.cgssbuuid = (select a.cgssbuuid from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb a where a.pzxh = ?) order by t.lrrq desc
select a.fpkf_dm, a.kfgly_dm, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.yxbz, a.sjgsrq from fp_kfgly a where a.fpkf_dm = ? and a.kfgly_dm = ?

select * from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.yzpzzl_dm <> 'BDA0610133' and t.skzl_dm in ('10', '90') union all select * from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610133' and t.skzl_dm in ('10', '20', '90')

select t.djxh gsdjxh, t.skssqq skssqq, t.skssqz skssqz, t.sbuuid zssbuuid, t.pzxh zspzxh, t.yzpzzl_dm zsyzpzzlDm, t.zsxm_dm zszsxmDm, t.zspm_dm zszspmDm, t.zszm_dm zszszmDm, t.ysx bhssre, t.ybtse bqxfsybtse, t.ynse ynse from sb_sbxx t where t.zsxm_dm = '10102' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select b.sspzjxbbh,b.jbjxdwr dwmc,b.jxsr,b.jxzr,b.pzgly_dm,b.jbjxrq,c.swjgmc cxyy from pz_sspkjbdzb a,pz_sspzjxb b, dm_gy_swjg c where b.jbjxdwr = c.swjg_dm and a.sspzjxbbh = b.sspzjxbbh and a.pzhsjg_dm = ? and a.jbrq_1 between to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and b.sfshtgbz = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.cxbz = 'N'

select count(mx.uuid) as num from sb_sbb t, sb_wtdz_skbg_fb_mx mx where t.sbuuid = mx.sbuuid and t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610130' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.pzxh = ?

select t.bduuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.bdbbz, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.bdnr, t.pbbdycyy, t.pbsbdycclyj_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.swry_dm, t.sbbdcljdbz from SB_sbbd_bdycCLxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.skssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT A.* FROM SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB A, SB_CXS_FYXXCJB B WHERE A.FYXXUUID = B.FYXXUUID AND A.YXBZ= 'Y' AND B.DJXH = ? AND ((A.SBZJSSZLQZ < TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.BGBM = '1') OR (A.SBZJSSZLQQ < TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.SBZJSSZLQZ > TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')))
select * from sb_sbxx where djxh=? and gzlx_dm_1 in (1,4,5)

select (select b.yprmc from pz_ypr b where b.ypruuid = a.ypruuid) as yprmc, (select c.pzgly_dm from pz_pzgly c where c.pzhsjg_dm = a.pzhsjg_dm and c.yxbz='Y') as swry_dm, a.pzzl_dm, a.pzhm, a.kjrq, a.szsk, a.jbjxbh, a.jbjxrq, a.yqjbjxts from pz_jbjxtssh a where a.pzhsjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select * from sb_cgs_jsfpmx t where t.cgssbuuid = ?

select ytdsybh tdsybh, sum(tdmj) tdmj from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and b.djxh = ? and ytdsybh is not null group by ytdsybh

select t.* from sb_sbf_cbjg t where t.zgswskfj_dm in (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) and t.sbqx between to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (t.djxh = ?)) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (t.ssgly_dm = ?)) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (t.cbrq is null)) and not exists (select 1 from sb_ls_sbxx ls where t.wsbuuid = ls.lsmxid and ls.hhljid = ?)
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB WHERE BGBM IN (#macroparam#) AND YXBZ = ? AND FYXXUUID = ?

select t.zspm_dm,sum(t.jsyj) jsyj,t.syslhdwse,sum(t.yjmse) yjmse,sum(t.wnbjse) wnbjse,sum(t.ydkdjdsdjse) ydkdjdsdjse,sum(t.sdkdjdsdjse) sdkdjdsdjse from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg t where sbpch=? and nvl(hzbz_1,'N')='N' group by zspm_dm,zszm_dm,syslhdwse
select distinct xzqhsz_dm,xzqhmc,sjxzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' order by xzqhsz_dm
select * from sb_sds_fjmhd_asrzehdmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from CS_SB_ZLBSYWBWDZB p where p.zlbsdl_dm=? and p.zlbsxl_dm=? and p.yxbz='Y'

SELECT T.SSPZJXBUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.SSPZJXBBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_SSPZJXB T WHERE T.JBJXDWR = ? AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SFSHTGBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.JBJXRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.JBJXRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.SSPZJXBBH

select t.djxh, t.pzxh, t.bduuid, t.sbbzsjxzqbcpbl, t.snyrlrbdsyqysb_1, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYSB_2, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYSB_3, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYSB_4, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYSB_5, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYQT_5, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYSB_6, t.SNYRLRBDSYQYSB_7 from SB_SBBD_SLYRYXXFDS t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.ddbfl='1' order by t.lrrq desc
select max(skssqz) skssqz from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx where zfbz_1='N' and fyxxuuid=?
select nvl(max(t.yzpzmxxh), 0) yzpzmxxh from sb_yjskxxlsz t where t.pzxh=?
select nvl(sum(t.ysx),0) ysx from sb_sbxx t where t.zsxm_dm='10101' and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.djxh =? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=?
select * from pz_flzjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.uuid,t.ywzjuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.sy,t.yj_1,t.sqsx,t.sqrq,t.wszzrq,t.wszg,t.shswjg,t.dzbzdszl_dm from sb_tdzzsqssh_swsxtzs t where t.ywzjuuid=?
select 1 from sb_yqwbszlqc t where t.wbszluuid = ? and t.cbuuid is not null and t.cbrq is not null
select t.pzzg_dm code,t.pzzg caption,t.pzzl_dm pcode,t.* from cs_pz_pzzgb t
select max(pzmxxh) as yzpzmxxh from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh=?
select a.* from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and b.zlbscjuuid = ? and (nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' or nvl(a.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y')
SELECT NVL(SUM(A.KPJE), 0) KPJE, NVL(SUM(A.DKSQJE), 0) DKSQJE FROM FP_DK_SQ A INNER JOIN FP_DK_HWYSYZZSFP B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE B.LZFPDM = ? AND B.LZFPHM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

Select t.pzxh, t.lrze As yfsbLrksze, t.Yylr As Yfsbyylrje, t.Mbyqndks As Yfsbagdkmbyqndksje, t.YNSSDE As Yfsbynssde, t.Sjynsdse As Yfsbsjynqysdse, t.Jmsdse As Yfsbjmqysdse, t.Jwsdybsdse As Yfsbjwsdybqysdse, t.ynse As Yfsbjnwsjynqysdse, t.Bndybtsdse As Yfsbbndybtqysdse, t.Bndljsjyyjdsdse As Yfsbbndyyjqysdse From Sb_Fjmjssb_15nd_Sdsnssbb t, Sb_Sbxx s Where s.Sbuuid = t.Sbuuid And s.Sbsx_Dm_1 = '11' And s.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And s.Djxh = ? And s.Zsfs_Dm = ? And s.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And Trunc(s.Skssqq) >= To_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') And Trunc(s.Skssqz) <= To_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and s.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zcsssqkcjtzmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select 1 from sb_sbxx sb where sb.djxh = ? and sb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sb.skssqq = ? and sb.skssqz = ? and sb.yzpzzl_dm =? and sb.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') Order By sb.lrrq Desc

select rownum as xh, y.zsxm_dm, y.zspm_dm, y.skssqq, y.skssqz, y.sbqx, nvl(y.zsdlfs_dm, 0) as zsdlfs_dm, (select b.cbrq from sb_yqwsbqc b where b.djxh = y.djxh and b.zspm_dm = y.zspm_dm and b.skssqq = y.skssqq and b.skssqz = y.skssqz and rownum = 1) as cbrq from sb_ysbtj y where y.djxh = ? and (y.nssbrq is null or y.nssbrq = date '1-1-1') and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where y.djxh = a.djxh and a.ZSXM_DM = y.ZSXM_DM and a.skssqz = y.skssqz and ((y.zsxm_dm not in ('10101', '10104', '30217') and y.zspm_dm = a.zspm_dm and y.skssqq = a.skssqq) /*普通税*/ or (y.zsxm_dm = '10101' and y.skssqq = a.skssqq) /*增值税*/ or (y.zsxm_dm = '30217' and y.skssqq = a.skssqq) /*文化事业建设费*/ or (y.zsxm_dm = '10104' and y.skssqq <= a.skssqq and ((y.skssqz + 1 < add_months(y.skssqq, 12) and a.yzpzzl_dm not in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688')) /*企业所得税非年报*/ or (y.skssqz + 1 >= add_months(y.skssqq, 12) and a.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610056', 'BDA0610688', 'BDA0610039', 'BDA0610764', 'BDA0610073', 'BDA0610766', 'BDA0610074', 'BDA0610776', 'BDA0610570')) AND (TO_CHAR(a.skssqz, 'MM') - TO_CHAR(a.skssqq, 'MM')) >= 11 /*企业所得税A类年报*/ )) /*企业所得税*/ ) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or a.sbsx_dm_1 is null))

SELECT ZQJMFB.* FROM SB_ZQJM ZQJM, SB_ZQJMFB ZQJMFB, SB_SBXX SBXX WHERE ZQJM.SBXXUUID = SBXX.SBXXUUID AND ZQJM.JMUUID = ZQJMFB.JMUUID and ZQJM.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND SBXX.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5') AND SBXX.SBUUID=? AND SBXX.PZXH = ?
select * from SB_SDS_FJMHD_YJND_SRZEHDMX t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT t.* FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYCZTSBGB T WHERE T.PZXH = ? AND T.SBUUID = ? AND t.mxuuid=?
select t.* from sb_zzsyjnssb_ywb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

SELECT T.DKSQUUID, T.FCJYCJXXUUID, T.DJXH, T.KPJE, T.DKSQJE FROM FP_FC_DKJE T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DKSQUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FCJYCJXXUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJXH = ?) AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
SELECT KJFPMXUUID, XSDBDCLPH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, BZ, KXXZ_DM, JE, DJ, MJ, MJLX_DM, FYBH, BDCXMMC, BDCXMBH, BDCFPUUID, BDCXMUUID FROM FP_DK_BDCFP_XMMX WHERE BDCFPUUID = ?
