select a.lcswsx_dm, a.slswsx_dm,a.swjg_dm from cs_gy_slswsxylcswsxdzb a,dm_gy_lcswsx c where a.slswsx_dm = (select slswsx_dm from cs_yh_clgzsmstjslswsxdzb b where b.clgzsmjstj_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y') and (#macroparam#)/*a.swjg_dm in ('')*/ and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.lcswsx_dm = c.lcswsx_dm and c.yxbz='Y' and c.xybz='Y' order by swjg_dm desc
SELECT * FROM yh_xnyqcclgzsmscxml a where ? like '%' || a.clxh || '%'
SELECT BG.ZSXM_DM, BG.ZSPM_DM, BG.SKSSQQ, BG.SKSSQZ, BG.KSSL, BG.JSYJ, BG.SE FROM SB_SYSBMXBG BG WHERE BG.PZXH = ? AND BG.DJXH = ? AND BG.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND BG.QGLBZ = 'Y'

with ls as (select ssqq, ssqz, sybh_1 from sb_ls_sbxx cc where cc.hhljid = ?) select b.clsbdm, a.djxh, b.bkjdjxh,b.zspm_dm,b.zszm_dm from sb_sbb a, (select clsbdm, sbuuid,null bkjdjxh,b.zspm_dm,b.zszm_dm from sb_ccs_2015 b, ls where b.skssqq = ls.ssqq and b.skssqz = ls.ssqz and b.clsbdm = ls.sybh_1 union all select clsbdm, sbuuid,null bkjdjxh,b.zspm_dm,b.zszm_dm from sb_ccs b, ls where b.skssqq = ls.ssqq and b.skssqz = ls.ssqz and b.clsbdm = ls.sybh_1 union all select clsbdm, sbuuid, b.bkjdjxh,b.zspm_dm,b.zszm_dm from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg b, ls where b.skssqq = ls.ssqq and b.skssqz = ls.ssqz and b.clsbdm = ls.sybh_1 union all select bdzcbsbh clsbdm, sbuuid,b.bdzdjxh bkjdjxh,b.zspm_dm,b.zszm_dm from sb_wtdz_skbg_fb_mx b, ls where b.skssqq = ls.ssqq and b.skssqz = ls.ssqz and b.bdzcbsbh = ls.sybh_1) b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

SELECT T.SBBWZ,t.djxh,t.yzpzzl_dm FROM SB_SBB T WHERE T.PZXH IN (SELECT DISTINCT B.PZXH FROM SB_SBXX B WHERE B.DJXH IN (#macroparam#) AND B.SKSSQQ = ? AND B.SKSSQZ = ? AND B.ZSXM_DM = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' ) and t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select * from PZ_YJRQSZB where yjrqnd=?

select t.ydtuuid, t.tdsfuuid, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.se, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.hy_dm, t.ttsjlx_dm from zs_ydtxx t where t.djxh =? and (1=? or to_char(t.skssqq,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=?) and (1=? or to_char(t.skssqz,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=?) and t.tzlx_dm in('1','4')
select * from sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb where syuuid=? and yxbz='Y'
select t.jdxz_dm,t.jdxzmc,t.xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_jdxz t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.xzqhsz_dm = ? order by t.jdxz_dm
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Tzsynstzmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select TRIM(c.yskm_dm) yskm_dm, TRIM(c.ysfpbl_dm) ysfpbl_dm, c.csdmz_1, c.csdmz_2, c.csdmz_3, c.csdmz_4, c.csdmz_5, c.csdmz_6, c.csdmz_7, c.csdmz_8, c.csdmz_9, c.csdmz_10, c.csdmz_11, c.csdmz_12, c.csdmz_13, c.csdmz_14, c.csdmz_15 from cs_zs_yskm_ysfpbl c where c.cslx_dm = ? and c.swjg_dm = ? and c.yxqq <= ? and c.yxqz >= ? and nvl(c.csdmz_1,'notdefault') = 'default'

with kk as (select DISTINCT b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.sbuuid, b.pzxh from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, sb_sbb b where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.gzlx_dm_1 in (?, ?) and b.sbrq_1 between ? and ? AND nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.yxbz = ? AND a.jknd = ? and a.djxh = ? ) select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, yssr bq133, ynse bq134 from kk a, sb_tdzzs_fdcqy_yz b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh union all select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4), substr(?, 5, 2), b.ZRFDCSRZE bq133, b.YJTDZZSSE bq134 from kk a, sb_tdzzssb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.dzbzdszl_dm = ? union all select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4), substr(?, 5, 2), zrfdc_srze bq133, yjtd_zzsse bq134 from kk a, sb_tdzzs_ffdckf b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.nd = ? and t.yf = ? and t.sjlybz = '2' and t.zsxm_dm is null
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYGQSBBGB t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
select * from Sb_Sds_Mbkstz t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select wbuuid from zs_yjsf_cbjtkz t ,sb_ls_sbxx l where t.wbuuid=l.lsmxid and l.hhljid=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? #macroparam# AND T.PZQSHM >= ? AND T.PZZZHM <= ? AND T.PZZT_DM = '01' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

Select Clscqy_Dm, Scqymc, Gcclscqynsrsbh, Scqyjc, Qydmscsj, Clscqyzgswjg, Cljkqymc, Cljkqynsrsbh, Cljkqyzgswjg, Sqrq, Yxbz, Lrr_Dm, Lrrq, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Sjgsdq, Clcdsx_Dm, Gcclscqyssdq, Jkclscqyssdq From Sb_Cgs_Clscqy t Where t.Clcdsx_Dm = ? And Yxbz = 'Y' And t.Clscqyzgswjg Like ?

delete from sb_swjgbfs t where t.clywlx=? and t.lrrq<sysdate-5/24 and t.swjg_dm in ( select s.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz='Y' and s.xybz='Y' and s.ghbz='Y' START WITH s.swjg_dm =? CONNECT BY PRIOR s.swjg_dm =s.sjswjg_dm )
Select t.Sbuuid, t.Djxh, t.Yxqq, t.Yxqz, t.Tsnsrlx_Dm, t.Swjg_Dm, t.Yxbz, t.Tsywgluuid From Sb_Cs_Tsnsrwhb t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Yxbz = ?
select /*+RESULT_CACHE*/jkqxgz from dm_gy_jkqx where jkqx_dm =? and xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
select t.* from sb_sbb t where nvl(t.Zfbz_1, 'N') = ? And t.yzpzzl_dm = ? And t.Gzlx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq = ? And t.Skssqz = ?
SELECT YSFPBL_DM,YSFPBLMC,zyjbl,ssjbl,dsjbl,qxjbl,xzjbl from DM_GY_YSFPBL where ysfpbl_dm=? AND xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
select yjsk.* from sb_ls_sbxx sbxx, sb_yjskxx yjsk where sbxx.yjskuuid = yjsk.yjskuuid and sbxx.hhljid = ?

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwsbqc a And a.Sbrq Is Null And a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (a.Skssqq >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (a.Skssqz <= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (a.Nsrsbh = ?)) And ('1' = #macroparam# Or a.Sjgsdq Like ?)

SELECT UUID, YSUUID, JMMJ, YJMSJE_1, JMSXMMC_1, SSJMXZ_DM, JMFS_DM, JMSL, YXQQ, YXQZ, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, JMQXQ, JMQXZ, JMSZJSR, JMED, JMFD, JMZLX_DM, JMSLX_DM, JMSFCYZ FROM SB_CXS_YSJMXZXX WHERE YSUUID = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY YXQQ
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.nd = ? and t.yf = ? and t.sjlybz = '1'

select b.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb a, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx b, sb_zlbscjb c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zlfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' and c.djxh = ? and b.fybh in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#
select pgjg from (select pgjg, rank() over(partition by fwuuid order by a.lrrq, uuid desc) xh from wbjh_pgqsjyjg a where a.fwuuid = ?) where xh = 1
select * from cs_sb_cbjpjgz where swjg_dm = ? and year=? and yxbz=?
select * from sb_cxs_fdcjyjghdb_spxx a where #macroparam#
Select * From sb_fqdqdzcpcljjyjsl t Where t.Sbuuid = ? and t.pzxh=?
select max(to_number(t.jylx_dm)) + 1 from dm_kj_jylx t
select * from sb_zzs_xgm xgm where xgm.sbuuid in (select sb.sbuuid from sb_sbb sb where sb.djxh=?) and ewblxh='1'
select * from sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb a where a.djxh=? and a.yxbz='Y' and (#macroparam#)
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb1_glgx t where t.sbuuid = ?

select t.* from sb_ls_pkqc a,sb_sbf_pkqc t where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.zspm_dm=t.zspm_dm and (a.zszm_dm is null or a.zszm_dm=t.zszm_dm) and a.skssqq=t.skssqq and a.skssqz=t.skssqz and a.hhljid = ? and nvl(t.kkzt_dm,'x') in (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or t.zgswskfj_dm =?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssswjg_dm=?)
Select t.* From Wbjh_Zjfwzx_Lspzxx t Where t.Fsrq > Add_Months(Sysdate, -3)
select t.sbuuid,t.pzxh,t.zsxm_dm,t.zspm_dm,t.zszm_dm,t.bdcxmbh,t.yssr,t.hbsr,t.swsrjqtsr,t.stxssr,t.yzl,t.ynse,t.yjse,t.ybtse from sb_tdzzs_fdcqy_yz t where sbuuid=?

select distinct t1.yzpzzl_dm, t1.nssbrq, t1.skssqq, t1.skssqz, t1.zsxm_dm, t1.ybtse, t2.yjskzt_dm, t1.pzxh from sb_gssbxx t1, zs_yjsf t2 where t1.pzxh = t2.yzpzxh and t1.sbsx_dm_1 = '21' and t1.djxh = ? and t1.skssqq >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t1.skssqz <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and(1 = ? or t1.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and t1.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t1.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_NSTZXMMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select t.* from sb_fxmtysb_grczzf_aysbqk t where t.djxh=? #macroparam#

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_ls_fcjyxx l where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = l.fcjycjxxuuid and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and l.fyjbxxuuid = ? and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = ?

select zspm_dm,sum(ysbse) yjse from ( select c.zspm_dm,sum(c.se) ysbse from sb_zlbs_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbscjb b ,sb_zlbs_sysbmxbg_mx c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and b.djxh=? and a.sybh_1=? and c.zsxm_dm=? and c.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and c.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by c.zspm_dm union all select b.zspm_dm, sum(se) ysbse from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and b.sybh_1 = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') group by b.zspm_dm ) group by zspm_dm

select ROUND(TO_NUMBER(c.sjxhrq - c.jkqx)) as wydzts, sum(c.yjse) as jsyj, c.zsswjg_dm from zs_yjsf a,zs_wsz b,zs_jks c where a.zsuuid=b.zsuuid and b.hzspuuid=c.spuuid and a.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610131' and c.sjxhrq is not null and c.djxh = ? and c.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and c.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and ROUND(TO_NUMBER(c.sjxhrq - c.jkqx))>0 group by ROUND(TO_NUMBER(c.sjxhrq - c.jkqx)), c.zsswjg_dm

select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, jglx, clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from (select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '现行' as jglx, clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb where ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clscqymc like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcpxh) like ?) union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '暂行' as jglx, ZXLSXLH as clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg zxzdjsjg where zxzdjsjg.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(zxzdjsjg.clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(zxzdjsjg.clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or zxzdjsjg.clscqymc like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(zxzdjsjg.clcpxh) like ?) and (#macroparam#) /*zxzdjsjg.hdswjg_dm in ()*/ union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '备案' as jglx, BALSXLH as clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clscqymc like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(clcpxh) like ?) and cjhdbz = 'N' and zgswjg_dm = ?)
select lcslid,skssqq,skssqz from sb_sbbd_bdycclxx where bduuid=?
select a.hy_dm code, a.hymc caption from dm_gy_hy a, zs_ls_kjshjygs_hy b where a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.xlbz = 'Y' and a.hy_dm = b.hy_dm order by a.hy_dm asc

select t.djxh, t.hdzxqq yxqq, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.wdqzdbz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.sjzxqz >= ? union all select a.djxh, a.hdqxq yxqq, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, null from zs_hd_qtszhd_jg a, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where a.djxh = ls.djxh and a.sjzxqz >= ?
select t.* from sb_ysbtj t where t.nd=? and t.yf=? and t.djxh=?

with t as (select rownum as xh, a.ysuuid, a.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_1, a.jmmj JMMJ_1, a.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_1, b.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_2, b.jmmj JMMJ_2, b.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_2, c.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_3, c.jmmj JMMJ_3, c.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_3 from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a2 on a.ysuuid = a2.ysuuid and a2.yxbz = 'Y' and a2.yxqq <= sysdate and a2.yxqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -24) inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb a1 on a1.syuuid = a2.syuuid and a1.yxbz = 'Y' and a1.pkbz = 'Y' and a1.zgswskfj_dm =? left join sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx b on a.ysuuid = b.ysuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.uuid <> b.uuid left join sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c on a.ysuuid = c.ysuuid and c.yxbz = 'Y' and b.uuid <> c.uuid and a.uuid <> c.uuid where a.yxbz = 'Y') select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrlx, t.tdsybh, t.hy_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.dh_1, t.tdsyzbh, t2.*, e.nsqx_dm, e.sbqx_dm, e.jkqx_dm, f.nsrsbh, f.nsrmc, f.nsrzt_dm, f.hy_dm, f.djzclx_dm, t1.ysuuid, t1.syuuid, t1.zspm_dm, t1.tddj_dm, t1.ystdmj, t1.dwse, t1.yxqq, t1.yxqz, t1.bgbm from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx t1 left join (select * from (select t.* from t where t.xh in (select min(xh) from t group by ysuuid))) t2 on t1.ysuuid = t2.ysuuid inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb t on t1.syuuid = t.syuuid and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.bgbm = '1' and t.pkbz = 'Y' and t.zgswskfj_dm = ? left join rd_sfzrdxxb e on t.djxh = e.djxh and e.zsxm_dm = '10112' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= e.rdyxqq and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= e.rdyxqz left join dj_nsrxx f on t.djxh = f.djxh and t1.yxqq <= sysdate and t1.yxqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -13)

select gz.jylx_dm, gz.jyfhbz, lx.jylx_mc from Dm_Kj_Jygz gz, dm_kj_jylx lx where gz.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm and gz.jylx_dm = ? and gz.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) #macroparam#
select * from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.swjg_dm =? and t.pzzl_dm=? and t.xybz = 'Y'

select sum(b.jsyj) as jsyjhj from sb_sbb a,sb_dkdj_fb_skmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.uuid and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a. and a.skssqq=? and a.skssqz = ? and b.bkjdjxh = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ?
SELECT T.YPRUUID CODE, T.YPRMC CAPTION FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.SWRY_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ
select t.* from sb_dkdj_zqjyyhsbgb t where t.sbuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT Y.PZHSJG_DM, Y.YPRMC, Y.SWRY_DM, Y.DJXH FROM PZ_YPR Y WHERE Y.YPRUUID = ? AND Y.YPRLX_DM = ? AND y.yxbz = 'Y'

Select Cgsuuid, Cgssbuuid, Wspzhm, Clsbdh, Zmsbz, Swjgjbr_Dm, Zsjg_Dm, Ffrq, Lrr_Dm, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Clpzhm, Pzzl_Dm, Pzzg_Dm, Pzhm From Sb_Cgs_Clgzswszm t Where t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And (1 = #macroparam# Or t.Cgsuuid = ?) And (1 = #macroparam# Or t.Cgssbuuid = ?) And (1 = #macroparam# Or t.Clsbdh = ?) And (1 = #macroparam# Or t.Wspzhm = ?)
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb10_Zcjz t Where t.sbuuid=? ORDER BY t.ewbhxh ASC
select zlbsuuid,ssqq,ssqz,lrrq from sb_zlbscjb where djxh = ? and ssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and ssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and bszl_dm = ?

WITH PZZL AS (SELECT DISTINCT ZL.PZZL_DM CODE, NULL PCODE, ZL.PZZLMC CAPTION, ZL.WHPBZ, ZL.PHCD, ZL.WBPZBZ,cs.swjg_dm FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL CS, DM_PZ_PZZL ZL WHERE CS.PZZL_DM = ZL.PZZL_DM AND ZL.XYBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SYSDATE <= NVL(ZL.TYRQ, SYSDATE) AND CS.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM qx_swjg_zns J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? AND zn_dm='09' and yxbz='Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM AND zn_dm='09' and yxbz='Y')) SELECT CODE, PCODE, CAPTION, WHPBZ, PHCD, WBPZBZ FROM PZZL UNION SELECT PZZG_DM CODE, PZZL_DM PCODE, PZZG CAPTION, NULL WHPBZ, NULL PHCD, NULL WBPZBZ FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB PZZG WHERE PZZG.PZZL_DM IN (SELECT PZZL_DM FROM PZZL) AND PZZG.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM qx_swjg_zns J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? AND zn_dm='09' and yxbz='Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM AND zn_dm='09' and yxbz='Y') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(PZZG.YXQSRQ) AND TRUNC(PZZG.YXZZRQ)

insert into sb_swjgbfs t (t.clywlx,t.swjg_dm,t.lrr_dm,t.lrrq,t.sjgsdq,t.hhljid) select ?,s.swjg_dm,'99999999999',sysdate,?,? FROM dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz='Y' and s.xybz='Y' and s.swjgbz='0' and s.jgjc_dm in ('51','52') START WITH s.swjg_dm =? CONNECT BY PRIOR s.swjg_dm =s.sjswjg_dm

select a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, sum(se) je from SB_SYSBMXBG a, SB_SBB b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.djxh = b.djxh and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? group by a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm

select * from (select sldjb.zlbsuuid, sldjb.nsrsbh, sldjb.nsrmc, sldjb.zlbsdl_dm, sldjb.zlbsxl_dm, sldjb.zllx, sldjb.zlsl, sldjb.slr_dm, sldjb.slrq, sldjb.slswjg_dm, sldjb.cfdz, cjb.djxh, cjb.ssqq, cjb.ssqz, cjb.bszl_dm, cjb.zlbscjuuid, cjb.bbh from SB_ZLBSSLDJB sldjb, sb_zlbscjb cjb where sldjb.zlbsuuid = cjb.zlbsuuid and cjb.bszl_dm = ? and cjb.ssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and cjb.ssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and cjb.djxh = ? order by cjb.lrrq desc) where rownum = 1
SELECT GLY.PZGLYUUID, GLY.PZHSJG_DM, GLY.PZGLY_DM, GLY.JGJC_DM, GLY.PZHSJGYXQSRQ, GLY.PZHSJGYXZZRQ FROM PZ_PZGLY GLY WHERE GLY.PZGLY_DM = ? AND gly.yxbz='Y'

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zgswskfj_dm from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.sbrq_1 is NULL and (1 = ? or (t.zsxm_dm != '10104' or (to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') != '01' or to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') != '12'))) and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and (a.zsxm_dm in ('10101', '30217') or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (t.zspm_dm = '101060200' or t.zsxm_dm != '10106') and (a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' or a.sbsx_dm_1 is null or a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610688') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')) and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx b, dj_nsrxx dj where b.gshgshdjxh = t.djxh and b.gshgshdjxh = dj.djxh and b.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and b.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm and b.skssqq <= t.skssqz and b.skssqz >= t.skssqq and ((b.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and b.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and not (dj.djzclx_dm in ('175', '171', '172') or dj.djzclx_dm like '41%') and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = b.djxh and tzf.yxqq <= b.skssqq and tzf.yxqz >= b.skssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and gsxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and gsxx.skssqq >= tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz <= tzf.yxqz))) or (b.zspm_dm not in ('101060300', '101060200') or (b.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and (dj.djzclx_dm in ('175', '171', '172') or dj.djzclx_dm like '41%')))))

select '1' as kjywlx, yqkj.kjywrsbh as nsrZqjmgnssbh , yqkj.gjhdqmc as nsrJmghdqmcjdm, yqkj.fjmqyzwmc as nsrZzgjnzwmc, yqkj.fjmqyywmc as nsrZzgjnywmc, yqkj.fjmqyzqjmgzwdz as nsrZqjmgzwdz, yqkj.fjmqyzqjmgywdz as nsrZqjmgywdz, yqkj.zqjmgnsrywmc as nsrZqjmgywmc, yqkj.zqjmgnsrzwmc as nsrZqjmgzwmc, yqkj.fjmnsrsbh, yqkj.hthxymc as nsrHtmc, yqkj.hth as nsrHtbh, yqkj.htzxqsrq as nsrHtzxqssj, yqkj.htzxzzrq as nsrHtzxzzsj, yqkj.gjhdqsz_dm as nsrJmghdqmcjdm, yqkj.htje as nsrHtzje ,HTBZ as bz,zfbz_2,zfxmmc as qysdssdlxDm1 from sb_fjm_kjqysdshtbadjb yqkj where fjmdjxh = ? and nvl(yqkj.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_yjd_btzwgqyxx t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?

select t.YDDKUUID, t.DKSQUUID, t.DJXH, t.DKFPLB_DM, t.SKSSQQ, t.SKSSQZ, t.ZSXM_DM, t.ZSPM_DM, t.KPJE, t.SFL, t.YBSFE, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ from SB_YDDKFPSJB t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? and t.zsxm_dm=?
SELECT distinct t.shrnsrsbh, t.shrmc, t.fhrnsrsbh, t.fhrmc, t.spfnsrsbh, t.spfnsrmc FROM fp_dk_hwysyzzsfp t WHERE t.cyrdjxh=?
select * from PZ_SSPKJBDZB where sspkjbduuid=?
select * from sb_cxs_fdcjyjghdb_spjg where yxbz='Y' #macroparam#

select b.zspm_dm, b.zsxm_dm,b.skssqq,b.skssqz,b.nsqx_dm from sb_sbb a ,sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610794','BDA0610100') and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.djxh=? and b.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.zsxm_dm=? and (b.nsqx_dm !='11' or b.nsqx_dm is null)

select b.zlbscjuuid,b.djxh,b.ssqq,b.ssqz,a.pzzl_dm,a.lrrq,a.pzzg,a.pzhm,a.sybz_dm_1,a.sybh_1,a.syzl,a.fysz_bdcxmbh,a.fysz_bdcxmdz from sb_zlbs_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.ssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.ssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.djxh=?
select * from dm_gy_ssjmxz t where t.ssjmxz_dm = ? and t.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.xybz = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from sb_fjmqysdszxsb_2015 Where Sbuuid = ?

SELECT YSYSKMXUUID, DKSQUUID, DKFPLB_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, PMSE, BCKCSE, SKSX, GLDKSQUUID, HY_DM, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, SFMXUUID, ZFRQ_1, SPUUID, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, KKCSE, JSFYJ, SFL, JSYJ, DJXH, KSYSKUUID FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

select sum(fb1.ypxs_yjse) + sum(fb1.qt_yjse) se from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr, sb_sbb sbb, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_yzqy_yjn fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz >= ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid = fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq >= ? and sbb.skssqz <= ?
select ry.swry_dm ,ry.rysfmc,ry.swry_dm code,ry.rysfmc caption from dm_qx_swrysf ry where ry.yxbz='Y' and ry.sfswjg_dm=? #macroparam#
select nh, nnch, count(1) zch, max(to_number(cnyh)) cnyh, min(lrrq) lrrq from yh_clgzsmstc where (1 = ? or nh = ?) and (1 = ? or nnch = ?) group by nh, nnch order by nh desc, nnch desc

select sum(fb1.jxse)+sum(fb1.je) jse from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr,sb_sbb sbb ,sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_hkys_qdjx fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz > = ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid=fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq <= ? and sbb.skssqz >= ?
select bqccjg, bqcklsjg, zdjsjg, yf from sb_cgs_clzdjsjghd where clxlh = ? and nd = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select distinct a.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbs_zdsyqyjbxx a inner join sb_zlbscjb b on a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.sdbz = 'Y' inner join sb_zlbssldjb c on c.zlbsuuid = b.zlbsuuid and c.zlbsxl_dm = 'ZL1005001' and c.ssqq = ? and c.nsrsbh in (#macroparam#) and c.nsrmc in (#macroparam#)

select t.sspkjbduuid ypzuuid, t.sspkjbdbh ypzbh, t.jbrq_1 ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.lrr_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.shbz='Y' and t.sbbz='Y' and t.sspzjxbbh is not null and t.jbrq_1 between ? and ? and not exists (select 1 from pz_flz b where b.yspzhm = t.sspkjbduuid and b.xhuuid is null) and not exists(select 1 from pz_gztzs a where t.SSPKJBDUUID=a.yspzhm and a.tybz is null)

SELECT SUM(YBTSE) SE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.ZSUUID, T.YBTSE FROM ZS_YJSF T, ZS_JKS B, SB_SBXX A WHERE T.YZPZXH = A.PZXH AND T.ZSUUID = B.ZSUUID AND T.DJXH = ? AND B.RKRQ >= ? AND B.RKRQ <= ? AND A.SBSX_DM_1 = ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND T.SKZL_DM != '20')
select pzxh from sb_sbb t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq >=? and t.skssqz <=? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and t.zfbz_1='N'
select t.* from pz_ypr t where t.swry_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq

select a.djxh zrfdjxh,b.zrfsbbz zrfsbbz_1, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_TDCZRXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and b.csfdjxh = ? and b.tdsybh = ? and (nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' or nvl(b.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'N')
select t.cfdz from SB_ZLBSSLDJB t where t.zlbsuuid=?
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_FJSMB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? and dzbzdszl_dm =?

with c as (select a.ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 maxskssq from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a inner join SB_CXS_CzJZSYMXB b on b.czsyuuid = a.ysuuid and b.bgbm = '1' and b.yxbz = 'Y' where a.djxh =? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by a.ysuuid) select t.czsyuuid, t.fyxxuuid, t.czfnsrsbh, t.czfnsrmc, t.czmj, t.htzjzsr, t.htydzlqq, t.htydzlqz, t.sbzjsr, nvl(c.maxskssq, t.sbzjsszlqq) sbzjsszlqq, t.sbzjsszlqz, t.sl_1, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.yczsyuuid, t.yxbz, t.zspm_dm, t.bgbm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.pkbz, t.jmxzdmxx, t.jmshj from SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB t inner join SB_CXS_FYXXCJB a on a.fyxxuuid =t.fyxxuuid left join c on c.ysuuid=t.cZsyuuid where a.djxh =? and t.bgbm = '1' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.maxskssq, t.sbzjsszlqq) < t.sbzjsszlqz and #macroparam#

WITH T1 AS (SELECT KK.KJRQ FROM ZS_SKY_KKXX KK WHERE KK.KKZT_DM IN ('01', '02') AND KK.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? UNION ALL SELECT B.KJRQ FROM ZS_SKY_PLTKZB B WHERE B.SKYJYLX_DM = 'SKTKA1' AND B.KKZT_DM IN ('01', '02') AND B.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?) SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(KJRQ), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM T1

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.fdcjylx_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from CS_SB_FDCYTHSKPZB a where trim(a.fdcjylx_dm) = ?) a, (SELECT t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg t START WITH t.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y') where xh = 1
select * from (select a.*, rank() over(PARTITION by a.bh order by lrrq desc) xh from SB_FJM_KJQYSDSHTBADJB a where a.BH = ? and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N') where xh = '1'
select pzxh as yzpzxh from sb_sbb where djxh=? and yzpzzl_dm=? and skssqq=? and skssqz=? and zfbz_1='N'

SELECT S.DJXH,S.ZSXM_DM ,s.zspm_dm ,s.skssqq,s.skssqz,s.sksx_dm as sksx,s.yjye_1 as yjse_1,s.yjskuuid FROM SB_YJSKXX S WHERE S.DJXH=? AND S.ZSXM_DM=? AND (1=? or S.ZSPM_DM=?) AND S.SKSSQQ >= ? AND S.SKSSQZ <= ?

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrlx, t.tdsybh, t.hy_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.dh_1, t.tdsyzbh, e.nsqx_dm, e.sbqx_dm, e.jkqx_dm, t1.ysuuid, t1.syuuid, t1.zspm_dm, t1.tddj_dm, t1.ystdmj, t1.dwse, t1.yxqq, t1.yxqz, t1.bgbm, t.tdsybh as SYBH_1 from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx t1 inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb t on t1.syuuid = t.syuuid and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.bgbm = '1' and t.zgswskfj_dm = ? left join rd_sfzrdxxb e on t.djxh = e.djxh and e.zsxm_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= e.rdyxqq and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= e.rdyxqz and e.zsdlfs_dm in (?, ?) inner join DJ_LS_DJXHNSRSBH f on t.djxh = f.djxh and t1.yxqq <= sysdate and t1.yxqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate),?)
SELECT PZZL_DM FROM PZ_YPRPZHDXXB WHERE YPRUUID = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT T.* FROM SB_SBXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM IN ('BDA0610056','BDA0610040','BDA0610688', 'BDA0610756') AND t.gzlx_dm_1 IN('1','4','5') AND t.zfbz_1 ='N' ORDER BY LRRQ DESC
select t.xfssysl, t.hzdxfsjsjg from SB_XFSJG_JYXFSJSJGHDB t where t.jyphgg = ? and t.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select t.ysyskmxuuid, t.dksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zsxm_dm, t.wspzzl_dm, t.wspzzg, t.wspzhm, t.bckcse, t.pmse, t.sksx, t.gldksquuid, t.hy_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.sfmxuuid, t.skssqq, t.spuuid, t.skssqz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.xgrq, t.kkcse, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.jsyj, t.djxh, t.ksyskuuid, t.lzsfmxuuid from fp_dk_ysyskmx t where t.spuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzgly_dm = ? AND a.pzhsjgyxqsrq <= trunc(SYSDATE) AND a.pzhsjgyxzzrq > trunc(SYSDATE)
UPDATE SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB SET YXBZ = 'N', XGRQ = SYSDATE, XGR_DM = ? WHERE CZSYUUID IN (#macroparam#)
SELECT t.pzzl_dm code,t.pzzlmc caption,t.* FROM cs_pz_swjgdypzzl t WHERE t.swjg_dm = ?

/*进口(免抵调)*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, mdtkse bq112 /*当期免抵税额*/ from dj_nsrxx a, zs_mdtkmxb b where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.xhrq_1 between ? and ? and a.djxh=? and (yskm_dm like '1010103%' or yskm_dm like '1010105%' or yskm_dm like '1010203%' or yskm_dm like '1010102%' or yskm_dm like '1010202%')

SELECT A.* FROM SB_CXS_TDSYXXCJB A INNER JOIN SB_CXS_TDSYYSXX B ON A.SYUUID = B.SYUUID WHERE DJXH =? AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' and b.yxbz='Y' AND （A.czrsj IS NULL OR TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.czrsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ）
Select * From Sb_Cs_Tsnsrwhb t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Yxbz = ? And t.yxqq<=to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And t.yxqz>=to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And t.tsnsrlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

select t.pzzl_dm as code, t.pzzlmc as caption, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzlmc, t.xjpzbz, t.whpbz, t.phcd from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and (t.swjg_dm = ? or t.swjg_dm like '000%') and t.pzzl_dm in (select pzzl_dm from pz_yprpzhdxxb a where sysdate between a.yxqsrq and a.yxzzrq and a.sjgsdq like ? and a.ypruuid = ?)
delete from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx_sh where fcjycjxxuuid=? and lcslid=?
select * from sb_zzs_ldsklsz where pzxh=?
select * from sb_qyndglbg_bgqyxxb_jbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(t.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y' order by t.lrrq desc
select t.ysjtqyxmlx_dm as code, t.ysjtqyxmlxmc as caption from dm_sb_ysjtqyxmlx t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y'
update sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a set a.gmfsbbz = 'N' where a.zlbscjuuid in (select zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb where nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(a.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.gmfpzxh = ?

select * from (select t.* from sb_wtdz_zqjyyhsbgb_skmx t, sb_sbb sb where t.sbuuid = sb.sbuuid and sb.djxh = ? and t.zspm_dm = ? and nvl(sb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and sb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and to_char(sb.skssqq, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') order by t.lrrq desc) where rownum = 1
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Sydwmjfylszb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select sum(xfs.bqjnqqynse) bqjnqqynse from sb_xfs xfs where xfs.sbuuid in( select sbb.sbuuid from sb_sbb sbb inner join sb_xfs_zb zb on sbb.sbuuid = zb.sbuuid where sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.djxh = ? and sbb.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sbb.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and zb.zspm_dm in(#macroparam#) )

SELECT A.FPKJXXUUID, A.DKSQUUID, A.KJSWJG_DM, A.KPR_DM, TO_CHAR(A.KJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') KJRQ, A.DJXH, A.FPZL_DM, A.FP_DM, A.FPHM, A.KPJE, A.LZFPDM, A.LZFPHM, A.TSNSRDJXH, A.FPKF_DM, A.BZ, A.ZFBZ_1, A.ZFR_DM, A.ZFSQR, A.ZFSQRQ, A.ZFYY, A.SJGSDQ, A.LRR_DM, A.LRRQ, A.XGR_DM, A.XGRQ, A.ZFRQ_1, A.SJTB_SJ, B.DKFPLB_DM FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX A INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE A.ZFBZ_1='N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.DKSQUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.FP_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.FPHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.LZFPDM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.LZFPHM = ?) order by A.KJRQ desc

select t.* from sb_sbxx t where t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610100', 'BDA0610642', 'BDA0610611', 'BDA0610125') and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.sbsx_dm_1='11' and t.djxh = ? and t.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.cgssbuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select * from DM_GY_XZQH a start with a.sjxzqhsz_dm = ? and xybz = 'Y' connect by prior a.xzqhsz_dm = a.sjxzqhsz_dm union select * from DM_GY_XZQH a where a.xzqhsz_dm = ? and xybz = 'Y' union select * from DM_GY_XZQH a start with a.sjxzqhsz_dm in (select xzqhsz_dm from cs_dj_swjggxgwxzqhdzb where swjg_dm = ?) and xybz = 'Y' connect by prior a.xzqhsz_dm = a.sjxzqhsz_dm union select * from DM_GY_XZQH a where a.xzqhsz_dm in (select xzqhsz_dm from cs_dj_swjggxgwxzqhdzb where swjg_dm = ?) and xybz = 'Y'

WITH SWJG AS (SELECT YPRUUID, YPRMC, DECODE(WT.DJXH, NULL, WT.SWRY_DM, NULL) AS SWRY_DM, WT.DJXH FROM PZ_YPR WT WHERE WT.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND wt.yxbz='Y') SELECT (NVL(YPRYHPSL, 0) + NVL(SDDWYHPSL, 0) + NVL(YPRWHPSL, 0) + NVL(SDDWWHPSL, 0)) AS KJS, (NVL(LQS, 0) - NVL(FCS, 0)) AS LFS, SWJG.YPRUUID AS PZDWDM, SWJG.YPRMC AS PZDWMC, DECODE((NVL(YPRYHPSL, 0) + NVL(SDDWYHPSL, 0) + NVL(YPRWHPSL, 0) + NVL(SDDWWHPSL, 0)), 0, '', ROUND((NVL(LQS, 0) - NVL(FCS, 0)) / (NVL(YPRYHPSL, 0) + NVL(SDDWYHPSL, 0) + NVL(YPRWHPSL, 0) + NVL(SDDWWHPSL, 0)), 2)) AS BS FROM SWJG LEFT JOIN (SELECT NVL(SUM(T.LQSL), 0) AS LQS, T2.LQDWR FROM PZ_SSPZLFDMXB T, PZ_SSPZLFDZB T2 WHERE T.PZLFDUUID IN (SELECT PZLFDUUID FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB W WHERE W.LFDLX_DM = '3' AND W.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND W.LQDWR IN (SELECT YPRUUID FROM SWJG) AND W.FFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND T2.PZLFDUUID = T.PZLFDUUID GROUP BY T2.LQDWR) A ON SWJG.YPRUUID = A.LQDWR LEFT JOIN (SELECT NVL(SUM(T.LQSL), 0) AS FCS, T2.FFDWR FROM PZ_SSPZLFDMXB T, PZ_SSPZLFDZB T2 WHERE T.PZLFDUUID IN (SELECT PZLFDUUID FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB W WHERE W.LFDLX_DM = '4' AND W.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND W.FFDWR IN (SELECT YPRUUID FROM SWJG) AND W.FFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND T2.PZLFDUUID = T.PZLFDUUID GROUP BY T2.FFDWR) B ON SWJG.YPRUUID = B.FFDWR LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS YPRYHPSL, T1.YPRUUID FROM ZS_PZSYQK T, PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T.KPR_DM = T1.SWRY_DM AND T1.YPRUUID IN (SELECT YPRUUID FROM SWJG) AND t1.yxbz='Y' AND T1.YPRLX_DM = '12' AND T.SDDWDJXH IS NULL AND T.PZCXSYBJ IS NULL AND T.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') GROUP BY T1.YPRUUID) C ON SWJG.YPRUUID = C.YPRUUID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SDDWYHPSL, T1.YPRUUID FROM ZS_PZSYQK T, PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T.SDDWDJXH = T1.DJXH AND T1.YPRUUID IN (SELECT YPRUUID FROM SWJG) AND t1.yxbz='Y' AND T1.YPRLX_DM = '31' AND T.PZCXSYBJ IS NULL AND T.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') GROUP BY T1.YPRUUID) D ON SWJG.YPRUUID = D.YPRUUID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(G.PZSL) AS YPRWHPSL, G1.YPRUUID FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP G, PZ_YPR G1 WHERE G.KPR_DM = G1.SWRY_DM AND G1.YPRUUID IN (SELECT YPRUUID FROM SWJG) AND g1.yxbz='Y' AND G1.YPRLX_DM = '12' AND G.SDDWDJXH IS NULL AND G.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') GROUP BY G1.YPRUUID) E ON SWJG.YPRUUID = E.YPRUUID LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(G.PZSL) AS SDDWWHPSL, G1.YPRUUID FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP G, PZ_YPR G1 WHERE G.SDDWDJXH = G1.DJXH AND G1.YPRUUID IN (SELECT YPRUUID FROM SWJG) AND g1.yxbz='Y' AND G1.YPRLX_DM = '31' AND G.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') GROUP BY G1.YPRUUID) F ON SWJG.YPRUUID = F.YPRUUID
select * from pz_sspztyzfzb where bbdw_dm = ? and zstybz = 'N' and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select xxptfpbhsxsesb, xxptfpsesb, xxzyfpcbjesb, xxzyfpcbsesb, jxffdqrzjesb, jxffdqrzsesb, jxffdqhyjesb, jxffdqhyjefp, jxffdqhzzcsesb, jxfdqjhzpjesb, jxfdqjhzpsesb, jxfdqjhhgsesb, bduuid from sb_sbbd_zzsybnsr_ycsbdygz where djxh=? and skssqq=? and skssqz=? order by lrrq desc

select t.bduuid, t.djxh, t.pzxh, t.skskjfpkjjetyysrsb_1, t.skskjfpkjjetyysrfp_1,t.skskjfpkjjetyysrsb_2, t.skskjfpkjjetyysrfp_2,t.skskjfpkjjetyysrsb_3, t.skskjfpkjjetyysrfp_3,t.qtptfpkjjetyysrsb, t.qtptfpkjjetyysrfp from SB_SBBD_YYSPBBD t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.yxbz='Y' order by t.lrrq desc
select t.* from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.djxh =? and t.zsxm_dm = '10104' and to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') = '01' and to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') = '12' and t.sbrq_1 is null

Select a.Swjg_Dm, a.Qysdsyspfbl, a.Qysdsysfpblmc, a.Dffxbfjmhysfpbl, a.Dffxbfjmhysfpblmc From Cs_Sb_Qysdsjzmzysfpblpzb a, (Select t.Swjg_Dm, t.Jgjc_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg t Start With t.Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior t.Sjswjg_Dm = t.Swjg_Dm) b Where a.Swjg_Dm = b.Swjg_Dm And a.Yxbz = 'Y' Order By b.Jgjc_Dm Desc
select t.* from pz_ypr t where t.djxh = ? and t.yprlx_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq
select t.* from sb_yhspdsbg t where t.sbuuid = ?
select t.zlbsuuid,t.zlbsuuid_gdjh from sb_gdjh_zlbsuuidglb t where t.zlbsuuid_gdjh=?

select * from ( SELECT T.PZJCUUID,T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? AND T.PZZG_DM = ? AND T.PZZT_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' UNION SELECT T1.PZJCUUID,T1.PZZL_DM, T1.PZZG_DM, T1.PZQSHM, T1.PZZZHM FROM PZ_JC_CSH T1 WHERE T1.PZZL_DM = ? AND T1.PZZG_DM = ? AND T1.YXBZ = 'Y' ) where pzjcuuid not in (#macroparam#)
select * from DM_SB_SBBDXM t where t.sbbdxm_dm=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='N'

select B.* from sb_sbb a, Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Ggywxckndtzb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND A.DJXH =? AND A.SKSSQZ =? AND B.ZFBZ_1 ='N' and rownum =1

SELECT NVL(SUM(SQ.KPJE), 0) KPJE, NVL(SUM(SQ.DKSQJE), 0) SQJE FROM FP_DK_SQ SQ,FP_DK_FPKJXX KJ WHERE SQ.DKSQUUID=KJ.DKSQUUID AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SQ.DKFPLB_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND SQ.DJXH = ? AND KJ.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND KJ.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SQ.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SQ.KJBZ = 'Y' AND KJ.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select * from pz_sspzjjb where lcslid = ? and jjbz = ?
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYGQSBBGB t where t.GQSGFNSSBH=? or t.BSGQYNSSBH=?

select * from ZDSY_JK_QYTHQC a where a.bbq = ? and a.jkcj in (#macroparam#) and a.SWJG_DM in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and nvl(a.sfjs, 'N') != 'Y'

select a.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj a, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.skssqz = sbxx.ssqz and a.skssqq = sbxx.ssqq and a.nssbrq is null and (a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm or a.zsdlfs_dm is null) and ((a.zsxm_dm not in ('10101', '30217') and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm) or a.zsxm_dm in ('10101','30217')) and nvl(sbxx.sybh_1, 'X') = nvl(a.sybh_1, nvl(sbxx.sybh_1, 'X')) and (a.sjlybz is null or a.sjlybz <> '2') and sbxx.hhljid = ?
SELECT * FROM SB_YQTDM T WHERE T.XYBZ='Y' and t.djxh = ?
SELECT YQSBUUID, HZYJ FROM SB_YQSBHZB WHERE pzxh = ? AND (ZFBZ_1 IS NULL OR ZFBZ_1='N')
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_MBKSMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?

select t1.pzzl_dm,t1.pzzg_dm,t1.pzqshm,t1.pzzzhm,t1.kjs,t1.zfs from pz_flz t1 where t1.pzdw_dm = ? and t1.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t1.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t1.pzzy_dm <= '10' and t1.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select a.*, b.NSRSBH,b.NSRMC from SB_KSHZTLSSZSJGWH a,DJ_NSRXX b where a.DJXH=b.DJXH and (a.ZSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) or a.LRR_DM = ?) and a.zfbz_1='N'

with abc as (select /*+materialize*/b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_fcjy b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and djxh = ?) select a.djxh mfdjxh, b.*, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.cjjg from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b, abc c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.mfNSRSBH = c.ZRFNSRSBH and b.GMFNSRSBH = c.csfnsrsbh and b.MFPZXH = c.pzxh and nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.djxh = ?
delete from SB_YSBTJ t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq<=? and t.skssqz>=? and t.nssbrq is null

select * from dm_kj_jylx x where (1 = ? or x.jylx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or x.jylx_mc like ?) and x.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) order by x.jylx_dm asc

select b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_fcjy_zb_zrf b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.djxh = ? and a.pzxh = ? union all select t.uuid, t.pzxh, t.sbuuid, t.ewbhxh, t.xybz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.jsyj, t.sl_1, t.ynse, t.kcse, t.jmse, t.bqybtse, to_number(0) as ykpje, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.ysx, t.yssdl, t.sskcs, t.jcx, t.sjtb_sj, t.ssjmxz_dm from sb_sbb s, sb_tdjy_zb_zrf t where s.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and s.zfbz_1 = 'N' and s.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and s.pzxh = t.pzxh and s.djxh = ? and s.pzxh = ?

SELECT T.FPKJXXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.KJSWJG_DM, T.KPR_DM, T.KJRQ, T.DJXH, T.FP_DM, T.FPZL_DM, T.FPHM, T.KPJE, T.LZFPDM, T.LZFPHM, T.TSNSRDJXH, T.FPKF_DM, T.BZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFSQR, T.ZFSQRQ, T.ZFYY, T.SJGSDQ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.ZFRQ_1 FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX T WHERE T.FP_DM = ? AND T.FPHM = ?

with t as (select rownum as xh, a.ysuuid, a.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_1, a.jmmj JMMJ_1, a.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_1, b.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_2, b.jmmj JMMJ_2, b.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_2, c.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_3, c.jmmj JMMJ_3, c.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_3 from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx a inner join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb a2 on a.ysuuid = a2.cjsyuuid and a2.yxbz = 'Y' and a2.yxqq <= sysdate and a2.yxqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -13) inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb a1 on a1.fyxxuuid = a2.fyxxuuid and a1.yxbz = 'Y' and a1.cjpkbz = 'Y' and a1.zgswskfj_dm = ? left join sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx b on a.ysuuid = b.ysuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.uuid <> b.uuid left join sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c on a.ysuuid = c.ysuuid and c.yxbz = 'Y' and b.uuid <> c.uuid and a.uuid <> c.uuid where a.yxbz = 'Y') select distinct t.djxh, t.nsrlx, t.fybh, t.hy_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.fcmc, t.fwcqzsh, t.fwzldz, t2.*, e.nsqx_dm, e.sbqx_dm, e.jkqx_dm, f.nsrsbh, f.nsrmc, f.nsrzt_dm, f.hy_dm, f.djzclx_dm, t1.cjsyuuid, t1.fyxxuuid, t1.zspm_dm, t1.fcyz, t1.czwyz, t1.czfcmj, t1.jsbl, t1.yxqq, t1.yxqz, t1.bgbm from sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb t1 left join (select * from (select t.* from t where t.xh in (select min(xh) from t group by ysuuid))) t2 on t1.cjsyuuid = t2.ysuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb t on t1.fyxxuuid = t.fyxxuuid and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.bgbm = '1' and t.cjpkbz = 'Y' and t.zgswskfj_dm = ? left join rd_sfzrdxxb e on t.djxh = e.djxh and e.zsxm_dm = '10110' and e.zspm_dm = '101100700' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= e.rdyxqq and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= e.rdyxqz and e.yxbz = 'Y' left join dj_nsrxx f on t.djxh = f.djxh and t1.yxqq <= sysdate and t1.yxqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -13)
select t.* from sb_zzsyjnssb_sjb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from (select * from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh=? and t.bszl_dm=? order by lrrq desc) where rownum=1

select t.lsmxid,max(x.skssqz) sbssqz from sb_ls_sbxx t,sb_sbxx x where t.hhljid=? and x.zfbz_1='N' and t.djxh=x.djxh and t.zsxm_dm=x.zsxm_dm and (trim(t.zspm_dm) is null or t.zspm_dm=x.zspm_dm) and (trim(t.zszm_dm) is null or t.zszm_dm=x.zszm_dm) and (t.zsdlfs_dm is null or t.zsdlfs_dm=x.zsdlfs_dm) and x.skssqz >add_months(sysdate,-12) group by t.lsmxid

select t1.nsrsbh bdznsrsbh, t1.nsrmc bdznsrmc, t1.djxh bdzdjxh, t1.sfzjlx_dm sfzjlx_Dm, t1.sfzjhm zjhm, t1.gjhdqsz_dm gjhdqsz_Dm, t1.hy_Dm, t1.zsxm_Dm, t1.zspm_dm, t1.jsyj, t1.sl_1, t1.ynse, t1.ybtse ydzse, t1.skssqq, t1.skssqz, t1.jmse, t1.ssdabh, t1.dzzgswskfj_dm zgswksfj_Dm from zs_gsdz_yjsf t1, zs_gsdz_wsz t2 where t1.zsuuid=t2.zsuuid and t1.wtdzrdjxh=? and trunc(t2.kjrq) between ? and ? and (t1.dzzgswskfj_dm=? or 1=?) and t1.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
SELECT t1.* FROM SB_ZQJM t1, SB_LS_SBXX t2 WHERE t1.sbxxuuid = t2.rdpzuuid AND t1.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4', '5') AND t2.hhljid = ?
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb9_dwzfkxqk t where t.sbuuid = ?

SELECT A.*, NSRXX.SCJYDZ, NSRXXKZ.SCJYDLXDH, SBXX.RDZSUUID AS LCSLID, SBXX.RDPZUUID AS YDCLLCSLID, SBXX.SYUUID AS RWTCUUID FROM SB_YQWSBQC A, SB_LS_SBXX SBXX, DJ_NSRXX NSRXX, DJ_NSRXX_KZ NSRXXKZ WHERE SBXX.HHLJID = ? AND A.WSBUUID = SBXX.YJSKUUID AND A.DJXH = NSRXX.DJXH AND NSRXX.DJXH = NSRXXKZ.DJXH AND (A.SFCBJJKWSB = 'Y' OR A.SFCBJJKWSB IS NULL) AND A.CBUUID IS NULL AND A.CBRQ IS NULL AND A.SBRQ_1 IS NULL AND ((0 = #macroparam#) OR (A.ZSXM_DM NOT IN ('30137', '30138')))

select a.sbuuid, c.fybh, b.fcyz, b.czwyz, b.jsbl, a.sl_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, round(sum(a.ynse), 2) ynse, round(sum(a.jmse), 2) jmse, round(sum(a.yjse), 2) yjse, round(sum(a.ybtse), 2) ybtse from sb_cxs_fcsyjskxx a inner join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb c on a.fyxxuuid = c.fyxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcssysyxx d on a.sbuuid = d.sbuuid and c.fyxxuuid = d.fyxxuuid and b.cjsyuuid = d.ysuuid and a.ysuuid=d.ysuuid and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' where a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.fcyz <> a.czwyz and b.yxbz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and a.djxh = ? and to_char(a.skssqq, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(a.skssqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.skssqq=d.skssqq and a.skssqz=d.skssqz and #macroparam# group by a.sbuuid, c.fybh, b.fcyz, b.czwyz, b.jsbl, a.sl_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz
select * from sb_sds_fjmhd_jd jd where jd.pzxh =? and jd.sbuuid=?
select b.* from sb_cgs_cljgxxcjmxb b where b.cjuuid = ? #macroparam#
update fp_dk_ysyskmxzjb t set t.zfbz_1 = 'Y', t.zfrq_1 = sysdate, t.xgrq = sysdate, t.zfr_dm = ?, t.xgr_dm = ? where t.spuuid in (#macroparam#)

select t.lsmxid,x.sbfs_dm from sb_ls_sbxx t,sb_sbxx x where x.zfbz_1='N' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and x.sbsx_dm_1='11' and t.djxh=x.djxh and t.ssqq=x.skssqq and t.ssqz=x.skssqz and (t.zsxm_dm is null or t.zsxm_dm=x.zsxm_dm) and (t.zsxm_dm='10101' or t.zspm_dm is null or t.zspm_dm=x.zspm_dm) and (t.zszm_dm is null or t.zszm_dm=x.zszm_dm) and (t.yzpzzl_dm is null or t.yzpzzl_dm=x.yzpzzl_dm) and t.hhljid= ?
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYZCSGFB1 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select a.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj a, sb_ls_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.skssqq < b.ssqz and a.skssqz > b.ssqq and a.nssbrq is not null and a.sjlybz = '5' and b.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610119' and ((a.zsdlfs_dm is null) or (a.zsdlfs_dm = b.zsdlfs_dm)) and b.hhljid = ?

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf j where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = j.fcjycjxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.zlfclfbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.htbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.nsrmc = ?) and j.zrfcsfbz = ? and #macroparam# and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'

select uuid, dksquuid, djxh, fpkf_dm, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, fphm, kpje, kkcse, bckcse, zfbz_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, gcxmbh, fpdkuuid, fbfdjxh, fbfgcxmbh, fbgcxmmc, zbgcxmmc, fpkjxxuuid, nsrsbh, nsrmc, ybsfe from fp_dk_tszg_ydkfpmx t where t.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or t.gcxmbh = ?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

with c as (select a.ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 maxskssq from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx a inner join SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB b on b.cjsyuuid = a.ysuuid and b.bgbm = '1' and b.yxbz = 'Y' where a.djxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by a.ysuuid) select * from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx t1 inner join SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB t on t1.ysuuid = t.cjsyuuid. inner join SB_CXS_FYXXCJB a on a.fyxxuuid = t.fyxxuuid left join c on c.ysuuid = t.cjsyuuid where a.djxh = ? and t.bgbm = '1' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.maxskssq, t.yxqq) < t.yxqz and #macroparam#

select t.lsmxid, y.pzxh, y.djxh, y.yjye_1, y.yjskuuid, y.sksx_dm, y.zsxm_dm, y.zspm_dm, y.skssqq, y.skssqz, y.hy_dm, y.zgswskfj_dm, y.sjgsdq, y.yjze, y.sphm from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_yjskxx y where t.hhljid = ? and y.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.djxh = y.djxh and t.zsxm_dm = y.zsxm_dm and (t.hy_dm is null or y.hy_dm is null or t.hy_dm = y.hy_dm) and nvl(y.sphm,'X') = nvl(t.sphm,nvl(y.sphm,'X')) /* 针对发票代开时增加税票号码匹配规则（申报使用时不关联此条件）*/ and (nvl(y.zspm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zspm_dm,nvl(y.zspm_dm,'X')) or (t.zsxm_dm = '10101' and (decode(substr(t.zspm_dm, 1, 6), '101016', '2', '101017', '2', '1') = decode(substr(y.zspm_dm, 1, 6), '101016', '2', '101017', '2', '1')))) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.skssqz <= t.ssqz) and (1 = #macroparam# or (y.skssqq >= t.ssqq and y.skssqz <= t.ssqz)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (y.skssqz >= t.ssqq and t.ssqz >= y.skssqq)) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.skssqq >= trunc(t.ssqq, 'yyyy'))

select sum(fb1.wlfzfw_yjse) + sum(fb1.jtysfw_yjse) se from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr, sb_sbb sbb, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_tlys_yjn fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz >= ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid = fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq >= ? and sbb.skssqz <= ?

select * from SB_ZLBSCJB t where t.djxh =? and t.ssqq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.ssqz >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.bszl_dm=? and (t.ssqq <>to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') or t.ssqz<>to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or zfbz_1 is null) order by lrrq desc
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where (#macroparam#) /*t.pzxh in ('')*/ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select je from cs_sb_cbjpjgz where swjg_dm = ? and year=? and yxbz=?

SELECT T.PZGLYUUID, T.PZGLY_DM, T2.SWRYXM, T.PZHSJG_DM, T1.SWJGMC, T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ, T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ, T.GKJSC_1, T.JGJC_DM, T.SJHSJG_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY T, DM_GY_SWJG T1, DM_GY_SWRY T2 WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ AND T.PZGLY_DM = T2.SWRY_DM AND T.PZHSJG_DM = T1.SWJG_DM #macroparam#

sELECT * FROM SB_FJM_JNJGHGRFBGCZYHLWXMBGB T WHERE ('1'=? OR T.cbshtglwfdh LIKE ?) AND('1'=? OR T.cbshtglwfdlrmc LIKE ?) AND('1'=? OR T.cbshtglwfdz LIKE ?) AND('1'=? OR T.cbshtglwfmc LIKE ?) AND('1'=? OR T.cbshtglwfsbh LIKE ?) AND('1'=? OR T.cbshtglwjflxr LIKE ?)
select t.* from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh=? and t.zspm_dm=? and t.skssqq=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.skssqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.zsdlfs_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1='N'
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.cgssbzt = ? and t.jdczccchgz = ?

select t.sspztyzfuuid pzuuid,t.sspztyzfbh pzbh,t.bbdw_dm,t.zsr_dm,t.zsrq_3 zsrq,t.tbrq from pz_sspztyzfzb t where (1 = ? or sspztyzfbh = ?) and (1 = ? or bbdw_dm = ?) and trunc(tbrq) between ? and ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and zstybz = 'Y' order by t.sspztyzfbh Asc

Select T3.* From Sb_Sbb T1, SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_JMSDSEMXB T3 Where T1.DJXH=? AND T1.PZXH = T3.PZXH AND T1.SBUUID = T3.SBUUID And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') AND T3.JZMZLX='1' And T1.Skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') And T1.Skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm in(#macroparam#) And T1.Sbsx_Dm_1 = ? And T1.Zfbz_1 = 'N' Order By T1.Lrrq Desc
select t.uuid, t.pzxh, t.sbuuid, t.djxh, t.yysgje, t.sl_1, t.ynse, t.ynse_1, t.ybtse, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.yyssgbz, t.yygmje from sb_yys_sgyysbxx t where sbuuid=?
select * from sb_cgs_jsfpmx t where t.cgssbuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select sbxx.djxh as gsdjxh, sbxx.skssqq as skssqq, sbxx.skssqz as skssqz, sbxx.sbuuid as zssbuuid, sbxx.pzxh as zspzxh, sbxx.yzpzzl_dm as zsyzpzzlDm, sbxx.zsxm_dm as zszsxmDm, sbxx.zspm_dm as zszspmDm, sbxx.zszm_dm as zszszmDm, ybr.asysljsxse as bhssre, ybr.bqybtse as zzsdqybtse, ybr.mdtytse as zzsdqmdse, (ybr.bqybtse + ybr.mdtytse) zzsxj from sb_sbxx sbxx, sb_zzs_ybnsr ybr where sbxx.sbuuid = ybr.sbuuid and sbxx.pzxh = ybr.pzxh and ybr.ewblxh in ('1') and sbxx.djxh = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.skssqz = ? and sbxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') union all select sbxx.djxh as gsdjxh, sbxx.skssqq as skssqq, sbxx.skssqz as skssqz, sbxx.sbuuid as zssbuuid, sbxx.pzxh as zspzxh, sbxx.yzpzzl_dm as zsyzpzzlDm, sbxx.zsxm_dm as zszsxmDm, sbxx.zspm_dm as zszspmDm, sbxx.zszm_dm as zszszmDm, (xgm.yzzzsbhsxse + xgm.xssygdysgdzcbhsxse + xgm.ckmsxse + xgm.bqmse) as bhssre, xgm.bqybtse as zzsdqybtse, xgm.msxse as zzsdqmdse, (xgm.bqybtse + xgm.msxse) zzsxj from sb_sbxx sbxx, sb_zzs_xgm xgm where sbxx.sbuuid = xgm.sbuuid and sbxx.pzxh = xgm.pzxh and xgm.ewblxh in ('1', '2') and sbxx.djxh = ? and sbxx.skssqq = ? and sbxx.skssqz = ? and sbxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_YDTXX T WHERE T.SE > 0 AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND T.PZXH = ?

SELECT T2.* FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD T2 WHERE T2.SBUUID IN (SELECT DISTINCT T1.SBUUID FROM SB_SBXX T1 WHERE T1.DJXH =? AND T1.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Skssqq >= ? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And T1.Sbsx_Dm_1 In (#macroparam#) And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) AND T1.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND T1.ZSXM_DM = '10104')

select t.pzzl_dm as code, t.pzzlmc as caption, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzlmc, t.xjpzbz, t.whpbz, t.phcd from dm_pz_pzzl t,cs_pz_swjgdypzzl t1 where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.pzzl_dm =t.pzzl_dm and t1.swjg_dm =?

update sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cz a set (a.fwcqzsh, a.fcmc, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.xxdz, a.dh_1, a.fcyt_dm, a.czfcmj, a.zgswskfj_dm) = (select b.fwcqzsh, b.fcmc, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.jdxz_dm, b.xxdz, b.dh_1, b.fcyt_dm, b.czfcmj, b.zgswskfj_dm from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.fybh = b.fybh) where (a.djxh, a.fybh) in (select djxh, fybh from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj) and a.djxh = ?

select * from sb_sbb a,sb_sbxx b where a.pzxh =b.pzxh and a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.djxh=b.djxh and a.djxh=? and a.sbuuid=? and (1=? or a.pzxh=?) and (1=? or a.skssqq = ?) and (1=? or a.skssqz= ?) and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and a.zfbz_1 ='N'

with kk as (select DISTINCT b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.sbuuid, b.pzxh from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, sb_sbb b where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.gzlx_dm_1 in (?, ?) and b.sbrq_1 between ? and ? AND nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.yxbz = ? AND a.jknd = ? and a.djxh = ?) select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, b.bnynse bq138 from kk a, sb_ccs_2015 b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh

SELECT YPR.YPRUUID CODE, YPRLX.YPRFLMC CAPTION FROM PZ_YPR YPR, DM_PZ_YPRFL YPRLX WHERE YPR.YPRLX_DM = YPRLX.YPRFL_DM AND YPRLX.YPRFL_DM = 12 AND YPR.SWRY_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN YPR.YXQSRQ AND YPR.YXZZRQ

select zspm_dm,skssqq,skssqz,ssjmxzhz_dm,sybh_1 as sybh,-sum(se) as jmse from sb_zqjm jm where jm.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jm.djxh = ? and jm.zsxm_dm = ? and jm.skssqq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jm.skssqz < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') having sum(se)<>0 group by zspm_dm,skssqq,skssqz,ssjmxzhz_dm,sybh_1
SELECT sk.zgswskfj_dm,sk.swjg_dm,sk.skssqq,sk.skssqz FROM sb_zzs_ldsklsz sk WHERE sk.Skssqz = (SELECT MAX(a.skssqz) FROM sb_zzs_ldsklsz a WHERE a.DJXH = ? ) AND sk.DJXH = ?

with uu as (select c.fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf t, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c where t.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and t.djxh = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and c.ysbbz = 'Y'), kk as (select distinct s.pzxh from sb_cxs_fcjy s, uu where s.fcjycjxxuuid = uu.fcjycjxxuuid and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') select distinct a.sbuuid, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.sbsx_dm_1 as sblx_dm, a.pzxh, a.yzpzzl_dm, b.ZSXM_DM, b.sbfs_dm, b.sbqx, b.sybh_1, a.sbrq_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.YBTSE, a.lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b, kk where a.SBUUID = b.SBUUID and a.pzxh = kk.pzxh and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sbrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sbrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and a.GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5') ORDER BY a.lrrq DESC
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_QYXTZB_GXHLFP where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?
select a.* from pz_jbsc a,pz_jbscjzxx b where b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf is null and b.jzpzbh = a.jzpzbh and a.pzzy_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.xh order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xhh from (select * from cs_sb_zdy_bzxxdy a where a.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and a.xybz='Y' and a.yxbz='Y') a, (SELECT t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm FROM DM_GY_SWJG t START WITH t.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm) where xhh = 1

select t2.nsrsbh, t2.nsrmc, t2.sfzjlx_dm sfzjzl, t2.sfzjhm zjhm, t2.gjhdqsz_dm gjhdqsz_Dm, t2.djxh bdzdjxh, t1.pzzl_dm, t1.pzzg_dm pzzg, t1.pzhm, t1.kjrq, t1.hy_dm, t1.zsxm_dm, t1.zspm_dm, t1.skssqq, t1.skssqz, t1.yskm_dm, t1.ysfpbl_dm, t1.skgk_dm, t1.kssl, t1.jsyj, t1.sl_1, t1.yjse yje, t1.sjje, t1.ssdabh from zs_gsdz_wsz t1, zs_gsdz_yjsf t2 where t1.zsuuid=t2.zsuuid and t1.wtdzrdjxh = ? and trunc(t1.kjrq) between ? and ? and (t2.dzzgswskfj_dm=? or 1=?) and t2.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select * from CS_PZ_JBJXPZB a where a.pzjg_dm like ?
select * from pz_flz a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and (a.xhuuid = ? or 1 = ?) and a.pzzy_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT DECODE(SUM(LQS), NULL, 0, SUM(LQS)) AS BQLQS, DECODE(SUM(SSHXS), NULL, 0, SUM(SSHXS)) AS BQSSS FROM PZ_JBSC WHERE YPRUUID = ? AND PZZL_DM = ? AND PZZG_DM = ? AND TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND PZZY_DM NOT IN ('12', '13', '14', '15') AND TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

update sb_tdsyqkdjxx a set (djxh, tdsybh, dh_1, tdxz_dm, tdqdfs_dm, xxdz, dj_1, qdtdsyqzfje, tdkfcb, csqdsj, tdsyqzzsj, zgswskfj_dm, tdsyzbh, xzqhsz_dm, tddj_dm, tdmj, tdyt_dm, dwse, pkbz, tdzj, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, jdxz_dm, zspm_dm, ssjmxz_dm, mstdmj, xgr_dm, xgrq) = (select djxh, tdsybh, dh_1, tdxz_dm, tdqdfs_dm, xxdz, dj_1, qdtdsyqzfje, tdkfcb, csqdsj, tdsyqzzsj, zgswskfj_dm, tdsyzbh, xzqhsz_dm, tddj_dm, tdmj, tdyt_dm, dwse, pkbz, tdzj, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, jdxz_dm, zspm_dm, ssjmxz_dm, mstdmj, lrr_dm, sysdate from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh) where (a.djxh, a.tdsybh) in (select djxh, tdsybh from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx) and a.djxh = ?
select t.* from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh=? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb8_Ggftz t Where t.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_cxs_fcjy_sh where fcjycjxxuuid=? and #macroparam#
select sum(BCLDBHS) from SB_ZZS_LDSKLSZ where djxh= ? and skssqq>=? and skssqz <=? and (CZLX_DM = '53' or CZLX_DM = '56') and LDLX='1'

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '5' zt_bz, case when ewbhxh = '2' or ewbhxh = '6' or ewbhxh = '10' or ewbhxh = '11' then bqje end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' or ewbhxh = '6' or ewbhxh = '10' then bqje end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then bqje end lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' or ewbhxh = '16' then bqje end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then bqje end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then bqje end lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then bqje end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ 0 lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ 0 lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ 0 lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then bqje end lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then bqje end lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then bqje end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then bqje end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then bqje end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ 0 lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '19' then bqje end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then bqje end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then bqje end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then bqje end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_zqgs_lrb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.bszl_dm =?

select a.* from sb_whsyjsf_ygz a where exists (select 1 from sb_sbb b where b.sbuuid = a.sbuuid and b.djxh =? and b.skssqz =? and b.yzpzzl_dm =? and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') and b.sbsx_dm_1 = '11')
select sum(t.ybtse) as ybtse from zs_yjsf t where yzpzxh=? and t.djxh =? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and t.czlx_dm in ('10','66','92')

select a.* from sb_cbqkxx a where a.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or a.CBSBH = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.ZXRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.QDSYQRQ <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.ZXRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.QDSYQRQ

select qk.pzzl_dm,decode(qk.pzzt_dm,null,'04',qk.pzzt_dm) pzzt_dm,pzsl jcsl from zs_pzsyqk_yhp qk where qk.sddwdjxh = ? and qk.zfr_dm is null and (qk.sspkjbdbh is null or exists (select 1 from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.sspkjbdbh = qk.sspkjbdbh and t.shbz = 'N')) and (qk.pzzt_dm != ? or qk.pzzt_dm is null)
Select Pzxh From Sb_Sbxx Where (Zfbz_1 = 'N' Or Zfbz_1 Is Null) And Djxh = ? And Skssqq = ? And Skssqz = ? And Yzpzzl_Dm in (#macroparam#) And Sbsx_Dm_1 = ? And Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')
select * from sb_sbxx t where djxh = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT * FROM CS_PZ_PZSLJKB T WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.PZZL_DM = ? AND T.SWJGZDKCSL > 0 AND T.SLPZXESL > 0 ORDER BY T.SWJG_DM DESC
select a.*,a.TDZLWZ as tdzldz from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.csfdjxh=?
SELECT DISTINCT J.HDZXQQ,J.SJZXQZ,J.ZSXM_DM, J.ZSPM_DM FROM ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JG J WHERE J.DJXH = ? AND J.HDZXQQ <J.SJZXQZ and j.HDZXQQ<=trunc(sysdate,'mm')-1
select distinct b.dzbzdszl_dm,b.dzbzdszlmc from SB_SBB a ,DM_GY_DZBZDSZL b where a.yzpzzl_dm=b.dzbzdszl_dm and a.djxh=? and a.ZFBZ_1='N' and GZLX_DM_1 in ('1','4','5')

SELECT SUM(DKSQJE) FROM FP_DK_SQ A INNER JOIN FP_DK_FPKJXX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE DKFPLB_DM = ? AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1='N' AND b.KJRQ >=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND b.kjrq <=to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1

select fpbl.ysfpbl_dm, fpbl.ysfpblmc, fpbl.zyjbl, fpbl.ssjbl, fpbl.dsjbl, fpbl.qxjbl, fpbl.xzjbl, fpbl.zydfpbl, fpbl.sjdfpbl, fpbl.swjg_dm from dm_jk_ysfpbl fpbl where fpbl.xybz = 'Y' and fpbl.yxbz = 'Y' and (fpbl.zyjbl = ? or fpbl.ssjbl = ? or fpbl.dsjbl = ?) and fpbl.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = (SELECT SJSWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG WHERE SWJG_DM = ?) connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm)
select * from dm_kj_jygz x where x.jylx_dm = ? and x.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) #macroparam#

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwsbqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And a.Cbrq is null And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '11' zt_bz, /*资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then ncye_zc end zcnc1, /* 一、资产总计*/ case when ewbhxh = '32' then qmye_zc end zcqm1, /* 一、资产总计*/ 0 zcnc2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ 0 zcqm2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then ncye_zc end zcnc3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then qmye_zc end zcqm3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then ncye_zc end zcnc4, /*交易性金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then qmye_zc end zcqm4, /*交易性金融资产*/ 0 zcnc5, /* 应收票据*/ 0 zcqm5, /* 应收票据*/ 0 zcnc6, /* 应收帐款*/ 0 zcqm6, /* 应收帐款*/ 0 zcnc7, /* 预付帐款*/ 0 zcqm7, /* 预付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then ncye_zc end zcnc8, /* 应收利息*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then qmye_zc end zcqm8, /* 应收利息*/ 0 zcnc9, /* 其他应收款*/ 0 zcqm9, /* 其他应收款*/ 0 zcnc10, /* 存 货*/ 0 zcqm10, /* 存 货*/ 0 zcnc11, /* 其中：原材料*/ 0 zcqm11, /* 其中：原材料*/ 0 zcnc12, /* 库存商品*/ 0 zcqm12, /* 库存商品*/ 0 zcnc13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ 0 zcqm13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then ncye_zc end zcnc14, /* 其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then qmye_zc end zcqm14, /* 其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then ncye_zc end zcnc15, /* 投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then qmye_zc end zcqm15, /* 投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then ncye_zc end zcnc16, /* 长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then qmye_zc end zcqm16, /* 长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then ncye_zc end zcnc17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then qmye_zc end zcqm17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '37' then ncye_zc end zcnc18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '37' then qmye_zc end zcqm18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then ncye_zc end zcnc19, /*无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then qmye_zc end zcqm19, /*无形资产*/ /*权益*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then ncye_qy end zcnc20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then qmye_qy end zcqm20, /* 二、负债合计*/ 0 zcnc21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ 0 zcqm21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then ncye_qy end zcnc22, /* 其中:短期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then qmye_qy end zcqm22, /* 其中:短期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then ncye_qy end zcnc23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then qmye_qy end zcqm23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ 0 zcnc24, /* 应付票据*/ 0 zcqm24, /* 应付票据*/ 0 zcnc25, /* 应付帐款*/ 0 zcqm25, /* 应付帐款*/ 0 zcnc26, /* 预收账款*/ 0 zcqm26, /* 预收账款*/ case when ewbhxh = '33' then ncye_qy end zcnc27, /* 其他应付款*/ case when ewbhxh = '33' then qmye_qy end zcqm27, /* 其他应付款*/ 0 zcnc28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ 0 zcqm28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then ncye_qy end zcnc29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then qmye_qy end zcqm29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then ncye_qy end zcnc30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then qmye_qy end zcqm30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then ncye_qy end zcnc31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then qmye_qy end zcqm31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then ncye_qy end zcnc32, /* 资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then qmye_qy end zcqm32, /* 资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then ncye_qy end zcnc33, /* 未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then qmye_qy end zcqm33, /* 未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '28' then ncye_qy end zcnc34, /* 盈余公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '28' then qmye_qy end zcqm34 /* 盈余公积*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, SB_CWBB_ZQGS_ZCFZB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.bszl_dm =?
select a.sjgsdq,a.kjdjxh,a.skssswjg_dm from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh = ?

SELECT T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.SJGSDQ, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.YBSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YJSFE, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.SFL, T.JSFYJ, T.YXKCJE, T.SRZE, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSXM_DM, T.SKSSQZ, T.SKSSQQ, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DKSQUUID, T.SFMXUUID, T.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.ZJSRSFFT, T.QXQ, T.QXZ, T.BZ, T.SFZCZF, T.SSJMXZ_DM,T.SSJMXZMC FROM FP_DK_SFMX T WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwzh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.dyh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.lc_2 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fjh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.zlfclfbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.htbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.kfbdcxmbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.kfbdcxmbh is null) and exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf k where k.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and k.nsrmc = ? and k.djxh is null and k.zrfcsfbz = '0') and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g where g.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and g.zrfcsfbz = '1' and g.nsrsbh = ?)) and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'
select mx.sspztyzfmxuuid, mx.sspztyzfuuid, mx.pzjcuuid, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.pzsl from pz_sspztyzfmxb mx where mx.sspztyzfmxuuid = ?
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBBGB t where t.HBQYNSSBH=?
SELECT GHFNSRSBH, GHFNSRMC, GHFDZ, GHFLXDH, GHFKHYH_DM, GHFYHZH, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, GHFYHYYWDMC FROM FP_DK_ZZS_GHFNSRXX WHERE GHFNSRSBH in(#macroparam#) ORDER BY NVL(XGRQ, LRRQ) DESC
SELECT * FROM SB_KJ_CXCKLX_GRSDS WHERE PZXH = ? AND SBUUID = ?
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb_Bqqs t Where t.sbuuid=?
select 1 from sb_kj_fjmqysds t where t.sbuuid=? and t.pzxh=?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qysdsndnssbzb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from zs_ydtxx t where t.ydtuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.tzlx_dm in('1','4')

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.zlfclfbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.htbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm = ?) and #macroparam# and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'

select distinct b.*, a.* from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'Y' and fcjycjxxuuid=?

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zgswskfj_dm from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and (t.sjlybz <> '2' or t.sjlybz is null) and (t.skssqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'mm'), -1) or (t.zsxm_dm = '10104' and to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') = '01' and to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') = '12')) and (t.nssbrq is null or t.nssbrq = date '1-1-1') and (1 = ? or (t.zsxm_dm != '10104' or (to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') != '01' or to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') != '12'))) and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh = t.djxh and a.skssqq = t.skssqq and a.skssqz = t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and (a.zsxm_dm IN ('10101', '30217') or a.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm) and (t.zspm_dm = '101060200' or t.zsxm_dm != '10106') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')) and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx b, dj_nsrxx dj where b.gshgshdjxh = t.djxh and b.gshgshdjxh = dj.djxh and b.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and b.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm and b.skssqq <= t.skssqz and b.skssqz >= t.skssqq and ((b.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and b.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and not (dj.djzclx_dm in ('175', '171', '172') or dj.djzclx_dm like '41%') and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = b.djxh and tzf.yxqq <= b.skssqq and tzf.yxqz >= b.skssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and gsxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and gsxx.skssqq >= tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz <= tzf.yxqz))) or (b.zspm_dm not in ('101060300', '101060200') or (b.zspm_dm in ('101060300', '101060200') and (dj.djzclx_dm in ('175', '171', '172') or dj.djzclx_dm like '41%')))))
select a.* from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and ((0=?) or (a.yzpzzl_dm = ?))
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_GDZCJSNEW t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? ORDER BY ewbhxh ASC

select p.pkuuid from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbf_pkqc p where t.lsmxid = p.pkuuid and t.hhljid = ? and (p.zfbz_1 = '1' or exists (select 1 from sb_sbf_pkqc pp where pp.djxh = p.djxh and pp.skssqq = p.skssqq and pp.skssqz = p.skssqz and pp.zfbz_1 = '0' and pp.zgswskfj_dm like substr(p.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and p.zspm_dm = pp.zspm_dm and p.hy_dm = pp.hy_dm and p.ybtse = pp.ybtse and nvl(pp.zszm_dm, 'X') = nvl(p.zszm_dm, nvl(pp.zszm_dm, 'X')) and p.pkuuid <> pp.pkuuid))

select t.pzxh, t.ewbhxh as fblc, t.pzxh as fbxh, t.KJSKZZSZYFP_XSE, t.KJSKZZSZYFP_XXYNSE, t.KJQTFP_XSE, t.KJQTFP_XXYNSE, t.WKJFP_XSE, t.WKJFP_XXYNSE, t.NSJCTZDXSE, t.NSJCTZ_XXYNSE, t.XSE, t.Hj_Xxynse, t.Jshj, t.Ysfwkcxmbqsjkcje, t.Kch_Hsmsxse, t.Kch_Xxynse, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq from SB_ZZS_YBNSR_FB1_BQXSQKMX t where t.sbuuid = ?

select t.sspztyzfuuid ypzuuid, t.sspztyzfbh ypzbh, t.tbrq ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm from pz_sspztyzfzb t where t.lrr_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zstybz = 'Y' and exists (select 1 from pz_flz b where b.yspzhm = t.sspztyzfuuid and b.xhuuid is null) and t.tbrq between ? and ? and not exists (select 1 from pz_gztzs a where t.sspztyzfuuid = a.yspzhm and a.tybz is null)
select * from ( select a.*, rank() over(PARTITION by a.bh order by lrrq desc) xh from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a where a.BH=?and a.ZFBZ_1='N') where xh = 1
select sbqxgz from dm_gy_sbqx where sbqx_dm =? and xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'

select * from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.djxh = ? and b.kfbdcxmbh = ? and a.ssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and zrfcsfbz = ? and a.bszl_dm=? and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
Select t.* from SB_SDS_JMQYQS_FB_ZCCZSY t Where t.sbuuid=?

select t2.nsrsbh, t2.nsrmc, t2.djxh, t2.skssqq ssqq, t2.skssqz ssqz, t1.bzsptm, t1.phgg, t1.jylb_dm_1, t1.jylx_dm_1, t1.xsjg, t1.xssl, t1.xse, t1.bz, t1.sbuuid from SB_XFS_FB_JYPFQYYFXSMX t1, sb_sbb t2 where t1.sbuuid = t2.sbuuid and t1.sbuuid in (select t.lcslid from SB_XFS_JYXFSJGXXCJSHB t where t.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yzpzzl_dm =? and t.shyj = 'Y' and (t.hzbz_1 IS NULL or t.hzbz_1='N') and t.shswjg_dm = ?)

select a.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and b.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select y.zsuuid,jks.spuuid,jks.pzzl_dm,jks.pzzg_dm,jks.pzhm from zs_yjsf y,(select zsuuid,spuuid,pzzl_dm,pzzg_dm,pzhm from zs_wsz where djxh = ? union all select zsuuid,spuuid,pzzl_dm,pzzg_dm,pzhm from zs_jks where djxh = ? ) jks where y.zsuuid=jks.zsuuid and y.djxh = ? and y.yzpzxh = ? and y.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')
select csmx.zsxm_dm, csmx.zspm_dm, csmx.skssqq, csmx.skssqz, csmx.SYSLHDWSE, csmx.ydkdjdsdjse from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg csmx where csmx.pzxh = ? and csmx.BKJDJXH = ?

select t1.nsrmc bdznsrmc, t1.sfzjlx_dm sfzjlx_Dm, t1.sfzjhm zjhm, t1.djxh bdzdjxh, t1.gjhdqsz_dm gjhdqsz_Dm, t1.hy_Dm, t1.zsxm_Dm, t1.zspm_dm, t1.jsyj, t1.sl_1, t1.ynse, t1.ybtse ydzse, t1.skssqq, t1.skssqz, t1.jmse, t1.ssdabh, t1.dzzgswskfj_dm zgswskfj_Dm from zs_gsdz_yjsf t1,zs_gsdz_wsz t2 where t1.djxh = t2.djxh and t1.zsuuid=t2.zsuuid and t1.wtdzrdjxh=? and trunc(t2.kjrq) between ? and ? and (t1.dzzgswskfj_dm=? or 1=?) and (instr(to_char(t1.djxh),'2')=1 or instr(to_char(t1.djxh),'3')=1)
select * from pz_jc where czyuuid = ? and pzzl_dm = ? and jcsl >= ? and pzzt_dm = ? and yprlx_dm = ? and yxbz='Y' order by pzzl_dm,pzzg_dm,ffyxj desc,rkrq,pzqshm
select t.wsjg,t.skje,t.jkdwsh_1 from wbjh_hg_wspzhzsj_zb t where t.zb_xh = ?
select * from sb_tdzzssb_jmxx t where t.sbuuid = ?
select bazdcjuuid from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where cjhdbz = 'N' and #macroparam#/*zgswjg_dm in ('')*/ and clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and balsxlh= ?

select round(nvl(sum(mx.srze * (1 + sfl)), 0), 2) kpje, nvl(sum(mx.srze), 0) sqje from fp_dk_sq sq, fp_dk_sfmx mx where sq.dksquuid = mx.dksquuid and sq.djxh = ? and mx.gldksquuid is null and mx.zsxm_dm = '10101' and trunc(mx.skssqq) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and trunc(mx.skssqz) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or sq.dkfplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.kjbz = 'Y'

select uuid, dksquuid, djxh, fpkf_dm, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, fphm, kpje, kkcse, bckcse, zfbz_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, gcxmbh, fpdkuuid, fbfdjxh, fbfgcxmbh, fbgcxmmc, zbgcxmmc, fpkjxxuuid, nsrsbh, nsrmc, ybsfe from fp_dk_tszg_ydkfpmx t where t.dksquuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select '1' as kjlx, yqkj.kjywrsbh, yqkj.gjhdqmc as fjmnsrzqjmgdqmcjdm, yqkj.fjmqyzwmc, yqkj.fjmqyywmc, yqkj.fjmqyzqjmgzwdz, yqkj.fjmqyzqjmgywdz, yqkj.zqjmgnsrywmc, yqkj.zqjmgnsrzwmc, yqkj.fjmnsrsbh, yqkj.hthxymc, yqkj.hth, yqkj.htzxqsrq as htqyrq, yqkj.htzxzzrq as htyxqx, yqkj.gjhdqsz_dm, kjywrlxrxm, kjywrlxdh, kjywryzbm, yqkj.htje, HTBZ, zfbz_2, zfxmmc as qysdssdlx_dm from sb_fjm_kjqysdshtbadjb yqkj where djxh =? and nvl(yqkj.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and hth is not null
select t.yzxm_dm,t.yzxmmc from cs_sb_yzxm t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y'

select * from (select a.cslx_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.cs_dm_1, a.cs_dm_2, a.cs_dm_3, a.cs_dm_4, a.cs_dm_5, a.cs_dm_6, a.cs_dm_7, a.cs_dm_8, a.cs_dm_9, a.cs_dm_10, a.cs_dm_11, a.cs_dm_12, a.cs_dm_13, a.cs_dm_14, a.cs_dm_15 from cs_zs_skgk_dm a where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.swjg_dm in (select d.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg d start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm) order by a.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1

select t.zlxgid,t.djxh,t.sbrq_1, (select min(a.nssbrq) from sb_sbxx a where a.djxh=t.djxh and a.skssqq=t.skssqq and a.skssqz=t.skssqz and a.zsxm_dm=t.zsxm_dm and a.zgswskfj_dm like substr(t.zgswskfj_dm,0,5)||'%' and (a.zsxm_dm='10101' or a.zspm_dm=t.zspm_dm) and (a.sbsx_dm_1='11' or a.sbsx_dm_1 is null) and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')) as nssbrq from sb_ls_sbxx l,sb_yqwsbqc t where l.hhljid=? and l.lsmxid=t.zlxgid and l.djxh=t.djxh and t.zgswskfj_dm like ?

SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND (1 = ? OR TRUNC(T.JBRQ_1) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) AND (1 = ? OR TRUNC(T.JBRQ_1) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) AND (1=? OR T.JBJXDWR = ?) AND T.SHBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.SSPZJXBBH IS NULL AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SBBZ = 'Y'
select a.* from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx a inner join sb_cxs_fcjy b on a.fcjyuuid=b.fcjyuuid where a.djxh=? and a.pzxh=? and b.zfbz_1='N'

select p.swry_dm, p.ypruuid, p.yprmc, p.djxh, p.yxqsrq, p.yxzzrq, p.pzhsjg_dm swjg_dm from PZ_YPR p where (1 = ? or p.pzhsjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or p.yprlx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or p.ypruuid = ?) and (1 = ? or p.djxh = ?) and sysdate BETWEEN p.YXQSRQ AND p.YXZZRQ

select cldauuid, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, clsbdh, nsrsfzjzl_dm, zjhm, hy_dm, djzclx_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clcp, clxh, zypz, cldw, zws, pql, fdjhm, clgzdsx_dm, gzrq, ffrq, mzsbz, wszmhm, jdrq, pzhm_1, wspzzl_dm, wspzhm, sjse, znj, znjpzhm, djr_dm, djrq, jdcxszhm, yzpzxh, cljdlx_dm, cldazt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, clscqymc, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, cllx_dm, cldabh, cdsx, fpjgzsbz, xnyqclx_dm, jdczccchgz, zsjg_dm, fpjg from sb_cgs_cldaxx where cldauuid = ?
select 1 from PZ_GZTZS where fqpzdw_dm = ? and tybz is null and yxbz='Y' union all select 1 from PZ_GZTZS where jspzdw_dm = ? and tybz is null and yxbz='Y'
select t.sbuuid,t.nsrsbh,t.skssqq,t.skssqz,t.sbrq_1,t.tbrq_1 ,t.zgswskfj_dm as swjgDm from sb_sbb t where t.sbuuid=?
select t.* from sb_nsrjbxx t where t.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_whsyjsf_ygz_fb_jcxmqd where sbuuid=?
select * from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh w where w.swjg_dm=?
SELECT * from PZ_SSPZJXB B where B.SFSHTGBZ='N' and B.ZFBZ_1='N' and B.Cxbz='N' and B.Sbbz='Y' and B.JXR_DM=?

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsdlfs_dm, t.sybh_1, t.nssbrq, t.sbfs_dm from sb_sbxx t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.zfbz_1 = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm not in (#macroparam#) and t.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 = ? and t.lrrq >= add_months(?, -3) and ('1' = #macroparam# or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or t.zspm_dm = ?)
select a.gmfsbbz,a.gmfpzxh from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a,sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and a.gmfdjxh = ? and a.fybh = ?
