select t.pkuuid, t.djxh, t.zspm_dm, t.pzxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.pkly_dm from sb_pkqc t where t.zfbz_1 = '0' and nvl(t.kkzt_dm, 'x') in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and t.pkly_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.skssswjg_dm = ? and t.lrrq >= trunc(sysdate, 'mm') and t.lrrq < add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'mm'), 1)
select t.* from SB_CYSKWGQYGFZGJMGDCGXX t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPRPZHDXXB P WHERE P.YPRUUID = ? AND P.YXBZ = 'Y'
select sl_1 as sl from cs_sb_cgsslpzb where yxbz = 'Y' and (#macroparam#)/*swjg_dm in ('')*/
select b.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb4_sedjqk b where b.sbuuid=?
update sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a set a.zlfsbbz = 'N' where a.zlbscjuuid in (select zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb where nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(a.zlfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.pzxh = ?
select pzxh from sb_sbb t where djxh=? and skssqq=? and skssqz=? and zsxm_dm=? and zspm_dm and zfbz_1='N'
select ypr.YPRLX_DM code,ypr.YPRMC caption from PZ_YPR ypr where ypr.YPRUUID=? and ypr.YPRLX_DM=31
select t.wbuuid from ZS_yjsf_cbjtkz t ,sb_ls_sbxx l where t.wbuuid=l.lsmxid and t.dscljg='Y' and t.yxbz='Y' and l.hhljid=? and t.dsclsm = '作废'
select t.* from sb_tysb_zsfjsgdshtglb t where t.dsdjxh=? and t.fjspzxh=?
select * from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj where (djxh, fybh) not in (select djxh, fybh from sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cj)

select pzdw, kcs, zfs, decode(bl, '', '', bl || '%') as bl from (select t1.pzdw_dm as pzdw, sum(nvl(t1.kjs, 0) + nvl(t1.zfs, 0)) as kcs, sum(nvl(t1.zfs, 0)) as zfs, round(decode(sum(nvl(t1.kjs, 0) + nvl(t1.zfs, 0)), 0, '', sum(nvl(t1.zfs, 0)) / sum(nvl(t1.kjs, 0) + nvl(t1.zfs, 0))) * 100, 2) as bl from pz_flz t1 where t1.pzdw_dm = ? and t1.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t1.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t1.pzzy_dm <= '10' and t1.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by t1.pzdw_dm union all select t2.ypruuid as pzdw, sum(nvl(t2.kjs, 0) + nvl(t2.zfs, 0)) as kcs, sum(nvl(t2.zfs, 0)) as zfs, round(DECODE(sum(nvl(t2.kjs, 0) + nvl(t2.zfs, 0)), 0, '', sum(nvl(t2.zfs, 0)) / sum(nvl(t2.kjs, 0) + nvl(t2.zfs, 0))) * 100, 2) as bl from pz_jbsc t2 where exists (select 1 from pz_ypr t3 where t3.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t3.yxbz = 'Y' and t3.ypruuid = t2.ypruuid) and t2.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t2.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t2.pzzy_dm <= '10' and t2.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by t2.ypruuid) t where t.bl >= ? or t.bl is null
SELECT * FROM sb_sds_jmcz_14nd_jmqygqhcf t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=?

select NVL(round(sum(t.jsyj / (months_between(trunc(t.skssqz, 'mm'), trunc(t.skssqq, 'mm')) + 1)), 2),0) xssr from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND t.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zsxm_dm in('10101', '10103') and t.skssqz >= t.skssqq

with t as (select rownum as xh, a.ysuuid, a.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_1, a.jmmj JMMJ_1, a.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_1, b.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_2, b.jmmj JMMJ_2, b.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_2, c.ssjmxz_dm SSJMXZDM_3, c.jmmj JMMJ_3, c.yjmsje_1 as YJMSJE_3 from sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx a inner join sb_cxs_czjzsymxb a2 on a.ysuuid = a2.czsyuuid and a2.yxbz = 'Y' and a2.sbzjsszlqq <= sysdate and a2.sbzjsszlqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -13) inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb a1 on a1.fyxxuuid = a2.fyxxuuid and a1.yxbz = 'Y' and a1.czpkbz = 'Y' and a1.zgswskfj_dm = ? left join sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx b on a.ysuuid = b.ysuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.uuid <> b.uuid left join sb_cxs_ysjmxzxx c on a.ysuuid = c.ysuuid and c.yxbz = 'Y' and b.uuid <> c.uuid and a.uuid <> c.uuid where a.yxbz = 'Y') select distinct t.djxh, t.nsrlx, t.fybh, t.hy_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.fcmc, t.fwcqzsh, t.fwzldz, t.fcyt_dm, t.fcsnsrlx, t2.*, e.nsqx_dm, e.sbqx_dm, e.jkqx_dm, f.nsrsbh, f.nsrmc, f.nsrzt_dm, f.hy_dm, f.djzclx_dm, t1.czsyuuid, t1.fyxxuuid, t1.zspm_dm, t1.czmj, t1.htzjzsr, t1.htydzlqq, t1.htydzlqz, t1.sbzjsr, t1.sbzjsszlqq, t1.sbzjsszlqz, t1.yxqq, t1.yxqz, t1.bgbm from sb_cxs_czjzsymxb t1 left join (select * from (select t.* from t where t.xh in (select min(xh) from t group by ysuuid))) t2 on t1.czsyuuid = t2.ysuuid inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb t on t1.fyxxuuid = t.fyxxuuid and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.bgbm = '1' and t.czpkbz = 'Y' and t.zgswskfj_dm = ? left join rd_sfzrdxxb e on t.djxh = e.djxh and e.zsxm_dm = '10110' and e.zspm_dm = '101100800' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= e.rdyxqq and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= e.rdyxqz and e.yxbz = 'Y' left join dj_nsrxx f on t.djxh = f.djxh and t1.sbzjsszlqq <= sysdate and t1.sbzjsszlqz >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -13)
select * from SB_CXS_FYXXCJB where YXBZ = 'Y' and fyxxuuid= ?

select t.sbuuid, t.pzxh, t.yzpzzl_dm, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.sbrq_1, t.tbrq_1, t.ybtse, t.ssgly_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.xtbm, t.sbsx_dm_1, t.gzlx_dm_1, t.sbfs_dm, t.slrq, t.slr_dm, t.slswjg_dm, t.bz, t.bsrxm, t.dljbrzyzjhm, t.cwfzrxm, t.fddbrxm, t.swdlrdz, t.swdlrlxdh, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.bsrlxdh, t.dlrmc, t.jbrxm, t.jbrlxdh from sb_sbb t where t.pzxh = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT sum(nvl(BYQSJFYJ,0)) as BNLJJFYJ,sum(nvl(BYQSBQYKJFE,0)) as BNLJBQYKJFE FROM SB_SBXX a,SB_DKDJ_WHSSJSF b WHERE A.SBUUID=B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH=? and A.SKSSQQ <=TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.SKSSQQ >=TO_DATE(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and A.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND A.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND A.Zsxm_Dm=? AND A.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select t.sbbdxm_dm code ,t.sbbdxmmc caption from DM_SB_SBBDXM t where t.sjsbbdxm_dm=? or t.sjsbbdxm_dm=? and t.xybz='Y' and t.yxbz='Y'
select yjye_1 from sb_yjskxx where skssqz <= Sysdate and djxh = ?
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.PZGLY_DM = ? AND trunc(SYSDATE) BETWEEN T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ
select distinct t.skssswjg_dm from sb_kssssrfpblwh t where t.djxh=?

select nvl(sum(xm.kkcsre), 0) as ykcsre from fp_dk_sq sq, fp_dk_jzyfp fp, fp_dk_jzyfp_gcxm xm where xm.jzuuid = fp.jzuuid and fp.dksquuid = sq.dksquuid and fp.gcxmbh = ? and sq.djxh = ? and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.zzslx,t.ldlx,sum(t.bcldbhs) bcldbhs from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssqz>?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssqz<?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.skssqz<=?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.czlx_dm in ('10','66','68')) group by t.zzslx,t.ldlx
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb5_wxzc t where t.sbuuid = ?
select sum(a.bdfe_2) as bdfe from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf a where a.fcjycjxxuuid=? and zrfcsfbz='0'

select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '备案' as jglx, BALSXLH as clxlh, bazdcjuuid as uuid from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.cjhdbz = 'N' And (t.clxlh = ? Or t.balsxlh = ?) order by lrrq desc
select * from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a where syuuid=? and #macroparam# and yxbz='Y' order by yxqq desc

select a.djxh kjdjxh, a.nsrmc kjywrmc, b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_dkdj_fb_skmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '3', '4', '5') and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bkjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.sybh_1 = ?) and b.zsxm_dm = ? and b.zspm_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or b.zszm_dm = ?) and b.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and not exists (select 1 from zm_yjssswszmxxb c where c.djxh = b.bkjdjxh and b.sybh_1 = c.fybh and b.zsxm_dm = c.zsxm_dm and b.zspm_dm = c.zspm_dm and b.skssqq = c.skssqq and b.skssqz = c.skssqz and nvl(c.yxbz,'Y')='Y' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N')
select * from sb_sbbd_zzsybnsr_ycsbdygz t where t.bduuid=?
select BDBZ from SB_SBBD_ZZSXGM_PBBD where djxh=? And Skssqq=? And Skssqz =? order by lrrq desc

select b.tdsybh,b.tdzldz,b.xzqhsz_dm,b.jdxz_dm,b.tdzldz,b.zgswskfj_dm,b.zdyt_dm,b.sjzdmj,b.sbuuid,b.pzxh from sb_gdzys_zb b, sb_sbb c where b.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and c.djxh=? and c.gzlx_dm_1 in('1', '4', '5') and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1=#macroparam# or b.tdsybh=?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.jdxz_dm=?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.xzqhsz_dm=?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1=#macroparam# or b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
insert into sb_swjgbfs t (t.clywlx, t.swjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.sjgsdq, t.hhljid) values (?, ?, '99999999999', sysdate, '00000000000', ?)

select jjrqsrq as jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq as jjrzzrq, rowid from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yyyf = ? and jjrbz = 'N'

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '9' zt_bz, /*资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '24' then ncye_zc end zcnc1, /* 一、资产总计*/ case when ewbhxh = '24' then qmye_zc end zcqm1, /* 一、资产总计*/ 0 zcnc2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ 0 zcqm2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ 0 zcnc3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ 0 zcqm3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then ncye_zc end zcnc4, /*交易性金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then qmye_zc end zcqm4, /*交易性金融资产*/ 0 zcnc5, /*应收票据*/ 0 zcqm5, /*应收票据*/ 0 zcnc6, /*应收帐款*/ 0 zcqm6, /*应收帐款*/ 0 zcnc7, /*预付帐款*/ 0 zcqm7, /*预付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then ncye_zc end zcnc8, /*应收利息*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then qmye_zc end zcqm8, /*应收利息*/ 0 zcnc9, /*其他应收款*/ 0 zcqm9, /*其他应收款*/ 0 zcnc10, /*存货*/ 0 zcqm10, /*存货*/ 0 zcnc11, /*其中：原材料*/ 0 zcqm11, /*其中：原材料*/ 0 zcnc12, /* 库存商品*/ 0 zcqm12, /* 库存商品*/ 0 zcnc13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ 0 zcqm13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then ncye_zc end zcnc14, /*其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then qmye_zc end zcqm14, /*其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then ncye_zc end zcnc15, /*投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then qmye_zc end zcqm15, /*投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then ncye_zc end zcnc16, /*长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then qmye_zc end zcqm16, /*长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then ncye_zc end zcnc17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then qmye_zc end zcqm17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ 0 zcnc18, /*在建工程*/ 0 zcqm18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then ncye_zc end zcnc19, /*无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then qmye_zc end zcqm19, /*无形资产*/ /*权益*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then ncye_qy end zcnc20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then qmye_qy end zcqm20, /* 二、负债合计*/ 0 zcnc21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ 0 zcqm21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ 0 zcnc22, /*其中:短期借款*/ 0 zcqm22, /*其中:短期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then ncye_qy end zcnc23, /*交易性金融负债*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then qmye_qy end zcqm23, /*交易性金融负债*/ 0 zcnc24, /*应付票据*/ 0 zcqm24, /*应付票据*/ 0 zcnc25, /*应付帐款*/ 0 zcqm25, /*应付帐款*/ 0 zcnc26, /*预收账款*/ 0 zcqm26, /*预收账款*/ 0 zcnc27, /*其他应付款*/ 0 zcqm27, /*其他应付款*/ 0 zcnc28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ 0 zcqm28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ 0 zcnc29, /*其中:长期借款*/ 0 zcqm29, /*其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then ncye_qy end zcnc30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then qmye_qy end zcqm30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then ncye_qy end zcnc31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then qmye_qy end zcqm31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then ncye_qy end zcnc32, /*资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then qmye_qy end zcqm32, /*资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then ncye_qy end zcnc33, /*未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then qmye_qy end zcqm33, /*未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then ncye_qy end zcnc34, /*盈余公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then qmye_qy end zcqm34/*盈余公积*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_syyh_zcfzb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid

select distinct b.*, a.* from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'N' and a.nextfcjycjxxuuid is null and #macroparam#
select t.* from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t, sb_ls_sbxx l where t.djxh = l.djxh and l.hhljid = ?
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzqshm, pzzzhm, pzsl as kjs, kjzfsl as zfs from v_zs_pz_pzsyqk where tfrq < sysdate - ? and coalesce(to_char(sddwdjxh), kpr_dm) = ?
select mx.bhzrdjxh djxh, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.hznsyxqq, mx.hznsyxqz from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb mx, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = mx.bhzrdjxh and mx.sbjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and mx.yxbz = ?
select a.* from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx a inner join sb_cxs_fcjy b on a.fcjyuuid = b.fcjyuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.jyfuuid = b.jyfuuid where a.jyfuuid = ?
select max(t.skssqz) skssqz from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? and t.njzbz='1'

SELECT T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZG_DM = ?) AND T.PZZT_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' UNION SELECT M.PZZL_DM, M.PZZG_DM, M.PZQSHM, M.PZZZHM FROM PZ_JC_CSH M WHERE M.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR M.PZZG_DM = ?) AND M.YXBZ = 'Y'
Select * From sb_sds_jmhd_yjnd t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
select * from CBJ_CLHDXX where djxh=? and skssksrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssjsrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from sb_zzs_xgm xgm where xgm.sbuuid in (select sb.sbuuid from sb_sbb sb where sb.djxh=?) and ewblxh='4'
select * from SB_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB_FB1 a where a.SBUUID=? and a.ZFBZ_1='N'

SELECT K1.JE1 - K2.JE2 AS YYSRSNTQ ,K1.JE3 - K2.JE4 AS LRZESNTQ FROM (SELECT SUM(A.YYSR_LJ) AS JE1 ,SUM(A.Lrze_Lj) AS JE3 FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD A INNER JOIN SB_SBB B ON A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND B.SKSSQZ = ? AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND B.GZLX_DM_1 IN (#macroparam#)) K1, (SELECT SUM(A.YYSR_LJ) AS JE2,SUM(A.LRZE_LJ)AS JE4 FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD A INNER JOIN SB_SBB B ON A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND B.SKSSQZ = ? AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND B.GZLX_DM_1 IN (#macroparam#)) K2

select distinct pzzl.pzzl_dm pzzl_dm, pzzl.pzzlmc pzzlmc from pz_sspzlfdmxb lfd, dm_pz_pzzl pzzl,pz_sspzlfdzb zb where lfd.pzzl_dm = pzzl.pzzl_dm and lfd.pzlfduuid = zb.pzlfduuid and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.lrr_dm like ?

select d.htje as cjjg ,decode(b.ynse-b.jmse,0,'Y','N') mzbz,a.*, b.ysx as kpje, c.hzsbbz from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf a inner join sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx b on a.jyfuuid = b.jyfuuid and b.zsxm_dm = '10101' inner join sb_cxs_fcjy c on a.jyfuuid = c.jyfuuid and b.fcjyuuid = c.fcjyuuid and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx d on a.fcjycjxxuuid=d.fcjycjxxuuid and d.zfbz_1='N' where a.bdfe_2 > 0 and a.fcjycjxxuuid =?
select wbuuid from zs_yjsf_cbjtkz t ,sb_ls_sbxx l where t.wbuuid=l.lsmxid and l.hhljid=?
select t.* from zs_yjsf t where t.djxh=? and t.tzlx_dm='1'
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYFLBGB t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
update sb_pkqc_kkqr t set t.yxbz='N',t.xgr_dm=?,t.xgrq=sysdate where t.swjg_dm=? and t.yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz='Y'
SELECT * FROM DM_PZ_PZZL WHERE SWJG_DM in (?,?) AND yxbz = 'Y' AND xybz = 'Y'

select b.cldauuid, b.cldabh, b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.nsrmc, b.clsbdh, b.nsrsfzjzl_dm, b.zjhm, b.hy_dm, b.djzclx_dm, b.lxdh, b.yzbm, b.dz, b.clcp, b.clxh, b.zypz, b.cldw, b.zws, b.pql, b.fdjhm, b.clgzdsx_dm, b.cdsx, b.gzrq, b.ffrq, b.mzsbz, b.ewtmc, b.wszmhm, b.jdrq, b.pzhm_1, b.wspzzl_dm, b.wspzhm, b.sjse, b.znj, b.znjpzhm, b.djr_dm, b.djrq, b.jdcxszhm, b.yzpzxh, b.cljdlx_dm, b.cldazt_dm, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.xgr_dm, b.xgrq, b.sjgsdq, b.clscqymc, b.zfbz_1, b.zfr_dm, b.zfrq_1, b.sjtb_sj, b.cllx_dm, b.cldabh, b.cdsx, b.fpjgzsbz, b.xnyqclx_dm, b.jdczccchgz, b.zsjg_dm, b.fpjg from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb a, sb_cgs_cldaxx b where a.clsbdh = b.clsbdh and a.pzxh = b.yzpzxh and b.lrrq >= to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') --and #macroparam# and (b.zfbz_1 is null or b.zfbz_1='N') and (a.zfbz_1 is null or a.zfbz_1='N') and b.lrrq <= sysdate
Select t.* from Sb_sds_Jmcz_Nd_fb_syktmx t Where t.sbuuid=?
select t.* from sb_dkdj_whssjsf t where t.sbuuid = ?
SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A, SB_XFS_FB_SNYRLYYDTJB_KCHYQK B WHERE A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ = ? AND A.SKSSQZ = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5')

Select Clscqy_Dm, Scqymc, Gcclscqynsrsbh, Scqyjc, Qydmscsj, Clscqyzgswjg, Cljkqymc, Cljkqynsrsbh, Cljkqyzgswjg, Sqrq, Yxbz, Lrr_Dm, Lrrq, Xgr_Dm, Xgrq, Sjgsdq, Clcdsx_Dm, Gcclscqyssdq, Jkclscqyssdq From Sb_Cgs_Clscqy t Where t.Clcdsx_Dm = ? And Yxbz = 'Y' And t.Cljkqyzgswjg Like ?
select * from SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB_MX a, SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB b, SB_ZLBSCJB c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and c.djxh = ? and b.kfbdcxmbh = ? and a.htbh = ?
Select Pzxh, Zspm_Dm From Sb_Sbxx Where Djxh = ? And Skssqq = ? And Skssqz = ? And Zsxm_Dm = ? and zfbz_1='N'
update fp_dk_ysyskmx t set t.zfbz_1 = 'Y', t.zfrq_1 = sysdate, t.xgrq = sysdate, t.zfr_dm = ?, t.xgr_dm = ? where t.spuuid in (#macroparam#)
select count(t.wbuuid) as num from ZS_yjsf_cbjtkz t where t.wbuuid=? and t.dscljg='Y' and t.yxbz='Y'

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qjfymxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select distinct t.pzzl_dm as code, t.pzzlmc as caption, t.* from dm_pz_pzzl t, CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL a where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.pzzl_dm=a.pzzl_dm and a.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from ( select * from qx_swjg_zns where zn_dm = '09' and yxbz = 'Y' and sjswjg_dm is not null ) pzzns connect by prior pzzns.sjswjg_dm = pzzns.swjg_dm start with pzzns.swjg_dm = ?) order by t.pzzl_dm

select * from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = b.djxh and a.yzpzzl_dm = b.yzpzzl_dm and b.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and a.zfbz_1!='Y' and a.djxh = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.bz = ?

select t.uuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.ssqq, t.nsrmc, t.xmbh, t.xmmc, t.xmdz, t.hdr, t.hdrq, t.zsbz, t.hdswjg, t.spjg, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm,t.sfbz, t.hdrxm from sb_tdzzsqshdb t where lcslid=?

SELECT LXDH, FKFNSRSBH, LZFPHM, LZFPDM, BZ, SQLY, FKFDJXH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, ZBGCXMBH, GCXMMC, GCXMBH, FKFSFWZBR, FKFMC, FKFSFZJHM, FKFSFZJZL_DM, SKFSFWFBR, DKSQUUID, JZUUID, SKFNSRSBH, SKFSFZJLX_DM, SKFSFZJHM, SKFMC, DZ FROM FP_DK_JZYFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

select max(jjrzzrq) as jjrzzrq from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm= any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm= swjg_dm) and xybz='Y' and jjrqsrq<=? and jjrzzrq>=? and yyyf=? and jjrbz='N'

SELECT DISTINCT T.PZJCUUID, T.PZHSJG_DM, T.CZYUUID, T.YPRLX_DM, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM, T.JCSL, T.RKRQ, T.FFYXJ, T.PZZT_DM FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.PZZT_DM in (#macroparam#) and T.Czyuuid=? and yprlx_dm=? AND T.JCSL > 0 and yxbz='Y' ORDER BY t.PZZL_DM ASC, t.ffyxj DESC, t.rkrq,t.pzqshm ASC
select count(*) as cnt from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where (#macroparam#) /*t.pzxh in ('')*/ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select b.* from wbjh_clfxsxxb a, wbjh_clfxsxxb_gyrxx b where (1 = #macroparam# or a.fwuuid = ?) and a.mfsfzjlx_dm = ? and a.mfzjhm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.mfgj_dm = ?) and a.fwuuid = b.fwuuid
select t.yjr_dm, t.jgr_dm, t.swjg_dm from pz_sspzjjb t where t.yjr_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.fhyj is null

select jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <= ? and yyyf = ? and jjrbz = 'Y' order by swjg_dm, jjrqsrq, jjrzzrq

with abc as (select /*+materialize*/ b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_tdjy b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and djxh = ?) select d.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b, abc c, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb_gyrxx d where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.czrf_nsrsbh = c.zrfnsrsbh and b.csfnsrsbh = c.csfnsrsbh and b.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and b.zrfpzxh = c.pzxh and nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.djxh = ?
select * from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb t where t.htzh=? and t.zfbz_1='N'
select * from sb_zqjm jm where jm.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jm.djxh = ? and jm.zsxm_dm = ? and jm.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jm.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

with swjg as (select ypruuid, yprmc, decode(wt.djxh, null, wt.swry_dm, null) as swry_dm, wt.djxh from pz_ypr wt where wt.pzhsjg_dm = ? and sysdate between wt.yxqsrq and wt.yxzzrq) select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, t3.pzzg, t4.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, cs_pz_pzzgb t3, dm_gy_swjg t4 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t.pzzg_dm = t3.pzzg_dm and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t.kpjg_dm = t4.swjg_dm and t.sddwdjxh is null and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, t3.pzzg, t4.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, cs_pz_pzzgb t3, dm_gy_swjg t4 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t.pzzg_dm = t3.pzzg_dm and t1.yprlx_dm in ('20', '31') and t.kpjg_dm = t4.swjg_dm and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, '' as pzzg_dm, '' as pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, '' as pzzg, t3.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk_yhp t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, dm_gy_swjg t3 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and t.kpjg_dm = t3.swjg_dm and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t.sddwdjxh is null and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select t1.yprmc, t.kpjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, '' as pzzg_dm, '' as pzhm, t.hjje, t.tfrq, t2.pzzlmc, '' as pzzg, t3.swjgmc from zs_pzsyqk_yhp t, pz_ypr t1, dm_pz_pzzl t2, dm_gy_swjg t3 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t.pzzl_dm = t2.pzzl_dm and t.kpjg_dm = t3.swjg_dm and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and sysdate between t1.yxqsrq and t1.yxzzrq and t1.yprlx_dm in ('20','31') and trunc(t.tfrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select t.* from sb_yhs t where t.sbuuid=?
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.JBR_DM_1 = ? AND T.PZJBLX_DM = ? AND T.SHBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.SSPZJXBBH IS NULL AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SBBZ = 'N'
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_JWGLFXXB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?

select a.sspkjbdbh, a.pzjblx_dm, a.jbsr, a.jbzr, a.shbz, a.jbrq_1, a.sspzjxbbh, a.jbr_dm_1, a.yprlx_dm, b.yprmc cxyy from pz_sspkjbdzb a, pz_ypr b where a.jbjxdwr = b.ypruuid and a.pzhsjg_dm = ? and a.jbrq_1 between to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (a.shbz = 'N' or (a.shbz = 'Y' and a.sspzjxbbh is null)) and a.cxbz = 'N'

WITH CC AS (SELECT c.fcjycjxxuuid, qh.xzqhmc as xzqhmc, c.dj, c.htqdsj, c.htje as htje, c.pgqs_jyjg, f.fybh, f.tdfwdz, f.mj as mj, f.fwsdswjg_dm as fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm as xzqhsz_dm, to_char(g.djxh) as djxh, g.sfzjzl_dm as sfzjzl_dm, g.sfzjhm as sfzjhm, g.nsrsbh, g.lxdh as lxdh, g.dz, g.nsrmc as nsrmc, g.pzxh, g.szfe_2 as szfe_2, g.zcqrbz FROM SB_CXS_FYJBXX F, SB_CXS_FCJYCJXX C, SB_CXS_FCJYCJXX_JYF G, DM_GY_XZQH QH WHERE F.FYJBXXUUID = C.FYJBXXUUID AND C.FCJYCJXXUUID = G.FCJYCJXXUUID AND G.ZRFCSFBZ = '1' AND C.FCJYCJXXUUID = ? AND NVL(F.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(C.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND C.YSBBZ = 'Y' AND F.XZQHSZ_DM = QH.XZQHSZ_DM), KK AS (SELECT A.FCJYCJXXUUID, S.DJXH, S.YBTSE, S.PZXH, S.HZSBBZ FROM SB_CXS_FCJY A, SB_CXS_FCJY_SKXX S WHERE A.FCJYUUID = S.FCJYUUID AND S.ZSXM_DM = '10119' AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND A.FCJYCJXXUUID IN (SELECT FCJYCJXXUUID FROM CC)), YY AS (SELECT MIN(DZSPHM) AS DZSPHM, MIN(PZZL_DM) AS PZZL_DM, MIN(PZHM) AS PZHM, YZPZXH AS YZPZXH, SUM(SJJE) AS YNSE, MIN(YZCLRQ) AS YZCLRQ, DJXH from (SELECT J.DZSPHM, J.PZZL_DM, J.PZHM, Y.YZPZXH, J.SJJE, Y.DJXH, Y.YZCLRQ FROM ZS_JKS J, ZS_YJSF Y WHERE J.ZSUUID = Y.ZSUUID AND J.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND Y.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND Y.YZPZXH IN (SELECT PZXH FROM KK) AND Y.ZSXM_DM = '10119' UNION ALL SELECT J.DZSPHM, J.PZZL_DM, J.PZHM, Y.YZPZXH, J.SJJE, Y.DJXH, Y.YZCLRQ FROM ZS_WSZ J, ZS_YJSF Y WHERE J.ZSUUID = Y.ZSUUID AND J.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND Y.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND Y.YZPZXH IN (SELECT PZXH FROM KK) AND Y.ZSXM_DM = '10119') GROUP BY DJXH, YZPZXH), ZZ AS (SELECT DISTINCT KK.PZXH, case when kk.ybtse <= 1 then 'Y' else case when kk.ybtse > yy.ynse then 'N' else decode(YY.YZCLRQ, null, 'N', '', 'N', 'Y') end end WSBZ FROM YY, KK WHERE KK.pzxh = YY.YZPZXH(+)) SELECT ROWNUM AS xh, cc.fcjycjxxuuid, cc.xzqhmc, cc.dj, cc.htqdsj, cc.htje, cc.pgqs_jyjg, cc.fybh, cc.tdfwdz, cc.mj, cc.fwsdswjg_dm, cc.xzqhsz_dm, cc.djxh, cc.sfzjzl_dm, cc.sfzjhm, cc.nsrsbh, cc.dz, cc.nsrmc, cc.szfe_2, kk.ybtse, yy.dzsphm, yy.pzzl_dm, yy.pzhm, yy.ynse, pz.pzzlmc, ZZ.WSBZ FROM CC, KK, YY, DM_PZ_PZZL PZ, ZZ WHERE CC.FCJYCJXXUUID = KK.FCJYCJXXUUID AND CC.DJXH = KK.DJXH AND KK.pzxh = YY.YZPZXH(+) AND KK.DJXH = YY.DJXH(+) AND YY.PZZL_DM = PZ.PZZL_DM(+) AND KK.pzxh = ZZ.PZXH
SELECT BZ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, JE, DJ, HLSL, DWSL_DM, GGXH, HWLWMC, TYFPUUID, TYFPHLUUID FROM FP_DK_TYJDFP_HLMX WHERE TYFPUUID = ?
select pzzg.PZZG_DM code,zl.PZZL_DM pcode,pzzg.pzzg caption from cs_pz_pzzgb pzzg,dm_pz_pzzl zl where pzzg.PZZL_DM=zl.PZZL_DM and pzzg.sjgsdq LIKE '150%'
Select bdbz from sb_sbbd_zzsybnsr_ycsbdygz where djxh = ? And skssqq = ? And skssqz = ? and yxbz = 'Y' order by lrrq desc
select a.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlbscjb b where nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and b.zlbscjuuid = ? and nvl(a.zlfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y'

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwsbqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And a.Sbrq_1 is null And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))
select to_char(b.sbqx,'yyyy-mm-dd') from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = ? and a.djxh = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
select * from PZ_JBSC where and ypruuid=? and yspzbh_1=? and yspzmxhm in (#macroparam#) and zfbz_1='N'

select SUM(YZZZSBHSXSE + XSSYGDYSGDZCBHSXSE + bqynse+ MSXSE+ CKMSXSE+bqmse) as h2,b.pzxh from sb_zzs_xgm a,sb_sbb b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.ewblxh <=2 group by b.pzxh

SELECT * FROM SB_FWSYQKDJXX_CJ T WHERE T.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND (1 = ? OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = ? OR (T.XZQHSZ_DM IS NULL OR T.JDXZ_DM IS NULL OR T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM IS NULL OR T.NSQX_DM IS NULL OR T.SBQX_DM IS NULL OR T.JKQX_DM IS NULL))
select t.* from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh=? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.zfbz_1='N'

update sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cz a set (a.fwcqzsh, a.tdsybh, a.czfcmj, a.zspm_dm, a.fcmc, a.fcyt_dm, a.dh_1, a.pkbz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.xxdz, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.zfrq_1, a.sl_1, a.htzjzsr, a.czfnsrsbh, a.czfnsrmc, a.zlrqq, a.zlrqz, a.bqyszjsr, a.jdxz_dm, a.nsqx_dm, a.sbqx_dm, a.jkqx_dm, a.czxz_dm, a.bqynse, a.ssjmxz_dm, a.bqjmse, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq) = (select b.fwcqzsh, b.tdsybh, b.czfcmj, b.zspm_dm, b.fcmc, b.fcyt_dm, b.dh_1, b.pkbz, b.xzqhsz_dm, b.xxdz, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.zfrq_1, b.sl_1, b.htzjzsr, b.czfnsrsbh, b.czfnsrmc, b.zlrqq, b.zlrqz, b.bqyszjsr, b.jdxz_dm, b.nsqx_dm, b.sbqx_dm, b.jkqx_dm, b.czxz_dm, b.bqynse, b.ssjmxz_dm, b.bqjmse, a.lrr_dm, sysdate from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcz b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.fybh = b.fybh) where (a.djxh, a.fybh) in (select djxh, fybh from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcz) and a.djxh = ?
select * from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx where #macroparam#
select * from pz_flz a where a.yspzhm = ? and a.yspzmxhm = ? and a.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select tdsyzbh,sybh_1,syzlwz,tddj_dm,tdmj,htbh,htqdrq,cjjg,zrfnsrsbh,tdsdswjg_Dm,jdxz_dm from SB_TDJY where zrfnsrsbh =?
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB WHERE YXBZ = 'Y' And FYXXUUID =? AND #macroparam# ORDER BY YXQQ

update sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cj a set ( a.fwcqzsh , a.fybh , a.fwmj , a.czfcmj , a.fcyz , a.czwyz , a.jsbl , a.zspm_dm , a.fcmc , a.fcyt_dm , a.dh_1 , a.pkbz , a.csqdrq , a.syqzzrq , a.xzqhsz_dm , a.xxdz , a.zgswskfj_dm , a.zfrq_1 , a.sl_1 , a.nsqx_dm , a.sbqx_dm , a.jkqx_dm , a.cqgs_dm , a.jdxz_dm , a.ssjmxz_dm , a.bqjmse , a.jmsfcyz , a.xgr_dm , a.xgrq ) = (select b.fwcqzsh , b.fybh , b.fwmj , b.czfcmj , b.fcyz , b.czwyz , b.jsbl , b.zspm_dm , b.fcmc , b.fcyt_dm , b.dh_1 , b.pkbz , b.csqdrq , b.syqzzrq , b.xzqhsz_dm , b.xxdz , b.zgswskfj_dm , b.zfrq_1 , b.sl_1 , b.nsqx_dm , b.sbqx_dm , b.jkqx_dm , b.cqgs_dm , b.jdxz_dm , b.ssjmxz_dm , b.bqjmse , b.jmsfcyz , a.lrr_dm , sysdate from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.fybh = b.fybh) where (a.djxh, a.fybh) in (select djxh, fybh from sb_ls_fwsyqkdjxxcj)

select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with sjswjg_dm = ? connect by sjswjg_dm = prior swjg_dm union all select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' and swjg_dm= ?

select t1.sqrmc_1, t1.sqrq, t1.uuid nsruuid, t2.uuid, t2.qsnsrczzczl_dm zczl_Dm, t2.qsnsrczzczlmc zcmc, t2.bdcqszsh bdccqzsh, t2.xmxxzldd bdczld, t2.jzmj, t2.xh_3 zcxh, t2.csfnsrsbh jsrnsrsbh, t2.csf_nsrmc jsrnsrmc, t2.jsflxdh jsrlxdh, t2.bgdz jsrbgdz, t2.zz jsrzz, t2.sl, t2.zcyz, t2.zcjz, t2.cffs_dm cffs, t2.cfjg, t2.sbbwz, t2.xzqhsf,t2.xzqhds,t2.xzqhqx,t2.jdxz_dm,t2.bduuid,t2.csfdjxh from sb_cfdezcbgb t1, sb_cfdezcbgmxb t2 where t1.djxh = t2.djxh and t1.sbbwz = t2.sbbwz and nvl(t2.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t2.djxh = ? and (t1.sqrq =to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') or 1=#macroparam#)
select t.* from sb_sbb t where t.djxh=? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.zfbz_1='N'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zcssnstzmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

WITH N AS (SELECT A.SPUUID, NVL(A.SJJE - B.FPDKSK, A.SJJE) FPDKSK FROM FP_LS_DK_SKCL A LEFT JOIN (SELECT T.SPUUID, SUM(T.FPDKSK) FPDKSK FROM FP_DK_KSYSKMX T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.DJXH = ? GROUP BY T.SPUUID) B ON A.SPUUID = B.SPUUID) SELECT '' KSYSKUUID, M.ZSUUID LYUUID, M.JSYJ, N.FPDKSK, M.SL_1, M.ZSXM_DM, M.ZSPM_DM, M.SKSSQQ, M.SKSSQZ, M.SKSX_DM, M.SPUUID, M.PZZL_DM WSPZZL_DM, M.PZZG_DM WSPZZG, M.PZHM WSPZHM, M.HY_DM FROM FP_LS_DK_SKCL M, N WHERE M.SPUUID = N.SPUUID AND N.FPDKSK > 0
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_bgrsgwgqygfqk t Where t.pzxh=? And (1=? or t.sbuuid=?) and (1=? or t.mxxh=?) AND T.ZFBZ_1='N'
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb7_rtzj_hj t where t.sbuuid = ?

select * from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB b, SB_ZLBS_ZLFXSXXB_MX c where a.zlbscjuuid = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zlfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid

select t2.pzzl_dm,t2.pzzg_dm,t2.pzqshm,t2.pzzzhm,t2.kjs,t2.zfs from pz_jbsc t2 where t2.ypruuid=? and t2.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t2.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t2.pzzy_dm <= '10' and t2.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP WHERE SSPKJBDBH = ?
SELECT DJXH, KPJE,SQRXM FROM FP_DK_SQ S WHERE S.DKSQUUID=?

SELECT DISTINCT SWRY.SWRY_DM CODE, SWRY.SWRYXM CAPTION FROM QX_JGGW_SWRYSF GWSF, QX_SWJG_GW SWJG, DM_QX_SWRYSF SF, DM_GY_SWRY SWRY LEFT JOIN PZ_YPR YPR ON SWRY.SWRY_DM = YPR.SWRY_DM WHERE GWSF.GWXH = SWJG.GWXH AND SF.SWRYSF_DM = GWSF.SWRYSF_DM AND SF.SWRY_DM = SWRY.SWRY_DM AND ((YPR.YPRLX_DM != '12' OR (YPR.YPRLX_DM = '12' AND YPR.YXBZ != 'Y')) OR YPR.YPRLX_DM IS NULL) AND SF.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SWJG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND GWSF.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SWRY.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SWJG.SWJG_DM = ?

select c.zlbsuuid,c.ssqq,c.ssqz,c.lrrq,d.cfdz from sb_zlbscjb c,sb_zlbssldjb d where c.djxh =? And c.zlbsuuid=d.zlbsuuid and c.ssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and c.ssqz =to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and bszl_dm =? and (zfbz_1 <>'Y' or zfbz_1 is Null) order by lrrq desc
select t.ewblxh, t.bqhzfwbzzszyfpypsl, t.bqzxddzgjhxsypsl from sb_xfs_fb_snyrlyydtjb_kchyqk t where t.sbuuid = ? and t.ewblxh in ('1', '3', '5', '7')
select xxptfpbhsxsesb ,xxzyfpcbjesb,xxptfpsesb,xxzyfpcbsesb ,bdbz from sb_sbbd_zzsybnsr_ycsbdygz t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz= ? order by t.lrrq desc

select t.djxh, t.pzxh, t.bduuid, t.SNYRLRBDSCQYSB_1, t.SNYRLRBDSCQYQT_1, t.SNYRLRBDSCQYSB_2, t.SNYRLRBDSCQYSB_3 from SB_SBBD_SLYRYXXFDS t where t.djxh=? and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.ddbfl='2' order by t.lrrq desc
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBBHBGD t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
select * from cs_gy_sxdwsjswjgwhb t where (1=? or t.xzqhsz_dm=?)

select max(jkqx) as jkqx from cs_gy_sbqxwh where swjg_dm= any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y') start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm= swjg_dm) and xybz='Y' and yyyf = ? and zclxfl = ? and zsxm_dm=? and (1=? or zspm_dm=?) and hsbz = ? and jkqx_dm = ?
select round(nvl(sum(t.ybtse), 0), 2) as ybtse from ZS_YJSF t where t.YZPZXH = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skzl_dm <>'20' and t.skcllx_dm <>'6'

select t.dksquuid, t.gldksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.srze, t.yxkcje, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.sskcs, t.ynsfe, t.jmsfe, t.yjsfe, t.ybsfe, t.zszsxm_dm, t.zszspm_dm, t.zszszm_dm, t.jmspjguuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.jyxm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.nsqnyjse, t.sfmxuuid, t.lzsfmxuuid, t.zjsrsfft, t.qxq, t.qxz, t.sfzczf from fp_dk_sfmx t, fp_dk_sq sq, fp_ls_dkje c where t.dksquuid = sq.dksquuid and sq.djxh = c.djxh and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zsbz = 'Y' #macroparam# and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zsxm_dm = '10101' and t.gldksquuid is null and t.skssqq >= c.kpqsrq and t.skssqz <= c.kpjzrq and c.dksquuid = ?
SELECT * FROM SB_XFSJG_BJXFSZDJSJG_HDMX T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ?

SELECT * FROM SB_SBXX WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5') AND DJXH in (select djxh from dj_nsrxx where nsrsbh in (select nsrsbh from dj_nsrxx where djxh = ?)) AND ZSXM_DM = ? AND SKSSQQ = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SKSSQZ = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ZSDLFS_DM = ? AND ZSPM_DM NOT LIKE '%9900' order by lrrq

select * from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sbxxuuid = b.sbxxuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_QYXTZB_TZQK where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? order by ewbhxh
select * from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb t where t.lcslid = ? /* and t.zfbz_1 = 'Y' */ order by t.lrrq desc
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb_Hhrdk t Where t.sbuuid=?

select zspm_dm,sum(ysbse) ysbse from ( select c.zspm_dm,sum(c.se) ysbse from sb_zlbs_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbscjb b ,sb_zlbs_sysbmxbg_mx c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and b.djxh=? and a.sybh_1=? and c.zsxm_dm=? and c.skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') group by c.zspm_dm union all select b.zspm_dm, sum(se) ysbse from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and b.sybh_1 = ? and b.zsxm_dm = ? and b.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm=? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') group by b.zspm_dm ) group by zspm_dm
SELECT * FROM sb_yjskxx t WHERE t.sphm=?

select sum(a.ybtse) as yjse from zs_yjsf a,zs_jks b where a.djxh=? and a.yzpzzl_dm in(#macroparam#) and a.zsxm_dm=? and a.zspm_dm=? and a.sybh_1=? and a.sjgsdq like ? and a.tzlx_dm in('1','4') and a.skcllx_dm='1' and a.zsuuid=b.zsuuid and b.rkrq is not null
SELECT * FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzgly_dm = ? AND a.pzhsjgyxqsrq <= trunc(SYSDATE) AND a.pzhsjgyxzzrq > trunc(SYSDATE)

Select t.Cldauuid, t.Djxh, t.Nsrsbh, t.Nsrmc, t.Clsbdh, t.Nsrsfzjzl_Dm, t.Zjhm, t.Hy_Dm, t.Djzclx_Dm, t.Lxdh, t.Yzbm, t.Dz, t.Clcp, t.Clxh, t.Zypz, t.Cldw, t.Zws, t.Pql, t.Fdjhm, t.Clgzdsx_Dm, t.Gzrq, t.Ffrq, t.Mzsbz, t.Ewtmc, t.Wszmhm, t.Jdrq, t.Pzhm_1, t.Wspzzl_Dm, t.Wspzhm, t.Sjse, t.Znj, t.Znjpzhm, t.Djr_Dm, t.Djrq, t.Jdcxszhm, t.Yzpzxh, t.Cljdlx_Dm, t.Cldazt_Dm, t.Clscqymc, t.Zfbz_1, t.Zfr_Dm, t.Zfrq_1, t.Sjtb_Sj, '' As Ewtmt, t.Cllx_Dm From Sb_Cgs_Cldaxx t Where (1 = '#macroparam#' Or t.Clsbdh = ?) And (1 = '#macroparam#' Or t.Wszmhm = ?) And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N'
select * from cs_gy_sxdwsjswjgwhb t where t.swjg_dm=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y'
update sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a set a.zrfsbbz = 'N' where a.zlbscjuuid in (select zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb where nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(a.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.zrfpzxh = ?
select * from sb_zlf a where a.sbuuid = ?
Select nvl(t.ljjzyhndkce,0) ljjzyhndkce From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Ggywxckndtzb t where t.djxh =? and t.nd=? and t.zfbz_1='N' AND ROWNUM =1

Select t.Pzxh, t.Asrzehdynssdehj, t.Ajfzchsjfzcze As Yfsbjejfzcze, t.Ajfzchshsdsre As Yfsbjehsdsre, t.Ajfzchshdlrl As Yfsbjejswjghddlrl1, t.Ajfzchsynssde, t.Acbfyhdcbfyze As Yfsbjecbfyze, t.Acbfyhdhsdsre As Yfsbjehsdsre1, t.Acbfyhdhdlrl As Yfsbjejswjghddlrl, t.Acbfyhdynssde, t.Ynqysdse As Yfsbjeynqysdse, t.Gjysjmsdse As Yfsbjejmqysdse, t.ynqysdse As Yfsbjesjynqysdse From Sb_Sds_Fjmhd_Yjnd t, Sb_Sbxx s Where s.Sbuuid = t.Sbuuid And t.Yjdndsbbj = '1' And s.Sbsx_Dm_1 = '11' And s.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And s.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And s.Djxh = ? And s.Zsfs_Dm = ? And s.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And Trunc(s.Skssqq) >= To_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') And Trunc(s.Skssqz) <= To_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.cgssbuuid = ?

select b.sbuuid, b.lrrq from sb_sbb b, sb_sds_jmhd_yjnd y where b.pzxh = y.pzxh and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.djxh = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm =? and b.lrrq <=? and y.yjdndsbbj='1'

select t.dksquuid, t.dksquuid gldksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.srze, t.yxkcje, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.sskcs, t.ynsfe, t.jmsfe, t.yjsfe, t.ybsfe, t.zszsxm_dm, t.zszspm_dm, t.zszszm_dm, t.jmspjguuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.jyxm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.nsqnyjse, t.sfmxuuid from fp_dk_sfmx t, fp_dk_sq sq where 1 = 1 and t.dksquuid = sq.dksquuid #macroparam# and sq.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.gldksquuid is null and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zsbz = 'Y'
select ysuuid,max(skssqz)+1 skssqz from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx where zfbz_1='N' and djxh=? and skssqz>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by ysuuid
select * from sb_sbbd_zzsxgm_pbbd t where t.bduuid=?
select t.* from sb_wtdz_zqjyyhsbgb_skmx t where t.sbuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.SSPKJBDUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.SSPKJBDBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.SHBZ = 'Y' AND T.SBBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SHRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SHRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.SSPKJBDBH

SELECT YPR.YPRUUID CODE, YPRLX.YPRFLMC CAPTION FROM PZ_YPR YPR, DM_PZ_YPRFL YPRLX WHERE YPR.YPRLX_DM = YPRLX.YPRFL_DM AND YPRLX.YPRFL_DM != 12 AND YPR.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN YPR.YXQSRQ AND YPR.YXZZRQ UNION ALL SELECT GLY.PZGLYUUID CODE, '税务部门' AS CAPTION FROM PZ_PZGLY GLY WHERE GLY.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN GLY.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND GLY.PZHSJGYXZZRQ
Select t.Fbh, t.Hc, t.Lh, t.Swsxlb, t.Dygmc, t.Ssyhlx_Dm From Cs_Sb_Sdsswsxdzb t Where t.Yxbz = 'Y' And t.Xybz = 'Y' And t.Fbh In (#macroparam#)
select ydt.* from zs_ydtxx ydt where ydt.pzxh=? and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.czlx_dm in ('10', '66')

select t.WFLZLBHSXSE_2 as jxffdqrzjesb, t.PTFPSJKPJE_2 as jxffdqrzsesb, t.PTFPSJKPJE_1 as xxptfpbhsxsesb, t.WFLZLBHSXSE_1 as xxptfpsesb,bdbz from sb_sbbd_zzsxgm_pbbd t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select swjg_dm, swjgmc, swjg_dm code, swjgmc caption from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz='Y' and xybz='Y' AND (sjswjg_dm = ? or swjg_dm = ?) and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_date(to_char(yxqsrq,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(to_char(yxzzrq,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Kndjzdmsdsb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.pzxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

update sb_tdsyqkdjxx a set (a.tdsyzfzjgmc) = (select distinct b.tdsyzfzjgmc from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh) where
(a.djxh,a.tdsybh) in (select b.djxh,b.tdsybh from sb_ls_tdsyqkdjxx b where b.qh is null and b.tdsyzfzjgmc is not null)

select abs(nvl(sum(cwbb.bnwfplr), 0)) wfplryxs from sb_cwbb_syyh_syzqybdb cwbb where cwbb.ewbhxh = 23 and cwbb.zlbscjuuid in (select t.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.ssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zfbz_1 is null)

SELECT ZB.PZSSBGDUUID, ZB.PZSSBGDBH, ZB.SQDW_DM, ZB.SQR_DM, ZB.TBRQ, ZB.SSDWR_DM, ZB.YPRLX_DM, ZB.SSSKJE, ZB.SSRQ, ZB.SSDD, ZB.SSYYJJG, ZB.BZ, ZB.ZFBZ_1, ZB.LCSLID, ZB.ZSTYBZ, ZB.ZSRQ_3, ZB.ZSR_DM, ZB.LRRQ, ZB.LRR_DM, ZB.ZRRXM FROM PZ_SSPZSSBGDZB ZB WHERE ZB.LCSLID = ? AND ZB.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZB.ZSTYBZ = 'N'
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb1_Srmx t Where t.sbuuid=?

select * from (select b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by a.lrrq desc) where rownum<=4

/*固定资产进项税额抵扣情况表*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, (nvl(hgjkzzszyjks_jxse, 0) + nvl(zzszyfp_jxse, 0)) / 0.17 bq17, /*外购可抵扣的固定资产金额*/ nvl(hgjkzzszyjks_jxse, 0) + nvl(zzszyfp_jxse, 0) bq26 /*按抵扣项目：固定资产进项税额*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_gdzcjxdk b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh

with abc as (select /*+materialize*/b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_tdjy b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and djxh = ?) select a.djxh mfdjxh, b.*, c.htje, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.cjjg from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b, abc c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.czrf_nsrsbh = c.zrfnsrsbh and b.csfnsrsbh = c.csfnsrsbh and b.zrfpzxh = c.pzxh and nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.djxh = ?
select * from sb_cgs_cljgqc t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.nd = ? and trim(t.yf) = ? and t.qdswjg_dm = ? and t.gccbz = ?
select a.* from sb_zyssb_skxxb a, sb_sbb b, sb_ls_sbxx c where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and c.pzxh = b.pzxh and c.hhljid=? and b.gzlx_dm_1 in (?, ?, ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ?
SELECT PZZL_DM, SUM(JCSL) AS BJ_JC, '01' AS PZZY_DM, '0' AS SS_JC, SUM(JCSL) AS JC FROM PZ_JC_CSH WHERE CZYUUID = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y' GROUP BY PZZL_DM
select jc.* from pz_jc jc where jc.yxbz = 'Y' and jc.czyuuid = ? and jc.pzzl_dm = ? and jc.pzzt_dm = ?

SELECT NVL(SUM(A.KPJE), 0) KPJE, NVL(SUM(A.DKSQJE), 0) DKSQJE FROM FP_DK_SQ A INNER JOIN FP_DK_FPKJXX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE B.LZFPDM = ? AND B.LZFPHM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select swsx_dm,swsxmc from dm_gy_swsx t where t.slswsx_dm=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y'
select * from dm_gy_swjg where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' and sjswjg_dm = ?
select * from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB t where t.djxh=? and t.HTZXQSRQ>=? and t.HTZXZZRQ<=?
SELECT * FROM Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_qygqsbfbq t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select t.djxh, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, trunc(t.lrrq) lrrq from sb_zlbscjb t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ls.djxh = t.djxh and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and t.bszl_dm not in (#macroparam#) and not exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.lb_dm = ? and t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and EXISTS (select 1 from dj_nsrxx_kz kz where kz.djxh = t.djxh and kz.hsfs_dm in (#macroparam#)))

select skssqq,skssqz from sb_sbb where (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and djxh = ? and skssqq >= ? and skssqz <= ? and yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611' and sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') order by skssqq
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_GLYWHZB_QTXX where pzxh =? and sbuuid =?
SELECT T.SSPZXHSQUUID as uuid,T.SSPZXHSQBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZXHSQZB T WHERE T.BBDW_DM = ? AND T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SSPZXHSQBH BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT PZHSJG_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY WHERE PZGLY_DM = ?
select * from sb_yjskxxlsz t where t.djxh =? and t.pzxh =? and t.yzpzzl_dm =? and t.czlx_dm in('10','66')
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Fjmjs_Nd_Fb1_Srcb t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Ggywxckndtzb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select a.djxh zrfdjxh,b.zrfsbbz zrfsbbz_1, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_TDCZRXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.csfdjxh =? and b.tdsybh =? and (nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' or nvl(b.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'N') and a.djxh is null
select sum(ld.se) se from zs_djldxx ld where ld.zfr_dm is null and ld.zfrq_1 is null and djxh = ? and ld.djqsrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and ld.djqsrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select * from sb_cgs_sbbxblsb t where t.clsbdh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.cgssbzt = ?) order by t.lrrq desc

select qk.pzzl_dm,qk.pzzg_dm,qk.pzzt_dm, qk.pzhm pzqshm,qk.pzhm pzzzhm,'1' pzsl,'0' kjzfsl,'0' skje from zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.kpr_dm = ? and qk.pzcxsybj is null and qk.sspkjbdbh is null and qk.sddwdjxh is null and qk.pzzt_dm != ?
select * from ZS_YJSF where YZPZXH =? and tzlx_dm in('1','4','5')

select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '现行' as jglx, clxlh from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb where clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_dm = ?) union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '暂行' as jglx, ZXLSXLH as clxlh from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg where zfbz_1 = 'N' and clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_dm = ?) and (#macroparam#) /*hdswjg_dm in('')*/ union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '备案' as jglx, BALSXLH as clxlh from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where zfbz_1 = 'N' and cjhdbz = 'N' and clcp = ? and clxh = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or zypz = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (cldw = ? or cldw='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (pql = ? or pql='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (zws = ? or zws='0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or cllx_dm = ?) and zgswjg_dm = ?
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_JRQYZCMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDMXB T WHERE T.SSPKJBDUUID = ?
select t.* from pz_sspkjbdzb t where ZFBZ_1='N' #macroparam#

select hgzspuuid, cgssbuuid, nsrsbh, nsrmc, jdccchgzbh, ywszmhm, cfsyyy, shr, shrq, shswjg, qdr_dm, qdrq, qdswjg_dm, shyj_dm, shyj, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from sb_cgs_clhgzdzxxcfsyspb where hgzspuuid=?

SELECT T.SSPZXHSQUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.SSPZXHSQBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_SSPZXHSQZB T WHERE T.BBDW_DM = ? AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.SSPZXHSQBH
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qycztsbgb t Where t.Sbuuid = ? And t.Pzxh = ?

select a.sbuuid, b.tdsybh, b.dh_1, sum(a.jsyj) jsyj, a.tddj_dm, a.sl_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, sum(a.ynse) ynse, sum(jmse) jmse, sum(ybtse) ybtse, sum(a.yjse) yjse from sb_cxs_yjskxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b on a.syuuid = b.syuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' inner join sb_cxs_tdsyysxx c on a.ysuuid = c.ysuuid where a.djxh =? and to_char(skssqq, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(skssqz, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and #macroparam# group by a.sbuuid, b.tdsybh, b.dh_1, a.tddj_dm, a.sl_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz

SELECT T.PZZL_DM AS CODE, T.PZZLMC AS CAPTION FROM DM_PZ_PZZL T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZXLBZ = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL C WHERE C.PZZL_DM = T.PZZL_DM AND C.SWJG_DM = ?)

WITH N AS (SELECT A.SPUUID, NVL(A.SJJE - B.BCKCSE, A.SJJE) KKCSE FROM FP_LS_DK_SKCL A LEFT JOIN (SELECT T.SPUUID, SUM(T.BCKCSE) BCKCSE FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.DJXH = ? GROUP BY T.SPUUID) B on A.SPUUID = B.SPUUID) SELECT '' KSYSKUUID, M.JSYJ, M.PMSE, N.KKCSE, '0' BCKCSE, M.SL_1 SFL, M.ZSXM_DM, M.ZSPM_DM, M.SKSSQQ, M.SKSSQZ, M.SKSX_DM SKSX, M.SPUUID, M.PZZL_DM WSPZZL_DM, M.PZZG_DM WSPZZG, M.PZHM WSPZHM, M.HY_DM FROM FP_LS_DK_SKCL M, N WHERE M.SPUUID = N.SPUUID AND N.KKCSE > 0
select sum(s.jsyj) jsyjsbs from sb_sbxx s where s.zfbz_1='N' and s.zsxm_dm=? and s.zspm_dm=? and s.sbuuid=?
select * from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh w where w.swjg_dm=?

select a.*,b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.nsrzt_dm,b.hy_dm,b.djzclx_dm from sb_tdsyqkdjxx a,dj_nsrxx b where a.zgswskfj_dm = ? and a.djxh = b.djxh(+) and nvl(b.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.pkbz,'N')='Y' and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.csqdsj <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.csqdsj
select * from SB_FJM_KJQYSDSHTBADJB t where t.fjmdjxh = ? and t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

SELECT SQ.DKSQJE, MX.DKFPLB_DM, MX.ZSXM_DM, MX.ZSPM_DM, MX.ZSZM_DM, MX.SKSSQQ, MX.SKSSQZ, MX.SRZE, MX.YXKCJE, MX.JSFYJ, MX.SFL, MX.SSKCS, MX.YNSFE, MX.YJSFE, MX.JMSFE, MX.YBSFE, MX.HY_DM, MX.ZSZSXM_DM, MX.ZSZSPM_DM, MX.ZSZSZM_DM, MX.JMSPJGUUID, MX.GLDKSQUUID, MX.ZFBZ_1, MX.ZFR_DM, MX.ZFRQ_1, MX.LRR_DM, MX.LRRQ, MX.XGR_DM, MX.XGRQ, MX.SJGSDQ, MX.JYXM_DM, MX.NSQNYJSE, MX.LZSFMXUUID, MX.SJTB_SJ, MX.TDDJ_DM, MX.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, MX.ZJSRSFFT, MX.QXQ, MX.QXZ, MX.BZ, MX.SFZCZF, MX.DKSQUUID, MX.SFMXUUID FROM FP_DK_SQ SQ,FP_DK_SFMX MX,FP_DK_FPKJXX KJ WHERE SQ.DKSQUUID = MX.DKSQUUID AND SQ.DKSQUUID = KJ.DKSQUUID AND MX.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND MX.GLDKSQUUID IS NULL AND SQ.GSDKSQUUID IS NULL AND SQ.DJXH = ? AND TRUNC(KJ.KJRQ) >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(KJ.KJRQ) <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SQ.DKFPLB_DM in ('01','07') AND SQ.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SQ.KJBZ = 'Y' AND KJ.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select t.* from pz_ypr t where t.djxh = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq
select t.uuid,t.swjg_dm,t.yxqq,t.yxqz,t.kkqrbz,t.xybz from sb_sbf_pkqc_kkqr t where t.swjg_dm=? and t.yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz='Y'

select cgsuuid, cgssbuuid, wspzhm, clsbdh, zmsbz, ewtmc, swjgjbr_dm, zsjg_dm, ffrq, sjgsdq, clpzhm, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm from sb_cgs_clgzswszm t where t.clsbdh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_bgrczwgqygfqk t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb4_lw_mx t where t.sbuuid = ?

select a.jshj from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb1_bqxsqkmx a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and b.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.ewbhxh = 5

SELECT nvl(t.ybtse,0) AS ybtse FROM SB_SBB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND t.skssqq =to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.skssqz =to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.PZXH != ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND T.SBSX_DM_1 = '21' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5')
select z.gljg_dm, z.hsjg_dm skssswjg_dm from dm_qx_znjgdzb z where z.hsjg_dm = ?
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb7_Zctzb t Where t.sbuuid=?
select cgsuuid, cgssbuuid, wspzhm, clsbdh, zmsbz, ewtmc, swjgjbr_dm, zsjg_dm, ffrq, sjgsdq, clpzhm, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm from sb_cgs_clgzswszm t where t.wspzhm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select a.* from pz_jc a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.czyuuid = ? and a.pzzl_dm = ? AND (1=? or a.pzzg_dm = ?) and a.pzzt_dm = ? and a.pzqshm <= ? and a.pzzzhm >= ? and a.yprlx_dm = ? and a.jcsl > 0
select * from CS_SB_TSNSRTSGZDZB a where a.xybz='Y'
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb3_gx_mx t where t.sbuuid = ?
select sum(t.ynse) ynse, sum(t.jsyj) jsyj from sb_sbxx t where t.sbuuid=? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.zspm_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.yzpzzl_dm in (?,?)

SELECT A.SBUUID, A.PZXH, B.ZSXM_DM, B.ZSPM_DM FROM SB_SBB A, SB_SBXX B WHERE A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND B.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND B.SKSSQQ = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.SKSSQZ = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select b.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr b where b.sbuuid=?

select t.sspkjbduuid pzuuid,t.sspkjbdbh pzbh,t.pzjblx_dm pzlx,t.jbsr,t.jbzr,t.jbr_dm_1,t.jbrq_1 jbrq,yprlx_dm,jbjxdwr from pz_sspkjbdzb t where (1 = ? or sspkjbdbh = ?) #macroparam# and trunc(jbrq_1) between ? and ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.shbz = 'Y' and t.cxbz= 'N' order by t.sspkjbdbh Asc

select a.djxh mfdjxh, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and b.gmfdjxh = ? and b.fybh = ? and (nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' or nvl(b.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'N')

select a.djxh zrfdjxh,b.zrfsbbz zrfsbbz_1,b.* from sb_zlbscjb a,sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.csfdjxh =? and b.tdsybh =? and (b.zrfsbbz = 'Y' or b.csfsbbz = 'Y') and a.djxh is null
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYCZTSBGB t where t.nsrsbh=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.YPRUUID = ?
Select * From sb_sds_fzjgfpb_zjg t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_JRQYSRMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?

select shmx.cjmxuuid,sh.cjuuid,shmx.shyj_dm,shmx.shyjsm,shmx.shmxuuid,sh.shuuid from sb_cgs_cljgxx_sh sh left join sb_cgs_cljgxx_shmx shmx on sh.shuuid = shmx.shuuid where sh.cjuuid = ? and (1=? or sh.cjglhj_dm=?)

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, jsje bq113, case when zspm_dm = '101110101' then jsje end bq114, case when zspm_dm = '101110102' then jsje end bq115, case when zspm_dm = '101110103' then jsje end bq116, case when zspm_dm = '101110104' then jsje end bq117, case when zspm_dm = '101110105' then jsje end bq118, case when zspm_dm = '101110106' then jsje end bq119, case when zspm_dm = '101110108' then jsje end bq120, case when zspm_dm = '101110109' then jsje end bq121, case when zspm_dm = '101110110' then jsje end bq122, case when zspm_dm in ('101110301', '101110302') then jsje end bq123 from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_yhs b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh
select * from sb_qyndglbg_bgqyxxb_qygdxx where zbuuid = ?

select a.* from sb_tdsyqkdjxx a where a.djxh = ? and (a.xzqhsz_dm is null or a.jdxz_dm is null or a.zgswskfj_dm is null or a.nsqx_dm is null or a.sbqx_dm is null or a.jkqx_dm is null) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.tdsyqzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.csqdsj

select t.* from sb_kssssrfpblwh t where t.djxh = ? and ((t.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (t.yxqq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (t.yxqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and nvl(t.zsdlfs_dm, '0') = ? and (1 = ? or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.bkjdjxh = ?) and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select distinct a.zfbz_1, a.sbfs_dm, b.sybh_1, a.ybtse, a.sbrq_1 sbrq, '' nsrsbzt_Dm from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.djxh = b.djxh and a.djxh = ? and b.skssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and b.skssqz = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and (1=#macroparam# or b.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.zspm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.sybh_1 = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or a.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
SELECT T.PZSSBGDUUID as uuid,T.PZSSBGDBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZSSBGDZB T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.SQDW_DM = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZSSBGDBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.PZSSBGDBH

select max(syts) as syts from CS_GY_ZQTZ where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and zsxm_dm = ? and (1 = ? or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and nsqx_dm = ? and yxqsrq <= ? and yxzzrq >= ?

select t.djxh, t.zgswskfj_Dm, t.ssgly_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, dj.scjydlxdh, t.lrrq, t.zsxm_Dm, t.zspm_Dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.ynse, t.jmse, t.yjse, t.ybtse, t.pkuuid, t.kkzt_dm, '税款' sflxmc, 'SK' sflxbz, decode(nvl(t.kkzt_dm, 'x'), 'x', '未扣款', '00', '扣款状态未明', '03', '扣款状态未明', '01', '成功', '02', '失败：' || nvl((select a.kkfhmc from dm_zs_skykkfh a where t.kkfh_dm = a.kkfh_dm), '原因未明'), '09', '扣款状态未明') kkztmc, t.yhhb_dm, t.yhyywd_dm, t.khyhhh, t.jkzh, dj.fddbryddh, dj.fddbrgddh from sb_pkqc t, dj_nsrxx_kz dj where t.zfbz_1 = '0' and t.djxh = dj.djxh(+) and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and t.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.lrrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 and (0 = ? or t.ssgly_dm = ?) and (0 = ? or t.nsrsbh = ?) and ('0' = ? or '1' = ?) and (0 = ? or decode(nvl(t.kkzt_dm, 'x'), '09', '00', '03', '00', nvl(t.kkzt_dm, 'x')) = ?) order by t.djxh

select t.lsmxid, sum(x.ybtse) as ybtse from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where t.djxh = x.djxh and t.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm and t.zspm_dm = x.zspm_dm and t.sbsx_dm_1 = x.sbsx_dm_1 and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and x.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610125' and t.ssqq <= x.skssqz and t.ssqz >= x.skssqq and t.hhljid = ? group by t.lsmxid
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_YBQYZCMXB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select max(yf) yf from PZ_ZWCS where nd = ? and sjgsdq like ?
select nvl(sum(sq.kpje), 0) as ljkpje from fp_dk_sq sq, fp_dk_jzyfp fp where sq.dksquuid = fp.dksquuid and fp.gcxmbh = ? and sq.djxh = ? and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT KJFPMXUUID, XSDBDCLPH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, BZ, KXXZ_DM, JE, DJ, MJ, MJLX_DM, FYBH, BDCXMMC, BDCXMBH, BDCFPUUID, BDCXMUUID FROM FP_DK_BDCFP_XMMX WHERE BDCFPUUID = ?

select nvl(sum(cwbb.qmye_qy), 0) wfplrqmye from sb_cwbb_syyh_zcfzb cwbb where cwbb.ewbhxh = 22 and cwbb.zlbscjuuid in (select t.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.ssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zfbz_1 is null)
select t.djxh,t.pzxh,t.uuid,t.zsgbz ,t.sbuuid,t.lrrq from SB_SBBTBCKTS t where t.sjtbbz='N' and t.zgswskfj_dm like ?

select p.pkuuid from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbf_pkqc p where t.lsmxid = p.pkuuid and t.hhljid = ? and (p.zfbz_1 = '1' or exists (select 1 from sb_sbf_pkqc pp where pp.djxh = p.djxh and pp.skssqq = p.skssqq and pp.skssqz = p.skssqz and pp.sbbm = p.sbbm and pp.zfbz_1 = '0' and pp.zgswskfj_dm like substr(p.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and p.zspm_dm = pp.zspm_dm and p.hy_dm = pp.hy_dm and p.ybtse = pp.ybtse and nvl(pp.zszm_dm,'X') = nvl(p.zszm_dm,nvl(pp.zszm_dm,'X')) and p.pkuuid <> pp.pkuuid))
select * from CS_SB_QYSDS_XXWLQYCSPZB t where t.swjg_dm =? and t.yxqq <=? and t.yxqz>=? and t.yxbz='Y' order by xxwlqyedxx asc

select t.lsmxid,x.hzyqsbqx from sb_ls_sbxx t,sb_yqsbhzb_mx x where t.djxh = x.djxh and t.ssqq = x.skssqq and t.ssqz = x.skssqz and t.zsxm_dm = x.sqyqsbsz_dm and (t.zspm_dm=x.sqyqsbpm_dm or x.sqyqsbpm_dm is null) and x.hzyqsbqx is not null and t.hhljid=?

SELECT xz.XZQHSZ_DM , xz.XZQHZM_DM , xz.XZQHMC , xz.SJXZQHSZ_DM , xz.XZQHJC , xz.XYBZ , xz.YXBZ , xz.XZQHLMZM_DM , xz.SSXZQMC , xz.SWJG_DM FROM dm_gy_xzqh xz WHERE XYBZ='Y' AND YXBZ='Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR xz.XZQHSZ_DM =xz.SJXZQHSZ_DM START WITH xz.SJXZQHSZ_DM =?

SELECT t.ewblxh as ewblxh,t.yshwxse as yshwxse, t.bqybtse as jzjtsjtse FROM SB_ZZS_YBNSR t, sb_sbb sb where sb.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and sb.djxh = ? and sb.skssqq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and sb.skssqz <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and sb.yzpzzl_dm = ? and sb.zfbz_1='N' and sb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')

update sb_clqkxx a set (clsbdh, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, sl_1, zbzl, hdzkrs, pql, zszm_dm, ppxh, syxz, jdcrlnyzl_dm, fdjhm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, nsqx_dm, clpzh, clfprqhzcdjrq, zxrq, bz, xgr_dm, xgrq, clcp, zfbz_1) = (select clsbdh, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, sl_1, zbzl, hdzkrs, pql, zszm_dm, ppxh, syxz, jdcrlnyzl_dm, fdjhm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, nsqx_dm, clpzh, clfprqhzcdjrq, zxrq, bz, swry_dm, sysdate, clcp, zfbz_1 from sb_ls_clqkmx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.clsbdh = b.clsbdh and rownum = 1) where (a.djxh, a.clsbdh) in (select djxh, clsbdh from sb_ls_clqkmx) and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT AA.YBTSE, AA.ZSPM_DM zspmDm FROM (SELECT A.YBTSE, A.DJXH, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, C.RKRQ, C.CZLX_DM, A.ZSXM_DM, A.SBSX_DM_1, A.TZLX_DM, A.SKZL_DM, A.SKSX_DM, A.ZSPM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF A, ZS_WSZ B, ZS_JKS C WHERE A.ZSUUID = B.ZSUUID AND B.HZSPUUID = C.SPUUID AND A.DJXH = B.DJXH AND A.ZSDLFS_DM = '0' UNION ALL SELECT A.YBTSE, A.DJXH, A.SKSSQQ, A.SKSSQZ, C.RKRQ, C.CZLX_DM, A.ZSXM_DM, A.SBSX_DM_1, A.TZLX_DM, A.SKZL_DM, A.SKSX_DM, A.ZSPM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF A, ZS_JKS C WHERE A.ZSUUID = C.ZSUUID AND A.ZSDLFS_DM = '0') AA WHERE AA.ZSXM_DM = '10102' AND DJXH = ? AND AA.RKRQ >= ? AND AA.RKRQ <= ? AND AA.SKSSQZ < ? AND AA.SBSX_DM_1 = '11' AND AA.SKSX_DM = '0101' AND AA.SKZL_DM != 20 AND AA.CZLX_DM not in ('44','67','49','51','52','34')
select max(yzpzmxxh) as yzpzmxxh from zs_yjsf where yzpzxh = ?
select t.pzzl_dm,t.pzzg_dm,t.jcsl,t.pzqshm,t.pzzzhm,t.pzzt_dm from pz_jc t where t.pzhsjg_dm=? and t.yprlx_dm !=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.pzzt_dm='01'
SELECT XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, KKCSRE, SQKPJE, JSXM, JZUUID, JZXMUUID FROM FP_DK_JZYFP_GCXM WHERE JZUUID = ?

select a.fyxxuuid, a.djxh, a.fybh, a.fwcqzsh, a.tdsybh, a.jzmj fwmj, b.czfcmj, b.fcyz, b.czwyz, b.jsbl, b.zspm_dm, a.fcmc, a.fcyt_dm, a.tdsybh dh_1, '' pkbz, a.csqdsj csqdrq, a.nsywzzsj syqzzrq, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.fwzldz xxdz, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsywzzsj zfrq_1, b.jsbl sl_1, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, '' nsqx_dm, '' jkqx_dm, '' sbqx_dm, '' cqgs_dm, a.jdxz_dm, b.jmxzdmxx ssjmxz_dm, b.jmshj bqjmse, b.fcyz jmsfcyz from sb_cxs_fyxxcjb a left join sb_cxs_cjjzsymxb b on a.fyxxuuid = b.fyxxuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and (b.bgbm = '1' or b.bgbm = '2') where a.djxh = ? and not exists(select 1 from sb_cxs_fyjbxx c where c.zfbz_1='N' and a.fybh=c.fybh) and (1 = ? or a.fybh = ?) and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.nsywzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.csqdsj <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.nsywzzsj, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.csqdsj

select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t,dm_gy_swjg a where t.xybz='Y' and t.yxbz='Y' and t.jgjc_dm in ('41','42') and t.swjg_dm=a.sjswjg_dm and a.xybz='Y' and a.yxbz='Y' and a.jgjc_dm in ('51','52') and a.swjg_dm =?

select t2.nsrsbh, t2.nsrmc, t2.djxh, t2.skssqq, t2.skssqz, t1.jytbzsptm, t1.gg, t1.cl, t1.sl, t1.xsjg, t1.dbjg, t1.jsjg, t1.xse, t1.bz, t1.sbuuid from SB_XFS_FB_JYSCQYNDXSMX t1, sb_sbb t2 where t1.sbuuid = t2.sbuuid and t1.sbuuid in (select t.lcslid from SB_XFS_JYXFSJGXXCJSHB t where t.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.shyj = 'Y' and (t.hzbz_1 IS NULL or t.hzbz_1='N') and t.shswjg_dm = ?)
select min(skssqz) skssqz from (select a.syuuid, max(a.skssqz) skssqz from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx a where a.zfbz_1='N' and a.djxh=? group by syuuid)
select a.* from pz_flz a,pz_flzjzxx b where b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf is null and b.jzpzbh = a.jzpzbh and a.pzzy_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.cfdz from SB_ZLBSSLDJB t where t.zlbsuuid=?

select zb.jhr, zb.xhr_dm_1, zb.xhqk, zb.dwfzr_dm, zb.xhswjg_dm, zb.xhrq, zb.xhzr, zb.xhsr, zb.xhjgyj, zb.bzr_2, zb.bzr_1, zb.pzxhyy_dm, zb.bbrq, zb.bbdw_dm, zb.lcslid, zb.sspzxhsqbh, zb.sspzxhsquuid from pz_sspzxhsqzb zb where zb.lcslid = ? and zb.zfbz_1='N' and zb.zstybz='N'

SELECT distinct (jmzs.jmuuid), JMZS.* FROM SB_SBXX SBXX, SB_JMYHZSB JMZS WHERE SBXX.PZXH = JMZS.PZXH AND SBXX.DJXH = JMZS.DJXH AND SBXX.ZSXM_DM = '10104' AND SBXX.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SBXX.ZSDLFS_DM = '0' AND SBXX.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND JMZS.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JMZS.CZLX_DM = '94') AND SBXX.DJXH = ? AND NVL(?, NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ, DATE '0001-01-01')) <= NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ, DATE '0001-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ, DATE '0001-01-01')) >= NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ, DATE '0001-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ, DATE '0001-01-01')) >= NVL(SBXX.SKSSQQ, DATE '0001-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ, DATE '0001-01-01')) <= NVL(SBXX.SKSSQZ, DATE '0001-01-01')
SELECT UUID, GHFNSRSBH, GHFNSRMC, GHFDZ, GHFLXDH, GHFKHYH_DM, GHFYHZH, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, GHFYHYYWDMC FROM FP_DK_ZZS_GHFNSRXX WHERE GHFNSRSBH=? ORDER BY lrrq DESC
select * from pz_ypr t where t.pzhsjg_dm in (select w.pzhsjg_dm from pz_pzgly w where w.pzgly_dm = ? and sysdate between w.pzhsjgyxqsrq and w.pzhsjgyxzzrq) and t.djxh = ? and t.yprlx_dm = ?
select * from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_FZJGBAMXB t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
Select Dm.* From Dm_Zs_Clscqy Dm Where #macroparam#
Select t.* from SB_SDS_JMQYQS_FB_SYCCJSHFP_ZB t Where t.sbuuid=?

with swjg as (select ypruuid, yprmc, decode(wt.djxh, null, wt.swry_dm, null) as swry_dm, wt.djxh from pz_ypr wt where wt.pzhsjg_dm = ? and wt.yxbz='Y') select * from (select swjg.ypruuid as pzdwdm, swjg.yprmc as pzdwmc, (nvl(ypryhpsl, 0) + nvl(yprwhpsl, 0) + nvl(sddwyhpsl, 0) + nvl(sddwwhpsl, 0)) as ytkwjbsl,'0' as wjxsl from swjg left join (select count(*) as ypryhpsl, t1.ypruuid from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1 where t.kpr_dm = t1.swry_dm and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sddwdjxh is null and t.sspkjbdbh is null and t.pzcxsybj is null and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(t.tfrq) >? group by t1.ypruuid) a on swjg.ypruuid = a.ypruuid left join (select count(g.pzsl) as yprwhpsl, g1.ypruuid from zs_pzsyqk_yhp g, pz_ypr g1 where g.kpr_dm = g1.swry_dm and g1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and g1.yxbz = 'Y' and g.sddwdjxh is null and g.sspkjbdbh is null and g1.yprlx_dm = '12' and g.zfrq_1 is null and g.zfr_dm is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(g.tfrq) >? group by g1.ypruuid) b on swjg.ypruuid = b.ypruuid left join (select count(*) as sddwyhpsl, t1.ypruuid from zs_pzsyqk t, pz_ypr t1 where t.sddwdjxh = t1.djxh and t1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and t1.yprlx_dm = '31' and t.pzcxsybj is null and t.sspkjbdbh is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(t.tfrq) >? group by t1.ypruuid) d on swjg.ypruuid = d.ypruuid left join (select count(g.pzsl) as sddwwhpsl, g1.ypruuid from zs_pzsyqk_yhp g, pz_ypr g1 where g.sddwdjxh = g1.djxh and g1.ypruuid in (select ypruuid from swjg) and g1.yxbz = 'Y' and g1.yprlx_dm = '31' and g.sspkjbdbh is null and g.zfrq_1 is null and g.zfr_dm is null and trunc(sysdate) - trunc(g.tfrq) >? group by g1.ypruuid) f on swjg.ypruuid = f.ypruuid ) c where c.ytkwjbsl >0

select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm, b.* from pz_gztzs_mx a, (select pzzl_dm yspzzl_dm, pzzg_dm yspzzg_dm, pzsl yspzsl, pzqshm yspzqshm, pzzzhm yspzzzhm from pz_gztzs_mx where gztzsuuid = ? and sxlx = '1') b where a.gztzsuuid = ? and a.sxlx = '2'
select * from sb_xfsjg_bjxfszdjsjg_hdmx t where t.lcslid = ?
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qyflbgb t Where t.Sbuuid = ? And t.Pzxh = ?
select p.* from sb_ls_sbxx t,sb_sbb p where t.lsmxid=p.pzxh and p.zfbz_1 = 'N' and p.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t.hhljid=?
select 1 from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_qygqsbfbq t where t.GQZRFNSSBH=?

SELECT SUM(YBTSE) SE FROM ZS_YJSF T where T.DJXH = ? AND T.YZPZXH = ? AND T.RKRQ >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.RKRQ <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.SBSX_DM_1 = ? AND T.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND T.SKZL_DM != '20'
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBBHBQY t where t.nsrsbh=?

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwsbqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And a.Sbrq_1 is null And a.Cbrq is null And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))
Select t.* From Sb_Cgs_Sbbxblsb t Where t.Djxh = ? And t.Cgssbzt = '9' And t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Clgzssblx_Dm Not In ('0201', '0205')

select SB.djxh, sb.pzxh, sb.sbuuid, sj.yzxm_dm, sb.skssqq, sb.skssqz, sj.xse, sj.kcje, sj.yzl, sj.sl_1, round((xse - kcje) / (1 + sl_1) * yzl, 2) as yzse from sb_sbb sb, sb_zzsyjnssb_sjb sj where sb.djxh = ? and sb.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sb.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610865' and sb.sbuuid = sj.sbuuid and sb.pzxh = sj.pzxh and sb.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND SB.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5')
Select bduuid,hsxsetptfpsjkpjesb, BDBZ from SB_SBBD_ZZSYBNSR_PTFPBD where pzxh=? and YXBZ=?

select '税收票证损失核销单' as djzl, ss.pzssbgduuid uuid, ss.pzssbgdbh bh, ss.tbrq lrrq, a.swryxm kjrmc, ss.lrr_dm kjr, ss.sqdw_dm fqdw, '' jsdw, ss.xgr_dm jsr, '02' ysdjzl from pz_sspzssbgdzb ss, dm_gy_swry a where ss.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (PZSSBGDBH=? or ? is null) and ss.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and a.swry_dm = ss.lrr_dm and ss.lrr_dm = ? and ss.tbrq between to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ss.sjgsdq like ? and not exists (select 0 from PZ_GZTZS g where g.yspzhm = ss.pzssbgduuid and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.yxbz = 'Y' and (g.gdbz = 'Y' or g.tybz <> 'Y'))
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_CZZWCZFB2 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select rpad( zl.pzzl_dm,9,' ') pcode, jc.pzqshm||'-'||jc.pzzzhm code, jc.pzzg_dm, jc.pzqshm||'-'||jc.pzzzhm caption, jc.jcsl , zl.wbpzbz, zl.phcd from dm_pz_pzzl zl, pz_jc jc where jc.pzzl_dm = zl.pzzl_dm

WITH B AS (SELECT T1.SFMXUUID, NVL(SUM(T1.BCKCSE), 0) BCKCSE FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX T1 INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ C ON T1.DKSQUUID = C.DKSQUUID WHERE C.DJXH = ? AND C.DKFPLB_DM = ? AND T1.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' GROUP BY T1.SFMXUUID) SELECT T.SFMXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.SKSSQQ, T.SKSSQZ, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSZM_DM, T.SRZE, T.YXKCJE, T.JSFYJ, T.SFL, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.YJSFE, T.JMSFE, (NVL(T.YBSFE, 0) + NVL(T.YJSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)) YBSFE, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JYXM_DM, A.HY_DM, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.SQDHM FROM FP_DK_SFMX T INNER JOIN FP_DK_SQ A ON T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID LEFT JOIN B ON T.SFMXUUID = B.SFMXUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.DKFPLB_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.KJBZ = 'N' AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (NVL(T.YBSFE, 0) + NVL(T.YJSFE, 0) - NVL(B.BCKCSE, 0)) > 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.DJXH = A.DJXH AND X.DKFPLB_DM = A.DKFPLB_DM AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID) ORDER BY DKSQUUID
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, lqsl pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm,bz from Pz_Sspzlfdmxb where pzlfduuid = ?

select a.wsbuuid from sb_yqwsbqc a, sb_ls_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.skssqq < b.ssqz and a.skssqz > b.ssqq and a.sbrq_1 is not null and a.sjlybz = '5' and b.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610119' and ((a.zsdlfs_dm is null) or (a.zsdlfs_dm = b.zsdlfs_dm)) and b.hhljid = ?

with c as (select a.ysuuid, max(skssqz) + 1 maxskssq from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyysxx b on a.ysuuid = b.ysuuid and b.bgbm = '1' and b.yxbz = 'Y' where a.djxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by a.ysuuid) select nvl(c.maxskssq,a.yxqq) yxqq, a.ysuuid, a.syuuid, a.tddj_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.ystdmj, a.dwse, a.yxqz, a.yysuuid, a.yxbz, a.bgbm, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, a.jmxxuuid1, a.jmxxuuid2, a.jmxxuuid3, a.jmxzdmxx, a.jmshj from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b on a.syuuid = b.syuuid left join c on a.ysuuid = c.ysuuid where b.djxh = ? and a.bgbm = '1' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and nvl(c.maxskssq, a.yxqq) < a.yxqz and #macroparam#
select b.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Ggywxckndtzb t WHERE t.djxh=? AND t.zfbz_1='N'
select * from sb_zzs_ybnsr t where t.sbuuid=?

select distinct a.cjhdbz,a.gccbz,a.cjuuid,a.nd,a.yf,a.cjr_dm,a.cjrq_1,a.cjswjg_dm,a.shswjg_dm,b.cjglhj_dm,c.sfshtgbz,max(shmx.shyj_dm) shyj_dm from sb_cgs_cljgxxcjmxb b left join sb_cgs_cljgxxcjb a on b.cjuuid = a.cjuuid left join sb_cgs_cljgxx_sh c on b.cjuuid = c.cjuuid and b.cjglhj_dm = c.cjglhj_dm left join sb_cgs_cljgxx_shmx shmx on b.cjmxuuid = shmx.cjmxuuid and c.shuuid=shmx.shuuid where (1=#macroparam# or a.gccbz = ?) and b.cjglhj_dm in (#macroparam#) and #macroparam# group by a.gccbz,a.cjuuid,a.cjhdbz,a.nd,a.yf,a.cjr_dm,a.cjrq_1,a.cjswjg_dm,a.shswjg_dm,b.cjglhj_dm,c.sfshtgbz
select DISTINCT a.BH code, a.BH caption from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb a where a.djxh = ? and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Yjd_Skfjb t Where t.sbuuid=?

select a.* from sb_qysds_qyjbb_dwtz a, sb_qysdsndsb_qyjbxxb t where a.mxuuid = t.uuid and t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(t.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y'
select * from sb_tdzzs_fdckf where zfbz_1 != 'Y' and pzxh=?

select * from (select a.djxh, NULL nsrsbh, b.zlbscjuuid, b.bszl_dm, b.ssqq, b.ssqz from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.djxh = b.djxh AND a.yxbz = ? AND a.jknd = ? and b.ssqz between ? and ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.djxh = ? order by b.lrrq desc) where rownum = 1
select hy_dm code, hymc caption from dm_gy_hy where xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y' and xlbz='Y'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Snlxbfsrmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select 1 from sb_kssssrfpblwh t where t.uuid=?

select t.uuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.ssqq, t.nsrmc, t.xmbh, t.xmmc, t.xmdz, t.hdr, t.hdrq, t.zsbz, t.hdswjg, t.spjg, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm,t.sfbz, t.hdrxm from sb_tdzzsqshdb t where uuid=?

select t2.nsrsbh, t2.nsrmc, t1.djxh, t1.ssqq, t1.ssqz, t1.jytbzsptm bzsptm, t1.jyphgg phgg, t1.jylb_dm_1, t1.jylx_dm_1, t1.xsjg, t1.xssl, t1.xse, t1.bz, t1.lcslid sbuuid from sb_xfs_jybfqyyfxsmxhzb t1, sb_sbb t2 where t1.lcslid = t2.sbuuid and t1.hdbz = 'N' and t1.hzzsjbz = 'Y' and t1.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t1.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t2.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t2.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t1.tbswjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t where t.sjswjg_dm = ?)
select * from zs_yjsf where djxh=?
select Bduuid, Skssqq, Skssqz, Bdnr,bdnr_1, Bdbbz,pbbdycyy From Sb_Sbbd_Bdyczbd t Where Lcslid = ?
select * from wbjh_clfxsxxb a where (1 = #macroparam# or fwuuid = ?) and a.mfsfzjlx_dm = ? and a.mfzjhm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.mfgj_dm = ?)
Select * From sb_sbxx t Where t.djxh=? And t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?
update sb_sbf_pkqc_kkqr t set t.yxbz='N',t.xgr_dm=?,t.xgrq=sysdate where t.swjg_dm=? and t.yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz='Y'

select a.ypruuid czyuuid, a.pzhsjg_dm, a.yprmc mc, a.yprlx_dm, a.swry_dm, a.djxh, '' jgjc_dm from pz_ypr a where a.ypruuid = ? AND a.yxbz = 'Y' UNION select b.pzglyuuid czyuuid, b.pzhsjg_dm, '' mc, '11' yprlx_dm, b.pzgly_dm swry_dm, 0 djxh, b.jgjc_dm from pz_pzgly b where b.pzglyuuid = ? AND b.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB T WHERE T.PZLFDUUID = ?

select t.jyphgg, t.jytbzsptm, t.jylb_dm_1, t.jylx_dm_1, s.sl_1 xfssysl , max(t.ssqq) ssqq, max(t.ssqz) ssqz, sum(t.xssl) xssl, sum(t.xse) xse from SB_XFS_JYBFQYYFXSMXHZB t, sb_sbxx s where t.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (t.hdbz = 'N' or t.hdbz is null) and (t.hzzsjbz = 'N' or t.hzzsjbz is null) and t.lcslid=s.sbuuid group by t.jyphgg, t.jytbzsptm, t.jylb_dm_1, t.jylx_dm_1, s.sl_1
select a.* from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx a inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf b on a.jyfuuid=b.jyfuuid where b.fcjycjxxuuid=?
select fcjycjxxuuid from sb_cxs_fcjy a inner join sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx b on a.fcjyuuid=b.fcjyuuid and a.zfbz_1='N' where sbuuid=?
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb_Hhrdk_Tz t Where t.sbuuid=?
select sum(t.kpje) kpje, sum(t.dksqje) dksqje from fp_dk_sq t where t.fcjycjxxuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select b.* from sb_zzs_fb_zzsjmssbmxb_jsxm b where b.sbuuid = ? and b.qmye > 0
select zgswjg_dm from sb_cgs_cljgqc where zfbz_1 = 'N' and nd = ? and trim(yf) = ? and gccbz = ?
select t.* from SB_GLYWWLBG_SKWGQYXXBGB t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

Select Distinct b.Sbuuid, b.Djxh, b.Sbsx_Dm_1 As Sblx_Dm, b.Pzxh, b.Yzpzzl_Dm, b.Zsxm_Dm, b.Sbfs_Dm, b.Nssbrq As Sbrq1, b.Skssqq, b.Skssqz, b.Ybtse, b.Sjgsdq From sb_sds_fjmhd_yjnd a, Sb_Sbxx b Where a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And b.Djxh = ? And b.Skssqq >= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And b.skssqz <= trunc(add_months( To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),11),'YYYY')-1 And b.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And b.Zsxm_Dm = ? And a.yjdndsbbj = '0' And b.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And b.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')
SELECT * FROM SB_YQSBHZB T WHERE T.LCSLID =? AND (T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL OR T.ZFBZ_1='N')
select t.gztzsuuid ypzuuid, t.gztzsbh ypzbh, t.qrrq ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm from pz_gztzs t where t.lrr_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.tybz='Y' and t.qrrq between ? and ?

select * from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg t where t.bkjdjxh = ? and (1 = ? or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx a where a.pzxh = t.pzxh and a.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') )
select t.* from WBJH_CJ_DWDZXX t where t.sjsybz='1' and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and t.nssbrq>=sysdate-1

SELECT T.PZSYQKUUID AS UUID, T.PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK T WHERE T.SDDWDJXH IN (SELECT DJXH FROM PZ_YPR W WHERE W.YPRUUID = ? AND W.YPRLX_DM IN ('31', '20')) AND T.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '03', '04') AND (1 = ? OR T.PZZL_DM = ?) AND T.PZCXSYBJ IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT T1.PZSYQKUUID AS UUID, T1.PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK T1 WHERE T1.KPR_DM IN (SELECT W1.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_YPR W1 WHERE W1.YPRUUID = ? AND W1.YPRLX_DM = '12') AND T1.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T1.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '03', '04') AND (1 = ? OR T1.PZZL_DM = ?) AND T1.PZCXSYBJ IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT T2.YHPSYQKUUID AS UUID, NULL AS PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP T2 WHERE T2.KPR_DM IN (SELECT W2.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_YPR W2 WHERE W2.YPRUUID = ? AND W2.YPRLX_DM = '12') AND T2.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T2.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '04') AND (1 = ? OR T2.PZZL_DM = ?) UNION ALL SELECT T3.YHPSYQKUUID AS UUID, NULL AS PZZG_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP T3 WHERE T3.SDDWDJXH IN (SELECT DJXH FROM PZ_YPR W3 WHERE W3.YPRUUID = ? AND W3.YPRLX_DM IN ('31', '20')) AND T3.SSPKJBDBH IS NULL AND T3.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '04') AND (1 = ? OR T3.PZZL_DM = ?)
select t.csfsbbz,t.csfpzxh from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb t,sb_zlbscjb cjb where t.zlbscjuuid = cjb.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and t.csfdjxh = ? and t.tdsybh = ? and t.czrfs = ?

select sum(case when a.ewbhxh in (1,2,3,4,5,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17,18,19,20,21) then a.kjqtfp_xse else 0 end) as xxptfpbhsxsesb, sum(case when a.ewbhxh in (1,2,3,4,5,8,9,10,11,12,13,20,21) then a.kjqtfp_xxynse else 0 end) as xxptfpsesb, sum(case when a.ewbhxh in (1,2,3,4,5,8,9,10,11,12,13,18,20,21) then a.kjskzzszyfp_xse else 0 end) as xxzyfpcbjesb, sum(case when a.ewbhxh in (1,2,3,4,5,8,9,10,11,12,13,18,20,21) then a.kjskzzszyfp_xxynse else 0 end) as xxzyfpcbsesb from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb1_bqxsqkmx a, sb_sbb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') group by a.sbuuid

select a.ewblxh,a.msxse,a.hdxse, a.yzzzsbhsxse,a.yzzzsbhsxse+a.xsczbdcbhsxse+a.xssygdysgdzcbhsxse+a.msxse+a.ckmsxse xse from sb_zzs_xgm a, sb_sbb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and b.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.ewblxh <= 2
