select l.* from sb_zzs_ldsklsz l,sb_ls_sbxx s where l.djxh=s.djxh and l.zgswskfj_dm = s.sybh_1 and s.hhljid=?
Select t.* From SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_ZCSSTZFB1 t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
Select t.* from SB_SDS_FJMJS_JD t Where t.sbuuid=?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jwfzjgmbksmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

with zj as (select a. UUID, a. CLLXMC, a. JDCCCHGZBH, a. FZRQ, a. SCQYMC, a. CLSPPPMC, a. CLMC, a. CLXH, a. CLSBDH, a. CSYS, a. DPXH, a. DPHGZBH, a. FDJXH, a. FDJHM, a. RLNYZLMC, a. GL, a. YH, a. WKCCCD, a. WKCCKD, a. WKCCGD, a. LTGG, a. ZS_1, a. EDZZL, a. ZQYZZL, a. EDZK, a. CLZZRQ, a. CLSCDWMC, a. CLXLH, a. LSPZXLH, a. FSRQ, a. PQL_1, a. HSJE, a. FPBH, a. FPLX, a. XGRQ, a. LRRQ, a.sfxny, b.lrrq bjrq, a.cjh, a.hwjckzmsbh, 'cx' as ztmc from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzcx b, (select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz order by lrrq desc) a where a.JDCCCHGZBH = b.JDCCCHGZBH and a.CLSBDH = ? union all select a. UUID, a. CLLXMC, a. JDCCCHGZBH, a. FZRQ, a. SCQYMC, a. CLSPPPMC, a. CLMC, a. CLXH, a. CLSBDH, a. CSYS, a. DPXH, a. DPHGZBH, a. FDJXH, a. FDJHM, a. RLNYZLMC, a. GL, a. YH, a. WKCCCD, a. WKCCKD, a. WKCCGD, a. LTGG, a. ZS_1, a. EDZZL, a. ZQYZZL, a. EDZK, a. CLZZRQ, a. CLSCDWMC, a. CLXLH, a. LSPZXLH, a. FSRQ, a. PQL_1, a. HSJE, a. FPBH, a. FPLX, a. XGRQ, a. LRRQ, b.sfxny, a.lrrq bjrq, a.cjh, a.hwjckzmsbh, 'xg' as ztmc from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxg a,(select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz order by lrrq desc) b where a.CLSBDH = ? and a.clsbdh=b.clsbdh(+) union all select a. UUID, a. CLLXMC, a. JDCCCHGZBH, a. FZRQ, a. SCQYMC, a. CLSPPPMC, a. CLMC, a. CLXH, a. CLSBDH, a. CSYS, a. DPXH, a. DPHGZBH, a. FDJXH, a. FDJHM, a. RLNYZLMC, a. GL, a. YH, a. WKCCCD, a. WKCCKD, a. WKCCGD, a. LTGG, a. ZS_1, a. EDZZL, a. ZQYZZL, a. EDZK, a. CLZZRQ, a. CLSCDWMC, a. CLXLH, a. LSPZXLH, a. FSRQ, a. PQL_1, a. HSJE, a. FPBH, a. FPLX, a. XGRQ, a. LRRQ, a.sfxny, a.lrrq bjrq, a.cjh, a.hwjckzmsbh, 'xz' as ztmc from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz a where a.CLSBDH = ?) select * from zj order by bjrq desc

SELECT FKFDJXH, FKFSFZJHM, FKFSFZJZL_DM, FKFNSRSBH, LZFPHM, LZFPDM, LXDH, DZ, SKFMC, SKFNSRSBH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, FKFMC, FYBH, TDSYBH, DKSQUUID, TYFPUUID, SKFSFZJLX_DM, SKFSFZJHM, XZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, FWDZ FROM FP_DK_TYJDFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

SELECT k.ewblxh, K.SQTSHSYPSL FROM SB_ZLBS_XFS_KCHYQK K, SB_ZLBSCJB B WHERE K.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.SSQQ = ? AND B.SSQZ = ? AND B.BSZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND B.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL
select 1 from sb_yjsf_cjb t where t.zsuuid=? and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null)

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.fdcjylx_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from CS_SB_FDCYTHSKPZB a where trim(a.fdcjylx_dm) in(#macroparam#) and a.yxbz='Y') a, (SELECT t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg t START WITH t.swjg_dm =? CONNECT BY PRIOR t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y') where xh = 1

select c.skgk_dm, c.csdmz_1, c.csdmz_2, c.csdmz_3, c.csdmz_4, c.csdmz_5, c.csdmz_6, c.csdmz_7, c.csdmz_8, c.csdmz_9, c.csdmz_10, c.csdmz_11, c.csdmz_12, c.csdmz_13, c.csdmz_14, c.csdmz_15 from cs_zs_skgk c where c.swjg_dm = ? and c.yxqq <= ? and c.yxqz >= ? and nvl(c.csdmz_1,'notdefault') != 'default'

SELECT count(1) as rowsum FROM SB_CXS_TDSYYSXX A inner join SB_CXS_SBSYSYXX B on A.YSUUID = B.YSUUID inner join SB_SBB C on B.SBUUID = C.SBUUID left join ZS_YJSF D on C.PZXH = D.YZPZXH and b.skssqq = d.skssqq and b.skssqz = d.skssqz and d.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') left join zs_ydtxx e on c.pzxh = e.pzxh and b.skssqq = e.skssqq and b.skssqz = e.skssqz and e.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') WHERE nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and A.YSUUID = ? and D.SKCLLX_DM= ?

with zj as (select a. UUID, a. CLLXMC, a. JDCCCHGZBH, a. FZRQ, a. SCQYMC, a. CLSPPPMC, a. CLMC, a. CLXH, a. CLSBDH, a. CSYS, a. DPXH, a. DPHGZBH, a. FDJXH, a. FDJHM, a. RLNYZLMC, a. GL, a. YH, a. WKCCCD, a. WKCCKD, a. WKCCGD, a. LTGG, a. ZS_1, a. EDZZL, a. ZQYZZL, a. EDZK, a. CLZZRQ, a. CLSCDWMC, a. CLXLH, a. LSPZXLH, a. FSRQ, a. PQL_1, a. HSJE, a. FPBH, a. FPLX, a. XGRQ, a. LRRQ, a.sfxny, b.lrrq bjrq, a.cjh, a.hwjckzmsbh, 'cx' as ztmc from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzcx b, (select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz order by lrrq desc) a where a.jdccchgzbh = b.jdccchgzbh and a.jdccchgzbh = ? union all select a. UUID, a. CLLXMC, a. JDCCCHGZBH, a. FZRQ, a. SCQYMC, a. CLSPPPMC, a. CLMC, a. CLXH, a. CLSBDH, a. CSYS, a. DPXH, a. DPHGZBH, a. FDJXH, a. FDJHM, a. RLNYZLMC, a. GL, a. YH, a. WKCCCD, a. WKCCKD, a. WKCCGD, a. LTGG, a. ZS_1, a. EDZZL, a. ZQYZZL, a. EDZK, a. CLZZRQ, a. CLSCDWMC, a. CLXLH, a. LSPZXLH, a. FSRQ, a. PQL_1, a. HSJE, a. FPBH, a. FPLX, a. XGRQ, a. LRRQ, b.sfxny, a.lrrq bjrq, a.cjh, a.hwjckzmsbh, 'xg' as ztmc from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxg a,(select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz order by lrrq desc) b where a.jdccchgzbh = ? and a.jdccchgzbh = b. jdccchgzbh(+) union all select a. UUID, a. CLLXMC, a. JDCCCHGZBH, a. FZRQ, a. SCQYMC, a. CLSPPPMC, a. CLMC, a. CLXH, a. CLSBDH, a. CSYS, a. DPXH, a. DPHGZBH, a. FDJXH, a. FDJHM, a. RLNYZLMC, a. GL, a. YH, a. WKCCCD, a. WKCCKD, a. WKCCGD, a. LTGG, a. ZS_1, a. EDZZL, a. ZQYZZL, a. EDZK, a. CLZZRQ, a. CLSCDWMC, a. CLXLH, a. LSPZXLH, a. FSRQ, a. PQL_1, a. HSJE, a. FPBH, a. FPLX, a. XGRQ, a. LRRQ, a.sfxny, a.lrrq bjrq, a.cjh, a.hwjckzmsbh, 'xz' as ztmc from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzxz a where a.jdccchgzbh = ?) select * from zj order by bjrq desc

select nvl(sum(sq.kpje), 0) kpje, count(sq.dksquuid) kpfs from fp_dk_sq sq where 1 = 1 #macroparam# and sq.sqrq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sq.sqrq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sq.djxh = ? and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select jc.* from pz_jc jc, pz_ypr ypr where ypr.ypruuid = jc.czyuuid and jc.yprlx_dm='12' and ypr.swry_dm = ? and jc.yxbz='Y' and jc.pzzt_dm='01' and jc.jcsl > 0 and ypr.yxbz = 'Y' order by jc.pzzl_dm,jc.pzzg_dm,jc.ffyxj desc,jc.rkrq,pzqshm
select mx.pzssbgdmxuuid, mx.pzssbgduuid, mx.pzjcuuid, mx.sspzxhsquuid, mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm, mx.pzqshm, mx.pzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.kbpbz from pz_sspzssbgdmxb mx where mx.sspzxhsquuid =?
select * from wbjh_cxs_fcjycjxx a where a.htbh=? and a.zfbz_1='N' #macroparam#

SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A,SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_JMYNSSDEB B WHERE A.SBUUID=B.SBUUID AND A.PZXH=B.PZXH AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ >= ? AND A.SKSSQZ <= ? AND A.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5') ORDER BY A.SKSSQQ +1 DESC
SELECT * FROM sb_sds_jmcz_14nd_jmqygqfb1 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=?
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_BFLGDB t where t.nsrsbh=?
select * from sb_zzs_xgm xgm where xgm.sbuuid in (select sb.sbuuid from sb_sbb sb where sb.djxh=?) and ewblxh='3'

select t.djxh,t.hy_dm,t.zgswj_dm,t.ssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.yxbz = ? and t.djxh = ? and (t.kzztdjlx_dm like '11%' or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '12%' or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '13%')

select c.clxlh, c.clcp, c.clxh, c.cd as cdsx, c.cllx_dm, c.cldw, c.zws, c.pql, c.zdjsjg, c.zypz from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb c where c.cllx_dm = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(c.clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(c.clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (c.cldw = ? or c.cldw = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (c.zws = ? or c.zws = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (c.pql = ? or c.pql = '0')) union select d.zxlsxlh as clxlh, d.clcp, d.clxh, d.cdsx, d.cllx_dm, d.cldw, d.zws, d.pql, d.zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, d.zypz from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg d where d.cllx_dm = ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(d.clcp) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or UPPER(d.clxh) like ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (d.cldw = ? or d.cldw = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (d.zws = ? or d.zws = '0')) and ('1' = #macroparam# or (d.pql = ? or d.pql = '0'))

select ls.sbqx, ysb.ysbtjuuid from sb_ls_sbxx ls, sb_ysbtj ysb where ysb.djxh = ls.djxh and ysb.zsxm_dm = ls.zsxm_dm and ysb.zspm_dm = ls.zspm_dm and ysb.skssqq = ls.ssqq and ysb.skssqz = ls.ssqz and ls.hhljid=?

select distinct a.nsrsbh,a.nsrmc,a.bbq,a.zlbscjuuid from ZDSY_JK_QYTHQC a where a.bbq = ? and a.jkcj in (#macroparam#) and a.SWJG_DM in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and nvl(a.sfjs, 'N') != 'Y'
Select t.* from SB_SDS_JMCZ_ND_FB5_SSYH t Where t.sbuuid=?
select * from sb_clgzswszmbfxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.clsbdh = ?

select t.djxh,t.skssqq,t.skssqz,t.czlx_dm,t.pzxh,t.BCLDBHS,nvl(t.LDFSRQ,trunc(t.lrrq)) as ldfsrq,ldsklsuuid from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where ( (t.lrrq >= trunc(sysdate)-1 and t.lrrq < trunc(sysdate+1)) or (t.xgrq >= trunc(sysdate)-1 and t.xgrq < trunc(sysdate+1)) ) and t.czlx_dm in ('53', '56', '61', '64') and t.zgswskfj_dm like ? and not exists(select ldsklsuuid from SB_CKTS_LDSKTB l where t.ldsklsuuid=l.ldsklsuuid and l.sjtbbz='Y')
SELECT NVL(SUM(A.KPJE), 0) KPJE, NVL(SUM(A.DKSQJE), 0) DKSQJE FROM FP_DK_SQ A, FP_DK_ZZSPTFP B WHERE A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID AND B.LZFPDM = ? AND B.LZFPHM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Qyxtzsyyhmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select t.* from sb_dkdj_zqjyyhsbgb_skmx t where t.sbuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM sb_hgz_ccqq t where (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.jdczccchgz = ?) and (1 = '#macroparam#' or t.clsbdh = ?) order by t.lrrq desc
select uuid, zdjsjg,lrrq from SB_QSJYZDJSJGHB where tdsybh=? And YXBZ='Y'
select * from sb_glywwlndbg_fb7_rtzj t where t.sbuuid = ?

SELECT B.SWJG_DM, B.JGJC_DM FROM (SELECT A.SWJG_DM SWJG_DM, A.SJSWJG_DM SJSWJG_DM, A.JGJC_DM JGJC_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.XYBZ = 'Y' AND A.YXQSRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.YXZZRQ > TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) B START WITH B.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR B.SJSWJG_DM = B.SWJG_DM
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_FLQYXX t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

select * from (select b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_xgm b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by a.lrrq desc) where rownum<=4
select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, bqynse bq131 from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zyssb_skxxb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh
SELECT * FROM PZ_JC JC WHERE JC.CZYUUID = ? AND JC.PZZL_DM = ? AND JC.PZZT_DM = ? AND JC.YXBZ='Y' #macroparam#
select t1.djxh,sum(t.jcsl) as yxbz from pz_jc t, pz_ypr t1 where t.czyuuid = t1.ypruuid and t1.yxbz='Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.pzzt_dm = '01' #macroparam# group by djxh

SELECT T.* FROM ZS_YDTXX T WHERE T.YDTLYUUID IN (SELECT B.SBXXUUID FROM SB_SBXX B WHERE B.PZXH = ? AND B.YZPZZL_DM = ?) AND T.CZLX_DM = '60' AND T.TZLX_DM = '3' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_YDTXX A WHERE T.YDTLYUUID IN (SELECT B.SBXXUUID FROM SB_SBXX B WHERE B.PZXH = ? AND B.YZPZZL_DM = ?) AND A.CZLX_DM IN ('10', '66') AND A.TZLX_DM = '2' AND T.YDTLYUUID = A.YDTLYUUID AND T.SE = -1 * A.SE)
select t.* from sb_slxx t where sbuuid=?

select A.TDYWYJZSDSE_BQ,A.ZJGYFTSDSE_BQ,A.CZJZFPSDSE_BQ,A.FZJGYFTSDSE_BQ,A.ZJGDLSCJYBMYFTSDSE_BQ FROM SB_SBB T, SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD A WHERE T.DJXH =? AND T.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.Yzpzzl_Dm in('BDA0610756','BDA0610040') and t.sbuuid=a.sbuuid and t.pzxh=a.pzxh and t.zfbz_1='N' AND T.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5') and t.sbsx_dm_1 in('11','21')

select t.dksquuid, t.djxh, t.dkfplb_dm, t.kpje, t.lcslid, t.sqrxm, t.sqrq, t.slr_dm, t.slrq, t.zfbz_1, t.slswjg_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zrrbz, t.kjbz, t.pzxh, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sqdhm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.hy_dm, t.dksqje, t.ybsfe, t.jmsbz, t.jmslx_dm, t.kplx_dm, t.jmyy, t.zsbz, t.zjsrsfft, t.qxq, t.qxz from fp_dk_sq t where t.djxh = ? and t.zjsrsfft = 'Y' and t.qxq is not null and t.qxz is not null and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zsbz = 'Y'

select b.tdzldz, b.xmmc, b.sjzdmj, c.sbrq_1, to_char(wm_concat(a.sysl)) dwsl, sum(a.jzse) ynse, sum(a.jmse) jmse, b.pzxh, to_char(wm_concat(a.ssjmxz_dm)) jmxz_dm from sb_gdzys a, sb_gdzys_zb b, sb_sbb c where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and c.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or b.tdsybh = ?) and b.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and c.gzlx_dm_1 in('1', '4', '5') and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by b.tdzldz, b.xmmc, b.sjzdmj, c.sbrq_1, b.pzxh union all select cj.tdzlwz tdzldz, '' xmmc, jy.sjzygdmj sjzdmj, sbb.sbrq_1, to_char(csf.sl_1) dwsl, csf.ynse, csf.jmse, csf.pzxh, csf.ssjmxz_dm jmxz_dm from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb cj, sb_tdjy jy, sb_tdjy_zb_csf csf, sb_sbb sbb where cj.csfdjxh = ? and cj.csfpzxh = csf.pzxh and csf.zsxm_dm = '10118' and jy.sbuuid = csf.sbuuid and sbb.sbuuid = csf.sbuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or jy.sybh_1 = ?) and csf.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and csf.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.sbuuid from sb_sbb a where a.djxh = ? and a.skssqz < ? and a.skssqq >= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' order by a.skssqz desc

select xfs.bqyjse, xfs.bqybtse from sb_sbb sbb, sb_xfs xfs where sbb.sbuuid = xfs.sbuuid and sbb.djxh = ? and sbb.skssqq = ? and sbb.skssqz = ? and sbb.yzpzzl_dm = ? and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
select a.gmfdjxh,a.gmfnsrsbh, a.fybh, a.tdfwdz, a.gmflxdh, a.gmfmc from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.mfnsrsbh= ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP WHERE YHPSYQKUUID = ?

select distinct balsxlh,clscqymc, clcpxh, clcp, clxh, zypz, cllx_dm, cdsx, cldw, zws, pql, jdczccchgz, clgzsrlnyzl_dm,zgswjg_dm,bazdjsjg from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb WHERE cjhdbz = 'N' and zfbz_1='N' and (1 = #macroparam# or clscqymc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or clcp like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or clxh like ?) and (#macroparam#) /*zgswjg_dm in ('') or zgswjg_dm in ('')*/

select p.pkuuid from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_pkqc p where t.lsmxid = p.pkuuid and t.hhljid = ? and exists (select 1 from sb_pkqc pp where pp.djxh = p.djxh and pp.skssqq = p.skssqq and pp.skssqz = p.skssqz and pp.zsxm_dm in ('10101', '10103', '10106', '10109', '10301', '10302', '30126', '30127', '30203', '30446') and pp.zfbz_1 = '0' and pp.zgswskfj_dm like substr(p.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and p.zspm_dm = pp.zspm_dm and p.hy_dm = pp.hy_dm and nvl(pp.sybh_1, 'X') = nvl(p.sybh_1, nvl(pp.sybh_1, 'X')) and p.ybtse = pp.ybtse and p.pkuuid <> pp.pkuuid)

SELECT DISTINCT B.KJZWMBWDKSJE ,c.jsyj FROM (SELECT SUM(KJZWMBWDKSJE) AS KJZWMBWDKSJE FROM SB_SDS_MBKSTZ WHERE pzxh = '1' AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N') B , (select sum(jsyj) as jsyj from sb_sbxx where pzxh='1' and zfbz_1='N' and gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') ) c
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYZCSGBGB t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
select 1 from sb_fjmqysdszxsb_2015 t where t.sbuuid=? and t.pzxh=?
select t.yspzmxhm yspzmxhm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzsl pzsl, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm from pz_gztzs_mx t where t.gztzsuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM sb_sbxx t WHERE t.djxh=? AND t.sbxxuuid=? AND t.jzjtskbz='Y'
select t.* from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh =? and t.zsxm_dm = '10104' and to_char(t.skssqq, 'mm') = '01' and to_char(t.skssqz, 'mm') = '12' and t.nssbrq is null
select t.* from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg t where sbuuid=?

select distinct a.djxh, a.fjmqyzwmc, a.fjmqyywmc, a.zqjmgnsrzwmc, a.zqjmgnsrywmc, a.gjhdqmc, a.fjmqyzqjmgzwdz, a.fjmqyzqjmgywdz, a.fjmqylxr, a.fjmqylxdh, a.hth, a.htzxqsrq, a.htzxzzrq, case when zfbz_2 is not null then zfbz_2 else to_char(htje) end as htje, a.htbz, a.zfxmmc, a.fkcs, a.hthxymc, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.bh, a.qysdssdlx_dm, a.ssxdsdlx_dm, a.fjmdjxh,a.zfbz_2 from SB_FJM_KJQYSDSHTBADJB a where (1 = #macroparam# OR a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.fjmdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.djxh = ? or a.fjmdjxh = ?) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select a.* from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b on a.syuuid=b.syuuid and a.yxbz='Y' and b.yxbz='Y' and djxh=? and #macroparam#

select t.sbqx as fdsbqx, t.nssbrq as zssbrq, case when t.nssbrq - t.sbqx > 0 then t.nssbrq - t.sbqx else 0 end as yqsbts, t.ybtse, case when t.ybtse > 0 then 'false' else 'true' end as sflsb, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz from sb_sbxx t, sb_ysbtj ysb where t.djxh = ysb.djxh and t.zsxm_dm = ysb.zsxm_dm and t.zspm_dm = ysb.zspm_dm and t.skssqq = ysb.skssqq and t.skssqz = ysb.skssqz and t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? and (1 = ? or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.zspm_dm = ?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') union all select t.sbqx as fdsbqx, t.nssbrq as zssbrq, case when trunc(sysdate) - t.sbqx > 0 then trunc(sysdate) - t.sbqx else 0 end as yqsbts, null as ybtse, null as sflsb, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? and t.nssbrq is null and not exists(select 1 from sb_sbxx sbxx where sbxx.djxh = t.djxh and sbxx.zsxm_dm = t.zsxm_dm and sbxx.zspm_dm = t.zspm_dm and sbxx.skssqq = t.skssqq and sbxx.skssqz = t.skssqz and sbxx.zsdlfs_dm=t.zsdlfs_dm and sbxx.zfbz_1='N' and sbxx.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')) and (1 = ? or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.zspm_dm = ?)
select * from sb_sbb t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq <= ? and t.skssqz >= ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610119' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
select yjskuuid, djxh, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, skssqq, skssqz, yjze, yjye_1, hy_dm, sksx_dm, zgswskfj_dm, pzxh, sphm, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj from sb_yjskxx x where x.yjskuuid = ?

select distinct b.*, a.* from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'Y' and #macroparam#
select * from sb_qyndglbg_bgqyxxb_qyryxx where zbuuid = ?
select * from SB_ZLBSCJB t where t.djxh =? and t.ssqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.ssqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.bszl_dm=? and (zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or zfbz_1 is null) order by lrrq desc
select a.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and gfzdjxh = ?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '5' zt_bz, case when (ewbhxh = '1' or ewbhxh = '11') then bqje when (ewbhxh = '7' or ewbhxh = '9' or ewbhxh = '11') then -1*bqje end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then bqje when (ewbhxh = '7' or ewbhxh = '9' or ewbhxh = '11') then -1*bqje end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then bqje end lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when (ewbhxh = '12' or ewbhxh = '24') then bqje when (ewbhxh = '20' or ewbhxh = '24' or ewbhxh = '25') then -1*bqje end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then bqje when (ewbhxh = '20' or ewbhxh = '24' or ewbhxh = '25') then -1*bqje end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '24' then bqje end lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then bqje end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ 0 lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ 0 lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ 0 lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then bqje end lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then bqje end lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then bqje end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then bqje end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '27' then bqje end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ 0 lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '28' then bqje end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then bqje end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then bqje end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then bqje end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_zqgs_lrb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.bszl_dm =?

update sb_sysbmxbg t set t.xgrq = sysdate, t.xgr_dm = ?, t.zfbz_1 = ?, t.zfr_dm = ?, t.zfrq_1 = sysdate where t.sbuuid in (select fcjycjxxuuid from sb_ls_fcjyxx l where l.fyjbxxuuid = ?) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from pz_ypr where swry_dm=? and yprlx_dm!=? and trunc(sysdate) between yxqsrq and yxzzrq

select a.djxh zrfdjxh,b.zrfsbbz zrfsbbz_1, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_TDCZRXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and b.csfdjxh = ? and b.tdsybh = ? and (b.zrfsbbz = 'Y' or b.csfsbbz='Y')
select swjg_dm, sjswjg_dm, SWJGBZ from dm_gy_swjg WHERE YXBZ = 'Y' AND XYBZ = 'Y' AND sysdate between YXQSRQ and YXZZRQ Start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm
update SB_XFS_FB_JYPFQYYFXSMX t set t.shbz='Y' where t.sbuuid=?

SELECT T.KCBZHDUUID, T.LCSLID, T.DJXH, T.HDQXQ, T.HDQXZ, T.CPMC_1, TRIM(T.CPLX_DM) CPLX_DM, T.GJNCPYT_DM, TRIM(T.HDFF_DM) HDFF_DM, T.NCPDHSL, T.SNTRSCDNCPWGJE, T.SNSCCB, T.CCPHYL, T.CZNCPDHSL, T.CZNCPHYL, T.SQR, T.SQRQ, T.FDDBR, T.HDR_DM, T.HDSWJG_DM, T.HDRQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.NCPHYL, T.DNYDKZZSJXSE, Z.KCBZ, T.HYNCPMC FROM SB_ZSS_NCPJXKCSHDB T, SB_ZZSJXSEKCBZHD_TZ Z WHERE T.KCBZHDUUID = Z.UUID(+) AND T.LCSLID = ?

select p.pzxh from sb_sbxx p,sb_sbb t where p.pzxh=t.pzxh and (p.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and p.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and p.djxh = ? and p.skssqq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and p.skssqz = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and p.yzpzzl_dm = ? and p.zspm_dm = ? and p.sbsx_dm_1= ? and t.bz=?
select t.nsqx_dm from sb_sbxx t where t.pzxh = ? and t.zspm_dm = ? and t.zsxm_dm = '10111' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select bduuid from sb_sbbd_bdycclxx where bduuid=?
select * from wbjh_zjfwzx_hgzdzcx a where a.jdccchgzbh=?
select t.pzxhyy_dm, t.pzxhyymc, t.pzxhyy_dm code, t.pzxhyymc caption from dm_pz_pzxhyy t where t.pzxhyy_dm in ('01', '02')

select t.swjg_dm as code, t.swjgmc as caption, t.*, t1.JGJC_DM as jgcj from dm_gy_swjg t, pz_pzgly t1 where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm = t1.pzhsjg_dm and t1.jgjc_dm in ('04', '05') and t1.yxbz='Y' and trunc(sysdate) between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and t.swjg_dm in (select distinct swjg_dm from qx_swjg_zns pzzns start with pzzns.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior pzzns.swjg_dm = pzzns.sjswjg_dm and pzzns.zn_dm = '09' and pzzns.yxbz = 'Y' and pzzns.sjswjg_dm is not null) order by t.swjg_dm asc

select * from ( select a.FJMSFYZXMSZDBLSWDJ,a.FJMSFWTJNDLRLXNSYW,a.FJMSFDYGSXZCSMSM, rank() over(PARTITION by a.bh order by lrrq desc) xh from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a where a.BH=? and a.ZFBZ_1='N') where xh = 1
select a.jbjxpzmxuuid,'Y' zfbz_1 from CS_PZ_JBJXPZBMX a where a.jbjxpzuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB WHERE YXBZ = 'Y' AND FYXXUUID =? AND #macroparam# ORDER BY YXQQ
SELECT MX.SSPZXHSQUUID, MX.SSPZTYZFMXUUID, MX.SSPZTYZFUUID, MX.PZJCUUID, MX.PZZL_DM, MX.PZZG_DM, MX.PZQSHM, MX.PZZZHM, MX.PZSL, MX.YY, MX.BZ FROM PZ_SSPZTYZFMXB MX WHERE MX.SSPZTYZFUUID = ?
select * from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? order by lrrq desc

select t.zzslx,t.ldlx,sum(decode(t.czlx_dm,'53',t.bcldbhs,'56',t.bcldbhs,0)) lddq,sum(decode(t.czlx_dm,'61',t.bcldbhs,'64',t.bcldbhs,0)) ldtk from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? and t.czlx_dm in ('53','56','61','64') and t.skssqq<? group by t.zzslx,t.ldlx
update sb_zzs_ldsklsz t set t.bcldbhs=t.bcldbhs+?,t.xgr_dm=?,t.xgrq=sysdate where t.djxh=? and t.njzbz='1' and t.zzslx=? and t.ldlx=? and t.skssqz>=?

select t.yskm_dm code, km.yskmmc caption,km.sjyskm_dm pcode from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.swjg_Dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xl from (select * from CS_SB_HSQJYSKMDZB a where a.yxbz = 'Y') a, (SELECT t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg t START WITH t.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm) t, dm_gy_yskm km where t.xl = 1 and t.yskm_dm = km.yskm_dm and km.xybz='Y' and km.yxbz='Y'
update sb_yjskxx t set t.yjye_1=t.yjye_1+?,t.xgrq=sysdate,t.xgr_dm='00000000000' where t.yjskuuid=?

select y.zsuuid, y.ybtse as se, y.yzpzzl_dm, y.hy_dm, y.zsxm_dm, y.zspm_dm, y.zszm_dm, y.skssqq, y.skssqz, y.kssl, y.jsyj, y.sl_1, y.yjse as kcse, y.jkqx, y.yzpzzl_dm, y.xgrq, t.lrrq from sb_yjsf_cjb t, zs_yjsf y where t.zsuuid = y.zsuuid and t.lcslid = ? and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null)
select * from pz_flzjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null and zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM CS_SB_FJSZSPMPZB WHERE SWJG_DM = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'

Select t.Sbuuid, t.ybtse, x.Jsyj, t.Lrrq From Sb_Sbb t, Sb_Sbxx x Where t.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And t.Sbuuid = x.Sbuuid And t.Djxh = ? And t.Skssqq = ? And t.Skssqz = ? And x.Zsxm_Dm = ? And x.Zspm_Dm = ? And t.Lrrq <= ?
select a.* from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and b.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.djxh = ? and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.bz = ? order by a.lrrq desc
select c.SBUUID,c.ZBSMC,c.ZBJE,c.ZBHTZH from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a ,SB_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB_FB2 c where a.BH=? and a.sbuuid=c.sbuuid

select a.fybh, d.gyrnsrsbh, d.gyrxm, d.sfzjlx_dm, d.zjhm, d.gj_dm, d.dz, d.lxdh, d.szfe_1, d.szfe_1 from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlf_zb b, sb_sbb c, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_gyrxx d, sb_zlbscjb e where a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.pzxh = c.pzxh and b.sbuuid=c.sbuuid and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.fybh = b.fybh and a.gfzdjxh = b.gfzdjxh and a.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid=e.zlbscjuuid and nvl(e.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and c.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.ewbhxh=d.dy_ewbhxh and c.djxh = ? and a.gfzdjxh = ? and (1 = ? or c.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or c.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select t.ssjmxz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.swsx_dm,jmxz.ssjmxzmc from CS_YH_SWSXJMXZDZB t,dm_gy_ssjmxz jmxz ,dm_gy_swsx swsx where t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.xybz = 'Y' and swsx.xybz = 'Y' and swsx.yxbz = 'Y' and swsx.swsx_dm = t.swsx_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and jmxz.ssjmxz_dm = t.ssjmxz_dm and jmxz.xybz = 'Y' and jmxz.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in ( select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ? )
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jzzcnstzmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select rd.djxh, rd.zsxm_dm, rd.zspm_dm, rd.nsqx_dm, rd.sbqx_dm, rd.zgswskfj_dm, rd.zsdlfs_dm from rd_sfzrdxxb rd, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where rd.djxh = ls.djxh and rd.yxbz = ? and rd.rdyxqq <= ? and rd.rdyxqz >= ? and rd.zgswskfj_dm = ? and rd.zsdlfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and rd.nsqx_dm != ? and ('1' = #macroparam# or rd.zsxm_dm not in (#macroparam#))

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwzh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.dyh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.lc_2 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fjh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.zlfclfbz = ?) and c.htbh = ? and c.kfbdcxmbh is null and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g where g.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid and g.zrfcsfbz = '1' and g.nsrsbh = ?)) and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM SB_YQSBHZB_MX T WHERE T.YQSBUUID=?
Select t.uuid, t.zsfjsgzbz, t.zsfjszfbz from SB_TYSB_ZSFJSGDSHTGLB t where t.zssbuuid = ? and t.gsdjxh = ? and t.zspzxh = ?
select t.* from wbjh_cxs_fcjycqbcdmb t where t.fcjycjxxuuid in (#macroparam#)
select bduuid from Sb_Sbbd_Bdycfhd where bduuid=?

select max(syts) as syts from cs_gy_zqtz where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and yyyf = ? and xybz = 'Y' and zsxm_dm is null and (1 = ? or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and yxqsrq <=? and yxzzrq >=?
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PZ_PZGLY A WHERE A.PZGLY_DM =? AND YXBZ = 'Y'

select ls.* from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_sbxx b, sb_ls_sbxx ls where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.djxh = ls.djxh and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sbxxuuid = b.sbxxuuid and a.zspm_dm = ls.zspm_dm and a.sybh_1 = ls.sybh_1 and b.skssqq = ls.ssqq and b.skssqz = ls.ssqz and b.yzpzzl_dm = ls.yzpzzl_dm and b.sbsx_dm_1 = ls.sbsx_dm_1 and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and ls.hhljid=?
select c.* from SB_CCS c, sb_sbxx t where c.sbuuid = t.sbuuid and t.djxh = ? and t.pzxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')

select distinct t.lcslid ,t.skssqq,t.skssqz from sb_sbbd_bdycclxx t where t.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = ? or t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select t.zbmc_2,t.yzpzzl_dm,t.jktjmc,t.jktjcx,t.tsxx,t.xybz,t.uuid from sb_ycjkzbwh t where t.ssswjg_dm=? and t.yzpzzl_dm=?

SELECT * FROM SB_FWSYQKDJXX_CZ T WHERE T.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND (1 = ? OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = ? OR (T.XZQHSZ_DM IS NULL OR T.JDXZ_DM IS NULL OR T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM IS NULL OR T.NSQX_DM IS NULL OR T.SBQX_DM IS NULL OR T.JKQX_DM IS NULL))

Select Uuid, Pzxh, Sbuuid, Yysr, Yycb, Yysj_Fj, Xsfy, Glfy, Cwfy, Zcjzss, Gyjzbdsy, Tzsy, Yylr, Yywsr, Yywzc, Lrze, Nstzzje, Nstzjse, Bzssr, Mssr, Jjsr, Jmsxmsd, Jjkc, Dkynssde, Jwyssdmbjnkse, Nsdzhsd, Mbyqndks, Ynssde, Sl_1, Ynsdse, Jmsdse, Dmsdse, Ynse, Jwsdynsdse, Jwsd_Dmsdse, Sjynsdse, Bnljsjyyj_Sdse, Hzns_Zjgftyj_Se, Hzns_Zjgczdkyj_Se, Hzns_Zjgssfzjgft_Yjse, Hbns_Mztzcyqyjdyjbl, Hbnsqyjdyj_Sdse, Bnybt_Sdse, Yqnddj_Sdse_Bndje, Yqnd_Yjwjzbnrksdse, Dljbrxm, Dljbrzyzjhm, Zjg_Zjgyftsdse, Czjzfpsdse, Fzjgyftsdse, Zjg_Qzzjgdlscjybmyftsdse From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd t Where t.Sbuuid = ?
select t.wbszluuid from sb_yqwbszlqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.zlssqjz = ? and t.sbrq_1 is not null
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBGDZCB t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

Select * From Sb_Hgz_Wszt t Where t.Cgswszt = ? And t.sjgsdq Like ? And (t.Cllb_Dm_1 != '2' Or t.Cllb_Dm_1 Is Null) And t.Sfbsbz = 'N' And #macroparam# And (t.Xfbz = 'N' Or t.Xfbz Is Null) And t.Jdczccchgz Is Not Null

select cbqkuuid, djxh, cbpzhm, cbjdw, cbmc, bz, zxrq, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, sl_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, cbsbh, tscd, fdjgl, zszm_dm, ccdjhm, cjg, fzrq, qdsyqrq, jcenrq, zjzl, jdxz_dm, sbqx_dm, nsqx_dm, jkqx_dm, jldw_dm from sb_cbqkxx a where (a.djxh=? or 1=?) and (a.cbsbh=? or 1=?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (nvl(a.zxrq, to_date('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-dd'))> =? or 1=?) and (a.qdsyqrq < =? or 1=?)

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.zsxm_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from cs_sb_zyszsl t where t.zspm_dm=? and t.zszm_dm=? and xybz='Y' AND YXBZ='Y') a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y')
select t.* from sb_qs t, sb_ls_fcjyxx l, sb_sbb a where t.zlbscjuuid = l.fcjycjxxuuid and t.sbuuid = a.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in (#macroparam#) and l.fyjbxxuuid = ?
select * from sb_sds_mbkstz t where t.djxh =? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

with kk as (select DISTINCT b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.sbuuid, b.pzxh from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, sb_sbb b where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.gzlx_dm_1 in (?, ?) and b.sbrq_1 between ? and ? AND nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and a.yxbz = ? AND a.jknd = ? and a.djxh = ?) select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, ynse bq136 from kk a, sb_cxs_fcsyjskxx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid
SELECT * FROM SB_YQSBHZB_MX T WHERE T.yqsbuuid=?

SELECT LZFPHM, LZFPDM, SQLY, LXDH, DZ, SKFNSRSBH, FKFNSRSBH, FKFDJXH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, SKFMC, SKFSFZJHM, SKFSFZJLX_DM, FKFMC, FKFSFZJHM, FKFSFZJZL_DM, DKSQUUID, BDCFPUUID, GYRMC FROM FP_DK_BDCFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
select Bduuid, Skssqq, Skssqz, Bdnr, Bdbbz, pbbdycyy, pbsbdycclyj_dm From sb_sbbd_bdycclxx t Where Lcslid = ? And (1 = ? or Sbbdcljdbz = ?) And Zfbz_1 = 'N'
select count(1) from fp_dk_sq sq where sq.zfbz_1='N' and sq.kjbz='N' and sq.djxh = ? and sq.sqrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sq.sqrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
Select * From Sb_Hgz_Ccqq t Where t.Qjjybs = ? Order By t.Lrrq Desc
select * from sb_sds_fjmhd_nd t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select a.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj a, sb_ls_sbxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.skssqq < b.ssqz and a.skssqz > b.ssqq and (a.nssbrq is null or a.nssbrq = date '1-1-1') and a.sjlybz = '5' and b.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610119' and b.hhljid = ?
Select t.* From SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_ZCSSTZFB3 t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select b.yqsbuuid, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.skssqq as sfkssqq, a.skssqz as sfkssqz, 0 as kssl, a.hdyjse as jsyj, 1 as sl, 0 as kcse, a.hdyjse as se, a.xjrq from sb_yqsbyjsehdb a, sb_yqsbhzb b where a.yqsbuuid = b.yqsbuuid and b.hdrq is not null and b.pzxh is null and (b.zfbz_1 is null or b.zfbz_1='N') and b.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or b.yqsbuuid = ?)
select b.sybh_1 from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.yzpzzl_dm=? and a.djxh=? and b.sbxxuuid=? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select ydt.* from sb_sbb t, sb_sbxx sbxx, zs_ydtxx ydt where t.pzxh = ? and t.sbuuid = ? and t.sbuuid = sbxx.sbuuid and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' AND sbxx.sbxxuuid = ydt.ydtlyuuid and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.czlx_dm in('10','66','17','18')
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZDSRWGZB T WHERE T.MC_1 in(#macroparam#) AND (1 = ? OR T.SJGSDQ = ?)
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb2_Cbfy t Where t.sbuuid=?

select a.fcjyuuid, a.fcjycjxxuuid, a.djxh, a.fwtc_dm, a.sfptzfbz, a.hy_dm, a.cqbcdmze, a.cqbcdmye, a.cqbcdmsye, a.pzxh, a.sbrq_1, a.hzsbbz, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.jyjgsfhs, a.kpfbz, a.sffgyrdp, b.fcjyskxxuuid, b.sbuuid, b.zfsbz, b.zsxm_dm, b.zspm_dm, b.zszm_dm, b.skssqq, b.skssqz, b.jsyj, b.sl_1, b.ynse, b.jmse, b.ybtse, b.ykpje, b.ysx, b.jcx, b.yssdl, b.ssjmxz_dm, b.nsqx_dm, b.jkqx_dm, b.sbqx_dm, g.djxh, g.jyfuuid, g.nsrsbh, g.nsrmc, g.szfe_2, g.bdfe_2, g.fwtc_dm, g.gj_dm, g.sfzjzl_dm, g.sfzjhm, g.zcqrbz from sb_cxs_fcjy_skxx b, sb_cxs_fcjy a, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf g, sb_ls_fcjyxx l where a.fcjyuuid = b.fcjyuuid and a.jyfuuid = g.jyfuuid and a.fcjycjxxuuid = l.fcjycjxxuuid and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and l.fyjbxxuuid = ? and g.zrfcsfbz = ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Kdjyhzndftmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select DISTINCT a1.HTZH,a1.CBSHTGLWFNSRSBH,a1.CBSHTGLWFMC from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a1 where a1.BH =?
select y.* from sb_yjskxx y, sb_ls_sbxx l where y.yjskuuid=l.sybh_1 and l.hhljid=?
select t.bkjdjxh,t.zspm_dm,t.zszm_dm,t.yjmse,t.syslhdwse,t.jsyj,t.clsbdm,t.ssjmxz_dm from sb_dkdj_fb_ccsmxbg t where sbpch = ? and nvl(hzbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ssjmxz_dm is not null

select t.*,dm.clscqy_dm from WBJH_ZJFWZX_LSPZXX t left join DM_ZS_CLSCQY dm on t.scqymc = dm.clscqymc left join sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb j on t.lspzxlh = j.clxlh where fsrq > add_months(sysdate,-6) and j.clxlh is null and #macroparam#
SELECT * FROM CS_SB_FJSZSPMPZB WHERE SWJG_DM = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from SB_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB_FB2 a where a.SBUUID=? and a.ZFBZ_1='N'

select * from sb_Sbb a, (select a.yspz_xmlsj, b.ywuuid from yspz_xmlsjb_new a, YSPZ_XMLYWGLB b where a.yspz_xmllsh = b.uuid and b.dzbzdszl_dm = ?) b where a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and a.sbuuid not in (select sbuuid from sb_ccs) and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.sbrq_1 >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.sbrq_1 <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.sbuuid = b.ywuuid
select * from pz_sspzlfdzb where pzlfduuid=?

with swjg as (select /*+materialize*/ swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) select a.*, nsrxx.scjydz, nsrxxkz.scjydlxdh from sb_yqwsbqc a, dj_nsrxx nsrxx, dj_nsrxx_kz nsrxxkz where a.djxh = nsrxx.djxh and nsrxx.djxh = nsrxxkz.djxh and a.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from swjg) and nvl(a.sfcbjjkwsb, 'Y') = 'Y' and a.sbqx between to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (a.ssgly_dm = ?)) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (a.djxh = ?)) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (a.sbrq_1 is null or a.sbrq_1 = date '1-1-1')) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (a.cbrq is null)) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (a.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#))) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (exists (select 1 from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb rd where rd.djxh = a.djxh and rd.nsrzglx_dm = ? and rd.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and rd.sjzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and rd.qxbz = 'N' and rd.zfbz_1 = 'N'))) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (a.zsxm_dm not in ('30137', '30138', '30221'))) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or (nsrxx.kzztdjlx_dm = ?)) and ((0 = #macroparam#) or exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where a.djxh = t.djxh and t.lb_dm = ?)) order by a.djxh asc
select * from sb_zlbs_zdsyqyjbxx where sdbz=? and zlbscjuuid in(#macroparam#)
select t.ewbhxh, t.hmc, t.bys, t.bnljs from SB_CWBB_QYKJZZ_LRB t, sb_zlbssldjb b where t.zlbscjuuid=b.zlbsuuid and b.djxh = ?
select fwcqzsh, sybh_1, syzlwz, fwmj, htbh, htqdrq, cjjg, zrfnsrsbh, fwsdswjg_Dm, jdxz_dm from SB_FCJY where zrfnsrsbh = ?

select t.pzxh yzpzxh, round(sum(decode( t.zsxm_dm,'10101',nvl(t.ysx,t.jsyj)*(1+nvl(t.sl_1,0)),nvl(t.ysx,t.jsyj) )),2) jsyj from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh=? and (1=? or t.sbsx_dm_1=?) and t.skssqq >=? and t.skssqz <=? and (1=? or t.zsxm_dm=?) and t.zsxm_dm in('10101','10103') and t.zfbz_1='N' group by t.pzxh

SELECT nvl(sum(yj.ybtse), 0) as sjse from ZS_YJSF yj where yj.djxh = ? and yj.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yj.zsxm_dm = ? and yj.zspm_dm =? and yj.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and yj.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and yj.yzclrq is not null
select * from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx where ysuuid=?
select jg.* from sb_sbf_cbjg jg, sb_ls_sbxx ls where jg.djxh = ls.djxh and jg.zlxgid = ls.yjskuuid and ls.hhljid = ?
select t.uuid, t.sbuuid, t.pzxh, t.djxh, t.yydj_dm, t.dj, t.sgsl, t.sgjk, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.yyssgbz from sb_yys_sgyyqk t where sbuuid=?

select clqkuuid, djxh, clpzh, clsbdh, zspm_dm, zszm_dm, ppxh, clcp, fdjhm, clfprqhzcdjrq, syxz, jdcrlnyzl_dm, jdxz_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, sl_1, bz, zxrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, zbzl, hdzkrs, pql, sbqx_dm, nsqx_dm, jkqx_dm, jldw_dm from sb_clqkxx a where (a.djxh=? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.clsbdh=? or 1=#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') =? and (nvl(a.zxrq, to_date('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-dd'))> =? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.clfprqhzcdjrq < =? or 1=#macroparam#)
select * from sb_sbb where djxh=? and gzlx_dm_1 in (1,4,5)

with swjg as (select case t1.ffflx_dm when '11' then (select swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = t1.ffdwr) else (select yprmc from pz_ypr where ypruuid = t1.ffdwr) end as ffdw, case t1.lqflx_dm when '11' then (select swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = t1.lqdwr) else (select yprmc from pz_ypr where ypruuid = t1.lqdwr) end as lqdw, t2.pzrklxmc as lfdlx, t1.ffrq, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.lqsl as lfs, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t3.pzzg, t4.pzzlmc from pz_sspzlfdmxb t, pz_sspzlfdzb t1, dm_pz_pzrklx t2, cs_pz_pzzgb t3, dm_pz_pzzl t4 where t.pzlfduuid = t1.pzlfduuid and t1.lfdlx_dm = '3' and t1.lqdwr = ? and trunc(t1.ffrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t1.lfdlx_dm = t2.pzrklx_dm and t1.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.pzzg_dm = t3.pzzg_dm(+) and t.pzzl_dm = t4.pzzl_dm union all select case t1.ffflx_dm when '11' then (select swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = t1.ffdwr) else (select yprmc from pz_ypr where ypruuid = t1.ffdwr) end as ffdw, case t1.lqflx_dm when '11' then (select swjgmc from dm_gy_swjg where swjg_dm = t1.lqdwr) else (select yprmc from pz_ypr where ypruuid = t1.lqdwr) end as lqdw, t2.pzrklxmc as lfdlx, t1.ffrq, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.lqsl as lfs, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t3.pzzg, t4.pzzlmc from pz_sspzlfdmxb t, pz_sspzlfdzb t1, dm_pz_pzrklx t2, cs_pz_pzzgb t3, dm_pz_pzzl t4 where t.pzlfduuid = t1.pzlfduuid and t1.lfdlx_dm = '4' and t1.ffdwr = ? and trunc(t1.ffrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t1.lfdlx_dm = t2.pzrklx_dm and t1.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.pzzg_dm = t3.pzzg_dm(+) and t.pzzl_dm = t4.pzzl_dm) select * from swjg order by lfdlx,ffrq desc

select sum(fb1.jxse)+sum(fb1.je) jse from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr,sb_sbb sbb ,sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_tlys_qdjx fb1 where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz > = ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.sbuuid=fb1.sbuuid and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq <= ? and sbb.skssqz >= ?

update sb_cxs_fcjy t set t.xgrq = sysdate, t.xgr_dm = ?, t.zfbz_1 = ?, t.zfr_dm = ?, t.zfrq_1 = sysdate where t.fcjycjxxuuid in (select fcjycjxxuuid from sb_ls_fcjyxx l where l.fyjbxxuuid = ?) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select b.* from sb_sbb a,sb_zzs_yqtqyfpb_skfprkqk b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and a.skssqq = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.sbsx_dm_1 = '11'

select a.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj a, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqz and a.skssqz >= sbxx.ssqq and a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm and a.nssbrq is not null and a.zsxm_dm = '10106' and sbxx.hhljid = ?
UPDATE SB_CXS_FYXXCJB T SET T.CZRSJ = '', T.NSYWZZSJ = '', T.XGR_DM = ?, T.XGRQ = SYSDATE WHERE T.FYXXUUID = ?
SELECT HY_DM, SJGSDQ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, DKFPLB_DM, SKSX, ZSPM_DM, ZSXM_DM, WSPZZL_DM, BCKCSE, PMSE, WSPZHM, WSPZZG, DKSQUUID, YSYSKMXUUID, GLDKSQUUID FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
select * from sb_tdzzssb_jmxx where tdzzsqssbuuid=?

select a.djxh mfdjxh, a.zlbsuuid, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (? is null or a.djxh = ?) and (? is null or b.mfnsrsbh = ?) and (? is null or b.gmfdjxh = ?) and (? is null or b.gmfnsrsbh = ?) and (nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' or nvl(b.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y') and b.mfpzxh = ?
SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T.JBRQ_1 + NUMTODSINTERVAL(1, 'SECOND')), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.SHBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.JBJXDWR= ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Yffyjjkcyhb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_GDZCJSZJB T WHERE T.PZXH=? AND T.SBUUID=? ORDER BY t.ewbhxh ASC
SELECT * FROM SB_CXS_FCSSYSYXX WHERE YSUUID = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
SELECT distinct t.* FROM sb_sbxx t WHERE t.djxh= ? and t.skssqq = ? and t.skssqz = ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')

SELECT ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFBZ_1, GLDKSQUUID, SJGSDQ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, JMSPJGUUID, ZSZSZM_DM, ZSZSPM_DM, ZSZSXM_DM, YBSFE, JMSFE, YJSFE, YNSFE, SSKCS, SFL, JSFYJ, YXKCJE, SRZE, ZSZM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSXM_DM, SKSSQZ, SKSSQQ, DKFPLB_DM, DKSQUUID, SFMXUUID FROM FP_DK_SFMX WHERE DKSQUUID = ?

select b.gmfdjxh as djxh, b.fybh, b.fwcqzsh, b.fwzh, b.dy as dyh, b.lc_1 as lc_2, b.fh as fjh, b.mj, b.tdfwdz, b.zgswskfj_dm as fwsdswjg_dm from sb_zlbscjb a,sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and #macroparam#
SELECT PZZG.PZZG_DM CODE, ZL.PZZL_DM PCODE, PZZG.PZZG CAPTION FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB PZZG, DM_PZ_PZZL ZL WHERE PZZG.PZZL_DM = ZL.PZZL_DM AND ZL.XYBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.YXBZ = 'Y'

/*增值税一般纳税人附表二*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when ewbhxh = '5' then se end bq27 /*按凭证种类：海关进口增值税专用缴款书*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb2_bqjxsemx b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh

SELECT T.YBSFE, T.DKSQJE, T.SQDHM, T.KJBZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.KPJE, T.LCSLID, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DJXH, T.DKSQUUID, T.SQRXM, T.SQRQ, T.SLR_DM, T.GSDKSQUUID FROM FP_DK_SQ T WHERE DJXH = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR DKFPLB_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SQRQ >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SQRQ <= ?) AND KJBZ = ? AND ZFBZ_1 =? AND ZSBZ = ? ORDER BY T.SQRQ DESC
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jrqysrmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Gdzczjkcb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

insert into sb_swjgbfs t (t.clywlx,t.swjg_dm,t.lrr_dm,t.lrrq,t.sjgsdq,t.hhljid) select ?,s.swjg_dm,'99999999999',sysdate,'00000000000',? FROM dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz='Y' and s.xybz='Y' and s.ghbz='Y' START WITH s.swjg_dm =? CONNECT BY PRIOR s.swjg_dm =s.sjswjg_dm

SELECT T.JDCMXUUID, T.JDCFPUUID, T.GHFSFZJZL_DM, T.GHFSFZJHM, T.GHFMC, T.GHFDZ, T.GHFLXDH, T.CLLX_DM, T.CD, T.HGZH, T.JKZMSH, T.SJDH, T.FDJHM, T.CLSBDH, T.CLDW, T.CLXCRS, T.JSHJ, T.ZSL, T.BZ, T.CLCPXHMC, T.CLSPPPMC, T.CLGZDSX_DM, T.SE, T.KJFPMXUUID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM FP_DK_JDCFP_CLMX T WHERE JDCFPUUID = ?
select t.ysbtjuuid from sb_ysbtj t where t.djxh = ? and t.nd = ? and t.yf = ? and t.sjlybz = '2' and t.zsxm_dm is null
select * from pz_jc_csh where czyuuid = ? and yxbz='Y'

select a.djxh, c.nsrsbh nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when b.zsxm_dm = ? then ybtse end bq78, case when b.zsxm_dm = ? then ybtse end bq90, case when b.zsxm_dm = ? then ybtse end bq106 from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, zs_yjsf b, dj_nsrxx c where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.djxh = c.djxh and a.djxh = ? AND a.yxbz = ? AND a.jknd = ? and b.tzlx_dm in (?,?,?) and b.skcllx_dm = ? and b.skssqz < = ? and b.zsxm_dm in(?,?,?) and b.jkqx < sysdate

select t.* from SB_SBXX t where djxh = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5') and t.zfbz_1='N' and (1 = #macroparam# or zsxm_dm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zspm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yzpzzl_dm = ?) and skssqq >= ? and skssqz <= ? order by t.lrrq desc
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jmsdsyhmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select t.jjrqsrq as jjrqsrq, t.jjrzzrq as jjrzzrq, t.JJRBZ from cs_gy_jjr t where t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and t.JJRQSRQ <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.JJRZZRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yyyf = ?

select htbh, htqdrq, tdsybh, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, zgswskfj_dm, fwcqzsh, fybh, htje, fclx_dm, mj, tnmj, fwzh, dy, lc_1, fh, jzjglx_dm, cx_dm, tdfwdz fwzldz, jyjg, fcjyfs_dm, tdsyzbh, zrmj, scqd_fwfs, scqd_fwsj, scqd_fwcb, gmfdjxh djxh from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gmfdjxh = ? and nvl(a.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(a.gmfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y'
select max(skssqz) skssqz from sb_cxs_fcssysyxx where ysuuid=? and zfbz_1='N'
select * from sb_sbbd_zzsybnsr_ycsbdygz t where t.djxh=? and t.pzxh=?
delete fp_dk_ysyskmx t where t.spuuid in (#macroparam#)
select ypr.YPRUUID code, yprlx.YPRFLMC caption,yprlx.YPRFL_DM pcode from pz_ypr ypr,DM_PZ_YPRFL yprlx where yprlx.YPRFL_DM = 12
select t.ssjmxz_dm, t.jmwj_dm from cs_yh_swsxssjmxzdzb t where t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swsx_dm = ?
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jwsddmmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

SELECT UUID, DJXH, FYBH, FWCQZSH, TDSYBH, TO_CHAR(CZFCMJ) AS CZFCMJ, ZSPM_DM, FCMC, FCYT_DM, DH_1, PKBZ, XZQHSZ_DM, XXDZ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZFRQ_1, SL_1, TO_CHAR(HTZJZSR) AS HTZJZSR, CZFNSRSBH, CZFNSRMC, ZLRQQ, ZLRQZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, NSQX_DM, SBQX_DM, JKQX_DM, CZXZ_DM, TO_CHAR(BQYSZJSR) AS BQYSZJSR, JDXZ_DM, TO_CHAR(BQYNSE) AS BQYNSE, SSJMXZ_DM, BQJMSE FROM SB_FWSYQKDJXX_CZ WHERE DJXH = ? AND ZFRQ_1 IS NULL

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE DKFPLB_DM = ? AND DJXH = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND YBSFE >=0 ORDER BY LRRQ DESC

select * from sb_qysds_qyjbb_qyzygd a, sb_qysdsndsb_qyjbxxb t where a.mxuuid = t.uuid and t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nvl(t.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y'
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Sedmyhmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=? and NVL(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
SELECT t.* FROM ZS_YJSF T,sb_yjsf_cjb c WHERE T.Zsuuid=c.zsuuid and c.lcslid=? and (c.zfbz_1 = 'N' or c.zfbz_1 is null)

SELECT distinct a.*, t.nssbrq, t.Sbqx FROM SB_SBB a, sb_sbxx t WHERE a.pzxh = t.pzxh and a.DJXH = ? AND NVL(A.SBRQ_1,DATE'9999-01-01')=NVL(?,NVL(A.SBRQ_1,DATE'9999-01-01')) AND NVL(A.SKSSQQ,DATE'9999-01-01')>=NVL(?,NVL(A.SKSSQQ,DATE'9999-01-01')) AND NVL(A.SKSSQZ,DATE'9999-01-01')<=NVL(?,NVL(A.SKSSQZ,DATE'9999-01-01')) AND (? is null OR a.YZPZZL_DM = ?) AND A.YZPZZL_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') order by a.sbrq_1 + 1 desc
select * from sb_zlf_zb where sbuuid = ? and fybh = ? and gfzdjxh = ? and exists (select 1 from sb_sbb where sbuuid = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N')

update sb_cxs_fcjycjxx t set t.xgrq = sysdate, t.ysbbz = ?, t.xgr_dm = ?, t.zfbz_1 = ? where t.fcjycjxxuuid in (select fcjycjxxuuid from sb_ls_fcjyxx l where l.fyjbxxuuid = ?) and t.ysbbz = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select a.* from sb_fwsyqkdjxx_cj a where a.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or a.fybh = ?) and (1 = ? or to_date(nvl(to_char(a.SYQZZRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = ? or a.CSQDRQ <= to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and to_date(nvl(to_char(a.SYQZZRQ, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '9999-12-31'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= a.CSQDRQ
select a.bh, a.cbshtglwfmc, a.htmc, a.htzh, a.htje from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb a where a.djxh = ? and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select a.* from zs_yjsf_cbjtkz t ,sb_ls_sbxx l, zs_yjsf a where t.wbuuid=l.lsmxid and t.dscljg='Y' and t.yxbz='Y' and l.hhljid=? and a.zsuuid = t.zsuuid and a.tzlx_dm='1'
select a.* from sb_sbb b, sb_sysbmxbg a where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.yzpzzl_dm = ? and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.djxh = b.djxh and a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zcxbqnstzmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.zsxm_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from ( select * from cs_sb_yzl t where t.zspm_dm=? and t.zszm_dm is null and xybz='Y' AND YXBZ='Y') a, (select t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm =? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y')
select y.* from sb_ls_sbxx l, Sb_Yqwsbqc y where l.djxh = y.djxh and l.ssqq = y.skssqq and l.ssqz = y.skssqz and l.zsxm_dm = y.zsxm_dm and l.zspm_dm = y.zspm_dm and l.hhljid = ?
select Bduuid, Skssqq, Skssqz, Bdnr,bdnr_1, Bdbbz From Sb_Sbbd_Bdyczbd t Where Lcslid = ?

SELECT a.pzzl_dm, b.pzzg_dm, b.pzzg pzzgmc, a.pzqshm pzhm, c.swry_dm FROM pz_jc a, cs_pz_pzzgb b, pz_ypr c where a.pzzl_dm = b.pzzl_dm and a.pzzg_dm = b.pzzg_dm and a.czyuuid = c.ypruuid and c.swry_dm = ? and c.yprlx_dm = '12' and a.pzzt_dm = '01' and a.jcsl > 0 and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.yxbz='Y' and a.yprlx_dm='12' ORDER BY a.pzzl_dm,a.pzzg_dm, a.ffyxj DESC, a.rkrq, a.pzqshm ASC

select cldauuid, cldabh, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, clsbdh, nsrsfzjzl_dm, zjhm, hy_dm, djzclx_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clcp, clxh, zypz, cldw, zws, pql, fdjhm, clgzdsx_dm, cdsx, gzrq, ffrq, mzsbz, ewtmc, wszmhm, jdrq, pzhm_1, wspzzl_dm, wspzhm, sjse, znj, znjpzhm, djr_dm, djrq, jdcxszhm, yzpzxh, cljdlx_dm, cldazt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, clscqymc, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, cllx_dm, cldabh, cdsx, fpjgzsbz, xnyqclx_dm, jdczccchgz, zsjg_dm, fpjg from sb_cgs_cldaxx t where t.clsbdh = ? and t.cldazt_dm = ? order by t.lrrq desc

select distinct d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, '' as bdcxmmc, d.skssqq, d.skssqz, d.pzxh, z.skcllx_dm from sb_ls_fcjyxx ls, sb_sbb d, zs_yjsf z where d.pzxh = ls.pzxh and d.pzxh = z.yzpzxh and ls.fyjbxxuuid = ? and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and z.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and z.skcllx_dm = '0'

select distinct a.sbuuid, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.sbsx_dm_1 as sblx_dm, a.pzxh, a.yzpzzl_dm, b.ZSXM_DM, b.sbfs_dm, b.sbqx, b.sybh_1, a.sbrq_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.YBTSE, a.lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.SBUUID = b.SBUUID and a.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or b.sybh_1 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sbrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sbrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and a.GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5') ORDER BY a.lrrq DESC

select t.ypruuid, t.pzhsjg_dm, t.yprmc, t.yprlx_dm, t.swry_dm, t1.pzgly_dm, t1.sjhsjg_dm from pz_ypr t, pz_pzgly t1 where t.swry_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and t.pzhsjg_dm = t1.pzhsjg_dm and sysdate between t1.pzhsjgyxqsrq and t1.pzhsjgyxzzrq
select * from pz_gztzs where gztzsuuid = ? and yxbz='Y'

select distinct a.htzh, a.htmc, case when zfbz_2 is not null then zfbz_2 else to_char(htje) end as htje, a.fkcs, a.zyhlwdd, a.cbshtglwjflxr, a.cbshtglwfdh, a.djxh, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.htzxqsrq, a.htzxzzrq, a.qysdssdlx_dm, a.ssxdsdlx_dm, a.cbshtglwfdz, a.xmmc, a.fjmdjxh, a.cbshtglwfmc,a.zfbz_2,a.htbz_dm from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb a where (1 = #macroparam# OR a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.fjmdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.djxh = ? or a.fjmdjxh = ?) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select jc.pzzl_dm, jc.pzzg_dm from pz_jc jc where jc.pzzl_dm = ? and jc.pzzg_dm = ? UNION ALL select mx.pzzl_dm, mx.pzzg_dm from pz_sspzlfdmxb mx where mx.pzzl_dm = ? and mx.pzzg_dm = ? union all select csh.pzzl_dm, csh.pzzg_dm from pz_jc_csh csh where csh.pzzl_dm = ? and csh.pzzg_dm = ?
select * from sb_xfs_jybfqyyfxsmxhzb t where t.lcslid=?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '2' zt_bz, case when ewbhxh = '1' then bqje end lrlj1, /*营业收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then bqje end lrlj2, /*主营业务收入*/ 0 lrlj3, /*其它业务收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bqje end lrlj4, /*营业成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then bqje end lrlj5, /*主营业务成本*/ 0 lrlj6, /*其它业务成本*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then bqje end lrlj7, /*营业税金及附加*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then bqje end lrlj8, /*销售费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then bqje end lrlj9, /*管理费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then bqje end lrlj10, /*财务费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then bqje end lrlj11, /*资产减值损失*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then bqje end lrlj12, /*公允价值变动收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then bqje end lrlj13, /*投资收益*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then bqje end lrlj14, /*营业利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then bqje end lrlj15, /*营业外收入*/ 0 lrlj16, /*补贴收入*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then bqje end lrlj17, /*营业外支出*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then bqje end lrlj18, /*利润总额*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then bqje end lrlj19, /*所得税费用*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then bqje end lrlj20 /*净利润*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, sb_cwbb_qykjzzybqy_lrb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid

select t.swjg_dm, t.sjswjg_dm from qx_swjg_zns t, DM_GY_SWJG M where t.ccm like ? and t.zn_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM = M.SWJG_DM AND M.YXBZ = 'Y' AND M.XYBZ = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm != ? and (M.Swjgbz = '0' or M.Ghbz = 'Y')
SELECT QK.PZSYQKUUID, QK.PZZL_DM, QK.PZHM PZHM, QK.PZZG_DM, QK.KPR_DM, QK.SDDWDJXH, QK.PZZT_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE QK.Zfr_Dm IS NULL AND QK.PZZl_DM = ? AND QK.PZZT_DM = ? #macroparam#
select a.sbrq_1,a.skssqq,a.skssqz,b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_qs b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = ? and a.sbuuid = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5')
select * from pz_jc t where t.czyuuid=? and t.pzzl_dm =? and (1=? or t.pzzg_dm = ?) and t.pzzt_dm =? and t.yxbz='Y' order by ffyxj desc,rkrq asc,pzqshm asc
select nvl(sum(t.bckcse),0) bckcse from fp_dk_ysyskmx t where t.spuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select * from (select t1.pzdw_dm as pzdw, sum(NVL(t1.rks, 0) - nvl(t1.fcs, 0)) as jcs, sum(case when t1.tfrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') then 0 else nvl(t1.kjs, 0) + nvl(t1.zfs, 0) end) as kcs, round(DECODE(sum(case when t1.tfrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') then 0 else nvl(t1.kjs, 0) + nvl(t1.zfs, 0) end), 0, '', sum(NVL(t1.rks, 0) - nvl(t1.fcs, 0)) / sum(case when t1.tfrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') then 0 else nvl(t1.kjs, 0) + nvl(t1.zfs, 0) end)), 2) as bs from pz_flz t1 where t1.pzdw_dm = ? and t1.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t1.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t1.pzzy_dm <= '10' and t1.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by t1.pzdw_dm union all select t2.ypruuid as pzdw, sum(NVL(t2.lqs, 0)) as jcs, sum(case when t2.tfrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') then 0 else nvl(t2.kjs, 0) + nvl(t2.zfs, 0) end) as kcs, round(DECODE(sum(case when t2.tfrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') then 0 else nvl(t2.kjs, 0) + nvl(t2.zfs, 0) end), 0, '', sum(NVL(t2.lqs, 0)) / sum(case when t2.tfrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') then 0 else nvl(t2.kjs, 0) + nvl(t2.zfs, 0) end)), 2) as bs from pz_jbsc t2 where exists (select 1 from pz_ypr t3 where t3.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t3.yxbz = 'Y' and t3.ypruuid = t2.ypruuid) and t2.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t2.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t2.pzzy_dm <= '10' and t2.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by t2.ypruuid) t where t.bs >= ? or t.bs is null
SELECT T.* FROM SB_SBXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? and t.skssqq <=? and t.skssqz >=? AND T.YZPZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND t.gzlx_dm_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') AND t.zfbz_1 = 'N' ORDER BY LRRQ+1 DESC

select distinct b.*, a.* from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ysbbz = 'Y' and #macroparam#
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYZCSGFB1 t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
SELECT * FROM sb_hgz_wszt t where t.cgswszt = ? and (t.cllb_dm_1 !='2' or t.cllb_dm_1 is null) and t.sfbsbz = 'N' and #macroparam# and (t.xfbz = 'N' or t.xfbz is null) and t.JDCZCCCHGZ is not null
Select t.* From SB_FJMJSSB_15ND_SDSNSSBB t Where t.Sbuuid = ?

select a.djxh czrfdjxh, a.zlbsuuid, b.* from SB_ZLBSCJB a, Sb_Zlbs_Tdczrxxb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and NVL(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1= #macroparam# or b.czrf_nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.csfdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.csfnsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.tdsybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.czrhtbh = ?) and (decode(nvl(b.czrfnsrbz, 'Y'), 'N', 'Y', nvl(b.zrfsbbz, 'N')) = 'N' or nvl(b.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'N')

select t.djxh, t.dkfplb_dm, t.dksquuid, t.lcslid, t.kpje, t.ybsfe, t.sqrxm, t.sqrq, r.swryxm from fp_dk_sq t, dm_gy_swry r where t.slr_dm = r.swry_dm and t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' #macroparam# order by t.sqrq desc
select a.SBUUID,a.XMMC,a.XMLX,a.HTMC,a.HTZH,a.ZYHLWDD,a.ZHZYHLWRS,a.HTQX,a.HTQDRQ,a.HTJE,a.FKCS,a.QT_BZ from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB a where a.HTZH=? and a.BH=?

select a.zgswskfj_dm, a.djxh, b.zsxm_dm, b.zspm_dm, b.sfkssqq as skssqq, b.sfkssqz as skssqz, b.sbuuid, b.pzxh, b.sybh_1, b.syzldz, b.zszm_dm, b.bqynsfe, b.bqjmsfe, b.bqyjsfe, b.bqybtsfe,b.ysx,b.yssdl,b.jcx,b.jsfyj,b.sflhdwse,b.sskcs,b.sybz_dm_1，b.HDJSYJJE，b.hztykcjye from sb_sbb a, sb_fxmtysb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.zgswskfj_dm = ? and b.sfkssqq <= ? and b.sfkssqz >= ? and b.zsxm_dm = ? and b.zspm_dm = ?

select spuuid from zs_yjsf f, zs_jks s where f.zsuuid = s.zsuuid and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and f.yzclrq is not null and f.yzpzxh = ? union all select spuuid from zs_yjsf f, zs_wsz s where f.zsuuid = s.zsuuid and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and f.yzclrq is not null and f.yzpzxh = ?
select t.wbuuid from ZS_yjsf_cbjtkz t ,sb_ls_sbxx l where t.wbuuid=l.lsmxid and t.dscljg='Y' and t.yxbz='Y' and l.hhljid=?

select t2.nsrmc, t2.sfzjlx_dm sfzjzl, t2.sfzjhm zjhm, t2.gjhdqsz_dm gjhdqsz_Dm, t2.djxh bdzdjxh, t1.pzzl_dm, t1.pzzg_dm pzzg, t1.pzhm, t1.kjrq, t1.hy_dm, t1.zsxm_dm, t1.zspm_dm, t1.skssqq, t1.skssqz, t1.yskm_dm, t1.ysfpbl_dm, t1.skgk_dm, t1.kssl, t1.jsyj, t1.sl_1, t1.yjse yje, t1.sjje, t1.ssdabh from zs_gsdz_wsz t1, zs_gsdz_yjsf t2 where t1.djxh = t2.djxh and t1.zsuuid=t2.zsuuid and t1.wtdzrdjxh = ? and trunc(t1.kjrq) between ? and ? and (t2.dzzgswskfj_dm=? or 1=?) and (instr(to_char(t2.djxh),'2')=1 or instr(to_char(t2.djxh),'3')=1)

select B.* from sb_sbb a, Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Zgxcnstzmxb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND A.DJXH =? AND A.SKSSQZ =? AND B.ZFBZ_1 ='N' and rownum =1

SELECT ZB.PZSSBGDUUID, ZB.PZSSBGDBH, ZB.SQDW_DM, ZB.SQR_DM, ZB.TBRQ, ZB.SSDWR_DM, ZB.YPRLX_DM, ZB.SSSKJE, ZB.SSRQ, ZB.SSDD, ZB.SSYYJJG, ZB.BZ, ZB.ZFBZ_1, ZB.LCSLID, ZB.ZSTYBZ, ZB.ZSRQ_3, ZB.ZSR_DM, ZB.LRRQ, ZB.LRR_DM, ZB.ZRRXM FROM PZ_SSPZSSBGDZB ZB where ZB.Pzssbgduuid =?

select c.zlbsuuid,c.ssqq,c.ssqz,c.lrrq,d.cfdz from sb_zlbscjb c,sb_zlbssldjb d where c.djxh =? And c.zlbsuuid=d.zlbsuuid and c.ssqq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and c.ssqz >=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and bszl_dm =? and (c.ssqq <>to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') or c.ssqz<>to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (zfbz_1 <>'Y' or zfbz_1 is Null) order by lrrq desc
select * from sb_cxs_tdsyysxx a where syuuid = ? and BGBM in('1','2') and YXBZ = 'Y' and yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and yxbz = 'Y' order by yxqz asc

select qk.pzzl_dm,qk.pzzg_dm,decode(qk.pzzt_dm,null,'04',qk.pzzt_dm) pzzt_dm, qk.pzhm pzqshm,qk.pzhm pzzzhm,'1' pzsl,'0' kjzfsl,'0' skje from zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.kpr_dm = ? and qk.pzcxsybj is null and (qk.sspkjbdbh is null or exists (select 1 from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.sspkjbdbh = qk.sspkjbdbh and t.shbz = 'N')) and qk.sddwdjxh is null and (qk.pzzt_dm != ? or qk.pzzt_dm is null)
select * from dm0_zdsy_cesj_ssb where djxh=? and year=? and month=?

select distinct a.sbuuid, a.djxh, a.sbsx_dm_1 as sblx_dm, a.pzxh, a.yzpzzl_dm, b.ZSXM_DM, b.sbfs_dm, a.sbrq_1, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.YBTSE, a.sjgsdq, to_char(a.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') lrrq from sb_sbb a, sb_sbxx b where a.SBUUID = b.SBUUID and a.djxh = ? AND NVL(A.SBRQ_1, DATE '9999-01-01') >= NVL(?, NVL(A.SBRQ_1, DATE '9999-01-01')) AND NVL(A.SBRQ_1-1, DATE '9999-01-01') <= NVL(?, NVL(A.SBRQ_1, DATE '9999-01-01')) AND NVL(A.SKSSQQ, DATE '9999-01-01') >= NVL(?, NVL(A.SKSSQQ, DATE '9999-01-01')) AND NVL(A.SKSSQZ, DATE '9999-01-01') <= NVL(?, NVL(A.SKSSQZ, DATE '9999-01-01')) and (? is null or a.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (? is null or b.zsxm_dm = ?) and (? is null or a.pzxh = ?) and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and a.GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and b.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and b.GZLX_DM_1 in ('1', '4', '5') ORDER BY lrrq DESC
SELECT TRIM(pzrklx_dm) code, pzrklxmc caption FROM dm_pz_pzrklx WHERE xybz = 'Y' AND yxbz = 'Y' AND pzrklx_dm IN (#macroparam#)
select * from SB_KSHZTLSSSRFPBLWH where nsrsbh=?
select * from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx where zlbscjuuid=?
update sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a set a.cjbz='Y' where a.csfdjxh = ? and a.tdsybh = ?
select * from PZ_SSPZTYZFZB where sspztyzfuuid=?

select a.cgssbuuid, a.clscqymc, b.clpzhm, a.clcpxh, a.clsbdh, a.fdjhm, b.zsjg_dm, decode(a.ybtse, '0', a.lrrq) mstfrq, case when a.ybtse <> 0 then a.lrrq end zstfrq, a.lrr_dm as swjgjbr_dm, a.gzrq, a.nsrsfzjzl_dm, a.zjhm, a.pzxh, a.WSZMHM wspzhm, a.cgssbzt, a.lrrq, a.ybtse, a.clcp, a.clxh, a.yzbm, a.dz, a.lxdh,a.djxh from Sb_Cgs_Sbbxblsb a, sb_cgs_clgzswszm b where a.cgssbuuid = b.cgssbuuid and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or a.ybtse > 0) and a.cgssbzt in (#macroparam#) and ('1' = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and a.clsbdh = ? order by a.lrrq desc

select a.djxh, a.ssny, a.jzlx, a.fyxxuuid as syuuid, sum(a.jsyj) jsyj, sum(a.jmse) jmse, sum(a.ybtse) ybtsehj from sb_cxs_fcsyjskxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyxxcjb b on a.fyxxuuid=b.fyxxuuid where a.djxh = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y' and #macroparam# group by a.djxh, a.fyxxuuid, a.ssny, a.jzlx

select t2.nsrsbh, t2.nsrmc, t1.ssqq, t1.ssqz, t1.jytbzsptm, t1.jyphgg gg, t1.xsjg, t1.xssl sl, t1.xse, t1.cl, t1.dbjg, t1.jsjg, t1.bz, t1.lcslid sbuuid from sb_xfs_jyscqyndxsmxhzb t1, sb_sbb t2 where t1.lcslid = t2.sbuuid and t1.hdbz = 'N' and t1.hzzsjbz = 'Y' and t1.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t1.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t2.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t2.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and t1.tbswjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t where t.sjswjg_dm = ?)

SELECT UUID, DJXH, FYBH, FWCQZSH, TDSYBH, TO_CHAR(FWMJ) AS FWMJ, TO_CHAR(CZFCMJ) AS CZFCMJ, TO_CHAR(FCYZ) AS FCYZ, TO_CHAR(CZWYZ) AS CZWYZ, JSBL, ZSPM_DM, FCMC, FCYT_DM, DH_1, PKBZ, CSQDRQ, SYQZZRQ, XZQHSZ_DM, XXDZ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZFRQ_1, SL_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, NSQX_DM, SBQX_DM, JKQX_DM, CQGS_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSJMXZ_DM, BQJMSE, JMSFCYZ FROM SB_FWSYQKDJXX_CJ WHERE DJXH = ? AND ZFRQ_1 IS NULL

Select Sb.* From Sb_Sbxx Sb Where Sb.Djxh = ? And Sb.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And Sb.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Pzxh = ?)) and nvl(?,nvl(sb.skssqq,date'0001-01-01')) <=nvl(sb.skssqq,date'0001-01-01') and nvl(?,nvl(sb.skssqz,date'0001-01-01')) >=nvl(sb.skssqz,date'0001-01-01') And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#))) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Zsxm_Dm In (#macroparam#))) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Zspm_Dm In (#macroparam#))) And (1 = ? Or (Sb.Sbsx_Dm_1 = ?)) Order By Sb.Lrrq Desc

select nvl(sum(cwbb.bns), 0) nmwfplr from sb_cwbb_qykjzz_syzqy cwbb where cwbb.ewbhxh = 47 and cwbb.zlbscjuuid in (select t.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.ssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zfbz_1 is null)
Select t.* from sb_sds_fjmjs_14jd t Where t.sbuuid=?
delete from sb_swjgbfs t where t.clywlx=? and t.hhljid=?

select cc.* from (SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A,SB_SDS_JMCZ_YJD_GDZCJSZJB B WHERE A.SBUUID=B.SBUUID AND A.PZXH=B.PZXH AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ <= ? AND A.SKSSQZ >= ? AND A.YZPZZL_DM = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5') ORDER BY A.SKSSQQ DESC) cc order by cc.ewbhxh asc
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_QYHBBGB t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?
select b.* from sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_tljsjj b where b.sbuuid=?

select a.pzxh from sb_sbxx a,sb_ccs b where (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.djxh = ? and b.clsbdm = ? and a.skssqq = ? and a.skssqz = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')
SELECT * FROM dm_zs_clscqy where #macroparam#

SELECT t.djxh, t.ksyskuuid, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.jsyj, t.ysyskmxuuid, t.dksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.wspzzl_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.skssqq, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.spuuid, t.wspzzg, t.wspzhm, t.pmse, t.bckcse, t.sksx, t.gldksquuid, t.hy_dm, t.skssqz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.sfmxuuid, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.kkcse FROM fp_dk_ysyskmxzjb t WHERE t.spuuid in (#macroparam#)
select t.* from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB t where t.djxh=? and t.zfbz_1='N'
Select * From sb_fqdqdzcpcljjsbmxxx t Where t.Sbuuid = ? and t.pzxh=?
select t.bzsptm, t.phgg, t.jylb_dm_1, t.jylx_dm_1, t.xsjg, t.xssl, t.xse, t.bz from SB_XFS_FB_JYPFQYYFXSMX t where t.sbuuid =?

select * from sb_sbxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610865' and t.zfbz_1='N' AND T.GZLX_DM_1 IN('1','4','5')
select * from Sb_Jmyhzsb t where t.pzxh = ? and (t.TZLX_DM = ? or t.TZLX_DM = ?)

select distinct skssqq, skssqz from sb_cxs_sbsysyxx a inner join sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb b on a.syuuid = b.syuuid and a.djxh = b.djxh where a.djxh = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and #macroparam# order by skssqq desc
Select Substr(t.Clscqy_Dm, 5) As Xh1 From Sb_Cgs_Clscqy t Where t.Clscqy_Dm Like ?

select a.sbrq_1,b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_qs b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.djxh = ? and b.sybh_1 = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.skssqq>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.skssqq<=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Nstzxmmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?
select * from cs_pz_swjgdypzzl a where a.swjg_dm like ? and not exists (select 1 from cs_pz_sspzsptjwh b where b.swjg_dm= ? and b.pzzl_dm = a.pzzl_dm )

select t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.lsmxid from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.djxh = x.djxh and nvl(x.zsxm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zsxm_dm,nvl(x.zsxm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.zspm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zspm_dm,nvl(x.zspm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.zszm_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zszm_dm,nvl(x.zszm_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.skssqq,date'1-1-1') = nvl(t.ssqq,nvl(x.skssqq,date'1-1-1')) and nvl(x.skssqz,date'1-1-1') = nvl(t.ssqz,nvl(x.skssqz,date'1-1-1')) and nvl(x.zsdlfs_dm,'X') = nvl(t.zsdlfs_dm,nvl(x.zsdlfs_dm,'X')) and nvl(x.sbsx_dm_1,'X') = nvl(t.sbsx_dm_1,nvl(x.sbsx_dm_1,'X')) and x.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and t.hhljid = ? and x.yzpzzl_dm = ?
select * from pz_jbscjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select DJXH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, CLSBDH, NSRSFZJZL_DM, ZJHM, HY_DM, DJZCLX_DM, LXDH, YZBM, DZ, CLCP, CLXH, ZYPZ, CLDW, ZWS, PQL, FDJHM, CLGZDSX_DM, GZRQ, FFRQ, MZSBZ, WSZMHM, JDRQ, PZHM_1, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZHM, SJSE, ZNJ, ZNJPZHM, DJR_DM, DJRQ, JDCXSZHM, YZPZXH, CLJDLX_DM, CLDAZT_DM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, CLSCQYMC, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, SJTB_SJ, CLLX_DM, CLDABH, CDSX, FPJGZSBZ, XNYQCLX_DM, JDCZCCCHGZ, ZSJG_DM, FPJG from sb_cgs_cldaxx a where a.clsbdh like #macroparam#
SELECT CS.*, ZL.PZZLMC FROM CS_PZ_SSPZSHSZB CS, DM_PZ_PZZL ZL WHERE CS.SWJG_DM = ? AND CS.PZZL_DM = ZL.PZZL_DM AND ZL.PZXLBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.YXBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.XYBZ = 'Y'

select distinct c.djxh, b.fybh, a.fwcqzsh, b.fwzh, b.dyh, b.lc_2, b.fjh, b.tdfwdz, b.fwsdswjg_dm, b.mj from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx a inner join sb_cxs_fyjbxx b on a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid inner join sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf c on a.fcjycjxxuuid = c.fcjycjxxuuid where a.zlfclfbz = '2' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and #macroparam#

select dksquuid, dkfplb_dm, djxh, lcslid, kpje, sqrxm, sqrq, slr_dm, slrq, slswjg_dm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, zrrbz, kjbz, pzxh, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sqdhm, jdxz_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, hy_dm, dksqje, ybsfe, jmsbz, jmslx_dm, kplx_dm, jmyy from (select dksquuid, dkfplb_dm, djxh, lcslid, kpje, sqrxm, sqrq, slr_dm, slrq, slswjg_dm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, zrrbz, kjbz, pzxh, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sqdhm, jdxz_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, hy_dm, dksqje, ybsfe, jmsbz, jmslx_dm, kplx_dm, jmyy from fp_dk_sq t where t.djxh = ? and t.dkfplb_dm = ? order by t.lrrq desc) where rownum = 1
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_PZGLY T,dm_qx_swrysf a WHERE T.PZGLY_DM = ? and t.pzhsjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm and a.swrysf_dm = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_NDGLJYCWZKFXB where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? and dzbzdszl_dm =? order by ewbhxh
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_MBKSTZ T WHERE T.MBKSTZUUID IN (#macroparam#) and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
select t.* from sb_zyssb_jmsmxfb t where t.sbuuid=?

select c.zspm_dm, max(c.sl_1) sl from sb_sbb a,sb_sbxx b,sb_sysbmxbg c where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and c.sbuuid=a.sbuuid and a.djxh=? and c.sybh_1=? and a.yzpzzl_dm='BDA0610683' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' group by c.zspm_dm
select * from CS_SB_ZZSYJ_FJSXX T WHERE T.SWJG_DM =? AND T.YXQQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz='Y'

select clxlh, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, cdsx, clcp, clxh, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, cllb_dm_1, '现行' as jglx from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb jgb where jgb.clxlh = ? union all select balsxlh as clxlh, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, cdsx, clcp, clxh, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, cllb_dm_1, '备案' as jglx from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb bab where bab.balsxlh = ? and bab.zfbz_1 = 'N' and bab.zgswjg_dm = ? union all select zxlsxlh as clxlh, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, cdsx, clcp, clxh, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, cllb_dm_1, '暂行' as jglx from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg zxb where zxb.zxlsxlh = ? and zxb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (#macroparam#) /*zxb.hdswjg_dm in('')*/

select a.kpr_dm, (select c.pzgly_dm from pz_pzgly c where c.pzhsjg_dm = a.pzhsjg_dm and c.yxbz='Y') as swry_dm, a.pzhsjg_dm, a.pzzl_dm, a.pzhm, (select coalesce(b.shxydm, b.nsrsbh) || '-' || b.nsrmc from dj_nsrxx b where b.djxh = a.djxh) as nsrsbhmc, a.kjrq, a.zfrq_1, a.skje from pz_zfspjesh a where a.pzhsjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

select a.bh, a.cbshtglwfmc, a.htmc, a.htzh, a.htje from sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb a where a.djxh=? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.cbshtglwfnsrsbh =? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.cbshtglwfmc=? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.gjhdqmc=?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.htzh=?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.qysdssdlx_Dm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sfzdjsxm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.htzxqsrq >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.htzxzzrq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.xmlx in (#macroparam#)) and a.ZFBZ_1 = ?
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB T WHERE T.SSPKJBDUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND T.SHBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.SSPZJXBBH IS NULL AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.SBBZ = 'Y'
select * from SB_QYNDGLBG_GLYWHZB_GLJYXX where pzxh =? and sbuuid =? order by ewbhxh
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Jwsdtzhmx t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

Select t.Uuid, t.Pfhcuuid, t.Syhjswjg_Dm, t.Syhjswry_Dm, t.Dqhjswjg_Dm, t.Dqhjswry_Dm, t.Lrr_Dm, t.Lrrq, t.Xgr_Dm, t.Xgrq, t.Sfpfhtbz From Sb_Cgs_Wszmpfhcxx_Lsb t Where t.Pfhcuuid = ? And t.Sfpfhtbz = ? Order By t.Lrrq Desc

select sum(t.snysl) as snysl, sum(t.rlysl) as rlysl,case when t.qywgyplx in('外购免税油品') then 1 else 2 end as qywgyplx from SB_XFS_FB_WGPZMX t where t.qywgyplx in ('外购免税油品', '外购含税油品') and t.fpzlmc = '汉字防伪版增值税专用发票' and t.sbuuid=? group by qywgyplx,fpzlmc

SELECT T.SFMXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.SKSSQQ, T.SKSSQZ, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSZM_DM, T.SRZE, T.YXKCJE, T.JSFYJ, T.SFL, T.SSKCS, T.YNSFE, T.YJSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YBSFE, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JYXM_DM, T.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE FROM FP_DK_SFMX T, FP_DK_SQ A WHERE T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SQRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.SQRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select t.* from cs_sb_zyssbszpzb t where swjg_dm=? and yxbz='Y' and yxqq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT B.FYBH, A.* FROM SB_CXS_FYXXCJB B, SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB A WHERE A.FYXXUUID = B.FYXXUUID and a.yxbz='Y' and b.yxbz='Y' and djxh=? and #macroparam#
select * from pz_sspkjbdzb t where t.shbz='N' and t.cxbz='N' and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.sbbz='Y' and t.yprlx_dm in ('31','32') and t.jbr_dm_1=?

Select Distinct b.Sbuuid, b.Djxh, b.Sbsx_Dm_1 As Sblx_Dm, b.Pzxh, b.Yzpzzl_Dm, b.Zsxm_Dm, b.Sbfs_Dm, b.Nssbrq As Sbrq1, b.Skssqq, b.Skssqz, b.Ybtse, b.Sjgsdq From Sb_Sds_Jmhd_Yjnd a, Sb_Sbxx b Where a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And b.Djxh = ? And b.Skssqq >= To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') And b.skssqz <= trunc(add_months( To_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),11),'YYYY')-1 And b.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And b.Zsxm_Dm = ? And a.yjdndsbbj = '0' And b.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And b.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5')

SELECT SUM(LRLJ1) yysrbnbsnzj, SUM(LRZE) lrzebnbsnzj FROM (with kk as (select zlbscjuuid, bszl_dm from (select NULL nsrsbh, b.zlbscjuuid, b.bszl_dm, b.ssqq, b.ssqz from sb_zlbscjb b where b.ssqz between ? and ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, ?) = ? and djxh = ? order by lrrq desc) where rownum = 1) /*一般企业利润表*/ SELECT CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '1' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRLJ1 /*营业收入*/, CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '15' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRZE /*利润总额*/ FROM KK A, SB_CWBB_QYKJZZYBQY_LRB B WHERE A.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID UNION ALL /*小企业利润表*/ SELECT CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '1' THEN BNLJJE ELSE 0 END LRLJ1 /*营业收入*/, CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '30' THEN BNLJJE ELSE 0 END LRZE /*利润总额*/ FROM KK A, SB_CWBB_XQYKJZZ_LRB B WHERE A.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID UNION ALL /*商业银行*/ SELECT CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '2' OR EWBHXH = '5' OR EWBHXH = '10' OR EWBHXH = '12' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRLJ1 /*营业收入*/, CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '21' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRZE /*利润总额*/ FROM KK A, SB_CWBB_SYYH_LRB B WHERE A.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID UNION ALL /*担保企业*/ SELECT CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '1' THEN BNS ELSE 0 END LRLJ1 /*营业收入*/, CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '35' THEN BNS ELSE 0 END LRZE /*利润总额*/ FROM KK A, SB_CWBB_DBQYKJHSBF_LRB B WHERE A.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID UNION ALL /*保险公司*/ SELECT CASE WHEN (EWBHXH = '1' OR EWBHXH = '11') THEN BQJE WHEN (EWBHXH = '7' OR EWBHXH = '9' OR EWBHXH = '11') THEN -1 * BQJE ELSE 0 END LRLJ1 /*营业收入*/, CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '29' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRZE /*利润总额*/ FROM KK A, SB_CWBB_ZQGS_LRB B WHERE A.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID AND A.BSZL_DM = ? UNION ALL /*证券公司*/ SELECT CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '2' OR EWBHXH = '6' OR EWBHXH = '10' OR EWBHXH = '11' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRLJ1 /*营业收入*/, CASE WHEN EWBHXH = '20' THEN BQJE ELSE 0 END LRZE /*利润总额*/ FROM KK A, SB_CWBB_ZQGS_LRB B WHERE A.ZLBSCJUUID = B.ZLBSCJUUID AND A.BSZL_DM = ?)

select DISTINCT b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.sbuuid, b.pzxh from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc a, sb_sbb b where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '5') and b.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yxbz = 'Y' AND a.jknd = ? and a.djxh = ?
select * from PZ_SSPZJHBBHZBZB a where a.tbswjg_dm = ? and a.pzjhzl_dm = ? and a.jhnyq = ? and a.jhnyz = ? and (1=? or sbbz = ?) and (1=? or hzbz_1 = ?) and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT T.SSPZJXBUUID as uuid,T.SSPZJXBBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZJXB T WHERE T.PZGLY_DM = ? AND T.CXBZ = 'N' AND T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.SFSHTGBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.SSPZJXBBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPZJXBBH
select b.* from sb_zzs_xgm b where b.sbuuid = ? and b.ewblxh <= 2 order by b.ewblxh
select a.* from SB_CS_TSNSRWHB a where sysdate between yxqq and yxqz and yxqz >= yxqq and to_char(djxh) || tsnsrlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

select distinct s.skssqq, s.skssqz, s.ybtse, s.yzpzzl_dm, t.sbuuid, s.lrrq from SB_XFS_FB_JYSCQYNDXSMX t, sb_sbb s where t.sbuuid = s.sbuuid and s.djxh = ? and s.skssqq >= to_date(?, ('yyyy-mm-dd')) and (t.shbz is null or t.shbz = 'N') and s.zfbz_1 = 'N' and s.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') order by s.lrrq desc
SELECT a.yzdwxh, a.yzdwmc FROM CS_PZ_YZDWXX a WHERE a.swjg_dm like ? AND sysdate between a.yxqsrq and a.yxzzrq
UPDATE SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB SET YXBZ = 'N', XGRQ = SYSDATE, XGR_DM = ? WHERE CJSYUUID IN (#macroparam#)

select t.gshgshdjxh djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsdlfs_dm, t.nssbrq, t.sbfs_dm from sb_gssbxx t, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where t.gshgshdjxh = ls.djxh and t.zfbz_1 = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 = ? and t.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and t.lrrq > add_months(?, -3) and ((t.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and not (t.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#) or t.djzclx_dm like '41%') and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = t.djxh and tzf.yxqq < = t.skssqq and tzf.yxqz > = t.skssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and not exists (select 1 from hx_sb.sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = ? and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 = ? and gsxx.zfbz_1 = ? and gsxx.skssqq > = tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz < = tzf.yxqz))) or (t.zspm_dm not in (#macroparam#) or (t.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#) and (t.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#) or t.djzclx_dm like '41%'))))
select * from sb_cgs_cljgqc t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.nd = ? and trim(t.yf) = ? and t.clscqy_dm=? and t.qdswjg_dm = ?
SELECT SBRQ_1, skssqq, skssqz, ybtse, zfbz_1, yzpzzl_dm, pzxh from SB_SBB where djxh = ? AND skssqq >= ? AND skssqz <= ? and ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and yzpzzl_dm = ?
select * from sb_glywwlndbg t where t.sbuuid = ?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, ? year, ? QUARTER, '7' zt_bz, /*资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then NCS_ZC end zcnc1, /* 一、资产总计*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then QMS_ZC end zcqm1, /* 一、资产总计*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then NCS_ZC end zcnc2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then QMS_ZC end zcqm2, /* 其中:流动资产合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then NCS_ZC end zcnc3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ case when ewbhxh = '1' then QMS_ZC end zcqm3, /* 其中:货币资金*/ 0 zcnc4, /*交易性金融资产*/ 0 zcqm4, /*交易性金融资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then NCS_ZC end zcnc5, /* 应收票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then QMS_ZC end zcqm5, /* 应收票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then NCS_ZC end zcnc6, /* 应收帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then QMS_ZC end zcqm6, /* 应收帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then NCS_ZC end zcnc7, /* 预付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then QMS_ZC end zcqm7, /* 预付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then NCS_ZC end zcnc8, /* 应收利息*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then QMS_ZC end zcqm8, /* 应收利息*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then NCS_ZC end zcnc9, /* 其他应收款*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then QMS_ZC end zcqm9, /* 其他应收款*/
