case when ewbhxh = '10' then NCS_ZC end zcnc10, /* 存 货*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then QMS_ZC end zcqm10, /* 存 货*/ 0 zcnc11, /* 其中：原材料*/ 0 zcqm11, /* 其中：原材料*/ 0 zcnc12, /* 库存商品*/ 0 zcqm12, /* 库存商品*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then NCS_ZC when ewbhxh = '14' then -1*NCS_ZC end zcnc13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then QMS_ZC when ewbhxh = '14' then -1*QMS_ZC end zcqm13, /* 其中:非流动资产合计(13=3-4)*/ 0 zcnc14, /* 其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ 0 zcqm14, /* 其中:可供出售的金融资产*/ 0 zcnc15, /* 投资性房地产*/ 0 zcqm15, /* 投资性房地产*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then NCS_ZC end zcnc16, /* 长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then QMS_ZC end zcqm16, /* 长期股权投资*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then NCS_ZC end zcnc17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then QMS_ZC end zcqm17, /* 固定资产（净值）*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then NCS_ZC end zcnc18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then QMS_ZC end zcqm18, /*在建工程*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then NCS_ZC end zcnc19, /*无形资产*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then QMS_ZC end zcqm19, /*无形资产*/ /*权益*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then NCS_QY end zcnc20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then QMS_QY end zcqm20, /* 二、负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then NCS_QY end zcnc21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then QMS_QY end zcqm21, /* 其中:流动负债合计*/ 0 zcnc22, /* 其中:短期借款*/ 0 zcqm22, /* 其中:短期借款*/ 0 zcnc23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ 0 zcqm23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then NCS_QY end zcnc24, /* 应付票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '2' then QMS_QY end zcqm24, /* 应付票据*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then NCS_QY end zcnc25, /* 应付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then QMS_QY end zcqm25, /* 应付帐款*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then NCS_QY end zcnc26, /* 预收账款*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then QMS_QY end zcqm26, /* 预收账款*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then NCS_QY end zcnc27, /* 其他应付款*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then QMS_QY end zcqm27, /* 其他应付款*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then NCS_QY when ewbhxh = '15' then -1*NCS_QY end zcnc28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then QMS_QY when ewbhxh = '15' then -1*QMS_QY end zcqm28, /*其中:非流动负债合计(27=20-21)*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then NCS_QY end zcnc29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then QMS_QY end zcqm29, /* 其中:长期借款*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then NCS_QY when ewbhxh = '25' then -1*NCS_QY end zcnc30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '36' then QMS_QY when ewbhxh = '25' then -1*QMS_QY end zcqm30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then NCS_QY end zcnc31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then QMS_QY end zcqm31, /* 其中:实收资本(或股本)*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then NCS_QY end zcnc32, /* 资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '31' then QMS_QY end zcqm32, /* 资本公积*/ case when ewbhxh = '34' then NCS_QY end zcnc33, /* 未分配利润*/ case when ewbhxh = '34' then QMS_QY end zcqm33, /* 未分配利润*/ 0 zcnc34, /* 盈余公积*/ 0 zcqm34 /* 盈余公积*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_zlbs a, SB_CWBB_QYKJZZ_ZCFZB b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid
select * from pz_sspzlfdzb where lqdwr=? and zfbz_1='N'

select (a.SKQJKJDPTFPBHSXSE_1+a.SKQJKJDPTFPBHSXSE)*(1+ (select sl_1 from sb_sbxx c where a.sbuuid=c.sbuuid and rownum=1))+a.SKQJKJDPTFPXSE_1 as h1,b.pzxh from sb_zzs_xgm a,sb_sbb b where a.sbuuid=b.sbuuid and b.djxh = ? and b.skssqq = ? and b.skssqz = ? and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5') and a.ewblxh <=2

select sum(yj.ybtse) yjseHj from sb_sbxx t, zs_yjsf yj where t.djxh in (#macroparam#) and t.pzxh = yj.yzpzxh and t.zspm_dm = yj.zspm_dm and t.skssqq >= ? and t.skssqz <= ? and t.yzpzzl_dm = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in (#macroparam#) and yj.rkrq is not null union all select sum(a.ybtse) yjseHj from zs_yjsf a where a.djxh in (#macroparam#) and a.skssqq >= ? and a.skssqz <= ? and a.yzpzzl_dm != ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.skzl_dm != ? and a.rkrq is not null
Select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_Nd_Fb_Jmzs t Where t.sbuuid=?

select pz.pzzl_dm, decode(t.pzdl_dm, '1', 'XJ', '3', 'SJ', '4', 'SJ', '5', 'XJ') as sptj from dm_pz_pzzl t, cs_pz_swjgdypzzl pz where t.pzzl_dm = pz.pzzl_dm and t.pzdl_dm in ('1', '3', '4', '5') and pz.pzzl_dm not like '00000104%' and pz.pzzl_dm not like '00000101%' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and pz.swjg_dm like ?

SELECT count(1) as rowsum FROM SB_CXS_FCSSYSYXX B inner join SB_SBB c on B.SBUUID = C.SBUUID left join ZS_YJSF D on C.PZXH = D.YZPZXH and b.skssqq = d.skssqq and b.skssqz = d.skssqz and d.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') left join zs_ydtxx e on c.pzxh = e.pzxh and b.skssqq = e.skssqq and b.skssqz = e.skssqz and e.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') where nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and B.YSUUID = ? and D.SKCLLX_DM= ?
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_SSPKJBDMXB T WHERE EXISTS (SELECT T1.SSPKJBDUUID FROM PZ_LS_SSPZJBUUID T1 WHERE T.SSPKJBDUUID = T1.SSPKJBDUUID) ORDER BY T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM
select a.* from sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.djxh = ? and fwuuid is not null
select * from sb_tdjy_zb_zrf where sbuuid=? and pzxh=?

select pgjg from (select ZDJSJG pgjg, rank() over(partition by a.GMFDJXH, a.tdsybh, fybh order by a.lrrq, uuid desc) xh from SB_QSJYZDJSJGHB a where a.GMFDJXH = ? and ((? is null or a.tdsybh = ?) or (? is null or a.fybh = ?)) and a.yxbz = 'Y') where xh = 1
select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.kssl, sf.jsyj, sf.ybtse from zs_yjsf sf where sf.djxh =? and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.kjdjxh =? and sf.yzpzzl_dm = ?

select t.bhzrdjxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb t, dj_nsrxx nsr where t.djxh = ? and t.hznsyxqq <= ? and t.hznsyxqz > = ? and t.djxh <> t.bhzrdjxh and t.bhzrdjxh <> '0' and t.bhzrdjxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sbjnfs_dm like '%2%' and not exists (select 1 from sb_sbb sbb where (sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610606' or sbb.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610611') and sbb.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and sbb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sbb.djxh = t.bhzrdjxh and sbb.skssqq <= ? and sbb.skssqz >= ?)
select * from sb_cgs_cldaxx where clsbdh=? and djxh=?
select t.* from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Sedmyhmxbfb t where t.djxh=? and t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

select t.dksquuid, t.gldksquuid, t.dkfplb_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.srze, t.yxkcje, t.jsfyj, t.sfl, t.sskcs, t.ynsfe, t.jmsfe, t.yjsfe, t.ybsfe, t.zszsxm_dm, t.zszspm_dm, t.zszszm_dm, t.jmspjguuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.jyxm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.nsqnyjse, t.sfmxuuid, t.lzsfmxuuid, t.zjsrsfft, t.qxq, t.qxz, t.sfzczf from fp_dk_sfmx t, fp_dk_sq sq where 1 = 1 and t.dksquuid = sq.dksquuid #macroparam# and sq.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sq.zsbz = 'Y'
select * from sb_cxs_sbnsrxx where djxh=? and #macroparam# order by lrrq desc

select * from (select ysuuid, djxh, ssny, -sum(jsyj) jsyj, sl_1, -sum(ynse) ynse, -sum(jmse) jmse, -sum(yjse) yjse, -sum(ybtse) ybtse, ssjmxzdm_1, jmsxmmc_1, -sum(jmmj_1) jmmj_1, -sum(yjmsje_1) yjmsje_1, ssjmxzdm_2, jmsxmmc_2, -sum(jmmj_2) jmmj_2, -sum(yjmsje_2) yjmsje_2, ssjmxzdm_3, jmsxmmc_3, -sum(jmmj_3) jmmj_3, -sum(yjmsje_3) yjmsje_3, syuuid, tddj_dm from sb_cxs_yjskxx a where a.djxh = ? and #macroparam# group by djxh, ysuuid, ssny, sl_1, ssjmxzdm_1, jmsxmmc_1, ssjmxzdm_2, jmsxmmc_2, ssjmxzdm_3, jmsxmmc_3, syuuid, tddj_dm) where ybtse <> 0 or nvl(yjmsje_1, 0) <> 0 or nvl(yjmsje_2, 0) <> 0 or nvl(yjmsje_3, 0) <> 0
select * from Sb_Fjm_Kjqysdshtbadjb t where t.hth=? and t.zfbz_1='N'

select distinct a.sybh_1 sybh, b.tdfwdz syzl, b.htqdrq htqdsj, '' qszyfsDm, b.mj qszymj, a.jsyj, a.sl_1, d.ynse, d.ynse jzse, d.jmse, d.ssjmxz_dm jmxzDm, a.lrrq sbrq, a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b, sb_zlbscjb c, sb_fcjy_zb_csf d where a.sybh_1 = b.fybh and a.pzxh = d.pzxh and a.zspm_dm = d.zspm_dm and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and b.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and (a.djxh = b.gmfdjxh or a.djxh = c.djxh) and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select distinct c.fybh sybh, c.fwzlwz syzl, b.htqdsj, '' qszyfsDm, b.mj qszymj, a.jsyj, a.sl_1, c.qs_ynse ynse, c.qs_ynse jzse, c.qs_jmse jmse, c.qsssjmxz_dm jmxzDm, a.lrrq sbrq, a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx b, sb_zlf_zb c where a.sybh_1 = b.fybh and b.fybh = c.fybh and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.pzxh = c.pzxh and a.zspm_dm = c.qspm_dm and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select distinct c.fybh sybh, c.fwzlwz syzl, b.htqdsj, '' qszyfsDm, b.mj qszymj, a.jsyj, a.sl_1, c.qs_ynse ynse, c.qs_ynse jzse, c.qs_jmse jmse, c.qsssjmxz_dm jmxzDm, a.lrrq sbrq, a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx b, sb_zlf_zb c, sb_zlf_fhtz d where a.sybh_1 = b.fybh and b.fybh=c.fybh and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and a.pzxh = d.pzxh and d.pcuuid = c.sbuuid and a.zspm_dm = c.qspm_dm and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select distinct a.sybh_1 sybh, b.tdzlwz syzl, b.czrhtqdsj htqdsj, '' qszyfsDm, b.tdmj qszymj, a.jsyj, a.sl_1, c.ynse ynse, c.ynse jzse, c.jmse, c.ssjmxz_dm jmxzDm, a.lrrq sbrq, a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b, sb_tdjy_zb_csf c where a.pzxh = b.csfpzxh and b.csfpzxh = c.pzxh and a.sybh_1 = b.tdsybh and a.zspm_dm = c.zspm_dm and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select distinct a.sybh_1 sybh, b.tdzlwz syzl, b.czrhtqdsj htqdsj, '' qszyfsDm, b.tdmj qszymj, a.jsyj, a.sl_1, c.ynse ynse, c.ynse jzse, c.jmse, c.ssjmxz_dm jmxzDm, a.lrrq sbrq, a.pzxh from sb_sysbmxbg a, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb b, sb_tdjy_zb_zrf c where a.pzxh = b.zrfpzxh and b.zrfpzxh = c.pzxh and a.sybh_1 = b.tdsybh and a.zspm_dm = c.zspm_dm and a.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select sum(decode(t.czlx_dm,'53',t.bcldbhs,'56',t.bcldbhs,0)) lddq,sum(decode(t.czlx_dm,'61',t.bcldbhs,'64',t.bcldbhs,0)) ldtk from sb_zzs_ldsklsz t where t.djxh=? and t.czlx_dm in ('53','56','61','64') and t.skssqq>=? and t.skssqz<=?
Select * From Sb_Hgz_Cyqq t Where t.Qjjybs = ? Order By t.Lrrq Desc
select zl.pzzl_dm, zl.pzzlmc, zl.whpbz, zl.phcd, '' as pzzg_dm, '' as pzzg from dm_pz_pzzl zl where zl.pzxlbz = 'Y'

select max(bazdjsjg) as zxzdjsjg from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where cjhdbz = 'N' and (#macroparam#)/*zgswjg_dm = in ('')*/ and clcp IN (#macroparam#) and clxh IN (#macroparam#) and zypz IN (#macroparam#) and balsxlh = ?

select count(1) as qsjl from dj_tdzzsxmxx a where a.djxh = ? and nvl(a.tdzzsxmzt_dm,'01') not in (#macroparam#) and a.yxbz = ? and tdzzsxmbh not in (select b.sybh_1 from sb_sbb a, sb_sysbmxbg b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.zfbz_1 = ? and a.gzlx_dm_1 in (#macroparam#) and a.djxh = ?)
SELECT jgjc_dm FROM pz_pzgly a WHERE a.pzgly_dm = ? AND a.pzhsjgyxqsrq <= trunc(SYSDATE) AND a.pzhsjgyxzzrq > trunc(SYSDATE)
Select Bduuid, Skssqq, Skssqz, Bdnr, bdnr_1,Pbbdycyy, Clyj, Bdbbz, Clrq From Sb_Sbbd_Bdycfhd Where Lcslid = ?

select t.swsx_dm, t.zsxm_dm, t.ssjmxz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm,jmxz.ssjmxzmc, t.ssjmxzxl_dm,t.swjg_dm,t.sxh from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb t,dm_gy_ssjmxz jmxz where t.zsxm_dm = ? and jmxz.ssjmxz_dm= t.ssjmxz_dm and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y'

Select a.Cgsuuid, a.Gcrxm, a.Zjhm, a.Lxdh, a.Yjdz, a.Cpxh, a.Clsbdh, a.Slrq, a.Fzjg, a.Glbm, a.Clgzswszmhm, a.Bdjg, a.Zjlx From Wbjh_Ga_Cgswsbdjg a, Wbjh_Ga_Cgsbdjgcl b Where a.Cgsuuid = b.Uuid And b.Clbz = 'N'

select t.sspkjbduuid ypzuuid, g.gztzsuuid gztzsuuid, t.sspkjbdbh ypzbh, g.gztzsbh gztzsbh, t.jbrq_1 ypzrq, t.lrr_dm kjr_dm, g.jsr_dm jsr_dm, g.fqpzdw_dm fqpzdw_dm, g.jspzdw_dm jspzdw_dm, t.gdbz yspzgdbz, t.sspzjxbbh from pz_sspkjbdzb t, pz_gztzs g where t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.shbz = 'Y' and t.cxbz = 'N' and t.sspkjbduuid = g.yspzhm and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz is null and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?

SELECT T.GZTZSUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.GZTZSBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_GZTZS T WHERE T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.TYBZ = 'Y' AND T.FQPZDW_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.LRRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.LRRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.GZTZSBH
select max(yzpzmxxh) as yzpzmxxh from zs_yjsf where yzpzxh = ?

SELECT B.* FROM SB_SBB A, SB_XFS_FB_BQZYKCSE_YAN B WHERE A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ = ? AND A.SKSSQZ = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') ORDER BY b.lrr_dm DESC
select * from sb_cxs_tdsyxxcjb where #macroparam#

Select a.* From Sb_Yqwbszlqc a where a.Zgswskfj_Dm In (Select Swjg_Dm From Dm_Gy_Swjg Start With Swjg_Dm = ? Connect By Prior Swjg_Dm = Sjswjg_Dm) And a.Cbrq is null And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Zlssqjz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) And ((0=?) or (a.Ssgly_Dm = ?)) And ((0=?) or (a.Nsrsbh = ?))
select * from Sb_Sds_Jmcz_14nd_Gxjsqyyhmxb t where t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=?

select nvl(sum(cwbb.bns), 0) bnlrfp from sb_cwbb_qykjzz_syzqy cwbb where cwbb.ewbhxh = 46 and cwbb.zlbscjuuid in (select t.zlbscjuuid from sb_zlbscjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.ssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.ssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zfbz_1 is null)
Select * From sb_sds_jmcz_bgrsgwgqygfqk t Where t.pzxh=? And t.sbuuid=?

SELECT T.SSPZTYZFUUID AS PZGDMXUUID, T.SSPZTYZFBH AS PZHMQ FROM PZ_SSPZTYZFZB T WHERE T.BBDW_DM = ? AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSRQ_3 >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSRQ_3 <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ORDER BY T.SSPZTYZFBH
SELECT DISTINCT A.PZXH yzpzxh, B.KJZWMBWDKSJE FROM SB_SDS_MBKSTZ A, (SELECT SUM(KJZWMBWDKSJE) AS KJZWMBWDKSJE FROM SB_SDS_MBKSTZ WHERE PZXH = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N') B WHERE A.PZXH = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select t.wsbuuid from sb_yqwsbqc t where t.djxh=? and (t.sbrq_1 is null or t.sbrq_1=date'1-1-1') and t.cbrq is not null
SELECT * FROM ZS_PZSYQK WHERE SSPKJBDBH = ?
SELECT T.SSPZXHSQUUID as uuid,T.SSPZXHSQBH AS PZBH FROM PZ_SSPZXHSQZB T WHERE T.BBDW_DM = ? AND T.GDBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SSPZXHSQBH BETWEEN ? AND ?

'4' then qmye_qy end zcqm23, /* 交易性金融负债*/ 0 zcnc24, /* 应付票据*/ 0 zcqm24, /* 应付票据*/ 0 zcnc25, /* 应付帐款*/ 0 zcqm25, /* 应付帐款*/ 0 zcnc26, /* 预收账款*/ 0 zcqm26, /* 预收账款*/ 0 zcnc27, /* 其他应付款*/ 0 zcqm27, /* case when ewbhxh = '27' then ncye_qy end zcnc30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '27' then qmye_qy end zcqm30, /*三、股东权益合计(29=3-20)*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then ncye_qy end zcnc31, WITH mx AS (SELECT PP.DKSQUUID as uuid, PP.GHFNSRSBH AS GMFNSRSBH, PP.GHFNSRMC AS GMFMC FROM FP_DK_ZZSPTFP PP UNION all SELECT ZP.DKSQUUID as uuid, ZP.GHFNSRSBH AS GMFNSRSBH, ZP.GHFNSRMC AS GMFMC FROM FP_DK_ZZSFP ZP) SELECT mx.GMFNSRSBH, mx.GMFMC, YBSFE, DKSQJE, SQDHM, DJXH, SQRQ, SLR_DM, DKFPLB_DM, LCSLID, DKSQUUID, SQRXM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, KJBZ, KPJE FROM FP_DK_SQ, mx WHERE DJXH in (#macroparam#) AND SQRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SQRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZSBZ = 'Y' AND DKFPLB_DM IN ('01', '09') AND FYBH IS NULL AND HZDKLX_DM IS NULL and DKSQUUID = mx.uuid order by sqrq desc

select b.djxh, decode(b.bbbsq_dm, '4', '06', '3', '08', '2', '09', '1', '10') nsqx_dm, b.kjbbbsqx_dm sbqx_dm, ba.kjzdzz_dm from dj_cwkjzdjhsrjbabgs ba, dj_cwkjzdba_kjbbmc b, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where ba.cwkjzdbauuid = b.cwkjzdbauuid and ba.djxh = ls.djxh and ba.yxqq <= ? and ba.yxqz >= ? and ba.yxbz = ? and b.yxbz = ?
select t.* from sb_zyssb_skxxb t where t.sbuuid=?

/*国内消费税*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, c.xse bq81, /*应征消费税的销售额*/ c.ynse bq82, /*应纳税额*/ c.ynse_cjjz bq83, /*其中：从价计征的应纳税额*/ b.bqjmse bq84, /*减(免)税额*/ b.bqzykcse bq85, /*准予扣除应税消费品已纳税额*/ nvl(c.ynse, 0) - nvl(b.bqjmse, 0) - nvl(b.bqzykcse, 0) bq86, /*应纳税额合计*/ b.qcwjse bq87, /*期初未缴税额*/ nvl(b.bqjnqqynse, 0) + nvl(b.bqyjse, 0) bq88, /*本期已缴税额*/ b.qmwjse bq89 /*期末未缴税额*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_xfs b, (select sbuuid, pzxh, sum(xse) xse, sum(ynse) ynse, sum(case when zspm_dm not in ('101020109', '101020104', '101020105', '101020206', '101020207', '101020205', '101020202', '101020204') then ynse end) ynse_cjjz from sb_xfs_zb group by sbuuid, pzxh) c where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.sbuuid = c.sbuuid and b.pzxh = c.pzxh

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.fdcjylx_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from CS_ZDY_SBZMGLGZ a where trim(a.fdcjylx_dm) = ? and a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ?) a, (SELECT t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm FROM DM_GY_SWJG t START WITH t.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm) where xh = 1
select * from pz_ypr t where t.swry_dm=? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and t.yprlx_dm =?

select t.sbxxuuid, t.sbuuid, t.pzxh, t.pzmxxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.djxh, t.yzpzzl_dm, t.sbqx, t.ysbqx, t.nssbrq, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.ysx, t.jsyj, t.sl_1, t.ynse, t.yjse, t.jmse, t.ybtse, t.djzclx_dm, t.hy_dm, t.sbfs_dm, t.zsfs_dm, t.zsdlfs_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.ssgly_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.gzlx_dm_1, t.sbsx_dm_1, t.sybh_1, t.zszm_dm, t.rdpzuuid, t.gshgshdjxh, t.zspzmxxh from sb_gssbxx t where t.pzxh = ? and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

Select T2.* From Sb_Sbb T1, Sb_Sds_Fjmjs_14jd_Ssyhmxb T2 Where T1.Sbuuid = T2.Sbuuid And T1.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And T1.Djxh = ? And T1.Skssqq >= ? And T1.Skssqz <= ? And T1.Yzpzzl_Dm = ? And T1.Zfbz_1 = ? Order By T1.Skssqz Desc

SELECT T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.SJGSDQ, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.YBSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YJSFE, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.SFL, T.JSFYJ, T.YXKCJE, T.SRZE, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSXM_DM, T.SKSSQZ, T.SKSSQQ, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DKSQUUID, T.SFMXUUID, A.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE, A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, A.XZQHSZ_DM, A.JDXZ_DM, A.DJXH, A.SQDHM FROM FP_DK_SFMX T, FP_DK_SQ A WHERE T.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID AND A.DKSQUUID =? AND A.YBSFE > 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMXZJB X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.SFMXUUID = T.SFMXUUID)

SELECT B.* FROM SB_CXS_FYXXCJB A, SB_CXS_CZJZSYMXB B WHERE A.FYXXUUID = B.FYXXUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND B.SBZJSSZLQZ > TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.SBZJSSZLQQ < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND B.YXBZ = 'Y'
select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, bqynsfe bq129 from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_fjsf b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh and b.zsxm_dm=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND trunc(SYSDATE) BETWEEN T.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND T.PZHSJGYXZZRQ

update sb_cbqkxx a set (cbpzhm, cbjdw, cbmc, bz, zxrq, jldw_dm, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, sl_1, cbsbh, zszm_dm, jcenrq, fzrq, cjg, ccdjhm, qdsyqrq, zjzl, sbqx_dm, nsqx_dm, jkqx_dm, zfbz_1, fdjgl, tscd, xgr_dm, xgrq) = (select cbpzhm, cbjdw, cbmc, bz, zxrq, jldw_dm, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, sl_1, cbsbh, zszm_dm, jcenrq, fzrq, cjg, ccdjhm, qdsyqrq, zjzl, sbqx_dm, nsqx_dm, jkqx_dm, zfbz_1, fdjgl, tscd, swry_dm, sysdate from sb_ls_cbqkxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.cbsbh = b.cbsbh and rownum = 1) where (a.djxh, a.cbsbh) in (select djxh, cbsbh from sb_ls_cbqkxx) and nvl(zfbz_1,'N')='N'
select * from zs_yjsf t where t.djxh = ? and t.yzpzxh = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and t.skzl_dm <> '20' and t.skcllx_dm <> '6'

select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, jglx, clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from (select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '现行' as jglx, clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_clzdjsjgb where ('1' = #macroparam# or clcp = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clxh = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clscqymc = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clcpxh = ?) union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, zxzdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '暂行' as jglx, ZXLSXLH as clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_zxzdjsjg zxzdjsjg where zxzdjsjg.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or zxzdjsjg.clcp = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or zxzdjsjg.clxh = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or zxzdjsjg.clscqymc = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or zxzdjsjg.clcpxh = ?) and (#macroparam#) /*zxzdjsjg.hdswjg_dm in ()*/ union all select clcp, clxh, cdsx, clscqymc, cllx_dm, clcpxh, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, bazdjsjg as zdjsjg, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, '备案' as jglx, BALSXLH as clxlh,cllb_dm_1 from sb_cgs_bazdjsjghdb where zfbz_1 = 'N' and ('1' = #macroparam# or clcp = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clxh = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clscqymc = ?) and ('1' = #macroparam# or clcpxh = ?) and cjhdbz = 'N' and zgswjg_dm = ?)
select * from sb_zlbscjb a where djxh = ? and ssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and ssqz = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.bszl_dm=? and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

select y.hy_dm, y.zsxm_dm, y.zspm_dm, y.zszm_dm, y.skssqq, y.skssqz, y.kssl,y.jsyj,y.sl_1,y.yjse as kcse,y.ybtse as se,y.jkqx,y.yzpzzl_dm,y.zsuuid,y.xgrq,c.lrrq from zs_yjsf y, sb_yjsf_cjb c where y.zsuuid = c.zsuuid and c.lcslid = ?

Select a.* From Sb_Sbxx a, SB_SDS_FJMHD_YJND b Where a.Zfbz_1 = 'N' And a.Gzlx_Dm_1 In ('1', '4', '5') And a.Sbuuid = b.Sbuuid And a.Pzxh = b.Pzxh And a.Djxh = ? And a.Skssqq >= ? And a.Skssqz <= ? And a.Yzpzzl_Dm In (#macroparam#) And a.Sbsx_Dm_1 = ? And b.Yjdndsbbj = ?
select * from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx where zlbscjuuid = ?
Select t.* From Sb_Sds_Mbkstz t Where t.djxh = ? And t.nd In (#macroparam#) And nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')= 'N' Order By t.Nd Desc
SELECT * FROM CS_DJ_TDDWSESZB T WHERE T.TDDJ_DM = ? AND T.XZQHSZ_DM = ? AND (T.JDXZ_DM = ? OR T.JDXZ_DM IS NULL) AND T.YXQQ <= T.YXQZ AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.YXQQ

select c.fcjycjxxuuid, c.fyjbxxuuid, c.zlfclfbz, c.jyjg, c.htbh, c.htje, c.htqdsj, c.qsqszydx_dm, c.qsqszyyt_dm, c.qsqszylb_dm, c.fcjyfs_dm, c.kfbdcxmbh, c.sfptzfbz, c.bdcxmmc, c.fwcqzsh, c.bz, c.pgqs_jyjg, c.wbmjyjg, c.tdzzs_kccb, c.grsds_kchlfy, c.dqyskje, c.dqysskssyf, c.dj, c.ewbhxh, c.grzffcslx_dm, f.fybh, f.fwsdswjg_dm, f.xzqhsz_dm, f.jdxz_dm, f.tdfwdz, f.mj, f.fwzh, f.dyh, f.fjh, f.jzjglx_dm, f.tnmj, f.cx_dm, f.fyxxly, f.tdsybh, f.tdsyzbh, f.fh, f.lc_2, k.djxh, k.nsrsbh, k.nsrmc from sb_cxs_fcjycjxx c, sb_cxs_fyjbxx f, sb_cxs_fcjycjxx_jyf k where c.fyjbxxuuid = f.fyjbxxuuid and c.fcjycjxxuuid = k.fcjycjxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.kfbdcxmbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fwsdswjg_dm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or f.fybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.nsrmc = ?) and c.zlfclfbz = ? and k.zrfcsfbz = '0' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.ysbbz, 'N') = 'N'
select t.ldskyeuuid,t.djxh,t.ldskye,t.ygzsxqldskye,t.zgswskfj_dm from sb_zzs_ldskye t where t.djxh=? and t.yxbz='Y' and nvl(t.sdbz,'N')='N'
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_YFXMGJB T WHERE T.PZXH =? AND T.SBUUID =?
select * from pz_sspzxhsqzb t where t.zfbz_1='N' and t.zstybz='N' and t.bbdw_dm=?

select p.pkuuid from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_pkqc p where t.lsmxid = p.pkuuid and t.hhljid = ? and exists (select 1 from sb_sbxx x where x.zfbz_1 = 'N' and x.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and p.djxh = x.djxh and x.zgswskfj_dm like substr(p.zgswskfj_dm, 1, 5) || '%' and p.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm and p.zspm_dm = x.zspm_dm and nvl(x.sybh_1,'X') = nvl(p.sybh_1,nvl(x.sybh_1,'X')) and p.skssqq = x.skssqq and p.skssqz = x.skssqz)
select * from pz_gztzs t where t.gztzsuuid=?
select t.gzqdjxh from sb_cgs_gzwszmdjxhdzb t where t.pzxh=? order by lrrq
select b.* from sb_cgs_cljgxxcjmxb b where b.zfbz_1='N' /*(b.cjuuid in('',''))*/ and (#macroparam#)
select a.csfdjxh djxh, a.csf_dwhgrmc csfnsrmc, a.csfnsrsbh, a.Tdsybh, a.tdzlwz from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.czrf_nsrsbh=?

select * from (select a.*, rank() over(partition by a.fdcjylx_dm order by b.jgjc_dm desc) xh from (select * from CS_SB_FDCYTHSKPZB a ) a, (SELECT t.swjg_dm, t.jgjc_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg t START WITH t.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) b where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y') where xh = 1

select a.wsbuuid from sb_yqwsbqc a, sb_ls_sbxx sbxx where a.djxh = sbxx.djxh and a.zsxm_dm = sbxx.zsxm_dm and a.zspm_dm = sbxx.zspm_dm and a.skssqq <= sbxx.ssqz and a.skssqz >= sbxx.ssqq and a.sbrq_1 is null and a.zsdlfs_dm = sbxx.zsdlfs_dm and ((sbxx.zspm_dm in('101060300', '101060200') and sbxx.yzpzzl_dm in('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and not(sbxx.hy_dm in ('175','171','172') or sbxx.hy_dm like '41%') and not exists (select 1 from dj_tzfxx tzf where tzf.djxh = sbxx.djxh and tzf.yxqq <= sbxx.ssqq and tzf.yxqz >= sbxx.ssqz and tzf.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx gsxx where gsxx.tzfhhhrdjxh = tzf.tzfhhrdjxh and gsxx.sbsx_dm_1 = '11' and gsxx.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and gsxx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and gsxx.skssqq >= tzf.yxqq and gsxx.skssqz <= tzf.yxqz))) or (sbxx.zspm_dm not in('101060300', '101060200') or (sbxx.zspm_dm in('101060300', '101060200') and (sbxx.hy_dm in ('175','171','172') or sbxx.hy_dm like '41%')))) and sbxx.hhljid = ?

SELECT nvl(SUM(DKSQJE),0) FROM FP_DK_SQ A INNER JOIN FP_DK_FPKJXX B ON A.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID WHERE A.DJXH = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FP_DK_SFMX X WHERE X.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND X.DKSQUUID = A.DKSQUUID AND X.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND X.GLDKSQUUID IS NULL AND (X.ZSPM_DM NOT LIKE '101016%' AND X.ZSPM_DM NOT LIKE '101017%') AND x.dkfplb_dm IN('01','07') ) AND a.dkfplb_dm IN('01','07') AND b.KJRQ >=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND b.kjrq <to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1

SELECT A.* FROM SB_CXS_CJJZSYMXB A, SB_CXS_FYXXCJB B WHERE A.FYXXUUID = B.FYXXUUID AND A.YXBZ= 'Y' AND B.DJXH = ? AND ((A.YXQZ < TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.BGBM = '1') OR (A.YXQQ < TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.YXQZ > TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')))

select * from ( select s.nsrsbh, s.nsrmc, s.djxh, BZSPTM, jylb_dm_1,phgg from sb_sbb s, sb_xfs_fb_jypfqyyfxsmx m where s.sbuuid = m.sbuuid group by s.nsrsbh, s.nsrmc, s.djxh, BZSPTM, jylb_dm_1,phgg) AA, (select f.jytbzsptm, f.jyphgg, f.jylb_dm_1, f.jylx_dm_1, f.hzdxfsjsjg, f.slsbswjg_dm from SB_XFSJG_JYXFSJSJGHDB f where f.hdbz = 'N' or f.hdbz is null) BB where AA.BZSPTM=BB.jytbzsptm
select pzglyuuid, pzhsjg_dm, pzgly_dm, sjhsjg_dm, jgjc_dm, pzhsjgyxqsrq, pzhsjgyxzzrq, gkjsc_1, sjgsdq from pz_pzgly t WHERE t.yxbz = 'Y' #macroparam#
select * from SB_ZLBS_CLFXSXXB_GYRXX a where a.zlbscjuuid = ?

SELECT ZL.DZBZDSZL_DM, ZL.DZBZDSZLMC,ZL.DZBZDSZL_DM code, ZL.DZBZDSZLMC caption FROM DM_GY_DZBZDSZL ZL WHERE ZL.XYBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.YXBZ = 'Y' and ZL.DZBZDSZL_DM IN (SELECT A.DZBZDSZL_DM FROM CS_ZS_SPLRYZPZZL A WHERE A.SWJG_DM in (SELECT D.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG D START WITH D.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR D.SJSWJG_DM = D.SWJG_DM))

select a.* from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.cjbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(a.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and (? is null or a.tdsybh = ?) and a.csfdjxh = ? union all select a.* from sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb a, sb_zlbscjb b, sb_zlbs_tdczrxxb_gyrxx c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.cjbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zrfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and nvl(a.csfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and (? is null or a.tdsybh = ?) and a.csfdjxh = ? and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and a.uuid = c.tdcj_uuid
UPDATE SB_TDSYQKDJXX SET QH = ?, TDSYZFZJGMC = ? WHERE DJXH = ? AND TDSYBH = ?
select t.lrr_dm, t.clrq, t.bdnr, t.pbbdycyy, t.ycclfs, t.clyj, t.fhr_dm, t.fhrq, t.syglbmclyj, t.syglbmclr, t.syglbmclrq, t.jcbmclyj, t.jcbmclr, t.jcbmclrq from SB_SBBD_BDYCFHD t where t.lcslid=?

with abc as (select /*+materialize*/ b.* from sb_sbb a, sb_fcjy b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.yzpzzl_dm = ? and djxh = ?) select d.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb b, abc c, sb_zlbs_clfxsxxb_gyrxx d where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.mfNSRSBH = c.ZRFNSRSBH and b.GMFNSRSBH = c.csfnsrsbh and b.zlbscjuuid = d.zlbscjuuid and b.MFPZXH = c.pzxh and nvl(b.mfsbbz, 'N') = 'Y' and a.djxh = ?

SELECT B.QMKCWGSL FROM SB_SBB A, SB_XFS_FB_BQZYDJSE_JJ B WHERE A.SBUUID = B.SBUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.SKSSQQ = ? AND A.SKSSQZ = ? AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.GZLX_DM_1 IN ('1', '4', '5') ORDER BY b.lrr_dm DESC
select 1 from SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_CZZWCZFB1 t where t.nsrsbh=?

select t.czrfs as pzxh, cjb.djxh as zrfdjxh, t.tdsyzbh as tdsyzbh, t.tdsybh as sybh1, t.tdzlwz as syzlwz, t.tddj_dm tddjDm, t.tdmj tdmj, t.czrhtbh htbh, t.czrhtqdsj as htqdrq, t.qh as tdqh, t.jyjg as cjjg, t.czrf_nsrsbh as zrfnsrsbh, t.czrf_dwhgrmc as zrfmc, t.czrf_sfzjzl_dm as zrfsfzjzlDm, t.czrf_zjhm as zrfsfzjhm, t.tdyt_dm, t.zlbscjuuid as sbuuid, t.czrfnsrbz, t.czrf_dwhgrmc as zrfnsrmc from SB_ZLBS_TDCZRXXB t, sb_zlbscjb cjb WHERE cjb.zlbscjuuid = t.zlbscjuuid and nvl(cjb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and T.csfdjxh = ?

select distinct a.* from sb_zlbscjb a, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb b, sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx c where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and a.zlbscjuuid = c.zlbscjuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.zrfcsfbz = ? and a.bszl_dm = ? and a.ssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ssqz = to_Date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') #macroparam#

SELECT LZFPHM, LZFPDM, SQLY, LXDH, DZ, SKFNSRSBH, FKFNSRSBH, FKFDJXH, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SKFMC, SKFSFZJHM, SKFSFZJLX_DM, FKFMC, FKFSFZJHM, FKFSFZJZL_DM, DKSQUUID, BDCFPUUID, GYRMC FROM FP_DK_BDCFP WHERE DKSQUUID = ?
select a.* from sb_zlbs_zlfxsxxb_mx a, sb_zlbscjb b where a.zlbscjuuid = b.zlbscjuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.gfzdjxh = ?
SELECT hwysfpuuid, dksqclmxuuid, sfzjhm, cllx_dm, cblx_dm_1, clpzhm, cldw, sjgsdq, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgr_dm, xgrq FROM fp_dk_hwyszzsfp_clmx WHERE hwysfpuuid=?
SELECT * FROM SB_SDS_JMCZ_14ND_BFLGDMX t WHERE t.pzxh=? AND t.sbuuid=? AND t.mxuuid=?

/*本期抵扣进项税额结构明细表*/ select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, substr(?, 1, 4) year, substr(?, 5, 2) month, case when ewbhxh = '2' then se end bq28, /* 按税率：17%税率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '3' then se end bq29, /*其中：有形动产租赁的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '4' then se end bq30, /*13%税率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '5' then se end bq31, /*11%税率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '6' then se end bq32, /*其中：运输服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '7' then se end bq33, /*电信服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '8' then se end bq34, /*建筑安装服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '9' then se end bq35, /*不动产租赁服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '10' then se end bq36, /*受让土地使用权的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '11' then se end bq37, /*6%税率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '12' then se end bq38, /*其中：电信服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '13' then se end bq39, /*金融保险服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '14' then se end bq40, /*生活服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '15' then se end bq41, /*取得无形资产的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '16' then se end bq42, /*5%征收率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '17' then se end bq43, /*其中：不动产租赁服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '18' then se end bq44, /*3%征收率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '19' then se end bq45, /*其中：货物及加工、修理修配劳务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '20' then se end bq46, /*运输服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '21' then se end bq47, /*电信服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '22' then se end bq48, /*建筑安装服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '23' then se end bq49, /*金融保险服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '24' then se end bq50, /*有形动产租赁服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '25' then se end bq51, /*生活服务的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '26' then se end bq52, /*取得无形资产的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '27' then se end bq53, /* 减按1.5%征收率的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '29' then se end bq54, /* 用于购建不动产并一次性抵扣的进项*/ case when ewbhxh = '30' then se end bq55 /*通行费的进项*/ from sb_ls_zdsy_gy_sb_sbb a, sb_zzs_ybnsr_fb_jxsejgmxb b where a.sbuuid = b.sbuuid and a.pzxh = b.pzxh
select * from sb_sbb t where t.djxh=? and t.pzxh=? and t.sbuuid=? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') ='N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in('1','4','5')

SELECT T.SSPZTYZFUUID as uuid ,T.SSPZTYZFBH AS PZBH FROM pz_sspztyzfzb T WHERE T.BBDW_DM = ? AND T.GDBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SSPZTYZFBH BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY T.SSPZTYZFBH
